original: (gha) śūdrā ye'pi vā narā peyāpeyayorgabhyāgamyayoḥ śubhāśubhayośca bhedamakṛtvā nirvikalpataḥ pañcāmṛtaṁ pañcamahāmāṁsaṁ ca bhakṣayatumarhanti  #
analyzed: śūdrāḥ ye api vā peya apeyayoḥ gabhya agamyayoḥ śubha aśubhayoḥ ca bhedam a kṛtvā nirvikalpataḥ pañcāmṛtam pañcamahāmāsam ca bhakṣayatum arhanti  /

original: sāmānyataśca ye sādhakā viṣṭhāmūtrādīni dugdhavad niḥsaṅkocaṁ grahītuṁ śaknuvanti,

evam hevajra tantre sampuṭa tantra ādau bahuśas pratipāditam
vineya janeṣu caturṇām kleśānām prādhānyam bhavati

ati mūḍha janāya kriyā tantram
ati alpa mūḍha janāya caryā tantra

ati tīkṣṇa indriya vineya janāya anuttara yoga tantram ca buddhaḥ adikṣat

original: ye pudgalā mandendriyā bāhyasnānādyabhilāṣiṇasteṣāṁ kṛte citralikhitāyāṁ dravyanirmitāyāṁ vā mūrtau devatāyā bhāvanaṁ pūjanaṁ ca kriyātantre  #
analyzed: ye pudgalāḥ manda indriyāḥ bāhya snāna ādi abhilāṣiṇaḥ teṣām kṛte citra likhitāyām dravya nirmitāyām vā mūrtau devatāyāḥ bhāvanam pūjanam ca kriyā tantre
nirdiṣṭam
madhyama indriya pudgalānām bāhya rūpeṇa ca devatā bhāvanā caryām anuṣṭhātum caryātantram

original: taduttamasādhakānāṁ kṛte jñānādevāvāhanapūrvakaṁ tasya ca bhāvyamānasamayadeve vilayanaṁ devayogabhāvanāyai yogatantraṁ,
analyzed: tad uttama sādhakānām kṛte jñānāt eva āvāhana pūrvakam tasya ca bhāvyamāna samaya deve vilayanam deva yoga bhāvanāyai yogatantra
sarva śreṣṭha pudgalebhyaḥ hi anuttara yogatantram nirdiṣṭa

original: 5. caturvāsanānāṁ kṣayāyāpi caturvidhatantrāṇāṁ deśanā kṛtā yathā ca kāalcakratantre - prajñātantraṁ hi pūrvāt punaraparamukhādeva yogānuviddhaṁ  #
analyzed: catur vāsanānām kṣayāya api caturvidha tantrāṇām deśanā kṛtā yathā ca kāalcakratantre prajñā tantram hi pūrvāt punar apara mukhāt eva yoga anuviddham
savya āsyāt yogatantram gadati jinapatiḥ vāma vaktrāt kriyā ādyam

original: yogācāraṁ hi pūrvāt punaraparamukhānmadhyamaṁ vai samastaṁ sūtrāntaṁ savyavaktrād gadati sitamukhāt śuddhavaibhāṣikaṁ ca ||
analyzed: yoga ācāram hi pūrvāt punar apara mukhāt madhyamam vai samastam sūtrāntam savya vaktrāt gadati sita mukhāt śuddha vaibhāṣikam ca

original: (5/48) nidrābhaṅge sati nindāvasanayā bāhyajagatyabhiniveśasya prahāṇāya vāmamukhena kriyātantraṁ,
analyzed: nidrā bhaṅge sati nindā vasanayā bāhya jagatī abhiniveśasya prahāṇāya vāma mukhena kriyātantra

original: dakṣiṇamukhena svapravāsanayā prabhāvite citte ābhāsamātrasyābhiniveśaṁ prahātuṁ caryātantram abhimukhena atinidrāvāsanayā bāhyavikalpebhyaḥ  #
analyzed: dakṣiṇa mukhena sva pravāsanayā prabhāvite citte ābhāsa mātrasya abhiniveśam prahātum caryā tantram abhimukhena ati nidrā vāsanayā bāhya vikalpebhyaḥ
prakaṭita abhiniveśānām prāhāṇāya yogatantra

original: pṛṣṭhamukhena vāsanāvaśāt sarvasūkṣmavikalpābhiniveśavāsanājanyadharmābhiniveśaprahāṇāya prahāṇārtham anuttaratantraṁ ca deśitam |
analyzed: pṛṣṭha mukhena vāsanā vaśāt sarva sūkṣma vikalpa abhiniveśa vāsanā janya dharma abhiniveśa prahāṇāya prahāṇa artham anuttara tantram ca deśitam

original: 6. yasmin tantre jalaghaṭabhiṣekavidhānamātraṁ tatkriyātantraṁ yatra ca vajraghaṇṭā''darśadharmadeśanānujñādyabhikṣekavidhānaṁ taccaryātantraṁ,
analyzed: yasmin tantre jala ghaṭa bhiṣeka vidhāna mātram tat kriyātantram yatra ca vajraghaṇṭā ādarśa dharma deśanā anujñā ādi abhikṣeka vidhānam tat caryātantram
vajrācārya ādi kalaśa sambaddha ekādaśa abhiṣeka vidhāyakam hi yogatantra
yatra guhya prajñā jñāna caturtha abhiṣeka vidhānam tat anuttara yogatantram ucyate
caturyuga anusāram api tantra catuṣṭāyasya deśanā abhimanyate

original: yathā satyatretādvāparakaliyugeṣu kramaśaḥ kriyā-caryā-yogānuttarayogatantrāṇāṁ deśanā bhagavatā vidhīyate |
analyzed: yathā satya tretā dvāpara kali yugeṣu kramaśas kriyā caryā yoga anuttara yoga tantrāṇām deśanā bhagavatā vidhīyate
rāgasya āyāma catuṣṭaya mārgīkaraṇa artham api kriyātantra prabhṛtikam tantra catuṣṭayam deśitam
yathā hāsa mārgīkaraṇāya kriyātantra
darśanasya kṛte caryātantra
āliṅganasya ca mārgīkaraṇāya anuttara yoga tantram deśitam

original: 9. bauddhānāṁ vaibhāṣikādicatuḥ siddhāntavādinaḥ anugrahītumapi tantrāṇāṁ catvāro vibhāgāḥ akriyanta |
analyzed: bauddhānām vaibhāṣika ādi catuḥ siddhānta vādinaḥ anugrahītum api tantrāṇām catvāraḥ vibhāgāḥ akriyanta

original: yathā vaibhāṣikeṣu bāhyārthasattā manyate tānanugrahītuṁ pratyakṣataḥ paṭacitre nyaste jñānadevamāvāhya tadhṛdaye mantraṁ sannyasya svayaṁ  #
analyzed: yathā vaibhāṣikeṣu bāhya artha sattāḥ manyate tān anugrahītum pratyakṣataḥ paṭa citre nyaste jñānadevam āvāhya tad hṛdaye mantram san nyasya svayam

original: ca snānādikriyātaḥ śuddhībhūya siddhiḥkāmyate atastebhyaḥ kriyātantraṁ vartate |
analyzed: ca snāna ādi kriyātaḥ śuddhībhūya siddhiḥ kāmyate atas tebhyaḥ kriyā tantram vartate
sautrāntikaiḥ grāhya grāhakayoḥ kṣaṇika tvam aṇu tvam ca aṅgīkriyate
atas tān anugrahītum caryā tantram

original: yasmiṁśca svayaṁ samayadevaṁ bhāvayitvā svasammukhaṁ jñānasattvamāvāhya tadhṛdaye mantraṁ sannyasya īṣṭadevaṁ mitrasamaṁ matvā siddhimavāptuṁ  #
analyzed: yasmin ca svayam samayadevam bhāvayitvā sva sammukham jñāna sattvam āvāhya tad hṛdaye mantram san nyasya īṣṭadevam mitra samam matvā siddhim avāptum
vidhiḥ pratyapādyata

original: vijñānavādino bāhyārthaṁ na mattvā ābhyantarikagrāhyagrāhakādvayasvasaṁvedyaṁ paramārthaṁ svīkurvanti,
analyzed: vijñāna vādinaḥ bāhya artham na mattvā ābhyantarika grāhya grāhaka advaya sva sa vedyam paramārtham svīkurvanti

original: teṣāṁ darśana-cintanānurūpaṁ svasaṁvedyasvarūpadevaṁ bhāvayitvā tasmin jñānadevaṁ vilīya mantrāvṛttimanu jñānadevaṁ visarjayanti yaśca yogatantrasya  #
analyzed: teṣām darśana cintana anurūpam sva sa vedya svarūpa devam bhāvayitvā tasmin jñānadevam vilīya mantra āvṛttim anu jñānadevam visarjayanti yaḥ ca yogatantrasya
vidhiḥ ucyate

original: mādhyamikāḥ saṁvṛtau viṣayaviṣayiṇoḥ dvaitabhāvasthitiṁ svīkṛtya paramārthātmikāṁ kāṁcidapi sattāṁ na manyante |
analyzed: mādhyamikāḥ sa vṛtau viṣaya viṣayiṇoḥ dvaita bhāva sthitim svīkṛtya paramārtha ātmikām kācid api sattām na manyante

original: ataḥ svayaṁ samayadevaṁ bhāvanāviṣayībhūtaṁ vidhāya tasmin jñānadevaṁ vilīya vinā visarjanameva tiṣṭhanti yaccānuttarayogatantrasya vidhurudyate
analyzed: atas svayam samayadevam bhāvanā viṣayībhūtam vidhāya tasmin jñānadevam vilīya vinā visarjanam eva tiṣṭhanti yat ca anuttara yogatantrasya vidhuḥ udyate

original: itthaṁ-devabhāvanāyāḥ vibhinnacaturvidhibhirapi tantraśāstraṁ caturṣu bhāgeṣu vibhajyate,
analyzed: ittha deva bhāvanāyāḥ vibhinna catur vidhibhiḥ api tantra śāstram caturṣu bhāgeṣu vibhajyate
evam nāgārjuna ādi siddha gaṇaiḥ aṅgīkriyate
tibbatīya viduṣām api abhimatam etat eva

original: tantraśāstrāṇāṁ tripiṭakatvavicāraḥ kiṁ bhagavadbuddhenopadiṣṭāni sarvāṇi vacanāni tripiṭake saṁgṛhītāni?
analyzed: tantra śāstrāṇām tripiṭaka tva vicāraḥ kim bhagavat buddhena upadiṣṭāni sarvāṇi vacanāni tripiṭake sa gṛhītāni

original: sūtrālaṅkāre etaduttaramittham - piṭakatrayaṁ dvayaṁ vā saṁgṛhṇataḥ kāraṇairnavabhiriṣṭam |
analyzed: sūtra alaṅkāre etat uttaram ittham piṭaka trayam dvayam vā sa gṛhṇataḥ kāraṇaiḥ navabhiḥ iṣṭam
vāsana bodhana śamana prativedhaiḥ tat vimocayati
arthāt sarvāṇi dvādaśa pravacāni sūtra geya vyākaraṇa gāthā dāna jātaka vaipulya adbhuta dharma prabhṛtīni
piṭaka traye sa gṛhītāni
yeṣām ca navabhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ siddhiḥ vihitā
kintantrāṇi api tripiṭake

original: viṣāye'smin viduṣāṁ matavaibhinnyaṁ yathā ca abhidharmakośe vasubandhunā nyagādi - dharmaskandhasahasrāṇi yānyaśītiṁ jagau muniḥ |
analyzed: viṣāye asmin viduṣām mata vaibhinnyam yathā ca abhidharmakośe vasubandhunā nyagādi dharma skandha sahasrāṇi yāni aśītim jagau muniḥ
tāni vāc nāma vā iti eṣām rūpa saskāra sagrahaḥ
śāstra pramāṇaḥ iti eke skandha ādīnām kathā ekaśas
carita pratipakṣaḥ tu dharma skandhaḥ anuvarṇitaḥ
aśītiḥ sahasrāṇi dharma skandhāḥ buddhena upādiśyanta
kim tat svarūpam etad nirṇayaḥ atra na anuṣṭhīyate
dharma skandhaḥ kaḥ

original: ityetad vicārayiṣyate yena ca buddhena vihitānām aśītisahasradharmaskandhānāṁ pravacanāśayasya pratītirbhavet piṭakavyavasthāpi varṇitā syāt
analyzed: iti etat vicārayiṣyate yena ca buddhena vihitānām aśīti sahasra dharma skandhānām pravacana āśayasya pratītiḥ bhavet piṭaka vyavasthā api varṇitā syāt
tathyam idam abhidharmakośa vyākhyāyām spaṣṭīkṛtam
dharma skandhasya kim pramāṇam
yat śāstrasya pramāṇam tat eva asya pramāṇam iti keṣācid matam
dharma skandha sajñakasya abhidharmakośasya pramāṇam ṣaṣ sahasra mitāḥ gāthāḥ santi

original: kiñcitskandhānām ekaikā gāthā ekaikaḥ dharmaskandha eva |
analyzed: kiñcid skandhānām ekaikā gāthā ekaikaḥ dharma skandhaḥ eva
anye tu skandha āyatana dhātu pratītyasamutpāda ārya satya āhāra dhyāna apramāṇa ārūpya vimokṣa praṇidhi praṇidhi jñāna prabhṛtīni aikaikāni ākhyānāni ekaikāḥ
dharma skandhāḥ vartante

original: svamataṁ pradarśayatā vasubandhunābhidhīyate - pratyekaṁ dharmaskandhaḥ ekaikasya caritasya vineyajanānāṁ pratipakṣāyānuvarṇitaḥ |
analyzed: sva matam pradarśayatā vasubandhunā abhidhīyate pratyekam dharma skandhaḥ ekaikasya caritasya vineya janānām pratipakṣāya anuvarṇitaḥ
atas carita bhedena sattvānām sakhyā aśīti sahasra mitā

original: kaścidrāgacaritaḥ anyaśca dveṣacaritastarhi kaścinmohacaritaḥ kaścicca mānacaritaḥ |
analyzed: kaścid rāga caritaḥ anyaḥ ca dveṣa caritaḥ tarhi kaścid moha caritaḥ kaścid ca māna caritaḥ
bhagavatā aśīti sahasra dharma skandhāḥ sattvānām kleśa pratipakṣe deśitāḥ

original: mahāyānibhiścaturaśītisahasramitā dharmaskandhā manyante te ca tattvasākṣātkārāyopadiṣṭā ityabhimanyate |
analyzed: mahāyānibhiḥ caturaśīti sahasra mitāḥ dharma skandhāḥ manyante te ca tattva sākṣātkārāya upadiṣṭāḥ iti abhimanyate

original: cīnībhāṣāyāmāmanūdite “kṛto ṛṇa” sūtre mahāyāninaḥ anantadharmaskandhā babhūvurityeṣā vārtā samuktā,
analyzed: cīnī bhāṣāyām āmanūdite kṛtoṃ ṛṇa sūtre mahāyāninaḥ ananta dharma skandhāḥ babhūvuḥ iti eṣā vārttā samuktā

original: anyaccedamapi yad devadattasya pañcasahasragajānāṁ bhāropamapramāṇavantaḥ sūtragranthā kaṇṭhasthā āsan |
analyzed: anyat ca idam api yat devadattasya pañca sahasra gajānām bhāra upama pramāṇavantaḥ sūtra granthā kaṇṭha sthāḥ āsan
etena sidhyati pāramitā yāne sūtra sakhyā aparimitā ca āsīt

original: vajrayāne'pi rāgasya damanāya ekaviṁśatisahasramitāni vinayapiṭakāni dveṣasya ca damanāya ekaviṁśatisahasrasūtrapiṭakāni mohasya pratipakṣe  #
analyzed: vajrayāne api rāgasya damanāya ekaviśati sahasra mitāni vinaya piṭakāni dveṣasya ca damanāya ekaviśati sahasra sūtra piṭakāni mohasya pratipakṣe

original: ekaviṁśatisahasrābhidharmapiṭakāi sāmānyarūpeṇa ca sarvāvaraṇakṣayāyaikaviṁśatisahasrāṇi caturthapiṭakānyarthāt caturaśītisahasramitadharmaskandhāḥ  #
analyzed: ekaviśati sahasra abhidharma piṭakāi sāmānya rūpeṇa ca sarva āvaraṇa kṣayāya ekaviśati sahasrāṇi caturtha piṭakāni arthāt caturaśīti sahasra mita dharma skandhāḥ
buddhena deśitāḥ manyante
tantra granthaḥ caturtha piṭakaḥ sūtrāntaḥ vā ucyate

original: maṅjuśrīmūlakalpe'pi - yo hīmaṁ sūtravaraṁ mukhyaṁ dharmakośaṁ jinorjitam |
analyzed: maṅjuśrī mūlakalpe api  yaḥ hi imam sūtra varam mukhyam dharma kośam jina ūrjitam

original: pratikṣeptāro bhuvi martyā vā avīcau narakāntakau ||
analyzed: pratikṣeptāraḥ bhuvi martyāḥ vā avīcau naraka antakau

original: (54/75) punastatraiva - yatra tatra gatiryāti kumatistatra jāyate |
analyzed: punar tatra eva yatra tatra gatiḥ yāti kumatiḥ tatra jāyate
pratikṣepāt idam sūtram tatra tatra upapadyate
arthāt tantram sūtrasya sutrānta piṭakasya ca antargatam manyate
guhya siddhau api kriyā caryā ādi bhedena
sūtrānta piṭaka ādibhiḥ
ekam eva param śuddham na eka ākāram vyavasthitam
prajñopāyasiddhau api abhihitam tathā traiyadhva sambuddhaiḥ jagat ānanda kārakaiḥ
ākhyātaḥ aneka sūtrānta mantra caryā ādiṣu kramāt

original: (2/4) ataścaturthapiṭakaṁ sūtrāntaṁ bhavituṁ śakyam yato hi vidvadbhiranyairapi tantraṁ sūtrāntapiṭakasya vidyādharapiṭakasyānto matam |
analyzed: atas caturtha piṭakam sūtrāntam bhavitum śakyam yatas hi vidvadbhiḥ anyaiḥ api tantram sūtrānta piṭakasya vidyādhara piṭakasya antaḥ matam

original: śraddhāvarmaṇā'pi mantrayānaṁ tripiṭake ca sammelitam api tu vidyādharapiṭakaṁ cedamucyate |
analyzed: śraddhāvarmaṇā api mantra yānam tripiṭake ca sammelitam api tu vidyādhara piṭakam ca idam ucyate

original: yataścedaṁ mahāyāni-piṭakam viśiṣṭaṁ sthānamādadhāti vidyādharapadaprāptyai naike upāyā samupabṛṁhitāścātra |
analyzed: yatas ca idam mahāyānipiṭakam viśiṣṭam sthānam ādadhāti vidyādhara pada prāptyai na eke upāyā samupabṛhitāḥ ca atra
atas caturtha piṭakasya vidyādhara piṭaka tvam ucyate

original: yathā ca vinayapiṭakadhārako vinayadharaḥ sūtrapiṭakadhārakāśca sūtradharādayaḥ kathyante tathaiva ca tantrapiṭakadhārako vidyādharo manyate
analyzed: yathā ca vinaya piṭaka dhārakaḥ vinayadharaḥ sūtra piṭaka dhārakāḥ ca sūtradhara ādayaḥ kathyante tathā eva ca tantra piṭaka dhārakaḥ vidyādharaḥ manyate
buddha guhyena api tantram idam deva mantrayoḥ abhinna tvam pratipādayati iti uktam

original: abhayākaraguptena subāhuparipṛcchāsūtraṁ samuddharatā prāvoci devāsurāṇāṁ hitāya guhyamantraḥ vidyāmantrādiṣu naikeṣu bhedopabhedeṣu pañcalakṣato'pyadhikāni  #
analyzed: abhayākaraguptena subāhu paripṛcchā sūtram samuddharatā prāvoci deva asurāṇām hitāya guhya mantraḥ vidyā mantra ādiṣu na ekeṣu bheda upabhedeṣu pañca lakṣataḥ api adhikāni

original: vidyādharapiṭakāni samupādiśyanta tathā cedaṁ caturthapiṭakam cocyate |
analyzed: vidyādharapiṭakāni samupādiśyanta tathā ca idam caturtha piṭakam ca ucyate

original: śāntipādo vaipulyasūtreṣu tantropadeśena teṣāṁ sūtrapiṭakāntargatatvaṁ manute,
analyzed: śāntipādaḥ vaipulya sūtreṣu tantra upadeśena teṣām sūtra piṭaka antargata tvam manute

original: vakti ca yat dvādaśāṅgapravacanadharmeṣu deśitatvādetāni sūtrāṇi ca santi |
analyzed: vakti ca yat dvādaśa aṅga pravacana dharmeṣu deśita tvāt etāni sūtrāṇi ca santi

original: yogaratnamālāyāmapi - “avadānaśatakatridaṇḍakamālādikaṁsūtrāntamiti anabhigambhīrāṇi sūtrāṇi sūtrāntāni ekagāthā-caturgāthā upadhāriṇī ṣaṇmukhī  #
analyzed: yogaratnamālāyām api avadāna śataka tridaṇḍaka mālā ādika sūtrāntam iti an abhigambhīrāṇi sūtrāṇi sūtrāntāni ekagāthā caturgāthā upadhāriṇī ṣaṇmukhī  /

original: śāntipādo'bhidhatte yat sāmānyato vayaṁ buddhaśikṣāḥ śīlasamādhiprajñākhyaskandhatraye vibhajya tripiṭakaṁ vyākhyāmastarhi tantrāṇyapi piṭakatraye  #
analyzed: śāntipādaḥ abhidhatte yat sāmānyatas vayam buddha śikṣāḥ śīla samādhi prajñā ākhya skandha traye vibhajya tripiṭakam vyākhyāmaḥ tarhi tantrāṇi api piṭaka traye
abhidheya dṛṣṭyā sammilitāni bhavanti

original: yathā ca tantreṣu yatra samaya-saṁvarāṇāṁ nirdeśaḥ vinayapiṭake,
analyzed: yathā ca tantreṣu yatra samaya savarāṇām nirdeśaḥ vinaya piṭake

original: dharmāṇāṁ svalakṣaṇāni sāmānyalakṣaṇāni ca yatra pratipāditāni,
analyzed: dharmāṇām sva lakṣaṇāni sāmānya lakṣaṇāni ca yatra pratipāditāni
tāni abhidharmapiṭake
gūḍha artha ādikam samādheḥ
yatra pratipāditam tat sūtra piṭake sa gṛhītam manyate

original: raṅjuṅ dorje etaccaturthapiṭakaṁ manyate etasmin piṭakatrayasya viṣayasamāveśatvāt |
analyzed: etat caturtha piṭakam manyate etasmin piṭaka trayasya viṣaya samāveśa tvāt
tasmāt vidyādhara piṭakasya śīla prajñā samādhi pratipādaka tvāt tasya caturtha piṭaka tvam kathyate

original: punarapi buddhaguhyamate gambhīrārthasya saṁkṣepeṇa varṇitatvādetat sūtrapiṭake'pi saṁgrahītuṁ śakyate |
analyzed: punar api buddha guhya mate gambhīra arthasya sakṣepeṇa varṇita tvāt etat sūtra piṭake api sa grahītum śakyate

tantra vargīkaraṇam abhidhāna diśā abhidhāna dṛṣṭyā vidvadbhiḥ tantrāṇām vargīkaraṇam ittham vyadhāyi bustona mahodayena mūla tantra uttara tantra uttarottara tantra sagraha tantra uttarika tantra vyākhyā tantra sabhāgīya tantrāṇām
nāmnā tantrāṇi sapta bhāgeṣu vyabhajyanta
ekapacāśat pariccheda sahitam uttara uttara tantram
buddha kapāla uttarika tantram sampuṭa udbhava sabhgīya tantram ca asti
tantre praveśa bheda anusāram mūla tantra parīkṣā tantra uttara tantra uttarottara tantra vyākhyā tantra garbha tantra phala tantra atyadbhuta tantra nāmabhiḥ tantrāṇi aṣṭasu
bhāgeṣu vibhājitāni

original: śākyasodanamacemo mahodayena tantrasya mūlatantrasaṁgrahatantra-vyākhyātantrottaratantra uttarottaratantraprabhṛtayaḥ ye pañca bhedā vyadhīyanta,
analyzed: śākyasodana macemaḥ mahodayena tantrasya mūla tantra sagraha tantra vyākhyā tantra uttara tantre uttarottara tantra prabhṛtayaḥ ye pañca bhedāḥ vyadhīyanta
tat mūla tantram vartate
yat mūlam ādhārīkṛtya vyākhyā rūpeṇa samupādeśi
tat vyākhyā tantram vyāhṛyate
ubhayasya ca dvau dvau bhedau
yathā mūlavistāratantram mūlasagrahatantram ca
sāmānya vyākhyā tantram asāmānya tantram ca

original: (ka) mūlavistāratantraṁ tattantramucyate yadupadeśaḥ svayaṁ buddhena vineyajanahitāya cakre |
analyzed: mūla vistāra tantram tat tantram ucyate yat upadeśaḥ svayam buddhena vineya jana hitāya cakre
yat viṣṇu śiṣyāṇām prayojanena upadiṣṭam tat sa graha mūla tantram nigadyate
vibhinna tantrāṇām āśaya spaṣṭa kāri tantram sāmānya vyākhyā tantram ucyate
yat ca kiñcid viśeṣa mūla tantra āśayān spaṣṭīkurute tat asāmānya vyākhyā tantram
ṣaḍbhiḥ hetubhiḥ vyākhyā tantram ucyate   mūla tantra gūḍha āśayam spaṣṭāyati
a pūrṇa viṣayam pūrayati
vibhinna vidhīn pratipādayati
sa kṣipta viṣayān vistārayati
sārāśam bodhayati
śada artham su spaṣṭam vyākhyāti
ime bhedāḥ kevalam anuttara tantrasya grantheṣu upalabhyante
kriyā ādi tantreṣu ca sarve bhedāḥ na upalabhyante
yathā ca kriyātantre mūlatantra uttaratantra uttarottara tantra vyākhyātantra nāmakāḥ catvāraḥ bhedāḥ upalabhyante
caryā tantre mūlatantra uttaratantra uttarottara tantra ākhyāḥ bhedāḥ vartante
yogatantre ca mūlatantra uttaratantra vyākhyātantra iti bheda trayam upalabhyate

original: khasaḍubaje ityanena yogatantra uttaratantrasya sthāne sabhāgatantraṁ parigaṇyate |
analyzed: iti anena yoga tantre uttara tantrasya sthāne sa bhāga tantram parigaṇyate
itthantantrāṇām ābhyantara bhedāḥ na eke santi
ete ca sarve sūtra piṭake sagṛhītāḥ santi

original: buddhatvāvāptervibhinnā adhvānaḥ bhagavatā buddhena nānāvidhavineyajanebhyaḥ svādhyāśayābhirucisāmarthyānusāraṁ vividhopāyā vibhinnā dharmā  #
analyzed: buddha tva avāpteḥ vibhinnāḥ adhvānaḥ bhagavatā buddhena nānāvidha vineya janebhyaḥ svādhyāśaya abhiruci sāmarthya anusāram vividha upāyāḥ vibhinnāḥ dharmāḥ
upādiśyanta

original: buddhaḥ yacchiṣyebhyo yadupāyaṁ mārgañca dideśa svayaṁ buddho'pi tadeva mārgamanusṛtya buddhatvāvāptiṁ svīcakāra,
analyzed: buddhaḥ yat śiṣyebhyaḥ yat upāyam mārgan ca dideśa svayam buddhaḥ api tat eva mārgam anusṛtya buddha tva avāptim svīcakāra

original: yena ca vineyajanāstanmārgaṁ niṣṭhayā samarpitabhāvena cānuśīlayantu |
analyzed: yena ca vineya janāḥ tad mārgam niṣṭhayā samarpita bhāvena ca anuśīlayantu

original: nāstyatra saṁśītileśo yat śrāvakayānimahāyānivajrayāninaśca svasvavibhimārgānurūpameva buddhatvaṁ svīkurvanti evaṁ ca svatantraikavyavasthāṁ  #
analyzed: na asti atra sa śīti leśaḥ yat śrāvaka yāni mahāyāni vajra yāninaḥ ca sva sva vibhi mārga anurūpam eva buddha tvam svīkurvanti evam ca svatantra eka vyavasthām
pratipādayanti
śrāvaka yāne api yāna traya vyavasthā upalabhyate

original: yathā'bhidharmakośe pratyekabuddha-samyaksambuddhaprādurbhāvaviṣaye samuktam - buddhatvamapakarṣe tu śatād yāvattadudbhavaḥ |
analyzed: yathā abhidharmakośe pratyekabuddha samyaksambuddha prādurbhāva viṣaye samuktam buddha tvam apakarṣe tu śatāt yāvat tad udbhavaḥ
dvayoḥ pratyekabuddhānām khaḍgaḥ kalpa śata anvayaḥ
khaḍgaḥ śata kalpa paryantam bodhi sambhārāya śīla samādhi prajñābhyaḥ

original: prayatate sa cāntimajanmani śrutāgamamantareṇa svātantryeṇa bodhiṁ labhate |
analyzed: prayatate sa ca antima janmani śruta āgamam antareṇa svātantryeṇa bodhim labhate

original: svayaṁ mokṣasādhitattvādayaṁ pratyekabuddho yo hi parasmai dharmaṁ na diśati |
analyzed: svayam mokṣa sādhi tattvāt ayam pratyekabuddhaḥ yaḥ hi parasmai dharmam na diśati
tad mārga spaṣṭīkaraṇam abhisamaya alaṅkāre yathā para upadeśa vaiyarttyam svayam bodhāt svayambhuvām
gambhīra tā ca jñānasya khaḍgānām abhidhīyate

original: śuśrūṣā yasya yasyārthe yatra yatra yathā yathā |
analyzed: śuśrūṣā yasya yasya arthe yatra yatra yathā yathā

original: sa so'rthaḥ khyātyaśabdo'pi tasya tasya tathā tathā ||
analyzed: sa saḥ arthaḥ khyāti aśabdaḥ api tasya tasya tathā tathā
grāhya artha kalpanā hānāt grāhakasya aprahāṇataḥ
ādhārataḥ ca vijñeyaḥ khaḍga mārgasya sa grahaḥ

original: (2.6-8) bodhisattvasambandhe'bhidharmakośasya caturthakośasthāne karmanirdeśe coktam - bodhisattvaḥ kuto yāvadyato lakṣaṇakarmakṛt |
analyzed: bodhisattva sambandhe abhidharmakośasya caturtha kośa sthāne karma nirdeśe ca uktam bodhisattvaḥ kutas yāvat yatas lakṣaṇa karma kṛt
sugatiḥ kula jaḥ adhyakṣaḥ pumān jātismaraḥ anivṛt
sa tad karma kartā dvātriśat lakṣaṇāni samutpādayate

original: sa ca niyato bodhisattvastadanu jambūdvīpe puruṣabhāvamākṣipati |
analyzed: sa ca niyataḥ bodhisattvaḥ tadanu jambūdvīpe puruṣa bhāvam ākṣipati
bodhi cintakaḥ tri asa khyeya kalpa antam puṇya sambhāram cinoti

original: ekāsanasthaḥ prayogamārgataḥ aśaikṣamārgāntaṁ sarvajñānāni sākṣātkṛtya buddho jāyate |
analyzed: eka āsana sthaḥ prayoga mārgataḥ a śaikṣa mārga antam sarva jñānāni sākṣātkṛtya buddhaḥ jāyate

original: evaṁ śrāvakayānīyābhidharmakoṣānusāraṁ neyaṁ mānyatā yat buddho naikakalpapūrvameva bodhimupalebhe tathā siddhārthasya punaḥ saṁsāre janma-gṛhatyāgābhiniṣkramaṇatapasyābodhilābhādikaṁ  #
analyzed: evam śrāvaka yānīya abhidharmakoṣa anusāram na iyam mānya tā yat buddhaḥ na eka kalpa pūrvam eva bodhim upalebhe tathā siddhārthasya punar sa sāre janma gṛha tyāga abhiniṣkramaṇa tapasyā bodhi lābha ādikam

original: līlātvena mahāyānimānyatānusāreṇa na svīkriyate'pi tu asaṁkhyakalpeṣu sambhāradvayaṁ saṁcitya vaiśākhapaurṇamāsyāṁ yāmacatuṣṭaye prayoga-darśanabhāvanāmārgaṁ  #
analyzed: līlā tvena mahāyānimānyatā anusāreṇa na svīkriyate api tu asakhya kalpeṣu sambhāra dvayam sacitya vaiśākha paurṇamāsyām yāma catuṣṭaye prayoga darśana bhāvanā mārgam

original: ca sākṣātkṛtya uṣasi tena buddhatvamavāptam iti manyate |
analyzed: ca sākṣātkṛtya uṣasi tena buddha tvam avāptam iti manyate

original: 2. mahāyānam mahāyānibhirmahāyānottaratantre pratipādyānurūpaṁ buddhasya bodhagayāyāṁ bodhiprāptirneyārthamātraṁ manyate,
analyzed: mahāyānam mahā yānibhiḥ mahāyāna uttara tantre pratipādya anurūpam buddhasya bodha gayāyām bodhi prāptiḥ neyārtha mātram manyate

original: nītārthe ca buddhaḥ pūrvata eva labdhabordhirmanyate |
analyzed: nīta arthe ca buddhaḥ pūrvatas eva labdha bordhiḥ manyate

original: vajrayānibhirnāmasaṅgītau pratipāditānurūpam ahetuka ādibuddha iva no manyate tathaiva pāramitāyānibhirnābhidhīyate'pi tu bodhicittamutpādya  #
analyzed: vajrayānibhiḥ nāma saṅgītau pratipādita anurūpam ahetukaḥ ādibuddhaḥ iva naḥ manyate tathā eva pāramitāyānibhiḥ nā abhidhīyate api tu bodhi cittam utpādya

original: kramaśaḥ mahāyānamanuśīlya tryasaṁkhyakalpānāmanantaraṁ buddhatvamavāpi iti manyate |
analyzed: kramaśas mahāyānam anuśīlya tri asakhya kalpānām anantaram buddha tvam avāpi iti manyate

original: śrāvakayānibhiḥ svānuśīlanamārgeṇa mahāyānibhiśca svamārgamanuśīlya bodhiravāpyateti manyate |
analyzed: śrāvaka yānibhiḥ sva anuśīlana mārgeṇa mahā yānibhiḥ ca sva mārgam anuśīlya bodhiḥ avāpyata iti manyate

original: yathā ca viśeṣastave buddhaṁ sambodhyābhāṇibhavatā yanmārgamanugamya buddhatvamavāpyate sa eva mārgaḥ svīyaśiṣyebhyo'pi nirdiśyate |
analyzed: yathā ca viśeṣa stave buddham sambodhya ābhāṇi bhavatā yat mārgam anugamya buddha tvam avāpyate saḥ eva mārgaḥ svīya śiṣyebhyaḥ api nirdiśyate

original: tantradeśanāyā bhedāḥ mahāyānaṁ pāramitāyānaya-mantranayākhyetibhāgadvaye vibhajyate mantranayasya ca punaḥ kriyācaryāyogānuttarayogatantraprabhṛtayaścatvāro  #
analyzed: tantra deśanāyāḥ bhedāḥ mahāyānam pāramitā yānaya mantra naya ākhyā iti bhāga dvaye vibhajyate mantra nayasya ca punar kriyā caryā yoga anuttara yoga tantra prabhṛtayaḥ catvāraḥ
bhedāḥ bhavanti

original: mantrayānasya bhedacatuṣṭaye'sminnapi buddhasya bodhi-prāptividhau dharmacakrasya ca vidhau bhinnatvaṁ varīvarti |
analyzed: mantrayānasya bheda catuṣṭaye asmin api buddhasya bodhi prāpti vidhau dharmacakrasya ca vidhau bhinna tvam varīvarti

original: kriyātantram kriyātantrānusāraṁ tathāgatasarvapuṣpanirdeśasammukhaṁ bodhicittamutpādya mantracaryā śākyamuninā samanuṣṭhīyate |
analyzed: kriyā tantram kriyā tantra anusāram tathāgata sarva puṣpa nirdeśa sammukham bodhi cittam utpādya mantra caryā śākyamuninā samanuṣṭhīyate

original: anantakalpeṣu mantramanusandhāya puṇyajñāne saṁcinvatā tathāgatena pūrṇakaśyape loke samāgamāvadhau brāhmaṇaputrasya gurutvāvāptiṁ yāvat puṇyaṁ  #
analyzed: ananta kalpeṣu mantram anusandhāya puṇya jñāne sacinvatā tathāgatena pūrṇakaśyape loke samāgama avadhau brāhmaṇa putrasya guru tva avāptim yāvat puṇyam

original: saṁcīyate tadanu ca tata eva mṛtyumupalabhya tuṣitaloke śvetaketurūpeṇāvatīrya devayonijānāṁ dharmopadeśaḥ kriyate |
analyzed: sacīyate tadanu ca tatas eva mṛtyum upalabhya tuṣita loke śvetaketu rūpeṇa avatīrya deva yoni jānām dharma upadeśaḥ kriyate

original: tataśca manuṣyaloke utpadya manuṣyayonijānāṁ kalyāṇāya mārgo nirdiśyate |
analyzed: tatas ca manuṣya loke utpadya manuṣya yoni jānām kalyāṇāya mārgaḥ nirdiśyate
mañjuśrī mūlakalpe viṣayaḥ ayam vistareṇa varṇitaḥ

original: buddhalīlāsu prāyeṇa sarvamateṣu sāmyaṁ dṛśyate - māreṇa bahudhā vighnā anekākārayojitāḥ |
analyzed: buddha līlāsu prāyeṇa sarva mateṣu sāmyam dṛśyate māreṇa bahudhā vighnāḥ aneka ākāra yojitāḥ
bhagna sainyaḥ parāvṛtya gataḥ asau bhavanam punar
anuttara tantra anusāreṇa buddha gayāyām abhisambodhi prāpti avadhau māra balaiḥ vighnān utpādayitum utpātaḥ vyadhīyata

original: tadā māraparājayākhyasamādhau samāhito bhagavān nijakāyavākcittaiḥ mahāyamārikrodharājamutpādyācakathat - vajrapāṇe! tvaṁ bhairavakāyaṁ sandhārya  #
analyzed: tadā māra parājaya ākhya samādhau samāhitaḥ bhagavān nija kāya vāc cittaiḥ mahāyam āri krodharājam utpādya ācakathat  vajrapāṇe tvam bhairava kāyam sandhārya
māra nāga asura ādīn vināśaya

original: kriyātantrānusāreṇa bhagavato prathamadharmacakrapravartanānantare kāśītaḥ śrāvastī gatvā tatra prātihāryyaṁ prādarśi,
analyzed: kriyā tantra anusāreṇa bhagavato prathama dharmacakra pravartana anantare kāśītaḥ śrāvastī gatvā tatra prātihāryam prādarśi
āṭānāṭīya sūtre api idam tathyam avartata
prātihāryyam anu śrāvastyāḥ trāyastriśa lokam sva mātre samupadeśāya jagāma bhagavān buddhaḥ

original: tatra ca māsatrayaṁ sthitvā uposathamakārṣīt yathāsamayaṁ tataḥ akaniṣṭha-tuṣita-brahmalokādīnupagamya tantramadiśat tasmānmāsatrayānantaraṁ  #
analyzed: tatra ca māsa trayam sthitvā uposatham akārṣīt yathāsamayam tatas akaniṣṭha tuṣita brahma loka ādīn upagamya tantram adiśat tasmāt māsa traya anantaram
bhūmi lokam āgatya magadha śrāvastī ādiṣu kriyā tantram didiśe

original: yathā - suvarṇaprabhāsasūtraṁ gṛdhrakūṭe tathāgatagarbheḥ sāgara-taṭe sarvadharmaguṇavyūharājanāmadhāriṇī ca veṇuvane samupādiśyata |
analyzed: yathā suvarṇa prabhāsa sūtram gṛdhrakūṭe tathāgata garbheḥ sāgara taṭe sarva dharma guṇa vyūha rāja nāmadhāriṇī ca veṇu vane samupādiśyata

original: itthaṁ kriyātantrasya dhāraṇīkalpamantrasūtrāṇi vyākhyātantrāṇi ca buddhena devamanuṣyalokayoḥ pātrāṇāṁ yogyatānurūpaṁ samupadiṣṭāni tathā  #
analyzed: ittham kriyā tantrasya dhāraṇī kalpa mantra sūtrāṇi vyākhyā tantrāṇi ca buddhena deva manuṣya lokayoḥ pātrāṇām yogyatā anurūpam samupadiṣṭāni tathā
vibhinna kula deva sambaddha tantrāṇām deśanā tatra a vibhūrya vihitā

original: yathā hi tathāgatakulasyākaniṣṭhabhuvane tathāgatena padmakulasyāvalokiteśvareṇa potalake vajrakulasya vajrapāṇinā'lakāvatyāṁ maṇikulasambaddhatantrasya  #
analyzed: yathā hi tathāgata kulasya akaniṣṭha bhuvane tathāgatena padma kulasya avalokiteśvareṇa potalake vajra kulasya vajrapāṇinā alakāvatyām maṇi kula sambaddha tantrasya
maṇibhadra vaiśravaṇa munibhyām alakāvatyām puṣṭi kulasya pañcaka haritābhyām kapilavastuni tathāgata śraddhālubhiḥ bhūta piśācaiḥ vidyā mantram vidhi vidhānam
ca tathāgatāya samarpitam

original: tadanu taiste samadhiṣṭhāpitāstathā'nena lokakulaṁ loke pracāritamabhūt |
analyzed: tadanu taiḥ te samadhiṣṭhāpitāḥ tathā anena loka kulam loke pracāritam abhūt
mañjuśrī mūlakalpe vṛttam idam vistareṇa nirūpitam

original: caryātantram - caryātantrānusāraṁ buddhena sarvaprathamaṁ tathāgata-puṣpābhāsasya sammukhaṁ bodhicittamudapādi mantranayasya caryāṅkartuṁ tathāgatād  #
analyzed: caryā tantram caryā tantra anusāram buddhena sarva prathamam tathāgata puṣpābhāsasya sammukham bodhi cittam udapādi mantra nayasya caryāṅkartum tathāgatāt

original: bhaviṣyavāṇīṁ prāpya mantra-mārgānusāreṇa puṇyaṁ jñānasaṁbhāraśca samacīyata |
analyzed: bhaviṣya vāṇīm prāpya mantra mārga anusāreṇa puṇyam jñāna sabhāraḥ ca samacīyata

original: yatra ca kriyātantre uddho bhagavataśatāṣṭadhāraṇīprabhūteḥ sādhanāmāvṛttiṁ cākārṣīt tatraiva caryātantramanurudhya - ‘mahāvairocanābhisambodhi-vyākṛtādhiṣṭhānavaipulyasūtrendrarājanāmadharmaparyāyākhye  #
analyzed: yatra ca kriyā tantre uddhaḥ bhagavataḥ śata aṣṭa dhāraṇī prabhūteḥ sādhanām āvṛttim ca akārṣīt tatra eva caryā tantram anurudhya mahāvairocana abhisambodhi vyākṛta adhiṣṭhāna vaipulya sūtra indra rāja nāma dharmaparyāya ākhye

original: granthe vajrapāṇiḥ bhagavantaṁ vairocanaṁ jñānāya bodhaye ca mūlaniṣṭhapadayorviṣaye pṛcchati tadā sa vakti-heturbodhicittamasti mūlā ca karuṇā  #
analyzed: granthe vajrapāṇiḥ bhagavantam vairocanam jñānāya bodhaye ca mūla niṣṭha padayoḥ viṣaye pṛcchati tadā sa vakti hetuḥ bodhi cittam asti mūlā ca karuṇā

original: paryantaścopāyastatraiva bodhicittaṁ spaṣṭayannabhidadhāti samyag yathāvat svacittasya jñānameva bodhiridameva ca bodhicittamapi |
analyzed: paryantaḥ ca upāyaḥ tatra eva bodhi cittam spaṣṭayan abhidadhāti samyak yathāvat sva cittasya jñānam eva bodhiḥ idam eva ca bodhi cittam api
ataḥ he vajrapāṇe

original: bodhaye sarvajñatāyai ca svacittaṁ pūrṇataḥ nirīkṣasva - itthaṁ pratipādayan saḥ bodhicittasya sākṣātkārāya prābalyena prerayati |
analyzed: bodhaye sarvajña tāyai ca sva cittam pūrṇatas nirīkṣasva ittham pratipādayan saḥ bodhi cittasya sākṣātkārāya prābalyena prerayati

original: tadvadeva vajraśekharamahāguhyayogatantre cāpyabhihitaṁ - bhagavān buddhaḥ purā kāle bodhicittaṁ gṛhītvā bodhisattvo babhūva,
analyzed: tadvat eva vajraśekhara mahā guhya yogatantre ca api abhihitam bhagavān buddhaḥ purā kāle bodhi cittam gṛhītvā bodhisattvaḥ babhūva

original: tadanu ca sambhāradvayaṁ saṁcitya prajñā-pūrṇatāṁ labdhvā paṭalābhiṣekamavāpya akaniṣṭhamanomayasthāne avasthitaḥ san paṁcābhisambodhibhyaḥ  #
analyzed: tadanu ca sambhāra dvayam sacitya prajñā pūrṇa tām labdhvā paṭala abhiṣekam avāpya akaniṣṭha manaḥ maya sthāne avasthitaḥ san paca abhisambodhibhyaḥ

original: buddhatvaṁ lebhe akaniṣṭhabhuvane ca vairocanasāmānyamahāyānatantraṁ caryātantraṁ vajrapāṇi-abhiṣekamūlamantraṁ ca samupādiśat |
analyzed: buddha tvam lebhe akaniṣṭha bhuvane ca vairocana sāmānya mahāyāna tantram caryā tantram vajrapāṇi abhiṣeka mūla mantram ca samupādiśat
punar ca para nirvāṇa vaśa vartini ārya acala mahākrodha rāja sarva tathāgata bala aparimita vīra vinaya sva vyākhyāta nāma kalpam samupadidiśe

original: tadanu ca manuṣyaloke samutpadya mahāyānīva sāranāthādikṣetreṣu dharmacakraṁ prāvartata |
analyzed: tadanu ca manuṣya loke samutpadya mahā yānī iva sāranātha ādi kṣetreṣu dharmacakram prāvartata
ittham caryā tantriṇaḥ eva svīkurvanti

original: caryātantreṣu bodhicittotpādasya prakriyā kriyātantrasadṛśī bodhiprāptiśca yogatantrānusāriṇī manyate |
analyzed: caryā tantreṣu bodhi citta utpādasya prakriyā kriyā tantra sadṛśī bodhi prāptiḥ ca yoga tantra anusāriṇī manyate
tasmāt katipaye vidvāsaḥ caryā tantram hi ubhaya tantra sajñam iti bruvate

original: caryātantramānyatayā akaniṣṭhabhuvane caryātantraṁ satatamavatiṣṭhate kāmadhātāvapi buddhaśāsanāntaṁ tiṣṭhati |
analyzed: caryā tantra mānya tayā akaniṣṭha bhuvane caryā tantram satatam avatiṣṭhate kāmadhātau api buddha śāsana antam tiṣṭhati
yogatantram tathāgatatattvasaṅgrahasya prathama paricchede vajra dhātu maṇḍala vidhau atha sarva artha siddhi bodhisattva mahāsattva sarva tathāgata pracoditaḥ

original: samānastata āsphāna samādhito vyutthāya’ ityetatprabhṛtivacobhirbuddhatva-saṁprāptiviṣaye vistareṇa nirūpitam |
analyzed: samānaḥ tatas āsphāna samādhitaḥ vyutthāya iti etad prabhṛti vacobhiḥ buddhatva saprāpti viṣaye vistareṇa nirūpitam

original: tatraiva ca pañcābhisambodhibhirbuddhatvaprāptyanantaraṁ sarvatathāgataiḥ buddhaḥ abhiṣekadharma-pravacanābhyāmanujñāpitaḥ tasya ca nirmāṇakāyaḥ  #
analyzed: tatra eva ca pañca abhisambodhibhiḥ buddhatva prāpti anantaram sarva tathāgataiḥ buddhaḥ abhiṣeka dharma pravacanābhyām anujñāpitaḥ tasya ca nirmāṇa kāyaḥ
sumeru parvatam gatvā mūlatantra uttaratantra triloka vijaya prabhṛtīni yogatantrāṇi upādiśat

original: tataḥ paranirvāṇavaśavartini paramādyatantramupādiśat ānandavane ca caryātantraṁ samupadiśya nirmāṇakāyasyāvāsaṁ saṁgṛhya akaniṣṭhabhuvane  #
analyzed: tatas para nirvāṇa vaśa vartini parama ādya tantram upādiśat ānanda vane ca caryā tantram samupadiśya nirmāṇa kāyasya āvāsam sagṛhya akaniṣṭha bhuvane

original: sthitastathāgataḥ vairocane samāhitaḥ punastato neyārthe dvādaśalīlāḥ pradarśayan jambudvīpe samudbhūya naikayānāni samupādideśa |
analyzed: sthitaḥ tathāgataḥ vairocane samāhitaḥ punar tatas neya arthe dvādaśa līlāḥ pradarśayan jambudvīpe samudbhūya na eka yānāni samupādideśa

original: tathyamidamāśritya śākyamitrācāryeṇa avoci śuddhodanasya putreṇa siddhārthena uruvelā-nadyāstaṭe tapasyāmācaratā tatraiva vipākakāyamapahāya  #
analyzed: tathyam idam āśritya śākyamitra ācāryeṇa avoci śuddhodanasya putreṇa siddhārthena uruvelā nadyāḥ taṭe tapasyām ācaratā tatra eva vipāka kāyam apahāya

original: sūkṣmakāyād akaniṣṭhabhuvanamupalabhya tatraiva pañcābhisambodhibhiḥ bodhimavāpya sumeruparvate-yogatantramupadiśya punaḥ vipākakāyaṁ praviśya  #
analyzed: sūkṣmakāyāt a kaniṣṭha bhuvanam upalabhya tatra eva pañca abhisambodhibhiḥ bodhim avāpya sumeru parvate yoga tantram upadiśya punar vipāka kāyam praviśya
bodha gayāyām buddha tvam alambhi

original: bhoṭasya paravartī ratnabhadro'nuvādako hevajravyākhyākārāścāpi tathyamidaṁ svīkurvanti |
analyzed: bhoṭasya para vartī ratnabhadraḥ anuvādakaḥ hevajra vyākhyākārāḥ ca api tathyam idam svīkurvanti

original: ānandagarbhānusāreṇa buddhaḥ asaṁkhyakalpapūrvamevābhisambhodhiṁ lebhe ata evānandagarbhaḥ śākyakulotpannaṁ siddhārthaṁ bodhisattvarūpeṇa na  #
analyzed: ānandagarbha anusāreṇa buddhaḥ asakhya kalpa pūrvam eva abhisambhodhim lebhe atas eva ānandagarbhaḥ śākya kula utpannam siddhārtham bodhisattva rūpeṇa na
manute śākyamitra matam ca api khaṇḍayate

original: anenācāryeṇa ‘buddhaḥ pūrvamakaniṣṭhabhuvane bodhiṁ prāpa’ iti manyate tadanu ca śākyakule samutpannasya buddhatvāvāptiḥ nirmāṇakāyasya līlā  #
analyzed: anena ācāryeṇa buddhaḥ pūrvam akaniṣṭha bhuvane bodhim prāpa iti manyate tadanu ca śākya kule samutpannasya buddha tva avāptiḥ nirmāṇa kāyasya līlā  /
neyārthā ca svīkriyate
anuttara tantram anuttara tantram pitṛ tantra mātṛ tantra advaya tantra ākhye bhāga traye vibhajyate
etat triyatayasya deśanā viṣayaka matānām vaibhinnyam āste

original: paraṁ ca buddhatvasamprāptiviṣaye prāyaḥ sampuṭatantramanukṛtya sāmānyānuttaratantrasya pakṣaḥ pratipādayituṁ śakyate'smābhiḥ |
analyzed: param ca buddhatva samprāpti viṣaye prāyas sampuṭa tantram anukṛtya sāmānya anuttara tantrasya pakṣaḥ pratipādayitum śakyate asmābhiḥ

original: etadanusāraṁ buddhaḥ ekasminneva kāle kvacid bodhicittamutpādayan kvacicca devalokataścaṁkramaṇaṁ vidadhānaḥ anyacca kutracit dharmacakraṁ  #
analyzed: etad anusāram buddhaḥ ekasmin eva kāle kvacid bodhi cittam utpādayan kvacid ca deva lokataḥ cakramaṇam vidadhānaḥ anyat ca kutracid dharmacakram
pravartayan vyutthānam ca kurvāṇaḥ dṛśyate

original: ataḥ etatsarvaṁ kiñcidviśiṣṭakrame vyavasthāyācāntargataṁ vyaktīkartuṁ na śakyate |
analyzed: atas etat sarvam kiñcid viśiṣṭa krame vyaktīkartum na śakyate

original: pitṛtantram - pitṛtantra - guhyasamājasya deśanāviṣaye'pi naikaṁ matamatāntaraṁ parilakṣyate |
analyzed: pitṛtantram pitṛtantra guhya samājasya deśanā viṣaye api na ekam mata mata antaram parilakṣyate

original: teṣu ca ekaṁ dvayaṁ vā matamatra pratipādyate-ānandagarbheṇa guhyasamājapaṁjikāyāmucyate-buddhaḥ vaiṣṇavādimahārāgiṇa upadaśati bhoṭīyo mahān  #
analyzed: teṣu ca ekam dvayam vā matam atra pratipādyate ānandagarbheṇa guhya samāja pajikāyām ucyate buddhaḥ vaiṣṇava ādi mahā rāgiṇaḥ upadaśati bhoṭīyaḥ mahān

original: siddhācāryaḥ ‘bustonaḥ’ api manute yat - buddho vaiṣṇavantre'pyabhiniviṣṭān anugrahītuṁ paranirvāṇavaśavartini loke guhyasamājaṁ samupadideśa
analyzed: siddha ācāryaḥ bustonaḥ api manute yat buddhaḥ vaiṣṇavantre api abhiniviṣṭān anugrahītum para nirvāṇa vaśa vartini loke guhya samājam samupadideśa

original: śrīvajramālāmahāyogatantraṭīkāgambhīrārthadīpikāyām alaṁkalaśapaṇḍitena kathyate - yadā siddhārtho nairañjanānadyāstaṭe ākāśaspharaṇanāmasamādhimeva  #
analyzed: śrī vajramālā mahā yogatantra ṭīkā gambhīra artha dīpikāyām alakalaśa paṇḍitena kathyate yadā siddhārthaḥ nairañjanā nadyāḥ taṭe ākāśaspharaṇa nāma samādhim eva

original: bodhiṁ mattvā samāhitāvasthāyāmāsīt tamālokya akaniṣṭharatnasambhavakṣetrasukhāvatīprabhṛtiśuddha kṣetrebhyaḥ tathāgata āgatya tasya (siddhārtharūpasya)
analyzed: bodhim mattvā samāhita avasthāyām āsīt tam ālokya akaniṣṭha ratnasambhava kṣetra sukhāvatī prabhṛti śuddha kṣetrebhyaḥ tathāgataḥ āgatya tasya siddhārtha rūpasya

original: mithyādhyāna-viṣayakaṁ spaṣṭayati tadānīntena ‘oṁ sarvatathāgatakāyavākcittapraṇāmena vajrasandhānaṁ karomi’ ityevaṁ kathite sati tathāgate  #
analyzed: mithyādhyāna viṣayakam spaṣṭayati tadānīm tena om sarva tathāgata kāya vāc citta praṇāmena vajra sandhānam karomi iti evam kathite sati tathāgate
tam abhyaṣicat dhyāna traya śata kula bheda paca krama ādīḥ ca upādiśat
atas ca te sva sva kṣetram jagmuḥ

original: siddhārthaḥ tattathāgatopadiṣṭamārgamanusṛtya bodhiṁ samavāpa tataśca sūkṣmakāyena tuṣitalokaṁ prāpya svakāyamahābhūtebhyo ratnavimānaṁ nirmame  #
analyzed: siddhārthaḥ tad tathāgata upadiṣṭa mārgam anusṛtya bodhim samavāpa tatas ca sūkṣma kāyena tuṣita lokam prāpya sva kāya mahābhūtebhyaḥ ratna vimānam nirmame  /

original: eva ca svapaṁcaskandhān pañcatathāgateṣu parivartyaṁ kāmukānāṁ rāgasya mārgīkaraṇāya guhyasamājamahātantrapañcaviṁśaśatakaṁ samupadidiśe punaśca  #
analyzed: eva ca sva paca skandhān pañca tathāgateṣu parivartyam kāmukānām rāgasya mārgīkaraṇāya guhya samāja mahā tantra pañcaviśa śatakam samupadidiśe punar ca
pañca kāṣāyika prāṇibhyaḥ āyuḥ dṛṣṭi kleśa kāla mārgibhyaḥ

original: anucarāṇāṁ nivedanena aṣṭādaśaparicchedayuktasaṁgrahaguhyasamājatantraṁ samadiśat tacca kramaśo guhyasamājasya saṁgrahakartṛvajrapāṇi - mañjuśrīprabhṛtīnāṁ  #
analyzed: anucarāṇām nivedanena aṣṭādaśa pariccheda yukta sagraha guhya samāja tantram samadiśat tat ca kramaśas guhya samājasya sagraha kartṛ vajrapāṇi mañjuśrī prabhṛtīnām
paramparayā jambudvīpe prāsarat

original: bhoṭaparamparayā manyate yad guhyasamājaṁ svayaṁ buddhaḥ oḍiyānadehīyaṁ rājānaṁ indrabhūtimadeśayat |
analyzed: bhoṭa paramparayā manyate yat guhya samājam svayam buddhaḥ oḍiyānadehīyam rājānam indrabhūtim adeśayat

original: tadabhimataṁ yad ākāśamārgeṇa gacchantaṁ bhagavad-buddhamavalokya rājā svamantrigaṇebhyastadviṣaye ajijñāsata tadā śākyamuneḥ śrāvako'yam ityajānāt
analyzed: tat abhimatam yat ākāśa mārgeṇa gacchantam bhagavat buddham avalokya rājā sva mantri gaṇebhyaḥ tad viṣaye ajijñāsata tadā śākyamuneḥ śrāvakaḥ ayam iti ajānāt

original: tatprabhāvitaḥ san nṛpo bhojanārthaṁ bhagavatsahita-śrāvakānāmantritavān samāgateṣu ca teṣu rājā ātmānam anugrahītuṁ buddhaṁ samprārthayat
analyzed: tad prabhāvitaḥ san nṛpaḥ bhojana artham bhagavat sahita śrāvakān āmantritavān samāgateṣu ca teṣu rājā ātmānam anugrahītum buddham samprārthayat

original: buddhena gṛhasthāśramatyāgāya samabhihitaḥ rājā samavocat kāmaguṇādīn parihāya tvahaṁ mokṣaṁ na kāmaye yadyasyāmeva sāṁsārikatāyāṁ sambhavaṁ  #
analyzed: buddhena gṛhastha āśrama tyāgāya samabhihitaḥ rājā samavocat kāma guṇa ādīn parihāya tu aham mokṣam na kāmaye yadi asyām eva sāsārika tāyām sambhavam

original: cedanugrāhyo'yaṁ janaḥ itthaṁ rājño vacanānusāraṁ tadrājānaṁ tantrasya yogyatāpātraṁ buddhdhvā śrāvakānantarhitya svayaṁ buddhena guhyasamāje  #
analyzed: ced anugrāhyaḥ ayam janaḥ ittham rājñaḥ vacana anusāram tat rājānam tantrasya yogyatā pātram buddhdhvā śrāvakān antarhitya svayam buddhena guhya samāje
prakaṭībhūya indrabhūtiḥ pravrājitaḥ
abhiṣeka mātreṇa eva saḥ sambodhim avāpnot

original: tadanu parvataśreṣṭhe devadevīnāṁ nivāsasya pradhānakendre alakāvatīprāsāde vajrapāṇeḥ saṁśrutya bodhisattvairguhyasamājo lipibaddho'kāri |
analyzed: tadanu parvata śreṣṭhe deva devīnām nivāsasya pradhāna kendre alakāvatī prāsāde vajrapāṇeḥ sa śrutya bodhisattvaiḥ guhya samājaḥ lipi baddhaḥ akāri

original: tacca svayaṁbhūprāsādagandholāyāṁ saṁsthāpya ḍākiṇīśvarābhiratyādīn abhiṣekātparaṁ samupadiśya tato'gre āgantukasiddhānāṁ saṁgrahakartṝṇāñca  #
analyzed: tat ca svayam bhū prāsāda gandholāyām sasthāpya ḍākiṇīśvara abhirati ādīn abhiṣekāt param samupadiśya tatas agre āgantuka siddhānām sagraha kartṝṇām ca
nāmāni ghoṣitāni

original: mātṛtantram - ācāryakāmadhenunā hevajrasya padoddhāraṇanāmaṭīkāyāṁ pratipādyate yad mātṛtantre pradhānībhūtahevajratantrasya deśanā tathāgatasya  #
analyzed: mātṛ tantram ācārya kāmadhenunā hevajrasya pada uddhāraṇa nāma ṭīkāyām pratipādyate yat mātṛ tantre pradhānībhūta hevajra tantrasya deśanā tathāgatasya
nirmāṇa kāya dvārā dvātriśat varṣa paryanta

original: jambūdvīpe nivāsakāle hevajrasya saṁgrahakartṛbodhisattvavajragarbhāya magadhe vihitā |
analyzed: jambūdvīpe nivāsa kāle hevajrasya sagraha kartṛ bodhisattva vajragarbhāya magadhe vihitā

original: tatraiva ca ‘ekasmin kāle mayā śrutam’ ityasya vyākhyāyāṁ suspaṣṭaṁ vyalekhi-yat na kayācit paramparayā etasyopadeśo'pi tu svayaṁ buddhena  #
analyzed: tatra eva ca ekasmin kāle mayā śrutam iti asya vyākhyāyām su spaṣṭam vyalekhiyat na kayācid paramparayā etasya upadeśaḥ api tu svayam buddhena
vajra garbhāya kṛtaḥ

original: bustono'pi sāmānyatantravyavasthāyāṁ hevajrasya bṛhaṭṭīkāyāḥ vyākhyātantravajramālāyāśca vacanamuddharan akathayat yat cakrasaṁvaradeśanānantaraṁ  #
analyzed: bustonaḥ api sāmānya tantra vyavasthāyām hevajrasya bṛhat ṭīkāyāḥ vyākhyā tantra vajramālāyāḥ ca vacanam uddharan akathayat yat cakra savara deśanā anantaram

original: nirmāṇakāyadvārā magadhe caturmāranāśakāle jambūdvīpe hevajratantrasya deśanā jātā |
analyzed: nirmāṇa kāya dvārā magadhe catur māra nāśa kāle jambūdvīpe hevajra tantrasya deśanā jātā

original: hevajratantrasya prāyaḥ samagravyākhyāgrantheṣu ṭīkāgrantheṣu ca kutra deśanā kṛtā,
analyzed: hevajra tantrasya prāyas samagra vyākhyā grantheṣu ṭīkā grantheṣu ca kutra deśanā kṛtā
iti asya su spaṣṭaḥ nirdeśaḥ na labhyate

original: advayatantram - advayatantre'pi kālacakramāyājālaprabhṛtīni naikāni tantrāṇi samāhitāni |
analyzed: advaya tantram advaya tantre api kālacakra māyā jāla prabhṛtīni na ekāni tantrāṇi samāhitāni

original: teṣu cātra kālacakrasya deśanāviṣaye paramādyatantre evaṁ pratipāditam - gṛdhrakūṭe yathāśāstraṁ prajñāpāramitānaye tathā mantranaye proktā,
analyzed: teṣu ca atra kālacakrasya deśanā viṣaye parama ādya tantre evam pratipāditam gṛdhrakūṭe yathāśāstram prajñāpāramitā naye tathā mantra naye proktā
śrīdhānye dharma deśanā

original: (se.ṭī. p.3) nāḍapādenāpi sekoddeśaṭīkāyām kālacakrasya deśanā dhānyakaṭake (amarāvatyāṁ)
analyzed: seṭī nāḍa pādena api seka uddeśa ṭīkāyām kālacakrasya deśanā dhānya kaṭake amarāvatyā
babhūva ittham pratyapādi

original: nāmasaṅgītiṭippaṇyāmamṛtakaṇikāyāmapi kathitam - “iha khalu śrīdhānyakaṭake mahācaityasthāne - nānātantraśravaṇārthibhiradhyeṣitaḥ śrīśākyasiṁho  #
analyzed: nāmasaṅgīti ṭippaṇyām amṛtakaṇikāyām api kathitam iha khalu śrīdhānyakaṭake mahā caitya sthāne nānā tantra śravaṇa arthibhiḥ adhyeṣitaḥ śrī śākyasihaḥ

original: nāma buddho bhagavān caitrapūrṇimāyāṁ śrīdharmadhātuvāgīśvaramaṇḍalaṁ tadupari śrīmān nakṣatramaṇḍalamādibuddhaṁ visphārya tasminneva dine buddhābhiṣekaṁ  #
analyzed: nāma buddhaḥ bhagavān caitra pūrṇimāyām śrī dharmadhātu vāgīśvara maṇḍalam tad upari śrīmān nakṣatra maṇḍalam ādibuddham visphārya tasmin eva dine buddha abhiṣekam

original: dattvā devādibhyaḥ sarvamantranītibṛhallabhutantrabhedena deśitavān” asyābhiprāyaḥ - vaiśākhapūrṇimāyāṁ buddhatvaṁ samupalabhya mahāyānimatena  #
analyzed: dattvā deva ādibhyaḥ sarva mantra nīti bṛhallabhu tantra bhedena deśitavān asya abhiprāyaḥ vaiśākha pūrṇimāyām buddha tvam samupalabhya mahāyāni matena

original: ṛṣipattana-mṛgadāvākhye prathamadharmacakrapravarttanasya dvādaśavarṣānantaraṁ māghapūrṇimāyāṁ bhagavān buddhaḥ gṛdhrakūṭe pāramitāyānaṁ dideśa,

analyzed: yathā ca saddharmapuṇḍarīke tathā eva śrāvakāḥ sarve prāpta nirvāṇa sajñitaḥ

analyzed: upāyaḥ eṣa buddhānām vadanti yat imam nayam

punar tatra eva uktam yat sarvajña tā jñāna ṣaṣ pāramitā śūnyatā animitta tā praṇidhāna ādīni tvayā sādhagīyāni

original: punastatraiva - tryadhvajñānamanantaṁ ca ṣaṭ ca pāramitāḥ śubhāḥ |
analyzed: punar tatra eva tri adhva jñānam anantam ca ṣaḍ ca pāramitāḥ śubhāḥ
śūnyatām animittam ca praṇidhāna vivarjitam
atas śrāvakāḥ arhataḥ nirodha samāpatyā jñāna kāyasya

original: avidyāvāsanāyā anāsravakarmaṇaḥ mṛtyusaṁkramaṇasya ca balena navaṁ janma gṛhītvā mahāyānaṁ praviśya buddhatvaṁ labhante |
analyzed: avidyā vāsanāyāḥ anāsrava karmaṇaḥ mṛtyu sakramaṇasya ca balena navam janma gṛhītvā mahāyānam praviśya buddha tvam labhante

original: mahāyāne kena pathā praveṣṭavyamasmin viṣaye taibbatācāryāṇāṁ matāni nimnāni - 1. saṁbhāramārgeṇa praveṣṭumuktiḥ keṣāṁcid viduṣām |
analyzed: mahāyāne kena pathā praveṣṭavyam asmin viṣaye taibbata ācāryāṇām matāni nimnāni sa bhāra mārgeṇa praveṣṭum uktiḥ keṣācid viduṣām
teṣām āśayaḥ buddha tva avāptyai mahāyānasya sa bhāra ādi pañca mārga anugamanam āvaśyakam

original: 2. apare ācāryā vadanti - arhaddvārā kleśāvaraṇasya samūlanāśena saṁsāre punarjanma na grahītavyaṁ bhavati |
analyzed: apare ācāryāḥ vadanti arhat dvārā kleśa āvaraṇasya sa mūla nāśena sa sāre punarjanma na grahītavyam bhavati

original: ataḥ sukhāvatīprabhṛtibuddhakṣetre saṁbhūya tata eva kramaśaḥ bodhisattvasādhanāmanuśīlya buddhatvaṁ labhyeta |
analyzed: atas sukhāvatī prabhṛti buddhakṣetre tatas eva kramaśas bodhisattva sādhanām anuśīlya buddha tvam labhyeta

original: 3. aparairācāryairarhaddvārā kleśāvarasya kṣayena mahāyāne prathamapramuditābhūmiṁ praviśya bhāvanāmārgeṇa jñeyāvaraṇānāṁ kramaśaḥ kṣayena  #
analyzed: aparaiḥ ācāryaiḥ arhat dvārā kleśa avarasya kṣayena mahāyāne prathama pramuditā bhūmim praviśya bhāvanā mārgeṇa jñeya āvaraṇānām kramaśas kṣayena
buddha tva avāptiḥ svīkriyate

original: 4. anye ācāryāḥ bodhisattveṣu saptamabhūmiparyantaṁ kleśāvaraṇasya sūkṣmavāsanayā,
analyzed: anye ācāryāḥ bodhisattveṣu saptama bhūmi paryantam kleśa āvaraṇasya sūkṣma vāsanayā
sa mūla nāśena bodhisattvānām saptama bhūmitaḥ praveśam āmananti

original: yatra ca dūraṁgamābhūmeḥ prāptyanantaraṁ bodhisattvaiḥ prajñayā śrāvakāṇāmākarṣakatvaprasaṅgaḥ carcito'sti |
analyzed: yatra ca dūragamā bhūmeḥ prāpti anantaram bodhisattvaiḥ prajñayā śrāvakāṇām ākarṣaka tva prasaṅgaḥ carcitaḥ asti

original: mahāyāniṣvapi keṣāṁcid viduṣāṁ matamidam - pāramitānayenāpi ante mantranayaḥ (vajrayānam)
analyzed: mahāyāniṣu api keṣācid viduṣām matam idam pāramitā nayena api ante mantra nayaḥ vajrayānam
āśrayaṇīyaḥ bhavati
na anyathā āloka āloka ābhāsa āloka upalabdhi samāvaraṇāni pariśudhyanti samyaksambodhi prāptiḥ api aśakyā
yadi api etat naya dvayam mahāyāne eva sammilitam

original: yathā cādvayavajrasaṁgrahe - ‘mahāyānaṁ ca dvividhaṁ pāramitānayo mantranayaśceti (pṛ. 14)
analyzed: yathā ca advayavajrasagrahe mahāyānam ca dvividham pāramitā nayaḥ mantra nayaḥ ca iti
adhunā avalokanīyam pāramitā naya mantra nayayoḥ ca antaram kim
kim ca tattatvam
yad abhāve pāramitā yānibhiḥ ca api mantra yāna vajra yānayoḥ āśrayam ādāya eva lakṣya prāptiḥ vidhīyate
tat api su spaṣṭam bhaviṣyati

original: ubhayanayāntaraṁ spaṣṭayatā bhoṭadeśasya mahāsiddhācāryasumatikīrticoṅkhāpāmahodayena mahāmantrakrame pratyapādi - 1. nayadvayasya caramalakṣyaṁ
analyzed: ubhaya naya antaram spaṣṭayatā bhoṭa deśasya mahā siddha ācārya sumati kīrti coṅkhāpā mahodayena mahā mantra krame pratyapādi naya dvayasya carama lakṣya
atas abhisamaya alaṅkārasya
etad uktim anusṛtya ubhayam prāṇi mātra hitāya bodhi tattvam abhīpsati
atas bodhi citta dvasya bheda rekhā svīkartum aśakyā

original: 2. sarvadharmāṇāṁ niṁsvabhāvatāyāḥ svīkṛtyā śūnyatāyāmapi bhedāsattvena śūnyatā'pi tadubhayasya bhedarekhā bhavitumaśakyā |
analyzed: sarva dharmāṇām nisvabhāva tāyāḥ svīkṛtyā śūnyatāyām api bheda asattvena śūnyatā api tad ubhayasya bheda rekhā bhavitum aśakyā
ubhaya naye ṣaṣ pāramitānām caryā anuśīlanena api sīmārekhā kartum aśakyā
pātreṣu mṛdu madhya adhimātra kramam ādhārīkṛtya bhedaḥ kartum aśakyaḥ
yatas hi imau bhedau ubhaya naye sambhāvyete

original: 5. pāramitānayo rāgarahitānāṁ tantranayaśca rāgayuktānāṁ pātrāṇāmanugrahāyopadiṣṭaḥ ityapi mantumaśakyaṁ yato hi pāramitānaye'pi evaṁ niyamo'sti
analyzed: pāramitā nayaḥ rāga rahitānām tantra nayaḥ ca rāga yuktānām pātrāṇām anugrahāya upadiṣṭaḥ iti api mantum aśakyam yatas hi pāramitā naye api evam niyamaḥ asti

original: yathā ca bodhicaryāvatāraḥ - evaṁ buddhvā parārtheṣu bhavet satatamutthitaḥ |
analyzed: yathā ca bodhi caryā avatāraḥ evam buddhvā parārtheṣu bhavet satatam utthitaḥ
niṣiddham api anujñātam kṛpāloḥ artha darśinaḥ

original: (5/84) etadatiricya pāramitānayānupālakā bahavo gṛhasthā api bhavituṁ śaknuvanti naitadeva,
analyzed: etat atiricya pāramitā naya anupālakāḥ bahavaḥ gṛhasthāḥ api bhavitum śaknuvanti na etat eva
brāhmaṇa putraḥ bhikṣu nakṣatraḥ api upāya kauśalena prāṇi kalyāṇāya maithunam akārṣīt
evaṃvidhā na ekā kathāḥ sūtra grantheṣu upalabhyante

original: tatraiva mantranaye'pi īdṛśā aneke mahāpuruṣāḥ ye bhikṣavaḥ eva nāpi tu siddhapuruṣā apyāsan |
analyzed: tatra eva mantra naye api īdṛśāḥ aneke mahā puruṣāḥ ye bhikṣavaḥ eva na api tu siddha puruṣāḥ api āsan

original: atra vicāraṇīyaṁ hi tantre rāgamārgīkaraṇaṁ vivecitaṁ paraṁ pāramitānaye rāgādīni prāṇināṁ hitāyoktāni |
analyzed: atra vicāraṇīyam hi tantre rāga mārgīkaraṇam vivecitam param pāramitā naye rāga ādīni prāṇinām hitāya uktāni
etat naya dvaye mahat idam antaram vidyate
yat ca vicāraṇīyam āste

original: 6. mahāsukhaṁ saṁcāryya viṣayaśūnyatāyāṁ dāḍhyārpteḥ sīmā rekhā'pi svīkartumaśakyā,
analyzed: mahā sukham viṣaya śūnyatāyām dāḍhya arpteḥ sīmā rekhā api svīkartum aśakyā
yatas ca pāramitā naye api śamathe dārḍhya prāptyā prāṇa vāyuḥ niyamyate

original: yataḥ kāyapraśrabdhiṁ prāpya kāye sukhaṁ saṁcarate sa ca yathecchaṁ cittaprasrabdhisamāpatyā svaviṣayesthairyyaṁ labdhumarhati |
analyzed: yatas kāya praśrabdhim prāpya kāye sukham sacarate sa ca yatheccham citta prasrabdhi samāpatyā sva viṣaye sthairyyam labdhum arhati

original: ata ubhayatra sukhānubhūtyā sīmārekhāṅkanaṁ kiyatsaṁbhavamidaṁ vicāraṇīyaṁ vartate |
analyzed: atas ubhayatra sukha anubhūtyā sīmā rekhā aṅkanam kiyat sabhavam idam vicāraṇīyam vartate

original: kecit tantre avikāritāyāḥ anakṣarasukhasya ca viṣaye kathayanti |
analyzed: kecid tantre avikāri tāyāḥ anakṣara sukhasya ca viṣaye kathayanti

original: pāramitānaye tu sthitiriyaṁ praśrabdhikāliko prayāsādinirbharā ca tiṣṭhati |
analyzed: pāramitā naye tu sthitiḥ iyam prayāsa ādi nirbharā ca tiṣṭhati

original: punaścātra mahāsukhābhiprāyaḥ raktaśvetabodhicittasyārdrībhāvatayā nāḍīvāyutilakādīnāṁ prakriyayā samutpannasukhena gṛhyeta tarhi kevalamanuttaratantrasya  #
analyzed: punar ca atra mahā sukha abhiprāyaḥ rakta śveta bodhi cittasya ārdrībhāva tayā nāḍī vāyu tilaka ādīnām prakriyayā samutpanna sukhena gṛhyeta tarhi kevalam anuttara tantrasya

original: vaiśiṣṭyamidaṁ syāt kriyādyanyasāmānyatantrāṇāṁ tu na syāt |
analyzed: vaiśiṣṭyam idam syāt kriyā ādi anya sāmānya tantrāṇām tu na syāt

original: itthaṁ nayadvayena prāpte lakṣye lo'pi bhedo nāsti,
analyzed: ittham naya dvayena prāpte lakṣye bhedaḥ nā asti

original: tatprāptau mārge ca śūnyatādarśanacittotpādapāramitāsambharaṇādīnāṁ bhedenāntaraṁ na kartuṁ pāryate |
analyzed: tad prāptau mārge ca śūnyatā darśana citta utpāda pāramitā sambharaṇa ādīnām bhedena antaram na kartum pāryate

original: niṣkarṣaḥ paraṁ cātra vicāraṇīyamidam - ubhayanayasya mukhyoddeśyaṁ parārthavidhānam,
analyzed: niṣkarṣaḥ param ca atra vicāraṇīyam idam ubhaya nayasya mukhya uddeśyam para artha vidhānam

original: yadā ca parārthaviṣaye vicintyate tadedaṁ kāryaṁ rūpakāyena saṁbhāvyate dharmakāyena cāsambhāvyam |
analyzed: yadā ca parārtha viṣaye vicintyate tadā idam kāryam rūpa kāyena sabhāvyate dharmakāyena ca asambhāvyam

original: śāstreṣu dharmakāyaprāptiḥ svārthasampatyā rūpakāyasya ca prāptiḥ parārthasampatyābhihitā |
analyzed: śāstreṣu dharmakāya prāptiḥ sva artha sampatyā rūpa kāyasya ca prāptiḥ para artha sampatyā abhihitā

original: śrāvakayānivaibhāṣika-sautrāntikāstu buddhasya rūpakāyaṁ karma-vipākaṁ manyante nirvāṇamapi bhāgadvaye vibhajanti |
analyzed: śrāvaka yāni vaibhāṣika sautrāntikāḥ tu buddhasya rūpa kāyam karma vipākam manyante nirvāṇam api bhāga dvaye vibhajanti

original: buddhatvaprāptyanantaramapi skandhasantateḥ avicchinnarūpeṇa vidyamānatāvasthā sopadhiśeṣanirvāṇatvena skandha-santateḥ (pañcaskandhānāṁ)
analyzed: buddha tva prāpti anantaram api skandha santateḥ avicchinna rūpeṇa vidyamāna tā avasthā sa upadhi śeṣa nirvāṇa tvena skandha santateḥ
nirodha avasthā nirupadhi śeṣa nirvāṇa tvena ca ucyate

original: evaṁ rūpakāyanirodhamanu prāṇināṁ sākṣāt kalyāṇaṁ na sambhāvyate |
analyzed: evam rūpa kāya nirodham anu prāṇinām sākṣāt kalyāṇam na sambhāvyate
param mahāyāna mate tadā api te buddhāḥ

original: kalyāṇannivṛttāḥ syuratha vā tatparārthasampattiḥ kṣīyeta ityapi nābhimatam |
analyzed: syuḥ atha vā tad para artha sampattiḥ kṣīyeta iti api na abhimatam

original: śrāvakayānamate buddhopadeśa eva dharmakāyatvena manyate yo hi tannirūpadhiśeṣanirvāṇānantaraṁ parārthaṁ sampādayate |
analyzed: śrāvaka yāna mate buddha upadeśaḥ eva dharmakāya tvena manyate yaḥ hi tad nirūpadhi śeṣa nirvāṇa anantaram parārtham sampādayate

original: yathā ca mahāparinirvāṇāvasthāyām ānandādiśiṣyairmahāparinirvāṇaprāptāvatyantaduḥkhānubhūtau prakaṭitāyāṁ satyāṁ buddhena svīyāntimopadeśarūpeṇāvoci  #
analyzed: yathā ca mahāparinirvāṇa avasthāyām ānanda ādi śiṣyaiḥ mahāparinirvāṇa prāptau atyanta duḥkha anubhūtau prakaṭitāyām satyām buddhena svīya antima upadeśa rūpeṇa avoci

original: - mayā evaṁ kimapi tathyaṁ svajīvane tava - sammukhaṁ na gopitam |
analyzed: mayā evam kim api tathyam sva jīvane tava sammukham na gopitam

original: mattannirāvaraṇacaritrameva tava śāstṛpathapradarśakaṁ cāsti tadeva dharmakāyaḥ |
analyzed: mad tad nirāvaraṇa caritram eva tava śāstṛ patha pradarśakam ca asti tat eva dharmakāyaḥ

original: bhagavato buddhasya sa upadeśaḥ adya pañcāśaduttarasahasradvayavarṣāntaramapi (2500)
analyzed: bhagavataḥ buddhasya saḥ upadeśaḥ adya pañcāśat uttara sahasra dvaya varṣa antaram api
janasya hṛdayāni satya ahi sā bodhi tattvāni prati prerayati
bauddha dharma darśana adhyayana adhyāpanayoḥ yā avichinnā paramparā
sā eva ca tat buddhasya
puṇyasya pariṇāmaḥ vidyate

original: itthaṁ śrāvakayānimatānusāraṁ buddhena manuṣyarūpeṇa avatīryya prāṇināṁ pratyakṣakalyāṇavidhānaṁ na sambhāvyate tathāpi pravacanarūpidharmakāyenādyāpi  #
analyzed: ittham śrāvaka yāni mata anusāram buddhena manuṣya rūpeṇa avatīryya prāṇinām pratyakṣa kalyāṇa vidhānam na sambhāvyate tathā api pravacana rūpi dharmakāyena adya api
sa duḥkha muktyai janān sat mārgam ārohayati

original: śrāvakayāninaḥ rūpakāyena lakṣyaprāptiṁ na manyante buddhasya rūpakāyaṁ ca duḥkhasatyaṁ manyante |
analyzed: śrāvaka yāninaḥ rūpa kāyena lakṣya prāptim na manyante buddhasya rūpa kāyam ca duḥkha satyam manyante

original: yadyapi śrāvakayānino buddhakāyaṁ duḥkhaskandhamāsravaṁ ca svīkurvanti tathāpi tat dvātriṁśallaṣaṇaiścaturaśīti-anuvyañjanaiḥ suśobhitamabhimatam
analyzed: yadi api śrāvaka yāninaḥ buddha kāyam duḥkha skandham āsravam ca svīkurvanti tathā api tat dvātriśat laṣaṇaiḥ caturaśīti anuvyañjanaiḥ su śobhitam abhimatam
hetu mārge etat puṇya sabhārasya sacaya phalam abhimanyante

original: yathā sāmānyaprāṇināṁ surūpatā tatpuṇyakarmaphalaṁ manyate sa eva kramo buddhena sahāpi |
analyzed: yathā sāmānya prāṇinām surūpa tā tat puṇya karma phalam manyate saḥ eva kramaḥ buddhena saha api
param ca mahāyāninām sthitau vaiparītyam avalokyate

original: gotravyākhyāprasaṅge vārteyaṁ suspaṣṭā yadasminnaye buddho mahāparinirvāṇānantaramapi nirmāṇakāyasaṁbhogakāyayoḥ rūpeṇāvirbhūya satataṁ sattvahitaṁ  #
analyzed: gotra vyākhyā prasaṅge vārttā iyam su spaṣṭā yat asmin naye buddhaḥ mahāparinirvāṇa anantaram api nirmāṇa kāya sabhoga kāyayoḥ rūpeṇa āvirbhūya satatam sattva hitam
vidadhāti
atas tad prāptiḥ kathaṅkāram śakyā iti vicāraṇīyam

original: idandṛsyate yat prajñāpakṣasya pūrṇataḥ pratipādanaṁ pāramitāyāne'pyasti paraṁ ca vineyajanādhyāśayānurūpaṁ yāvad bhavaḥ sthāsyati tāvat prāṇimātrahitena  #

original: yathā ca vayaṁ śūnyatājñāpikāṁ prajñāṁ dharmakāyasyopādānakāraṇaṁ mattvā vicāryya tad bhāvayāmaḥ tathaiva rūpakāyasya hetubhūtadevakāyasya  #

me u gotram nidhi phalābhyām paripūrṇam vṛkṣa samam

original: cittasya yā'sau prakṛtiḥ prabhāsvarā na jātu sā dyauriva yāti vikriyām |
analyzed: cittasya yā asau prakṛtiḥ prabhāsvarā na jātu sā dyauḥ iva yāti vikriyām
āgantukaiḥ rāga mala ādibhiḥ tu asau sa kleśam abhūta kalpa jaiḥ
me u na abhiḥ nirvartayati enam karma kleśa ambu sa cayaḥ
na nirdahati udīrṇaḥ api mṛtyu vyādhi jarā analaḥ

original: (ma. u. 1-64) arthādidaṁ gotraṁ karmakleśādyabhimukhaṁ na bhavati,
analyzed: me u arthāt idam gotram karma kleśa ādi abhimukham na bhavati

original: paraṁ cāsya svarūpamāgantukaḥ hetuvikṛtaṁ na kartuṁ pārayati |
analyzed: param ca asya sva rūpam āgantukaḥ hetu vikṛtam na kartum pārayati

original: idamādita eva gaganavat prabhāsvara-svarūpaṁ yasya ca notpattirna nāśaśca |
analyzed: idam āditas eva gagana vat prabhāsvara svarūpam yasya ca nā utpattiḥ na nāśaḥ ca
etasmin eva tathāgata guṇa sthitiḥ
pṛthivyām nirmala jalam iva śarīra dhāriṣu sthitam

original: nāgarjunaḥ— pṛthivyantarhitaṁ toyaṁ yathā tiṣṭhati nirmalam |
analyzed: nāga rjunaḥ pṛthivī antarhitam toyam yathā tiṣṭhati nirmalam
kleśaiḥ antarhitam jñānam tathā tiṣṭhati nirmalam
prakṛtistha gotrasya prabhāsvarasya ca abhimukhībhāvaḥ eva pariśuddha tā
na tu kārya kārana hetubhyaḥ utpattiḥ

original: yathā— agniḥśaucaṁ yathā vastraṁ malinaṁ vividhairmalaiḥ |
analyzed: yathā agniḥ śaucam yathā vastram malinam vividhaiḥ malaiḥ

original: agnimadhye yathā kṣiptaṁ dagdhaṁ na vastratā ||
analyzed: agni madhye yathā kṣiptam dagdham na vastra tā

original: (se. ṭī. pṛ. 66) jñānasādhanābhyāṁ yathā yathā sādhakaḥ āgantuka-kleśān prajahāti tathā tathā tatra prabhāsvarabuṇo vikasati |
analyzed: jñāna sādhanābhyām yathā yathā sādhakaḥ āgantuka kleśān prajahāti tathā tathā tatra prabhāsvara buṇaḥ vikasati

original: antataḥ sādhanāsādhayu caikībhūtau tathā bhavataḥ yathā śuklapakṣīyaścandraḥ kṛṣṇatvaśuddhyā pūrṇatāṁ prāpnoti |
analyzed: antatas ca ekībhūtau tathā bhavataḥ yathā śukla pakṣīyaḥ candraḥ kṛṣṇa tva śuddhyā pūrṇa tām prāpnoti
mārga gamana paripuṣṭa gotrayoḥ ayam eva kramaḥ

original: maitreyanāthenāpi śarīriṣu sthitagotrasya guṇān upamayā spaṣṭayatā etatsvarūpaṁ vyāhṛtam— jinagarbhavyavasthānamityevaṁ daśadhoditam |
analyzed: maitreya nāthena api śarīriṣu sthita gotrasya guṇān upamayā spaṣṭayatā etat svarūpam vyāhṛtam jina garbha vyavasthānam iti evam daśadhā uditam
tad kleśa kośa garbha tvam punar jñeyam nidarśanaiḥ

original: buddhaḥ kupadme madhumakṣikāsu tuṣeṣu sārāṇyaśucau suvarṇam |
analyzed: buddhaḥ kupadme madhumakṣikāsu tuṣeṣu sārāṇi aśucau suvarṇam
nidhiḥ kṣitau alpa phale aṅkura ādi praklenna vastreṣu jina ātmabhāvaḥ

original: jaghanyanārījaṭhare nṛpatvaṁ yathā bhavenmṛtsu ca ratnabimbam |
analyzed: jaghanya nārī jaṭhare nṛpa tvam yathā bhavet mṛtsu ca ratna bimbam

original: āgantukakleśamalāvṛteṣu sattveṣu tadvat sthta eṣa dhātuḥ ||
analyzed: āgantuka kleśa mala āvṛteṣu sattveṣu tadvat stha eṣa dhātuḥ
me u te yathā nirgandha puṣpe

original: aśucau suvarṇam bhūmau nidhiḥ kukhādyena kṛṣiḥ praklinnavastrāveṣṭitamaṇirdevamūrtirvā strīgarbhe cakravartī rājā ca cavatiṣṭhate tathaiva  #
analyzed: aśucau suvarṇam bhūmau nidhiḥ kukha ādyena kṛṣiḥ praklinna vastra āveṣṭita maṇiḥ deva mūrtiḥ vā strī garbhe cakravartī rājā ca tathā eva
sattvānām anādi prabhāsvara citte tathāgatānām guṇaḥ dhātu rūpeṇa tiṣṭhati
sādhanayā tad prakaṭīkaraṇam eva paripuṣṭa gotram abhidhīyate
buddhasya ayam eva rūpa kāyaḥ api
mahāyāna uttara tantre buddha kāya traya avāptiḥ asmāt gotra dvayāt matā

original: prathamāt prathamaḥ kāyo dvitīyād dvau tu paścimau ||
analyzed: prathamāt prathamaḥ kāyaḥ dvitīyāt dvau tu paścimau
me u prathama gotrāt dharma prāptiḥ dvitīyāt ca sa bhoga kāya nirmāṇa kāyayoḥ ca jāyate
kāraṇena anena eva nirmāṇa kāyaḥ api dharmakāyāt prasphuṭitaḥ uktaḥ

original: yataḥ sarvaguṇāḥ prathamagotre eva tu tiṣṭhanti |
analyzed: yatas sarva guṇāḥ prathama gotre eva tu tiṣṭhanti
prathama gotrasya gagana sama tvāt sarva jīvasya api sama tvam
yathā ca ākāśa dharmadhātoḥ aneka tvam aśakyam tathā eva prakṛti gotra vaiṣamyam na bhavati

original: abhisamayālaṅkāre cāpi— dharmadhātorasambhedād gotrabhedo na yujyate |
analyzed: abhisamaya alaṅkāre ca api dharmadhātoḥ asambhedāt gotra bhedaḥ na yujyate
ādheya dharma bhedāt tu tad bhedaḥ parigīyate
āśrita dharma bhedena sattva bhedaḥ vidhātum śakyaḥ

original: yathā suvarṇarajatalauhādīnāṁ kalaśeṣu pārthakyaṁ tanmūlyaṁ sthānaṁ cāpi pṛthak bhavituṁ śaknoti paraṁ ca tatra sthitākāśadhātau ko'pi bhedaḥ  #
analyzed: yathā suvarṇa rajata lauha ādīnām kalaśeṣu pārthakyam tat mūlyam sthānam ca api pṛthak bhavitum śaknoti param ca tatra sthita ākāśa dhātau kaḥ api bhedaḥ

original: na bhavituṁ śaknoti tathaiva sattvānāṁ svabhāvabhirucīnāṁ kāraṇena śrāvakayāninaḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ bodhisattvāśca kathyante svasāmarthyānurūpaṁ  #
analyzed: na bhavitum śaknoti tathā eva sattvānām svabhāva abhirucīnām kāraṇena śrāvaka yāninaḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ bodhisattvāḥ ca kathyante sva sāmarthya anurūpam
parama padam prāpyate
prakṛti stha bheda tvāt ayam bhedaḥ nā asti
param ca paripuṣṭa gotrasya pūrṇa tā a pūrṇa tā bhedena ajāyata
vaibhāṣika sautrāntika vijñāna vādibhiḥ śrāvaka arha tva
pratyekabuddha tva

original: samyaksambuddhatvaṁ ceti pṛthak-svatantrapadatrayaṁ svīkriyate kintu nedamucittam |
analyzed: samyaksambuddha tvam ca iti pṛthak svatantra pada trayam svīkriyate kintu na idam ucittam

original: mahāyāninastu arhat-pratyekabuddhākhyaṁ viśrāmapadasthalatvena nirdhārayanti yāvat samyaksambodhirna labhyate tāvat nirvāṇaṁ na kathayituṁ
analyzed: mahāyāninaḥ tu arhat pratyekabuddha ākhyam viśrāma pada sthala tvena nirdhārayanti yāvat samyaksambodhiḥ na labhyate tāvat nirvāṇam na kathayitu

original: yataśca prathamagotraṁ dvitīyagotraṁ ca candra-candrikāsadṛśaṁ vidyate |
analyzed: yatas ca prathama gotram dvitīya gotram ca candra candrikā sadṛśam vidyate
yathā ca ukta prajñā jñāna vimuktīnām dīpti spharaṇa śuddhitaḥ
abhedataḥ ca sādharmyam prabhā raśmi arka maṇḍalaiḥ

original: (ma. u. ta. 1/13) gotrasya pariśuddhireva sādhakaṁ saṁbhāra-prayoga-darśana-bhāvanāśaikṣaṇikākhyapaṁcamārgeṣu vibhajate |
analyzed: me u ta gotrasya pariśuddhiḥ eva sādhakam sa bhāra prayoga darśana bhāvanā śaikṣaṇika ākhya paca mārgeṣu vibhajate
yathā aśuddhaḥ aśuddha śuddhaḥ atha su viśuddhaḥ yathākramam
sattvadhātuḥ iti
bodhisattvaḥ tathāgataḥ

original: (ma. u. ta. 1/47) etadaśuddhāvasthā hi sattvadhātuḥ aśuddhaśuddhāvasthā ca bodhisattvasya prathamabhūmito bhāvanāmārgaparyantaṁ pariśuddhāvasthā  #
analyzed: me u te etat aśuddha avasthā hi sattvadhātuḥ aśuddha śuddha avasthā ca bodhisattvasya prathama bhūmitaḥ bhāvanā mārga paryantam pariśuddha avasthā
tu tathāgata tvam

original: asmābhiḥ kathayituṁ śakyaṁ yat kleśajñeyāvaraṇasamanvitaḥ pṛghatjanaḥ aśuddhaḥ kleśena sadgrāhyadhāraṇayā ca śuddhaḥ jñeyāvaraṇena aśuddhaḥ  #
analyzed: asmābhiḥ kathayitum śakyam yat kleśa jñeya āvaraṇa samanvitaḥ pṛghat janaḥ aśuddhaḥ kleśena sat grāhya dhāraṇayā ca śuddhaḥ jñeya āvaraṇena aśuddhaḥ
evam ca darśana bhāvanā mārgau śuddha aśuddhau
āvaraṇa dvayena pūrṇa śuddhaḥ tathā bhavati

original: sāratastu vaktuṁ śakyate sādhakaḥ svasvayogatānurūpaṁ sādhanāmanuṣṭhāya paramapadaṁ samavāpnoti |
analyzed: sāratas tu vaktum śakyate sādhakaḥ sva sva yogatā anurūpam sādhanām anuṣṭhāya parama padam samavāpnoti

original: kulaṁ yatra phalantatraiva mārgācaraṇe mārgo heturvāpi vidyate |
analyzed: kulam yatra phalat tatra eva mārga ācaraṇe mārgaḥ hetuḥ vā api vidyate

original: paraṁ ca buddhisatarānusāreṇa naike bhedā vidhātuṁ śakyāḥ |
analyzed: param ca buddhi satara anusāreṇa na eke bhedāḥ vidhātum śakyāḥ

analyzed: loke eva manuṣyasya buddhau varṇa sa sthāna ādi bhedena na eke bhedāḥ dṛśyante tathā eva tantra grantheṣu vyāvṛtti anusāreṇa aneka kula vṛttāni carcitāni

original: yathā hi— (ka) sādhakeṣu kleśānāṁ nyūnādhikavāsanayā tantragrantheṣu tattatkleśānāṁ mārgīkaraṇavidhiḥ nyarūpi |

original: punaśca jambūdvīpaṁ parāvṛtya magadhaśrāvastyādivibhinnasthāneṣu nānāvidhābhirucivineyajanebhyaḥ tantramupadideśa |

analyzed: mañjuśriyā sambaddha tantram mañjuśrī mūla kalpasya deśanā tathāgatena śuddhāvāsa loke kṛtā ekasmin samaye bhagavān śuddhāvāsa upari gagana pratiṣṭhite

original: acintyasāścaryādbhutabodhisattvasaṁnipātamaṇḍalamāle viharati sma“ ityādiprakaraṇe vistṛtavivaraṇaṁ draṣṭuṁ śakyate |
analyzed: acintya sa āścarya adbhuta bodhisattva sa nipāta maṇḍala māle viharati smaḥ ityādi prakaraṇe vistṛta vivaraṇam draṣṭum śakyate
avalokiteśvara tantram avalokiteśvareṇa sambaddhāni anekāni tantra pustakāni santi
teṣu ārya amogha pāśa tantram bhagavāḥ tathāgataḥ potala parvate samupādiśat
yat ca avalokiteśvara kṣetram udyate
tatra eva ca asakhya bodhisattvaiḥ rūpa loka sattvaiḥ ca etad upadeśaḥ alābhi
ārya avalokiteśvara padmajāla mūla tantra rājam bhagavān himālayasya mahā vane āyuṣmat mahākaśyapa gayākaśyapa ānanda kumāra śāriputra maudgalyāyana subhūti prabhṛtīn
na ekāḥ ca bhikṣūn śrāmaṇerān nāga deva asura kinnara gandharva ādīn samupādiśat
ārya aparimita āyuḥ jñāna hṛdaya nāmadhāraṇīm buddhaḥ gaṅgā taṭe bhikṣu sagha bodhisattvebhyaḥ upādiśat
ārya avalokiteśvara guhyakośa asaṅga cintāmaṇi cakra hṛdaya nāmadhāraṇīm bhagavān bodhisattvebhyaḥ ṛṣiparvate didiśe

original: 5. āryamukhadeśaka-vidyāmantrahṛdayanāmadhāraṇī bhagavatā tathāgatena śrāvastyā veṇuvane bhikṣusaṁghena maitreyādibodhisattvaiśca sākaṁ viharatā'valokiteśvarādiṛṣīṇāṁ  #
analyzed: ārya mukha deśaka vidyā mantra hṛdaya nāmadhāraṇī bhagavatā tathāgatena śrāvastyāḥ veṇuvane bhikṣu saghena maitreya ādi bodhisattvaiḥ ca sākam viharatā avalokiteśvara ādi ṛṣīṇām
vidyādhara ādīnām ca nivedanena samupādeśi

original: 6. āryasamantabhadranāmadhāraṇī rājagirau bhagavatā'ṣṭasahasrabhikṣusaṁghenāsaṁkhyabodhisattvaiḥ śuddhāvāsakulasya devaiśca paripūrṇāyāṁ sabhāyāṁ  #
analyzed: ārya samantabhadra nāma dhāraṇī rājagirau bhagavatā aṣṭa sahasra bhikṣu saghena asakhya bodhisattvaiḥ śuddhāvāsa kulasya devaiḥ ca paripūrṇāyām sabhāyām

original: pravacanaṁ vidadhatā avalokiteśvaraistaddhāraṇīṁ deśayituṁ vinatau samupādiśyata |
analyzed: pravacanam vidadhatā avalokiteśvaraiḥ tad dhāraṇīm deśayitum vinatau samupādiśyata

original: 7. āryāmodhapāśakalpaḥ bhagavatā potalāparvate avalokiteśvarasya nivedanena deśitaḥ |
analyzed: ārya āmodha pāśa kalpaḥ bhagavatā potalā parvate avalokiteśvarasya nivedanena deśitaḥ

original: 8. āryāvalokiteśvaranāmadhāraṇī svayamavalokiteśvareṇa maitrīvaśāt padmacandrasūryāsane ekānanacaturbhujābhirāvirbhūya bodhisattvebhyaḥ samupadiṣṭā
analyzed: ārya avalokiteśvara nāmadhāraṇī svayamavalokiteśvareṇa maitrī vaśāt padma candra sūrya āsane ekānana caturbhujābhiḥ āvirbhūya bodhisattvebhyaḥ samupadiṣṭā

original: 9. bhagavān svayameva padmāvalokiteśvararūpeṇāvirbhūya vajrāsane vajrapāṇaye siṁhanādatantramupadidiśe |
analyzed: bhagavān svayam eva padmāvalokiteśvara rūpeṇa āvirbhūya vajrāsane vajrapāṇaye sihanāda tantram upadidiśe

original: 10. āryāvalokiteśvarāṣṭaśatakaṁ bhagavatā devanāgayakṣagandharvarākṣasāsurakinnaravineyaiśca sākaṁ viharatā brahmādibodhisattvānāṁ samakṣaṁ  #
analyzed: ārya avalokiteśvara aṣṭaśatakam bhagavatā deva nāga yakṣa gandharva rākṣasa asura kinnara vineyaiḥ ca sākam viharatā brahma ādi bodhisattvānām samakṣam
desitam yatra vibhinna paryāyeṣu avalokiteśvaraḥ praśasitaḥ
acala tantram asya api aneke upavibhāgāḥ samupalabhyante

eteṣu ca ārya acala nāmadhāraṇī bhagavatā trāyastriśa loke daśama bhūmi vāsi bodhisattva samantabhadra ākāśagarbha sarva nīvaraṇa viṣkambhi mañjuśrī pāṇyavalokita īśvara maitreya prabhṛti bodhisattvaiḥ
samam viharamāṇena maitreyasya nivedanena akāri
ārya vighnavināyaka dhāraṇīm bhagavān śrāvastī jetṛ vane āyuṣmat rati nivedanena upādiśat
śrī vajrabhairavam svayam vajrabhairavaḥ adiśat
vajrapāṇi tantram bhagavān tathāgataḥ ārya vajrapāṇi nīla ambara dhara vajrapāla nāmaka tantram pātāla loke nāga rāja ānanda aupananda bodhisattva vajrapāṇi prabhṛtibhiḥ
saha viharan upādiśat
ārya vajrapāṇi nīlāmbara triloka vijaya nāma tantram sumeru parvatasya dakṣiṇa pradeśe alakāvatyām vajrapāṇi sahita ananta deva asurebhyaḥ bodhisattvebhyaḥ ca
tathāgata bhagavatā samupādeśi
nīla ambara dhara vajra pratyakṣa tantra triloka vijayasya deśanā vajrapāṇinā vyadhīyata
vajracaṇḍa citta guhya tantram bhagavatā tathāgatena indra devasya nivedanena samupadiṣṭam

original: 5. śrīvajracaṇḍacittaguhyatantrottaratantraṁ bhagavataḥ vajrapāṇeḥ nivedanena bhagavān samupadiṣṭavān |
analyzed: śrī vajracaṇḍa citta guhyatantra uttara tantram bhagavataḥ vajrapāṇeḥ nivedanena bhagavān samupadiṣṭavān
vajrahṛdaya vajrajihva anala nāma dhāraṇīm bhagavān śītavajra mahā śmaśāne bodhisattva śrāvaka pratyekabuddha deva asura nara prabhṛtibhyaḥ samupādiśat

original: 7. śrīguhyavajrapāṇyabhideśatantraṁ bhagavatā tathāgatena akaniṣṭhabhuvane alakāvatīprāsāde vīreśvare pṛṣṭavati sati praśnottararūpeṇa samupādiśyata
analyzed: śrī guhya vajrapāṇi abhideśa tantram bhagavatā tathāgatena akaniṣṭha bhuvane alakāvatī prāsāde vīra īśvare pṛṣṭavati sati praśna uttara rūpeṇa samupādiśyata

original: 8. āryalohatuṇḍanāmadhāraṇī bhagavatā indrasya nivedanena magadhe āmravanasya videhaguhāyāṁ viharatā deśanā samapādi |
analyzed: ārya lohatuṇḍa nāmadhāraṇī bhagavatā indrasya nivedanena magadhe āmravanasya videha guhāyām viharatā deśanā samapādi

original: 9. āryamekhalānāmadhāraṇī kapilavastuni nyagrodhodyāne kumārarāhulasya nivedanena upādeśi |
analyzed: ārya mekhalā nāmadhāraṇī kapilavastuni nyagrodha udyāne kumāra rāhulasya nivedanena upādeśi

original: 10. āryavajrapāṇihṛdayaṁ bhagavān buddhaḥ śrāvastī-jaitravane ānandādinā vajrapāṇeḥ kiṁ kulamityādi praśne samupādiśat |
analyzed: ārya vajrapāṇi hṛdayam bhagavān buddhaḥ śrāvastī jaitravane ānanda ādinā vajrapāṇeḥ kim kulam ityādi praśne samupādiśat

original: vidyādevītantram 1. mahāmāyūrī-vidyārājñī bhagavatā tathāgatena anāthapiṇḍakodyāne viharatā deśitā |
analyzed: vidyādevītantram mahāmāyūrīvidyārājñī bhagavatā tathāgatena anāthapiṇḍaka udyāne viharatā deśitā

original: dīkṣāmādāya śārināmakabhikṣoḥ bhikṣusaṁghe praveśasya kiñcitkāla eva gataḥ akasmācca sarpeṇa saḥ daṁṣṭraḥ taṁ mūrcchitaṁ vilokya ānandena bhagavān  #
analyzed: dīkṣām ādāya śāri nāmaka bhikṣoḥ bhikṣu saghe praveśasya kiñcid kāle eva gataḥ akasmāt ca sarpeṇa saḥ daṣṭraḥ tam mūrcchitam vilokya ānandena bhagavān
niveditaḥ tadā prāṇimātrasya vibhinna rogebhyaḥ muktaye vidyā rājñīm upādiśyata

original: 2. mahāmantrānudhāraṇīsūtraṁ bhagavān buddhaḥ śrāvastyā jetṛvane indra trāyastriṁśadevadikpālayakṣādibhirnivedane kṛte sati samupadideśa |
analyzed: mahāmantrānudhāraṇī sūtram bhagavān buddhaḥ śrāvastyāḥ jetṛ vane indra trāyastriśa deva dikpāla yakṣa ādibhiḥ nivedane kṛte sati samupadideśa
ārya mahāpratisarā vidyā rājñīm bhagavān tathāgataḥ vajraparvate samupadiṣṭavān

original: 4. āryajayavatīmahāvidyārājñī bhagavatā rājagiri-videhaparvate nivasatā bhikṣusaṁgha-bhikṣuṇīsaṁgha-śrāmaṇerasaṁghopāsakānāṁ śāsanaṁ prati  #
analyzed: ārya jayavatī mahāvidyā rājñī bhagavatā rājagiri videha parvate nivasatā bhikṣu sagha bhikṣuṇī sagha śrāmaṇera sagha upāsakānām śāsanam prati

original: vighnaṁ vilokya prārthanayā svayaṁvajradharacaṇḍarūpeṇāvirbhūya pūrvābhimukhasahasravajrajvālāḥ prasāryyaṁ bhūtasamūhaṁ tarjayatopādeśi |
analyzed: vighnam vilokya prārthanayā svaya vajradhara caṇḍa rūpeṇa āvirbhūya pūrva abhimukha sahasra vajra jvālāḥ prasāryyam bhūta samūham tarjayatā upādeśi
ārya tārā bhaṭṭārikā nāmaka aṣṭaśatakam ārya avalokiteśvaraḥ samupādiśat
sarva tathāgata mātṛ tārā viśvakarma bhāva tantram tathāgata buddhena tuṣita loke mañjuśrī prabhṛti bodhisattva abhyarthanayā samupadiṣṭam
ārya tārā aṣṭa ghora tāraṇī sūtram bhagavān sumeru parvate devasthāne samupādiśat
uṣṇīṣa tantram asya api aneke granthāḥ prāpyante

original: eteṣu ca āryamahādaṇḍanāmadhāraṇīṁ bhagavāṁstathāgataḥ rājagireḥ gṛdhrakūṭe āyuṣmato rāhulabhadrasya prārthanayā'diśat |
analyzed: eteṣu ca ārya mahādaṇḍa nāmadhāraṇīm bhagavān tathāgataḥ rājagireḥ gṛdhrakūṭe āyuṣmataḥ rāhulabhadrasya prārthanayā adiśat

original: 2. āryasarva-āntarāyikaviśodhinīnāmadhāraṇī bhagavatā tadā samupādeśi yadā rājagireḥ pūrvasmin brāhmaṇa-nivāsāmravanasya dakṣiṇe ca videhaparvatasya  #
analyzed: ārya sarva āntarāyika viśodhinī nāmadhāraṇī bhagavatā tadā samupādeśi yadā rājagireḥ pūrvasmin brāhmaṇa nivāsa āmra vanasya dakṣiṇe ca videha parvatasya
indra ākhya kandarāyām bhagavān viharamāṇaḥ āsīt

original: sasevakaḥ indrastatropadeśa-grahaṇāya samupāgatastasya ca nivedanena bhagavatā dhāraṇīyaṁ tasmai samupādiśyata |
analyzed: sa sevakaḥ indraḥ tatra upadeśa grahaṇāya samupāgataḥ tasya ca nivedanena bhagavatā dhāraṇīyam tasmai samupādiśyata

original: 3. āryasarva-abhayapradānanāmadhāraṇī cāpi magadhe bhagavatā indrasya vinatyā didiśe |
analyzed: ārya sarva abhaya pradāna nāmadhāraṇī ca api magadhe bhagavatā indrasya vinatyā didiśe

original: 4. āryabāhuputrapratisāranāmadhāraṇī śrāvastyāmanāthapiṇḍakena rājñā prasenajitena ākramaṇe kṛte sati tadrakṣaṇaṁ kathaṁ śakyam iti pṛṣṭe sati  #
analyzed: ārya bāhuputra pratisāra nāmadhāraṇī śrāvastyām anāthapiṇḍakena rājñā prasenajitena ākramaṇe kṛte sati tad rakṣaṇam katham śakyam iti pṛṣṭe sati
bhagavatā iyam dhāriṇī samupādeśi
śrāvastī anāthapiṇḍaka udyāne

original: bhikṣubhiḥ saha yadā bhagavān viharati sma tadānīm ānando grīṣmakāle māsatrayamupoṣathaṁ sampādya ayodhyātaḥ buddhadarśanāya śrāvastīmupajagāma
analyzed: bhikṣubhiḥ saha yadā bhagavān viharati sma tadānīm ānandaḥ grīṣma kāle māsa trayam upoṣatham sampādya ayodhyātaḥ buddha darśanāya śrāvastīm upajagāma

original: bhagavatā ānandaḥ samabhihitaḥ yadadyataḥ pūrvaṁ saptasaptatikoṭimitasamyaksambuddhairapi āryamahādhāraṇī samupadiṣṭā |
analyzed: bhagavatā ānandaḥ samabhihitaḥ yat adya atas pūrvam saptasaptati koṭi mita samyaksambuddhaiḥ api ārya mahādhāraṇī samupadiṣṭā
aham ca punar ārya mahādhāraṇīm tubhyam upadiśāmi
ārya bhadrarātri nāmasūtram bhagavatā rājagiri veṇuvane bhikṣubhyaḥ didiśe
ārya ojaḥpratyaṅgiraṇī sūtram śrāvastyām ānanda ādi bhikṣubhyaḥ samupadiṣṭam

original: 8. āryajvarapraśamanīnāmadhāraṇī ca bhagavatā rājagireḥ śīlākhyaśmaśāne bhikṣusaṁghāyopādiśyata |
analyzed: ārya jvarapraśamanī nāmadhāraṇī ca bhagavatā rājagireḥ śīla ākhya śmaśāne bhikṣu saghāya upādiśyata
sarva tathāgata uṣṇīṣavijaya nāmadhāraṇī kalpasya amitāyuḥ bhagavatā sukhāvatī loke avalokita īśvarasya nivedanena upadeśaḥ samapādi

original: 10. āryadraviṇavidyārājatantraṁ buddhaḥ śrāvastyāṁ veṇunirmite prakoṣṭhāṅgaṇe viharan ānandādibhyaḥ samupādiśat |
analyzed: ārya draviṇa vidyā rāja tantram buddhaḥ śrāvastyām veṇu nirmite prakoṣṭha aṅgaṇe viharan ānanda ādibhyaḥ samupādiśat

original: kriyātantrasya svarūpam kriyātantrasvarūpaṁ tathāgatena jñānasamuccaye evaṁ pratyāpādi - “loke avahelanāvidhātṛcaryāyā bhītaḥ kriyātantrasya  #
analyzed: kriyātantrasya svarūpam kriyātantra svarūpam tathāgatena jñāna samuccaye evam pratyāpādi loke avahelanā vidhātṛ caryāyāḥ bhītaḥ kriyātantrasya
sādhakaḥ bāhyaśuddhim prābalyena vidhatte

original: asmin jñānasattvasyābhāvaḥ svadehe devakāyasya bhāvanā'bhāvaḥ ativiśiṣṭe'dhvani praveśayogyatā'bhāvo bhavati |
analyzed: asmin jñāna sattvasya abhāvaḥ sva dehe deva kāyasya bhāvanā abhāvaḥ ati viśiṣṭe adhvani praveśa yogya tā abhāvaḥ bhavati
atas sa doṣa kṣaya hetave vikalpam āśrayate
evam sādhakaḥ kriyā tantra avasthitaḥ samabhidhīyate
etat vyākhyāyamānaḥ koṅṭula rinapoche vakti manda buddhiḥ janaḥ sādhakaḥ
gambhīra arthāt rāga utpanna anubhūte bibheti

original: svayaṁ samayadevasya bhāvanāyāmasāmarthyena svadehe devakāyasya bhāvanābhāvo bhavati |
analyzed: svayam samayadevasya bhāvanāyāma sāmarthyena sva dehe deva kāyasya bhāvanā bhāvaḥ bhavati

original: etadabhāve jñānadevamāhūyātmani sa vilīnatvamapi na kartumarhati |
analyzed: etad abhāve jñānadevam āhūya ātmani sa vilīna tvam api na kartum arhati
sandhyā bhāṣayā mudrita ati viśiṣṭa mārgha anukaraṇe api tat asāmarthyam

original: doṣāṇāṁ prahāṇāya vikalpānāśritya snānādikamācaradbhiriṣṭadevasya svāminaḥ rūpeṇātmanaśca sevakasya rūpeṇa bhāvanāṁ vidhāyādhiṣṭhātumiṣyate
analyzed: doṣāṇām prahāṇāya vikalpān āśritya snāna ādikam ācaradbhiḥ iṣṭadevasya svāminaḥ rūpeṇa ātmanaḥ ca sevakasya rūpeṇa bhāvanām vidhāya adhiṣṭhātum iṣyate
evam sādhakāḥ kriyātantravantaḥ kathyante
ebhiḥ mantra ajana ādi aṣṭa laukika siddhīnām svātantryeṇa ācaraṇa abhilāṣeṇa tad prāpti artham mantra āvṛtim anuṣṭhāya sādhanā anuṣṭhīyate

original: seratogapācāryeṇa kriyātantrasya svarūpamitthaṁ nyarūpi - kriyācaryātantrayoḥ sādhakāḥ sampūrṇamārgaṁ sādhanāsthala-svatatvavidyāmantrāvṛtti-agnistha-dhvanistha-dhvanyantaḥstha  #
analyzed: seratogapa ācāryeṇa kriyātantrasya svarūpam ittham nyarūpi kriyā caryā tantrayoḥ sādhakāḥ sampūrṇa mārgam sādhanā sthala sva tatva vidyā mantra āvṛtti agni stha dhvani stha dhvani antar stha

original: samādhi-mantrasādhanāpraveśavidhiṣu homābhiṣekākhyeṣu daśasu tattveṣu saṁgṛhya dhyānaṁ kurvanti |
analyzed: samādhi mantra sādhanā praveśa vidhiṣu homa abhiṣeka ākhyeṣu daśasu tattveṣu sa gṛhya dhyānam kurvanti
etāni daśa tattvāni bodhyaṅgāni manyante

original: buddhenānuṣṭhitāyāḥ jñānasamuccayavacana-vyākhyāyā udāharaṇaṁ dadatācārya-coṅkhāpāmahodayena vyāhriyate-kriyātantrasya vineyajanā ye ca devayoge  #
analyzed: buddhena anuṣṭhitāyāḥ jñānasamuccaya vacana vyākhyāyāḥ udāharaṇam dadatā ācārya coṅkhāpā mahā udayena vyāhriyate kriyā tantrasya vineya janāḥ ye ca deva yoge
ekāgra tāyāḥ bibhyati

original: ativiśiṣṭācaraṇasya loka-garhaṇatvād evaṁ cārthaṁ vidhātumasamarthāḥ evaṁ cotpattijarābhaṅgādidoṣāṇāṁ kāraṇena sarvadharmasatyatāṁ sattvā sādhanāṁ
analyzed: ati viśiṣṭa ācaraṇasya loka garhaṇa tvāt evam ca artham vidhātum asamarthāḥ evam ca utpatti jarā bhaṅga ādi doṣāṇām kāraṇena sarva dharma satyatām sattvā sādhanā

original: evaṁ vikalponmukhasādhakebhyaḥ eva svayaṁ devabhāvanāyāḥ jñānāveśasya cābhāvaḥ pratipāditaḥ,
analyzed: evam vikalpa unmukha sādhakebhyaḥ eva svayam deva bhāvanāyāḥ jñāna āveśasya ca abhāvaḥ pratipāditaḥ

original: na tu kriyātantrasya samagrasādhakebhyaḥ evaṁ viśiṣṭasādhakāḥ ye ca svadehadevabhāvanājñānāveśa-rāga-hāsadarśanādimārgeṇacaraṇe kṣamante teṣāṁ  #
analyzed: na tu kriyātantrasya samagra sādhakebhyaḥ evam viśiṣṭa sādhakāḥ ye ca sva deha deva bhāvanā jñāna āveśa rāga hāsa darśana ādi mārgeṇa caraṇe kṣamante teṣām
kṛte samanujñā vidyate

original: itthamatra kriyāyāḥ sāmānyaviśiṣṭasādhakānāṁ starānurūpaṁ svarūpaṁ svīkṛtamasti |

original: tatsvacittacandramaṇḍale tanmantrabījaṁ nyasya tadekībhūya sthitirevākṣaradevasya bhāvanā vyāhriyate |
analyzed: tad sva citta candra maṇḍale tat mantrabījam nyasya tat ekībhūya sthitiḥ eva akṣaradevasya bhāvanā vyāhriyate
iti tatra samāhitiḥ eva dhvani deva bhāvanā abhidhīyate

original: (gha) rūpadevaḥ— nabhomaṇḍale svacittaṁ candramaṇḍalasadṛśaṁ bhāvayitvā tanmadhye yasyeṣṭadevasya mantrabījasya nyāsena akṣaradevadhvanidevayorbhāvanāvidhinā  #
analyzed: rūpa devaḥ nabhaḥ maṇḍale sva cittam candra maṇḍala sadṛśam bhāvayitvā tad madhye yasya iṣṭadevasya mantra bījasya nyāsena akṣaradeva dhvanidevayoḥ bhāvanā vidhinā

original: cittasyaikāgryamabhūt tadbījamantrāt pañcaraśmipuṁjaḥ sphuritaḥ san tanmin ārādhyadevyaḥ daśāśāsu virājitabuddhasya bodhisattvānāṁ ca pūjārcanaṁ  #
analyzed: cittasya aikāgryam abhūt tad bīja mantrāt pañcaraśmi pujaḥ sphuritaḥ san tanmin ārādhya devyaḥ daśa āśāsu virājita buddhasya bodhisattvānām ca pūjā arcanam
kurvanti
iti evam cintanīyam
