original: (ṅa) mudrādevaḥ— hastamudrayā svoṣṇīṣalalāṭakaṇṭhādiṣu spṛṣṭeṣu satsu svayaṁ samayamudrayādhiṣṭhito bhavet,
analyzed: mudrādevaḥ hasta mudrayā sva uṣṇīṣa lalāṭa kaṇṭha ādiṣu spṛṣṭeṣu satsu svayam samayamudrayā adhiṣṭhitaḥ bhavet
evam bhāvanā vidhānam eva mudrādevasya bhāvanā ucyate

original: (ca) nimittadevaḥ— sādhakaḥ yamiṣṭadevaṁ svacittamaṇḍalabhinnaṁ mattvā samāhitavān tata upari pṛṣṭhabhūmau sarvabhājanaṁ sattvalokaśca śuddhābhāsaḥ
analyzed: ca nimitta devaḥ sādhakaḥ yam iṣṭadevam sva citta maṇḍala bhinnam mattvā samāhitavān tatas upari pṛṣṭha bhūmau sarva bhājanam sattva lokaḥ ca śuddha ābhāsaḥ

original: arthāt sveṣṭadevasya sthānaṁ kāyasāmagrī cāsti evaṁ bhāvanā nimittadevasya bhāvanā samabhidhīyate |
analyzed: arthāt sva iṣṭadevasya sthānam kāya sāmagrī ca asti evam bhāvanā nimitta devasya bhāvanā samabhidhīyate
sādhakena bhāvanāyām dakṣa tā prāptyai prāṇāyāmaḥ abhyasyate

original: prāṇāyāmaśabdaḥ yadyapyanuttaratantre kriyātantre copalabhyate paraṁ ca vidhestu bhinnatvameva |
analyzed: prāṇāyāma śabdaḥ yadi api anuttara tantre kriyā tantre ca upalabhyate param ca vidheḥ tu bhinna tvam eva

original: apānaṁ ca tad yat prāṇebhyaḥ dīrghatvaṁ pradadāti |
analyzed: apānam ca tat yat prāṇebhyaḥ dīrgha tvam pradadāti
atas prāṇa apāna bandhanam tad avarodhaḥ ca prāṇāyāmaḥ vartate

original: kālacakre lalanāyāṁ rasanāyāṁ ca caladvāyumavarudhya tanmadhyamāyāṁ praveśasya prayāsa eva prāṇāyāma ucyate |
analyzed: kālacakre lalanāyām rasanāyām ca calat vāyum avarudhya tad madhyamāyām praveśasya prayāsaḥ eva prāṇāyāmaḥ ucyate

original: atra prāṇāpānayoḥ śvāsapraśvāsayoḥ niyantraṇaṁ saṁsthāpya tatra vikalpodbhavāvarodho vidhātavyaḥ |
analyzed: atra prāṇa apānayoḥ śvāsa praśvāsayoḥ niyantraṇam sasthāpya tatra vikalpa udbhava avarodhaḥ vidhātavyaḥ

original: atra prāṇāpānayoḥ śvāsapraśvāsayoḥ niyantraṇaṁ saṁsthāpya tatra vikalpodbhavāvarodho vidhātavyaḥ |
analyzed: atra prāṇa apānayoḥ śvāsa praśvāsayoḥ niyantraṇam sasthāpya tatra vikalpa udbhava avarodhaḥ vidhātavyaḥ

tadā abhyantara bhāgaḥ śuddhi ati
prāṇāyāma vidhāna kālasya api tantra naye pārthakyam eva

original: anuttaratantre niṣpannakramasya bhāvanākāle eva prāṇāyāma- bhāvanā kriyate nānyasyāmavasthāyām atra nimittadevasya bhāvanāyāṁ prāṇāyāmo vidhīyate
analyzed: anuttara tantre niṣpanna kramasya bhāvanā kāle eva prāṇāyāma bhāvanā kriyate na anyasyām avasthāyām atra nimitta devasya bhāvanāyām prāṇāyāmaḥ vidhīyate
prāṇāyāma prayojanāni api pṛthak santi
anuttara tantre vāyum avadhūtyām praveśayitum prāṇāyāmaḥ vidhīyate

original: atra kriyātantre tu kevalaṁ vikalpāvarodhāyedaṁ sampādyate |

vikalpa bandhanāt devatā ābhāsaḥ su spaṣṭam prakaṭībhavati
prāṇāyāma vidhau ca api bhedaḥ
anuttara tantre avasthita uṣṇīṣa cakra sthitasya pitṛ labdha śukrasya nābhi cakra sthita mātṛ labdha śoṇitasya ca ūrdhva adhas gatibhyām utpanna mahā sukhasya ca anubhūtyā
mahāśūnyatā sākṣātkriyate

original: atra vikalpānavarodhya devabhāvanām ekāgracittena gṛhītvā ālambane sthitvā devābhāsodbhavāya cittavṛtteraikyaṁ vidhīyate |
analyzed: atra vikalpān avarodhya deva bhāvanām ekāgra cittena gṛhītvā ālambane sthitvā deva ābhāsa udbhavāya citta vṛtteḥ aikyam vidhīyate

pradhāna bhāvanā

( kha ) pradhānabhāvanāyāṁ dhyānottaratantroktimāśritya caturavayavasahitaḥ sādhakaḥ prāṇāyāmena sākaṁ japaṁ kuryāt |
analyzed: pradhāna bhāvanāyām dhyāna uttara tantra uktim āśritya catur avayava sahitaḥ sādhakaḥ prāṇāyāmena sākam japam kuryāt

original: āśrayadevādibhāvanā svasamakṣam iṣṭadevasya suspaṣṭarūpasya paripūrṇarūpasya ca bhāvanākaraṇam āśrayadevaḥ |
analyzed: āśraya deva ādi bhāvanā sva samakṣam iṣṭa devasya su spaṣṭa rūpasya paripūrṇa rūpasya ca bhāvanā karaṇam āśraya devaḥ
āśraya devasya hṛdaye sva citta maṇḍalasya bhāvanā eva āśrita bodhi cittam ucyate

original: tadupari sveṣṭadevasya mantrabījasya sahajabhāvena uccaritattvasya bhāvanā dhvanibījamantro nigadyate |
analyzed: tad upari sva iṣṭadevasya mantra bījasya sahaja bhāvena uccari tattvasya bhāvanā dhvanibījamantraḥ nigadyate

original: etattritayāvayavānāṁ suspaṣṭatayā bhāvanāṁ vidhāya prāṇāyāmaṁ vidadhyāt |
analyzed: etad tritaya avayavānām su spaṣṭa tayā bhāvanām vidhāya prāṇāyāmam vidadhyāt

original: arthāt vāyumavarodhya svasamakṣaṁ aṅgatrayayuktena ālambane sthirībhūya manasyeva mantrāvṛttirvidhātavyā |
analyzed: arthāt vāyum avarodhya sva samakṣam aṅga traya yuktena ālambane sthirībhūya manasi eva mantra āvṛttiḥ vidhātavyā

original: mantrajapāvadhau svasamakṣaṁ bhāviteṣṭadevasya hṛdaye'pi ātmavanmantroccāraṇaṁ bhavati,
analyzed: mantra japa avadhau sva samakṣam bhāvita iṣṭadevasya hṛdaye api ātma vat mantra uccāraṇam bhavati
iti evam cintayet yathā sādhyam ca vāyum avarūndhyāt
vāyu visarjana avadhau ātmānam iṣṭadeva abhinnam mattvā iṣṭadeva ahaṅkāram kuryāt
mantra japa avasthāyām ikāra ukāra ādi laghu dīrgha mātrāṇām ca su spaṣṭam uccāraṇam bhavet

original: jāpaṁ jāpaṁ pariśrāntau satyāṁ viśramāya nirvikalpasvatattve samāhitaḥ syāt |
analyzed: jāpam jāpam pariśrāntau satyām viśramāya nirvikalpa sva tattve samāhitaḥ syāt

original: viśrāmakālamatiricya svasamakṣam iṣṭadevālambane tāvat ekāgramanāḥ tiṣṭhet yāvacca devātmanorabhinnānubhūtirna bhavet |
analyzed: viśrāma kālam atiricya sva samakṣam iṣṭa deva ālambane tāvat ekāgra manāḥ tiṣṭhet yāvat ca deva ātmanoḥ abhinna anubhūtiḥ na bhavet
kriyātantre asmin sva dehe iṣṭadeva abhāvam manyamānānām paddhati anusāram mantra japa vidhiḥ ayam asti

original: yairvidvadbhiḥ kriyātantre svadehe devakāyasya bhāvanāvidhiḥ svīkriyate tairūpari varṇitāṅgatrayayuktairbhūtvā svayamapi iṣṭadeve bhāvayitvā  #
analyzed: yaiḥ vidvadbhiḥ kriyā tantre sva dehe deva kāyasya bhāvanā vidhiḥ svīkriyate taiḥ upari varṇita aṅga traya yuktaiḥ bhūtvā svayam api iṣṭadeve bhāvayitvā

original: prāṇāyāmakāle śvāsāvadhau nijahṛdayasthā'śrayāśritabījamantrādikaṁ sarvaṁ prabhāmayaṁ jātam evaṁ vicintya navadvārāṇi pidhāya mantrabīje manaḥ  #
analyzed: prāṇāyāma kāle śvāsa avadhau nija hṛdaya stha ā āśraya āśrita bīja mantra ādikam sarvam prabhā mayam jātam evam vicintya nava dvārāṇi pidhāya mantra bīje manaḥ

original: śvāsamuktyavadhau praśvāsaḥ svasamakṣaṁ bahiḥ sthiteṣṭadevasya maṇḍale praviṣṭaḥ evaṁ bhāvyate |
analyzed: śvāsa mukti avadhau praśvāsaḥ sva samakṣam bahis sthita iṣṭadevasya maṇḍale praviṣṭaḥ evam bhāvyate

original: 4. dhyānatattvasya bhāvanā dhyānatattva- bhāvanāyāḥ trayo bhedāḥ ( ka )

original: agnisthadhyānam - svasammukhaṁ bhāviteṣṭadevasya hṛdaya-candra-maṇḍalasya madhye caturdik dīpaśikheva atyantaṁ śāntamavacchinnaṁ bījākṣaraṁ
analyzed: agni stha dhyānam sva sammukham bhāvita iṣṭadevasya hṛdaya candra maṇḍalasya madhye catur diś dīpa śikhā iva atyantam śāntam avacchinnam bīja akṣaraiḥ

original: iti vicārya prāṇāpānau niyamya yathāsādhyaṁ śvāsamavarodhya ālambane cittaikāgyrameva agnisthadhyānamucyate |
analyzed: iti vicārya prāṇa apānau niyamya yathāsādhyam śvāsam avarodhya ālambane citta aikāgyram eva agni stha dhyānam ucyate
etena śānti karma ādi siddhau sāhāyyam upalabhyate

original: ( kha ) dhvanisthadhyānam- iṣṭadevaṁ hṛdayakamalacandramaṇḍale caturdik agnipuñjena sama bījamantramalaṅkṛtamevaṁ kiñcitkṣaṇaṁ manaḥ pravartya  #
analyzed: dhvani stha dhyānam iṣṭadevam hṛdaya kamala candra maṇḍale catur diś agni puñjena sama bīja mantram alaṅkṛtam evam kiñcid kṣaṇam manaḥ pravartya
paśyet
tatas kramaśas bīja akṣara lopaḥ tatas ca tasmāt mantra dhvaniḥ utpadyate

original: evaṁ bhāvayitvā pūrvavat prāṇāyāmaṁ kṛtvā ekāgratvaṁ kuryāt |
analyzed: evam bhāvayitvā pūrvavat prāṇāyāmam kṛtvā ekāgra tvam kuryāt

original: atra prāṇāyāmābhiprāyaḥ - sarvacchidreṣu praviṣṭo vāyuḥ prāṇākhyastathā tato nirgato vāyurapānākhyo'rthāt śvāsapraśvāsākhyau vāyū,
analyzed: atra prāṇāyāma abhiprāyaḥ sarva chidreṣu praviṣṭaḥ vāyuḥ prāṇa ākhyaḥ tathā tatas nirgataḥ vāyuḥ apāna ākhyaḥ arthāt śvāsa praśvāsa ākhyau vāyū

original: tanniyamya sahasā candramaṇḍalād utpadyamānaghaṇṭādhvani- samaṁ mantradhvanisthitireva dhvanisthaṁ dhyānaṁ nigadyate |
analyzed: tat niyamya sahasā candra maṇḍalāt utpadyamāna ghaṇṭā dhvani samam mantra dhvani sthitiḥ eva dhvani stham dhyānam nigadyate

original: ( ga ) dhvanyantaḥ sthaṁ dhyānam - etadadhyānasthityā śabdamantradhvanau vicāryamāṇe sati utpattisthitibhaṁganirodhavirahite nirvikalpasvatattve  #
samāhitattve sati adhiprajñākhyaṁ jñānamutpadyate yacca mokṣasarvajñatayorūpādānaṁ bhavati |
analyzed: samāhi tattve sati adhiprajñā ākhyam jñānam utpadyate yat ca mokṣa sarvajña tayoḥ upādānam bhavati
varṇitaḥ ayam sādhanā vidhiḥ prāmukhyeṇa buddha guhya viracita dhyānottara tantra ṭīkām ādhārīkṛtya nyarūpi

original: sādhanācaryā subāhuparipṛcchāsūtre varṇitaṁ yad vidhipūrvakaṁ mantrajapānantaraṁ yadi mantrasiddhiḥ cikīrṣyeta tarhi tena sādhanāsiddhicaryā  #
analyzed: sādhanā caryā subāhu paripṛcchā sūtre varṇitam yat vidhi pūrvakam mantra japa anantaram yadi mantra siddhiḥ cikīrṣyeta tarhi tena sādhanā siddhi caryā
vidheyā

original: atredaṁ dhyeyaṁ mantrasādhako yadi bodhicittotpādābhāve mantrajapasaṁkhyāṁ pūrayet tarhi sa śrāvakayāniprabhṛtīnāṁ falaṁ tu lapsyate,
analyzed: atrā idam dhyeyam mantra sādhakaḥ yadi bodhi citta utpāda abhāve mantra japa sakhyām pūrayet tarhi sa śrāvaka yāni prabhṛtīnām falam tu lapsyate
param ca tena vajradhara padam na avāpsyate
atas mantra yānine bodhi citta utpādanam anivāryyam bhavati
kriyātantra sādhakaḥ kula anusāram trividhām siddhim āpadyate
tathāgata kulāt śānti karma

original: padyakulāt śreṣṭhakarma vajrakulācca tena raudrakarma prāpyate |
analyzed: padya kulāt śreṣṭha karma vajra kulāt ca tena raudra karma prāpyate

original: punaśca kulānāmāntarikabhedena pradhānakulāt śāntiḥ adhipatikulāt puṣṭiḥ krodha-krodhinīkulāt raudrakarma siddhyati |
analyzed: punar ca kulānām āntarika bhedena pradhāna kulāt śāntiḥ adhipati kulāt puṣṭiḥ krodha krodhinī kulāt raudra karma siddhi ati

original: svarūpagataḥ kriyātantrī trividhasiddhimavāpnoti-uttamaḥ kriyātantrī vidyādharapadaṁ madhyamaśca abhijñādipañcajñānāni kaniṣṭhaśca kriyātantrī  #
analyzed: sva rūpa gataḥ kriyātantrī trividha siddhim avāpnoti uttamaḥ kriyātantrī vidyādhara padam madhyamaḥ ca abhijñā ādi pañcajñānāni kaniṣṭhaḥ ca kriyātantrī

original: sarvaśāstrāṇāṁ sūkṣmajñānaṁ laghimādikaṁ - rasa- rasāyanatvaritagamanavaśīkaraṇamāraṇādikṣudrasiddhiṁ ca prāpnoti |
analyzed: sarva śāstrāṇām sūkṣma jñānam laghima ādikam ca prāpnoti

original: āśrayādisiddhyanusāreṇa kriyātantriṇaḥ kramaśaḥ kāyasiddhidravyasiddhisaṁbhogasiddhīnāṁ bhāgino bhavanti |
analyzed: āśraya ādi siddhi anusāreṇa kriyā tantriṇaḥ kramaśas kāya siddhi dravya siddhi sabhoga siddhīnām bhāginaḥ bhavanti

original: etat siddhi- prāptyai mantrajapasaṁkhyāpūrto satyāmeva sādhanācaryā vidhātavyā, nānyathā |
analyzed: etat siddhi prāptyai satyām eva sādhana ācaryā vidhātavyā na anyathā

original: sādhanācaryāyā niyamadvayam- sāmānyasādhanāyāṁ kālatraye sveṣṭadevasya savidhi pūjārcanāpāpadeśanābhyarthanāpariṇāmanādikaṁ sampādanīyam |
analyzed: sādhanā caryāyāḥ niyama dvayam sāmānya sādhanāyām kāla traye sva iṣṭadevasya savidhi pūjā arcanā pāpa deśanā abhyarthanā pariṇāmana ādikam sampādanīyam
sūtra antam ca paṭhanīyam

original: evaṁ sādhanāyāṁ svasamakṣaṁ sthāpitayā mūrtyā stūpādinā vā ābhāprakaṭīkaraṇam,
analyzed: evam sādhanāyām sva samakṣam sthāpitayā mūrtyā stūpa ādinā vā ābhā prakaṭīkaraṇam

original: sādhanāyāṁ kṣutpipāsādīnāmabhāvaḥ śarīrasfūrtiḥ svapne iṣṭadeva-darśanamityetat sādhanāsiddhilakṣaṇāni |
analyzed: sādhanāyām kṣudh pipāsā ādīnām abhāvaḥ śarīra sfūrtiḥ svapne iṣṭadeva darśanam iti etat sādhanā siddhi lakṣaṇāni
evam lakṣaṇeṣu uditeṣu sva gurūm pṛṣṭvā siddhi caryā anuṣṭheyā
viśeṣa sādhanāyām khaḍga ādikam ādāya mantra japa homa ādikam kuryāt

original: khecarādiśuddhakṣetraṁ gatvā aṁjanādikaṁ saṁsevya caryāḥ ācaryyeran,
analyzed: khecara ādi śuddha kṣetram gatvā ajana ādikam sa sevya caryāḥ ācaryyeran
tena ca vidyādhara padam prāptum prayasanīyam

original: svadehasya sūkṣmatvaṁ vidhāya īśvarasya aṣṭau guṇāḥ prāptavyāḥ |
analyzed: sva dehasya sūkṣma tvam vidhāya īśvarasya aṣṭau guṇāḥ prāptavyāḥ

original: siddhicaryā kriyātantrasya sādhanāvidheḥ siddhicaryānusāraṁ caryāṁ vidhāya sādhakaḥ yathecchaṁ siddhiṁ labdhumarhati |
analyzed: siddhi caryā kriyātantrasya sādhanā vidheḥ siddhi caryā anusāram caryām vidhāya sādhakaḥ yatheccham siddhim labdhum arhati

original: uparyuktaṁ yad bodhicittotpādābhāve anayaiva sādhanayā śrāvakapadaṁ lokalokottara-sarvavidhahīnamadhyamādhamasiddhīṁśca prāptuṁ pārayati |
analyzed: upari uktam yat bodhi citta utpāda abhāve anayā eva sādhanayā śrāvaka padam loka lokottara sarvavidha hīna madhyama adhama siddhīḥ ca prāptum pārayati
atas uttamam parama padam ca uddeśyam bhavet
kriyātantra sādhana uddeśyam kṣudra siddhi prāptiḥ na bhavati
tat tu buddha tva avāptiḥ eva

original: kriyātantrasādhanānusāreṇa buddhatvaprāptyai aṣṭakalpānāṁ kalpatrayasya vā kālo vyatyeti |
analyzed: kriyātantra sādhana anusāreṇa buddhatva prāptyai aṣṭa kalpānām kalpa trayasya vā kālaḥ vyatyeti

original: sādhakasya tīvraprayāsena ekasmin janmanyapi paramapadaprāptyuktistu mañjuśrīmūlakalpādikriyātantragrantheṣu vihitā'sti |
analyzed: sādhakasya tīvra prayāsena ekasmin janmani api parama pada prāpti uktiḥ tu mañjuśrī mūlakalpa ādi kriyātantra grantheṣu vihitā asti

original: kriyātantre pañca mārgā daśa bhūmayaśca kriyātantrānusāraṁ pañcamārgāṇāṁ daśabhūmīnāṁ ca vyākhyāvyavasthā ittham - 1. kriyātantrābhiṣekaprāptyanantaraṁ  #
analyzed: kriyātantre pañca mārgāḥ daśa bhūmayaḥ ca kriyātantra anusāram pañca mārgāṇām daśa bhūmīnām ca vyākhyā vyavasthāḥ ittham kriyātantra abhiṣeka prāpti anantaram

original: sādhako'haṁ kriyātantrasādhanāyāḥ samyaksambodhiṁ prāpsyāmi 'ityetadakṛtrimābhilāṣotpattimārabhya dhvanyantaḥ sthādhyānabhāvanābalena śūnyatābodhakavipaśyanāyāḥ  #
analyzed: sādhakaḥ aham kriyātantra sādhanāyāḥ samyaksambodhim prāpsyāmi iti etat akṛtrima abhilāṣa utpattim ārabhya dhvanyantaḥ sthā dhyāna bhāvanā balena śūnyatā bodhaka vipaśyanāyāḥ
sākṣātkāra pūrva varti mārgaḥ kriyā tantrasya sa bhāra mārgaḥ ucayate

original: 2. vipaśyanotpādamārabhya śamathavipaśyanāyugalabhāvanayā śūnyatāsākṣātkārapūrvāvasthā mārgaśca prayogamārgaḥ samabhidhīyate |
analyzed: vipaśyanā utpādam ārabhya śamatha vipaśyanā yugala bhāvanayā śūnyatā sākṣātkāra pūrva avasthā mārgaḥ ca prayoga mārgaḥ samabhidhīyate

original: 3. vipaśyanāsamādhidvārā śūnyatāṁ sākṣātkṛtya bhāvanāmārgeṇa praheyadharmasya mahākleśāvaraṇasya sthūlāṁśapratipakṣotpattimārgaḥ darśanamārgaḥ  #
analyzed: vipaśyanā samādhi dvārā śūnyatām sākṣātkṛtya bhāvanā mārgeṇa praheya dharmasya mahā kleśa āvaraṇasya sthūlāśa pratipakṣa utpatti mārgaḥ darśana mārgaḥ
pramuditā bhūmiḥ udyate
bhāvanā mārgeṇa praheya dharma mahā kleśa āvaraṇasya sthūlāśa pratipakṣa utpattim ārabhya sūkṣma ati sūkṣma āvaraṇa a kṣayāt buddhatva prāpaka vajrāsana ākhya samādheḥ
vimalā prabhākarī prabhṛtayaḥ nava bhūmayaḥ santi
bhāvanā mārgasya praheyam kleśa āvaraṇam jñeya āvaraṇam ca

original: kleśāvaraṇasya sthūlamadhyamasūkṣmabhedāḥ tadvadeva madhyamāvaraṇasya sūkṣmāvaraṇasya ca krameṇa trayastrayo bhedāḥ evaṁ navabhedāḥ bhavanti  #
analyzed: kleśa āvaraṇasya sthūla madhyama sūkṣma bhedāḥ tadvat eva madhyama āvaraṇasya sūkṣma āvaraṇasya ca krameṇa trayaḥ trayaḥ bhedāḥ evam nava bhedāḥ bhavanti  /
ye ca bhūmi praheya dharmāḥ nigadyante

original: etannavakleśāvaraṇeṣu svabhūmijñeyāvaraṇeṣu ca naṣṭeṣu satsu kramaśaḥ sādhakena uparitanabhūmayo labhyante |
analyzed: etad nava kleśa āvaraṇeṣu sva bhūmi jñeya āvaraṇeṣu ca naṣṭeṣu satsu kramaśas sādhakena uparitana bhūmayaḥ labhyante
kriyātantrasya samyaksambodhi avasthā eva a śaikṣa mārgaḥ parama padam ca asti

original: upasaṁhāraḥ jñānasamuccaye kriyātantrasādhakāyoktaṁ - tatra svadehe devakāyasya bhāvanā'bhāvo'sti |

original: jonaṅ je cuna- prabhṛtayo'tra svadehe devakāyabhāvanā'bhāvaṁ svīkurvanti |

original: ācārya coṅkhāpāprabhṛtividvadbhiḥ kriyātantre svadehe devakāyabhāvanāpaddhatiḥ svīkṛtā'sti |

original: etasya ca samarthane naikānyāgamavacāṁsi yuktayaśca prādīyanta |
analyzed: etasya ca samarthane na ekāni āgama vacāsi yuktayaḥ ca prādīyanta

original: ācāryakarmāṭhinalas prabhṛtibhiḥ kriyātantrasādhakasya pradhānāpradhāneti staradvayamabhimatam bhaṇitañcāpi pradhānasādhakaḥ svadehe devatāṁ  #
analyzed: prabhṛtibhiḥ kriyātantra sādhakasya pradhāna apradhānā iti stara dvayam abhimatam bhaṇitam ca api pradhāna sādhakaḥ sva dehe devatām
bhāvayati

original: aparaśca svasammukhaṁ devatāṁ bhāvayitvā mantraṁ japati |
analyzed: aparaḥ ca sva sammukham devatām bhāvayitvā mantram japati

original: ayameva caramapakṣaḥ susaṅgataḥ pratīyate yataśca kriyātantrasya naikeṣu prāmāṇikagrantheṣu svadehe devabhāvanāyāḥ sattvam asattvaṁ vobhayaṁ  #
analyzed: ayam eva carama pakṣaḥ su saṅgataḥ pratīyate yatas ca kriyātantrasya na ekeṣu prāmāṇika grantheṣu sva dehe deva bhāvanāyāḥ sattvam asattvam vā ubhayam

analyzed: atas ekasya viśiṣṭam artham kṛtvā vyākhyānam kiyat ucitam iti duḥśakam

original: sāmānyavicāreṇāpi pratīyate pāramitānayasya vacanenānena - buddhāśca bodhisatvāśca sarvatrāvyāhatekṣaṇāḥ |
analyzed: sāmānya vicāreṇa api pratīyate pāramitā nayasya vacanena anena buddhāḥ ca bodhisatvāḥ ca sarvatra avyāhata īkṣaṇāḥ
sarvam eva agratas teṣām teṣām asmi puras sthitaḥ

original: 'yaḥ sādhako'tyabhilaṣati tatsammukhaṁ sadā śāstā'vatiṣṭhate' etadāśayaṁ yo'tyantamabhiniveśapūrvakaṁ dhārayati,
analyzed: yaḥ sādhakaḥ ati abhilaṣati tad sammukham sadā śāstā avatiṣṭhate etad āśayam yaḥ atyantam abhiniveśa pūrvakam dhārayati

original: kriyātantravidhau tatpravartanāya iṣṭadevaṁ svasammukhamāhūya pūjārcanābhāvanāyāḥ vyavasthāvidhānamanucitaṁ na bhavati |

original: anyataśca svadehe devabhāvanā'tyantābhāvo'pyasvīkāryaḥ yataśca evamabhimatyā pāramitānayād mantranayasya kimapi vaiśiṣṭyaṁ na syāt |
analyzed: anyatas ca sva dehe deva bhāvanā atyanta abhāvaḥ api a svīkāryaḥ yatas ca evam abhimatyā pāramitā nayāt mantra nayasya kim api vaiśiṣṭyam na syāt

original: rūpakāyasyopādānakārakābhāvo'pi syāt tataśca atra falasya mārgīkaraṇamapi na syāt |

original: tṛtīyaḥ paricchedaḥ caryātantram caryātantrābhyudayaḥ dīpaṅkaraśrījñānena bodhipathapradīpasya svavṛttau caryātantrasya vairocanābhisambodhitantra-vajrāaṇyabhiṣekatantraprabhṛtīni  #
analyzed: tṛtīyaḥ paricchedaḥ caryātantram caryātantra abhyudayaḥ dīpaṅkara śrī jñānena bodhi patha pradīpasya sva vṛttau caryātantrasya vairocana abhisambodhi tantra vajrāaṇi abhiṣekatantra prabhṛtīni
aṣṭa sahasrāṇi tantrāṇi pratyapādyanta

original: anyavidvatsu śākyasampradāyasya ḍodgona-chosagyala-fagasapāprabhṛtayaḥ kriyātantre svadehe devakāyabhāvanā'bhāvammanyante |
analyzed: anya vidvatsu śākya sampradāyasya ḍodgona chosagya lafagasapā prabhṛtayaḥ kriyā tantre sva dehe deva kāya bhāvanā abhāvam manyante
atas eva mañjuśrī mūla kalpam api caryātantra antargatam manyate
etad matena vairocana abhi sambodhi tantram
yama antaka krodha vijaya tantram api caryā tantram asti
anya vidvas gaṇeṣu mahā paṇḍita puṇyakīrti prabhṛtibhiḥ acala mahākrodha rājatantra nīla ambara dhara vajrapāla prabhṛtayaḥ sapta granthāḥ agaṇyanta
sa kṣepeṇa sa nidānam paricayaḥ atra prastūyate

original: viśeṣataśca caryātantrāsādhāraṇavairocanābhisaṁbodhitantrasya deśanā bhagavataḥ vairocanasya kusumatalagarbhālaṅkāravyūhākhye buddhatattvaprāptisthāne  #
analyzed: viśeṣataḥ ca caryā tantra asādhāraṇa vairocana abhisabodhi tantrasya deśanā bhagavataḥ vairocanasya kusuma tala garbha alaṅkāra vyūha ākhye buddha tattva prāpti sthāne  /
kṛtā

original: etatsambandhe vajrapāṇya-bhiṣekatantrasya nidānaparivarte kathitaṁ yadidaṁ kṣetram anantasaṁsāradhātuṁ nirdiśati |

eka sa sāra dhātau ananta lokadhātavaḥ
śata koṭi catur dīpa śata koṭi sumerū parvata śata koṭi mahā sāgara sūrya candra ādayaḥ sarve api tri sāhasra mahā sāhasra lokāḥ kathyante
ittham śata koṭi kusuma tala garbha alaṅkāraḥ ucyate
evam śata koṭi eka santati kusuma tala garbha alaṅkāraḥ ucyate

original: arthāt bhagavadvairocanena buddhatvātpūrvaṁ bodhisattvānāṁ caryayā pariśodhitaṁ sampūrṇakṣetrameva kusumatalagarbhālaṅkāravyūhakṣetram evocyate
analyzed: arthāt bhagavat vairocanena buddha tvāt pūrvam bodhisattvānām caryayā pariśodhitam sampūrṇa kṣetram eva kusuma tala garbha alaṅkāra vyūha kṣetram eva ucyate

original: tatkṣetre yathākāśe sūryaprakāśe prasṛte sati ākāśa prakāśābhinnau bhavatastathaivādvayabhāvasthito mahāvairocano buddhaḥ satvebhyaḥ kāyasamatāsthitanāmadharmaparyāyaṁ,
analyzed: tad kṣetre yathā ākāśe sūrya prakāśe prasṛte sati ākāśa prakāśa abhinnau bhavataḥ tathā eva advaya bhāva sthitaḥ mahāvairocanaḥ buddhaḥ satvebhyaḥ kāya samatā sthita nāma dharmaparyāya
vāc samatā sthita nāma dharmaparyāyam citta samatā sthita nāma dharmaparyāyam ca diśati

original: kāyavākcittānāmagādhatvena bhagavato vairocanasya kāyavākcittāni sarvabhūmiṣu praveśārhāṇi |

ābhyantara catur aṅga samanvitaḥ ayam eva mantra japa vidhiḥ ūcyate
nirlakṣaṇasādhanāvidhiḥ nirlakṣaṇasādhanāyāḥ dvau bhedau ka
sāmānyam kha viśeṣaḥ ca

original: ( ka ) sāmānyam svahṛdayakamale ( svayam iṣṭadevaṁ bhāvanāviṣayībhūtaṁ kṛtvā )
analyzed: ka sāmānyam sva hṛdaya kamale svayam iṣṭadevam bhāvanā viṣayībhūtam kṛtvā
āyudha cakra vajra bīja akṣara dikam bhāvayitvā prāṇāyāma karaṇam

original: tataśca devadavyoḥ parasparam īkṣaṇaṁ hasanātmakaṁ svarūpaṁ dhyātvā rāga-mārgīkaraṇavidhānena saha viṣaye ( śūnyatāyām )
analyzed: tatas ca deva davyoḥ parasparam īkṣaṇam hasana ātmakam sva rūpam dhyātvā rāga mārgīkaraṇa vidhānena saha viṣaye śūnyatāyām
sthitiḥ eva sāmānya nirlakṣaṇa sādhanā vidhiḥ ūcyate

original: ( kha ) viśeṣaḥ skandhādiṣu catuṣkoṭivatyā-mādhyamikayuktyā ajātānirūddhādiguṇasahitāṁ catuṣkoṭiniṣprapañcatāṁ buddhvā tattve sthitirapekṣyate
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ skandha ādiṣu catuṣkoṭivatyā amādhyamika yuktyā ajāta anirūddha ādi guṇa sahitām catuṣkoṭi niṣprapañca tām buddhvā tattve sthitiḥ apekṣyate

original: ye ca sattvā etattathyādaparicitā stathā'nenaiva kāraṇena nānāduḥkhāni anubhavanti tān dṛṣṭvā karūṇayā dravībhūtaḥ san anugrahītumicched arthāt  #
analyzed: ye ca sattvāḥ etad tathyāt aparicitāḥ stathā anena eva kāraṇena nānā duḥkhāni anubhavanti tān dṛṣṭvā karūṇayā dravībhūtaḥ san anugrahītum icchet arthāt
yuktibhiḥ vastu niḥsvabhāva tām pratipādya pravarteta

original: tadanu ca tattve yathāsaṁbhavaṁ sthitiḥ antataḥ samādherūtthitiḥ,
analyzed: tadanu ca tattve yathāsabhavam sthitiḥ antatas samādheḥ utthitiḥ
pṛṣṭhalabdhau sattva hita vidhānam
tri aṅga yuktam bhāvanā karaṇam hi nirlakṣaṇa bhāvanā kathyate
vairocana abhisambodhau salakṣaṇa bhāvanā apekṣayā nirlakṣaṇa bhāvanā prabala tayā preritā
yatas ca salakṣaṇa yogāt salakṣaṇa siddhiḥ labhyate
nirlakṣaṇa yogāt ca salakṣaṇa nirlakṣaṇa ubhaya siddhiḥ avāpyate
sārāśaḥ kriyā caryā tantrayoḥ yogasya catvāri mahattva ādhāyakāni aṅgāni
deva śūnyatayoḥ yogaḥ prāṇāyāma mantra japayoḥ ca yogaḥ

original: paramārthataḥ śūnyatābhāvanā saṁvṛtito devarūpā ca bhāvanaiva dharmakāyasaṁbhogakāyaprāpteḥ pradhānamupādānam |
analyzed: paramārthataḥ śūnyatā bhāvanā sa vṛtitaḥ deva rūpā ca bhāvanā eva dharmakāya sabhoga kāya prāpteḥ pradhānam upādānam
mantra jape yaḥ iṣṭadevaḥ bhāvyeta
tat āvāhanam ātmanaḥ ca tad rūpeṇa adhiṣṭhānam bhavet
atas idam salakṣaṇa nirlakṣaṇa yogayoḥ samānam anivāryam ca aṅgam asti

original: 3. sādhanāsiddhicaryā mantrajapasya pūrṇatāyāṁ satyāṁ sādhakaḥ sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇasiddhīnāṁ prāptyadhikārī bhavati |
analyzed: sādhana asiddhi caryā mantra japasya pūrṇa tāyām satyām sādhakaḥ sādhāraṇa asādhāraṇa siddhīnām prāpti adhikārī bhavati
sādhāraṇa siddhi prāptyai sādhakaḥ khaḍga ādikam ādāya mantram japet
tena ca vidyādhara ādi siddhayaḥ prāpyante
asādhāraṇa siddhi avasthāyām antar nihita kṣiti jala pāvaka ādi maṇḍalānām āśraye śakti puṣṭi raudra vaśyā ādi karmasu pūrṇa tvam labhate
prātihārya abhijñā ādibhiḥ sva para ubhaya hitam karoti
siddheḥ ayam mā apadaṇḍaḥ
evam sthiti āgamana pūrvam sādhanā kriyamāṇā bhavet

original: samānyasādhanākāle svapna iṣṭadevābhāsaḥ iṣṭadevamaṇḍalasya pūjārcanaṁ svapnādyavekṣaṇamapi sādhanāyāḥ śubhalakṣaṇaṁ manyate |
analyzed: samānya sādhanā kāle svapnaḥ iṣṭadeva ābhāsaḥ iṣṭadeva maṇḍalasya pūjā arcanam svapna ādi avekṣaṇam api sādhanāyāḥ śubha lakṣaṇam manyate

original: kramaśaḥ pariṣkṛtyā sākṣād iṣṭadevasya darśanena sāmānyāsāmānyasarvavidhasiddhayaḥ prāpyante |
analyzed: kramaśas pariṣkṛtyā sākṣāt iṣṭadevasya darśanena sāmānya asāmānya sarvavidha siddhayaḥ prāpyante
etad sāmānya asāmānya siddhibhyaḥ mantra japa pūrṇa tā anantaram sādhakasya siddhi prāptiḥ tat yatheccham ālambate

original: 4. siddhicaryā siddhicaryayā mṛdvindriyo janaḥ aṣṭakalpeṣu nūnameva samyaksambodhiṁ labhate |
analyzed: siddhi caryā siddhi caryayā mṛdu indriyaḥ janaḥ aṣṭa kalpeṣu nūnam eva samyaksambodhim labhate
tīkṣṇa indriyaḥ kalpa traye parama padam avāpnoti
sādhakaḥ prāpti abhilāṣāyām ekasmin jīvane api parama padam prāptum arhati
upasahāraḥ sādhanā paddhatiḥ eka vidyā samācā asti
atas caryā tantra sādhanā paddhatiḥ na viśadam vivecitā tena

original: paṇḍitapuṇyakīrti-mahodayenāpi caryātantraṁ samayasaṁvaratantragranthaṁ yāvat kulabhedamātraṁ ca niradhāri |
analyzed: paṇḍita puṇyakīrti mahodayena api caryā tantram samaya savara tantra grantham yāvat kula bheda mātram ca niradhāri
tad matena api sādhanā paddhatiḥ kriyātantra sadṛśī ca eva asti
ācārya coṅkhāpā mahodayena sa kṣepeṇa caryātantra sādhanā paddhatiḥ vivecitā
atra jñeya kośam ādhārīkṛtya kiñcid likhyate

original: kriyātantravadeva caryātantramapi kulānusāreṇa tathāgatakulapadyakulavajrakulākhye bhāgatraye vibhajyate |
analyzed: kriyā tantra vat eva caryā tantram api kula anusāreṇa tathāgata kula padya kula vajra kula ākhye bhāga traye vibhajyate

original: sādhanāpaddhatau caturañgayuktabhāvanāvidhiḥ yadyapi kriyātantrasamāna eva paraṁ ca caryātantrasya bhāvanāvidhiḥ kriyātantrāpekṣayā bhṛśaṁ
analyzed: sādhanā paddhatau catur añga yukta bhāvanā vidhiḥ yadi api kriyātantra samānaḥ eva param ca caryātantrasya bhāvanā vidhiḥ kriyātantra apekṣayā bhṛśa
na anyathā kriyā tantrāt pārthakya āvaśyaka tvam syāt

original: yathā ca kriyātantre svadehe devakāyasya bhāvanāyāṁ satyāmasatyāṁ matabhedaḥ kintvatra nirvivādaṁ svadehe devakāyasya bhāvanā-vidherāvaśyakatvaṁ  #
analyzed: yathā ca kriyātantre sva dehe deva kāyasya bhāvanāyām satyām asatyām mata bhedaḥ kintu atra nirvivādam sva dehe deva kāyasya bhāvanā vidheḥ āvaśyaka tvam
pratyapādi

original: svasammukhaṁ ca dhyeya iṣṭadeve jñānadevamāhūya vilīnatvasyāpi paddhatiḥ prākāśi |
analyzed: sva sammukham ca dhyeyaḥ iṣṭadeve jñānadevam āhūya vilīna tvasya api paddhatiḥ prākāśi

original: sādhaneyameva salakṣaṇadevayoga-nirlakṣaṇadevayogeti nāmnā vijñāyate yā ca kriyātantrāpekṣayā sūkṣmā |
analyzed: sādhanā iyam eva salakṣaṇa deva yoga nirlakṣaṇa deva yoga iti nāmnā vijñāyate yā ca kriyātantra apekṣayā sūkṣmā

original: salakṣaṇadevayogasya tātparyantu svayam iṣṭadevaṁ bhāvayitvā pūrvoktacaturavayavayuktaṁ sat mantrajapavidhānam |
analyzed: salakṣaṇa deva yogasya tātparyam tu svayam iṣṭadevam bhāvayitvā pūrva ukta catur avayava yuktam sat mantra japa vidhānam

original: atraivaṁ vijñeyaṁ yat sādhakaḥ svayam iṣṭadevarūpeṇa kathaṁ pariṇato bhavet?
analyzed: atra evam vijñeyam yat sādhakaḥ svayam iṣṭadeva rūpeṇa katham pariṇataḥ bhavet

original: yathā asmākaṁ skandhaḥ yaśca pañcamahābhūtairvinirmitaḥ naikatattvānāṁ saṁghātamātraḥ,
analyzed: yathā asmākam skandhaḥ yaḥ ca pañca mahābhūtaiḥ vinirmitaḥ na eka tattvānām sa ghāta mātraḥ
pūrva karma falaiḥ samudbhūtaḥ
sa parama artha pratipādaka yuktibhiḥ yadā asmābhiḥ viśliṣyate tadā śūnya tvam prāpyate

original: paraṁ ca tad hetupratyayānāmupalabdhau niḥsvabhāvatayā'pi ādarśe pratibimbitatattvamiva prabhavati |
analyzed: param ca tat hetu pratyayānām upalabdhau niḥsvabhāva tayā api ādarśe pratibimbita tattvam iva prabhavati
tathā eva sarva dharmāḥ avagantavyāḥ

original: yathā śūnyatāsvarūpeṇa vastūni āvirbhavanti tathā ātmanā devatvāvirbhāvena,
analyzed: yathā śūnyatā svarūpeṇa vastūni āvirbhavanti tathā ātmanā deva tva āvirbhāvena

original: gurūpradattābhiṣekeṇa ca iṣṭadevaśaktyadhiṣṭhānādinā pratītyasamutpannavidhinā sādhakaḥ iṣṭadevatvena prakaṭībhavati |
analyzed: ca iṣṭadeva śakti adhiṣṭhāna ādinā pratītyasamutpanna vidhinā sādhakaḥ iṣṭadeva tvena prakaṭībhavati

original: ataḥ etat sthiteḥ pūrva iṣṭadevaḥ evaṁ bhāvanīyo yadahameveṣṭadevaḥ,
analyzed: atas etat sthiteḥ pūrvaḥ iṣṭadevaḥ evam bhāvanīyaḥ yat aham eva iṣṭadevaḥ
iṣṭadeve aham asmi

original: evam iṣṭadevabhāvanayā mantrajapakāryameva atra salakṣaṇayogaḥ ucyate |
analyzed: evam iṣṭadeva bhāvanayā mantra japa kāryam eva atra sa lakṣaṇa yogaḥ ucyate
salakṣaṇa yoga avadhau bhāvita iṣṭadevaḥ api viśleṣaṇīyaḥ

original: viśleṣaṇena yathā rūpādidharmāṇāṁ kā'pi sattā na tiṣṭhati tathaiveṣṭadevakāyasattā'pi na tathā ca svacittaṁ kālatrayarahitaṁ sarvalakṣaṇeṣu  #
analyzed: viśleṣaṇena yathā rūpa ādi dharmāṇām kā api sattā na tiṣṭhati tathā evā iṣṭa deva kāya sattā api na tathā ca sva cittam kāla traya rahitam sarva lakṣaṇeṣu
nirvikalpa sthitim prāpnoti
ayam eva nirvikalpa bhāvanā vidhiḥ ūdyate
bhāvanā krame api kamala śīlena idam eva tathyam nyarūpi

original: kecid vidvāṁsaḥ śūnyatābodhānantaraṁ kṛtadevabhāvanāṁ nirlakṣaṇabhāvanāṁ tadabhāvaṁ tadabhāvaṁ ca salakṣaṇa-bhāvanāṁ manvate |
analyzed: kecid vidvāsaḥ śūnyatā bodha anantaram kṛta deva bhāvanām nirlakṣaṇa bhāvanām tad abhāvam tad abhāvam ca salakṣaṇa bhāvanām manvate

original: yathā śūnyatāsākṣātkaraṇānantaraṁ tacchūnyatābodhake citte prabala-prajñotpatyā sahaiva dānasampādanam,
analyzed: yathā śūnyatā sākṣātkaraṇa anantaram tad śūnyatā bodhake citte prabala prajñā utpatyā saha eva dāna sampādanam
parikramaṇam
vandanam ityādi karmāṇi na śūnyatā bodhakāni
param ca śūnyatā bodha pūrṇa citta tvāt tad karma api śūnyatā preritam ucyate

original: yathā bodhicittamutpādya tatkṣaṇameva śūnyatāyāṁ samāhitatve sati samāhitāvasthāyāṁ bodhicittapravāhāstitvamurarīkriyate tathaivātrāpi śūnyatājñānasya  #
analyzed: yathā bodhi cittam utpādya tad kṣaṇam eva śūnyatāyām samāhita tve sati samāhita avasthāyām bodhi citta pravāha astitvam urarīkriyate tathā eva atra api śūnyatā jñānasya
pravāhe deva bhāvanā
nirlakṣaṇa deva bhāvanā abhidhīyate

original: evaṁ vidhā vyavasthā pāramitānaye tu sambhāvyate paraṁ ca tantreṣu na saṁbhāvyate |
analyzed: evaṃvidhā vyavasthā pāramitā naye tu sambhāvyate param ca tantreṣu na sabhāvyate

original: gurūvarācārya-chulaṭhimo'pi prajñopāyasya yuganaddhasvarūpaṁ spaṣṭayan kathayāmāsa- 'yathā kasyāścin-māturekākiputrasya mṛtyau atyantaṁ duḥkhamanubhūyate,
analyzed: guru vara ācārya chulaṭhimaḥ api prajñā upāyasya yuga naddha svarūpam spaṣṭayan kathayāmāsa ayathā kasyāścid mātuḥ ekāki putrasya mṛtyau atyantam duḥkham anubhūyate

original: tathāpi sā tadanubhavavedanādinā saha sarvāmapi dinacaryāṁ sampādayati tadvadeva śūnyatāpreritadānādisampādanam pāramitānayasya prajñopāyādvayāvasthocyate
analyzed: tathā api sā tad anubhava vedanā ādinā saha sarvām api dina caryām sampādayati tadvat eva śūnyatā prerita dāna ādi sampādanam pāramitā nayasya prajñā upāya advaya avasthā ucyate

original: ataḥ pāramitānayānusāreṇa evaṁ vyākhyā nūnammānyā paraṁ ca vajrayānānusāreṇa amānyaiva |
analyzed: atas pāramitā naya anusāreṇa evam vyākhyā nūnam mānyā param ca vajra yāna anusāreṇa amānyā eva
yatas ca tantreṣu deva sva rūpasya śūnyatāyāḥ ca yuga naddha rūpam apekṣyate
tad śūnyatā ca parama arthāḥ yā ca advaya eka ākārā
eka rasā abhinnā satī eka buddhi viṣayiṇī ca asti
fala avasthāyām kāyasya lakṣaṇa anuvyañjana alaṅkṛtaḥ āśrayaḥ deva kāyaḥ

original: evaṁ ca tadāśritā nirālambakarūṇā ca advayabhāve tathaiva avatiṣṭhete yathā ca dīpakālokau |
analyzed: evam ca tad āśritā nirālamba karūṇā ca advaya bhāve tathā eva avatiṣṭhete yathā ca dīpa kālokau

original: tathāgatakāyastasya ca niḥ- svabhāvatā'rthāt prajñopāyādvayabhāvanaiva nirlakṣaṇadevabhāvanā'sti |
analyzed: tathāgata kāyaḥ tasya ca niḥ svabhāva tā arthāt prajñā upāya advaya bhāvanā eva nirlakṣaṇa deva bhāvanā asti
atra vyākhyātam advayam yuga naddha devaḥ ca manaḥ mayaḥ
manasā nirmāya etat bhāvyate

original: paraṁ ca yogatantrānuttaratantrayoḥ pañcābhisambodhibhiḥ prāṇāyāmena caitat sūkṣmaprāṇacittopāyena samutpādya bhāvyate |
analyzed: param ca yogatantra anuttara tantrayoḥ pañca abhisambodhibhiḥ prāṇāyāmena ca etat sūkṣmaprāṇa citta upāyena samutpādya bhāvyate
etat bhāvanā dvaye mahat antaram yat ca agre vakṣyate tat iti

original: caturthaḥ paricchedaḥ yogatantram yogatantrasyābhyudayaḥ 1.tattvasaṁgrahaḥ- padyavajratathāgatena tattvasaṁgrahasya tantrārthāvatārākhyaṭīkāyāṁ  #
analyzed: caturthaḥ paricchedaḥ yogatantram yoga tantrasya abhyudayaḥ tattvasagrahaḥ padyavajra tathāgatena tattvasagrahasya tantrārthāvatāra ākhya ṭīkāyām

original: yogatantradeśanāvidhiṁ spaṣṭayatā samullikhyate - sāmānyato bhagavān svaparārthahetubodhi-cittotpādadvārā āvaraṇānāṁ kṣayāt puṇyasaṁbhārajñānasaṁbhārābhyāṁ  #
analyzed: yogatantra deśanā vidhim spaṣṭayatā samullikhyate sāmānyatas bhagavān sva para artha hetu bodhi citta utpāda dvārā āvaraṇānām kṣayāt puṇya sabhāra jñāna sabhārābhyām

original: paripūrṇatayā vajrakāyaṁ prāpyākāśavat sarvatattveṣu vyāpto nirālambanirvikalpasvarūpeṇāvatiṣṭhate |
analyzed: paripūrṇa tayā vajra kāyam prāpya ākāśa vat sarva tattveṣu vyāptaḥ nirālamba nirvikalpa svarūpeṇa avatiṣṭhate

original: īdṛśa-sthitāvapi bodhicaryāsaṁpādanakālikasaṁskārāṇāmarthāt-prāṇināṁ hitāya kṛtāyāḥ pratijñāyāḥ vaśībhūtaḥ san sambhoganirmāṇakāyatvenāvirbhūya  #
analyzed: īdṛśa sthitau api bodhi caryā sapādana kālika saskārāṇām arthāt prāṇinām hitāya kṛtāyāḥ pratijñāyāḥ vaśībhūtaḥ san sambhoga nirmāṇa kāya tvena āvirbhūya
satva hitam vidadhāti

original: tena sattvānāmadhyādeśānusāraṁ kramaśaḥ yugapadubhayarūpeṇa dharmaḥ diśyate |
analyzed: tena sattvānām adhyādeśa anusāram kramaśas yugapad ubhaya rūpeṇa dharmaḥ diśyate
śāstuḥ trīṇi rūpāṇi dharmakāya sabhoga kāya nirmāṇa kāya ākhyāni
dharmaḥ api trividhaḥ

original: tadanu viśeṣeṇa tatpadaprāptyupāyena sākaṁ laukikalokottarasiddhīnāṁ prāptimārgo'pi samavarṇyata |
analyzed: tadanu viśeṣeṇa tad pada prāpti upāyena sākam laukika lokottara siddhīnām prāpti mārgaḥ api samavarṇyata
yadi api tathāgata śabda prayogaḥ sarva pañca tathāgata kuleṣu bhavati

original: yadā tathāgatakula-mātraṁ prayujyate tadānīṁ vairocanakulikabodhisattvebhya eva bhavati na tu catuḥ kulabodhi-sattvebhyaḥ |
analyzed: yadā tathāgata kula mātram prayujyate tadānīm vairocana kulika bodhisattvebhyaḥ eva bhavati na tu catuḥ kula bodhisattvebhyaḥ

original: tantrasyāsya prathamāṅge tathāgatakulānāṁ sambaddhamārgaḥ pratipāditaḥ tathaiva dvitīye'ṅge vajrakulamarthāt akṣobhyakulaṁ tṛtīye ca padyakulaṁ  #
analyzed: tantrasya asya prathama aṅge tathāgata kulānām sambaddha mārgaḥ pratipāditaḥ tathā eva dvitīye aṅge vajra kulam arthāt akṣobhya kulam tṛtīye ca padya kulam
caturthe ca sarva prāṇi hetu siddhi dam ratna kulam pratyapādyata
atra kulāni catvāri eva varṇitāni

original: prāṇināmartha-sampattikartṛ ratnakulaṁ kāryasampādakaṁ karmakulaṁ arthāt amoghasiddhiḥ |
analyzed: prāṇinām artha sampatti kartṛ ratna kulam kārya sampādakam karma kulam arthāt amogha siddhiḥ
ekena eva rūpeṇa sagṛhītā
tasmāt bhāga catuṣṭaye eva pañca kulāni samāhriyante
mūlatantra tattvasagrahena saha eva uttara tantram uttarottara tantram api samupalabhyate
yasmin catur aṅgeṣu pratipādita parama pada prāpti upāyāḥ vistareṇa vyākhyātāḥ
uttara uttara tantre vistareṇa spaṣṭīkṛtam

original: yat yogatantrasya ye sādhakāḥ ābhyantarayogasya sādhanāyāma-sāmarthyaṁ budhyante tebhyaḥ japapūjādibāhyacaryā vihitāḥ |
analyzed: yat yoga tantrasya ye sādhakāḥ ābhyantara yogasya sādhanāyām asāmarthyam budhyante tebhyaḥ japa pūjā ādi bāhya caryāḥ vihitāḥ

original: mūlatantrasya caturaṅgeṣu yallaukikasiddhiprāptimārgasya vyavasthā'spaṣṭā'pūrṇā ca tadapi spaṣṭīkṛtyātra pūritam |
analyzed: mūlatantrasya caturaṅgeṣu yat laukika siddhi prāpti mārgasya vyavasthā aspaṣṭā apūrṇā ca tat api spaṣṭīkṛtya atra pūritam

original: atra yogatantrasyopavibhāga uttaratantrasambandhe praśno'yaṁ samudbhavati kiṁ yogatantrasya ekaḥ pakṣaḥ kriyātantraṁ kathayiṣyate |
analyzed: atra yoga tantrasya upavibhāgaḥ uttara tantra sambandhe praśnaḥ ayam samudbhavati kim yoga tantrasya ekaḥ pakṣaḥ kriyātantram kathayiṣyate
yatas ca ayam bāhya pavitra tām dhyāyati japa ādikam api karoti

original: etaduttaramapyasti- yat sāmānyacatustantrāṇāṁ sthūlaprasthānātmako bhedo'sti paraṁ caitad mithaḥ virodhābhāso'śakyaḥ |
analyzed: etat uttaram api asti yat sāmānya catustantrāṇām sthūla prasthāna ātmakaḥ bhedaḥ asti param ca etat mithas virodha ābhāsaḥ aśakyaḥ

original: yathā guhyasamājasya vineyajanaṁ spaṣṭayatā candrakīrtimahodayenocyate- yaḥ sādhakaḥ utpattikramapūrṇatāprāptyanantaraṁ sādhāraṇasiddhiṁ labdhuṁ  #
analyzed: yathā guhya samājasya vineya janam spaṣṭayatā candrakīrti mahodayena ucyate yaḥ sādhakaḥ utpatti krama pūrṇa tā prāpti anantaram sādhāraṇa siddhim labdhum

original: na prayasati niṣpannakramaṁ bhāvayan paramapadāvāptyai caiva prayatate īdṛśaḥ sādhakaḥ ratnasadṛśaṁ yogyatāpātramucyate |
analyzed: na niṣpanna kramam bhāvayan parama pada avāptyai ca eva prayatate īdṛśaḥ sādhakaḥ ratna sadṛśam yogyatā pātram ucyate

original: yena sādhakena utpattikrame dākṣyam upalabhya sādhāraṇasiddhiprāptyai prayasyate sa adhamapuṇḍarīkaḥ ākhyāyyate |
analyzed: yena sādhakena utpatti krame dākṣyam upalabhya sādhāraṇa siddhi prāptyai prayasyate sa adhamapuṇḍarīkaḥ ākhyāyyate

original: yathā cātra pradhānagaṇasādhakau samupalabdhau stastathaiva yogatantre cāpi sthitiḥ |
analyzed: yathā ca atra pradhāna gaṇa sādhakau samupalabdhau staḥ tathā eva yoga tantre ca api sthitiḥ
punar atra praśnaḥ samudeti

original: tantrasya bhāgacatuṣṭaye ekasmā eva sādhakāya vairocanādeḥ paramapadaprāptimārgo varṇito'sti vibhinnacaturvidhasādhakānāṁ sādhyamārgo vā varṇito'sti?
analyzed: tantrasya bhāga catuṣṭaye ekasmai eva sādhakāya vairocana ādeḥ parama pada prāpti mārgaḥ varṇitaḥ asti vibhinna caturvidha sādhakānām sādhya mārgaḥ vā varṇitaḥ asti

original: etasya suspaṣṭamuttaraṁ paramādyatantre itthaṁ varṇitaṁ - pañcatathāgatasādhanā- vidhāyakeṣu yasmin trividhaṁ ( kāmamohakrodhākhyaṁ )
analyzed: etasya su spaṣṭam uttaram parama ādya tantre ittham varṇitam pañca tathāgata sādhanāḥ vidhāyakeṣu yasmin trividham kāma moha krodha ākhyam

original: samānarūpeṇa vidyate tebhyo mahārāgibhyaśca prathamabhāgo'rthāt dharmadhātumaṇḍalam,

original: ācāryakunagā ñiṅapo mahodayo'pi sāmānyalaghutantre prāyastādṛśīmeva vārtām acakathat-sādhakaḥ svayaṁ kimapi nirṇayaṅkartumasamarthaḥ san yathā  #

original: yathā gurūnupalabhya teṣāmupadeśānanusaran kadācidrāgayuktamadhvānaṁ kvaciddveṣayuktamapi bāhyaśuddhiprabhṛtimapi dharmaṁ matvā caryāḥ sampādayati  #

analyzed: yatra pradhāna mātṛ pitṛ yuga naddha kāyasya bhuja ānana ādiḥ samānaḥ kintu anucara devānām yuga naddha kāyeṣu ānana bhuja ādiḥ bhinnaḥ syāt sa ca advaya tantrasya
devaḥ asti

original: 5. vajrapañjarānusāraṁ yatra tathāgataḥ vajraḍākinīrūpaḥ syāttathā'nucareṣu mātṛdevīnāṁ prādhānyaṁ bhavet tad mātṛtantram ityucyate devaḥpañcatathāgatakuleṣu  #
analyzed: vajra pañjara anusāram yatra tathāgataḥ vajra ḍākinī rūpaḥ syāt tathā anucareṣu mātṛ devīnām prādhānyam bhavet tat mātṛtantram iti ucyate devaḥ pañca tathāgata kuleṣu

original: prakaṭībhūto'nucareṣu ca pitṛdevānāṁ prādhānyaṁ bhavettadā tat pitṛtantramasti |
analyzed: prakaṭībhūtaḥ anucareṣu ca pitṛ devānām prādhānyam bhavet tadā tat pitṛtantram asti

original: 6. yatrāsana-siṁhāsane ratnanirmite syātām tadupari ratnālaṅkāracakrā-dibhirvibhūṣitaḥ krodha-pratyālīdamudrayoḥ prakaṭito deva eva upāyatantrasya  #
analyzed: yatra āsana siha āsane ratna nirmite syātām tad upari ratna alaṅkāra cakra ādibhiḥ vibhūṣitaḥ krodha pratyālīda mudrayoḥ prakaṭitaḥ devaḥ eva upāya tantrasya
devaḥ vidyate

original: yatra śavāsanaṁ kapālāsthibhiralaṅkārairratnīkṛtaṁ hasteṣu kartarī-kapāla-khaḍga-ḍamarūkādi-dhārayitā vyāghragajacarmaparidhāno nirvastro nagnaśca  #
analyzed: yatra śavāsanam kapāla asthibhiḥ alaṅkāraiḥ ratnīkṛtam hasteṣu kartarī kapāla khaḍga ḍamarūka ādi dhārayitā vyāghra gaja carma paridhānaḥ nirvastraḥ nagnaḥ ca
devaḥ deva prajñāmātṛ tantrayoḥ devaḥ abhihitaḥ

original: 7. yanmaṇḍalamabhitaḥ śmaśānaṁ syāt tat mātṛtantraṁ tadabhāvaśca pitṛtantram |
analyzed: yat maṇḍalam abhitas śmaśānam syāt tat mātṛ tantram tad abhāvaḥ ca pitṛ tantram

original: 8. niṣpannakramikaprajñāpāramitāyā udāramahopāyābhyāṁ saha yatra yogi varṇitaḥ tat mātṛtantraṁ,
analyzed: niṣpanna kramika prajñāpāramitāyāḥ udāra mahā upāyābhyām saha yatra yogi varṇitaḥ tat mātṛtantram

original: yatra ca svādhiṣṭhānābhisambodhikramayoḥ prādhānyena nirūpaṇaṁ tat pitṛtantramasti |
analyzed: yatra ca svādhiṣṭhāna abhisambodhi kramayoḥ prādhānyena nirūpaṇam tat pitṛtantram asti

original: 9. nāḍīvāyvoryatra prādhānyena nirūpaṇaṁ tat mātṛtantram yatra ca vāyoḥ prādhānyena nirūpaṇaṁ tat pitṛtantramasti |
analyzed: nāḍī vāyvoḥ yatra prādhānyena nirūpaṇam tat mātṛ tantram yatra ca vāyoḥ prādhānyena nirūpaṇam tat pitṛ tantram asti

original: 10 . guhyasamājānusāraṁ yatra sādhakasya pañcaskandhaviśuddhapañcatathāgateṣu pariṇatasya prakriyopadiṣṭā tat pitṛtantram yatra ca pañcadhātūn  #
analyzed: guhya samāja anusāram yatra sādhakasya pañca skandha viśuddha pañca tathāgateṣu pariṇatasya prakriyā upadiṣṭā tat pitṛtantram yatra ca pañca dhātūn

original: pariśodhya pañcadevītvena nirūpaṇasya prakriyā varṇitā tat mātṛtantramasti |
analyzed: pariśodhya pañca devī tvena nirūpaṇasya prakriyā varṇitā tat mātṛtantram asti
yatra sūkṣma vāyoḥ pariśuddhitaḥ pañca tathāgata rūpe pariṇata sādhanā
tat mātṛtantram asti

original: 12. vajrasattva-cakradharābhyāṁ bhaṭṭārikāṇāṁ samūha upadiṣṭaṁ tantraṁ pitṛtantram yatra ca harūka-vajraḍākinībhyāmupadiṣṭaṁ tantraṁ tanmātṛtantramabhidhīyate
analyzed: vajra sattva cakradharābhyām bhaṭṭārikāṇām samūhaḥ upadiṣṭam tantram pitṛtantram yatra ca harūka vajra ḍākinībhyām upadiṣṭam tantram tat mātṛtantram abhidhīyate

original: 13. śāstṛ-vajradhara-anucara-buddha-bodhisatvānāṁ madhye vineyajanairnivedane kṛte kṛtopadeśaḥ pitṛtantraṁ tathā mātṛdevībhirnivedane kṛte  #
analyzed: śāstṛ vajradhara anucara buddha bodhisatvānām madhye vineya janaiḥ nivedane kṛte kṛta upadeśaḥ pitṛ tantram tathā mātṛ devībhiḥ nivedane kṛte
upadiṣṭam tantram mātṛtantram iti ucyate

original: 14. vineyajanānāśritya yatra purūṣasamūhasya prādhānyaṁ tat pitṛtantram yatra ca strīsamūhasya prādhānyaṁ tat mātṛtantramabhidhīyate |
analyzed: vineya janān āśritya yatra purūṣa samūhasya prādhānyam tat pitṛ tantram yatra ca strī samūhasya prādhānyam tat mātṛ tantram abhidhīyate

original: ime bhedā vyāptirūpatvena svīkartuṁ na śakyante,
analyzed: ime bhedāḥ vyāpti rūpa tvena svīkartum na śakyante

original: bhoṭadeśīyo vidvān padyakarapo niṣpannakramasya sādhanādhāreṇānuttaratantrasya bhedatrayaṁ vyadadhāt |
analyzed: bhoṭa deśīyaḥ vidvān padyakarapaḥ niṣpanna kramasya sādhana ādhāreṇa anuttara tantrasya bheda trayam vyadadhāt

original: pañcakramānusāraṁ yatra niṣpannakramasya bhāvanā kriyate tat pitṛtantraṁ caturmudrābhiryatra niṣpannakramasya bhāvanā syāt tat mātṛtantram
analyzed: pañcakrama anusāram yatra niṣpanna kramasya bhāvanā kriyate tat pitṛtantram catur mudrābhiḥ yatra niṣpanna kramasya bhāvanā syāt tat mātṛtantram
yatra ca pratyāhāra samādhi ādi ṣaṣ aṅga yogaiḥ niṣpanna krama sādhanā bhavet tat advaya tantram asti
siddhagodachaṅapādena api cakrasavarasya vyākhyāyām idam eva uktam

original: khasaḍuba je ādyācāryairanuttaratantrasya pitṛ-mātṛbhedena vibhāgadvayaṁ kṛtam,
analyzed: ādi ācāryaiḥ anuttara tantrasya pitṛ mātṛ bhedena vibhāga dvayam kṛtam

tathā guhya samāja kṛṣṇa yama ari tantra vairocana māyā jāla anuttara māyā jāla vajra sattva māyā jāla ādayaḥ pitṛ tantre samāyātāḥ tathā ca mātṛ tantre cakra savara he vajra kāla cakra mahāmudrā tilaka mahāmāyā buddha kapāla ādayaḥ
samāyānti iti svīkṛtam

śākya sampradāya ācāryaiḥ chosagya lafagasapā mahodayaiḥ advaya tantra ihevajra hevajra a sāmānya vyākhyā tantra vajrapañjara sāmānya vyākhyā tantra sampuṭa tantra jñāna tilaka auttara tantra jñāna garbha yoginītantra tattva pradīpa guhya pradīpa mahāmudrā tilaka auttarottara tantra nāma saṅgīti kālacakra ādīnām
gaṇanā kṛtā

original: prajñātantre-cakasaṁvara-mahāmāyā-buddhaka- pālādīnām upāyatantre ca guhyasamāja- vajramālā-kṛṣṇayamāritantrādīnāṁ samāveśaḥ kṛtaḥ |
analyzed: upāya tantre ca guhya samāja vajra mālā kṛṣṇa yamāri tantra ādīnām samāveśaḥ kṛtaḥ
jama gonama sajabsa mahodayena mahā yogatantrasya bheda trayam kṛtam

original: asya matānusāraṁ pitṛtantra-guhyasamāja-mātṛtantrādayaḥ sarve cakrasaṁvarāntargatā eva santi |
analyzed: asya mata anusāram pitṛ tantra guhya samāja mātṛ tantra ādayaḥ sarve cakra savara antargatāḥ eva santi

original: advayatantrasya punarapi ābhyantarodāra-gambhīrārthavistāranāmadvayena bhedadvayaṁ vidhāya prathame hevajrasya dvitīye kālacakrasya gaṇanā
analyzed: advaya tantrasya punar api ābhyantara udāra gambhīra artha vistāra nāma dvayena bheda dvayam vidhāya prathame hevajrasya dvitīye kālacakrasya gaṇanā

original: karmāyonatanagyāchomahodayena neyārthamātre pitṛ-mātṛ-avayatantrākhyaṁ bhedatrayaṁ vidhāya nītārthe samastānuttaratantrāṇi advaya-tantrāṇyeva  #
analyzed: neya artha mātre pitṛ mātṛ avaya tantra ākhyam bheda trayam vidhāya nīta arthe samasta anuttara tantrāṇi advaya tantrāṇi eva
iti svīkṛtam

original: teṣāṁ matamasti yad upāye pitṛdevotpattikramasya mantravidheśca prādhānyaṁ bhavati |
analyzed: teṣām matam asti yat upāye pitṛ deva utpatti kramasya mantra vidheḥ ca prādhānyam bhavati

original: mātṛtantre mātṛdevyā utpattikrameṇa mantravidhinā ca sahānekamahattvapūrṇopāyānāṁ gambhīratā bhavati |
analyzed: mātṛtantre mātṛdevyāḥ utpatti krameṇa mantra vidhinā ca saha aneka mahattva pūrṇa upāyānām gambhīra tā bhavati
atas pitṛ tantra apekṣayā mātṛ tantram ati gahanam

original: ācāryaseratogapāmahodayānāṁ matānusāraṁ pitṛ-mātṛtantrayorabheda eva advayatantram vidyate |
analyzed: ācārya seratogapā mahodayānām mata anusāram pitṛ mātṛ tantrayoḥ abhedaḥ eva advaya tantram vidyate

pitṛtantra aupāyatantra ḍākinīmātṛtantra yoginītantra ādīni hi etāni nāma paryāyāṇi santi
prathamam idam pitṛ tantram abhidhīyate

original: yato hi buddhasya rūpakāyasyedamupādānakārakaṁ bījatulyaṁ ca |
analyzed: yatas hi buddhasya rūpa kāyasya idam upādāna kārakam bīja tulyam ca
tantram idam ābhāsa pakṣaḥ asti

original: dvitīyatantraṁ mātṛtantramabhidhīyate yato hīdaṁ mātṛsadṛśaṁ prajñātantraṁ pradhānataḥ paramārthasatyenābhinnamahāsukhajñānafale dharmakāyasyopādānamasti  #
analyzed: dvitīya tantram mātṛtantram abhidhīyate yatas hi idam mātṛ sadṛśam prajñā tantram pradhānataḥ paramārtha satyena abhinna mahā sukha jñāna fale dharmakāyasya upādānam asti  /
prajñā upāyayoḥ prajñāpakṣaḥ asti

original: prajñāpāramitāyāḥ vibhinnopāyeṣu militeṣu vibhinnaprakārāṇāṁ falānāṁ devakāyasya ( upāyasya )

original: mātṛsadṛśamahāsukhaśūnyatā'bhinnatve sati yuganaddhatvamupalabhyate loke'pi pitṛvat putrakulaṁ nirdhāritaṁ bhavati |
analyzed: mātṛ sadṛśa mahā sukha śūnyatā abhinnatve sati yuga naddha tvam upalabhyate loke api pitṛ vat putra kulam nirdhāritam bhavati

original: sārāṁśaḥ pūrṇaprakaraṇasya sārāṁśo'yamāsti yat-bhoṭācāryeranuttaratantramidaṁ pitṛ-mātṛ-advayatantratvena svīkṛtam etannāmatantram |
analyzed: sārāśaḥ pūrṇa prakaraṇasya sārāśaḥ ayam āsti yat bhoṭa ācāryeḥ anuttara tantram idam pitṛ mātṛ advaya tantra tvena svīkṛtam etat nāma tantram

original: bhāratīyācāryāṇāṁ matānusāraṁ tantramidam itthaṁ spaṣṭarūpeṇa tridhā vibhajya vyākhyātaṁ syāditi na kutrāpi pratīyate |
analyzed: bhāratīya ācāryāṇām mata anusāram tantram idam ittham spaṣṭa rūpeṇa tridhā vibhajya vyākhyātam syāt iti na kutra api pratīyate

original: atastantradvayasyādhāraṁ svīkṛtya bhoṭadeśīyācāryaiḥ pitṛ-mātṛ-advayarūpeṇa bhedāḥ kṛtāḥ iti pratīyate |
analyzed: atas tantra dvayasya ādhāram svīkṛtya bhoṭa deśīya ācāryaiḥ pitṛ mātṛa dvaya rūpeṇa bhedāḥ kṛtāḥ iti pratīyate

original: kālacakre samāgataṁ praġyopāyatantradvayamapi svatantratantratvena svīkartuṁ na śakyate,
analyzed: kālacakre samāgatam praya upāya tantra dvayam api svatantra tantra tvena svīkartum na śakyate

original: yaiśca guhyasamājādiḥ pitṛtantrīyagrantho'bhihitasteṣāmapi matānusāraṁ tatrāpi prajñopāyadvayasyābhinnarūpeṇa vyākhyā sādhanāpaddhatiścāyāti
analyzed: yaiḥ ca guhya samāja ādiḥ pitṛtantrīya granthaḥ abhihitaḥ teṣām api mata anusāram tatra api prajñopāya dvayasya abhinna rūpeṇa vyākhyā sādhanā paddhatiḥ ca āyāti
yathā prajñā upāya samāpattiḥ yogaḥ iti abhidhīyate
yaḥ niḥsvabhāvataḥ prajñā upāyaḥ bhāva lakṣaṇam
hevajraḥ mātṛtantrasya granthaḥ abhidhīyate

advaya bhāvanā artham kathitam

original: yathā- hekāreṇa mahākalpā vajraṁ prajñā ca gaṇyate |

ittham samasta anuttara tantram prajñā upāya yuga naddhasya eva vyākhyām karoti
svatantra tvena pṛthak pṛthak na asti

original: sādhanā'vasare mātṛtantrīyasādhakāḥ mahāsukhaṁ śūnyatāṁ vādhikaṁ sādhayanti |
analyzed: sādhanā avasare mātṛ tantrīya sādhakāḥ mahā sukham śūnyatām vā adhikam sādhayanti

original: yathā-vajrapañjarasya 13 tame paricchede uktaṁ yat prajñāpāramitopāyo yoginitantramastīti |
analyzed: yathā vajrapañjarasya tame paricchede uktam yat prajñāpāramitā upāyaḥ yogini tantram asti iti

atas idam yoginītantram abhihitam

original: arthāt mātṛtantre caṇḍālyāderbhāvanāṁ pradhānarūpeṇa kṛtvā uṣṇīṣakamalāt śukrasya adhaḥ kṣaraṇe jāte punaścordhvagatau caturānandasya catuḥśūnyatāyāśca  #
analyzed: arthāt mātṛtantre caṇḍālī ādeḥ bhāvanām pradhāna rūpeṇa kṛtvā uṣṇīṣa kamalāt śukrasya adhas kṣaraṇe jāte punar ca ūrdhva gatau catur ānandasya catur śūnyatāyāḥ ca

original: sākṣātkāraṁ vidhāya mahāsukhaśūnyatāyāṁ dārdyamupalabhya mahāsukhajñānasyādhārabhūtena pañcaraśmiyutena vāyunā saṁvṛtimāyākāye utthāpitasya  #
analyzed: sākṣātkāram vidhāya mahā sukha śūnyatāyām dārdyam upalabhya mahā sukha jñānasya ādhāra bhūtena pañca raśmi yutena vāyunā sa vṛti māyā kāye utthāpitasya

original: prakriyā mātṛtantre hevajre vā pradhānarūpena nirdiṣṭā vidyate |
analyzed: prakriyā mātṛtantre hevajre vā pradhāna rūpena nirdiṣṭā vidyate

ayam śūnyatā pakṣe prajñāyāḥ aśaḥ
atas prajñā iyam ' mātā iti ucyate

original: pitṛtantraguhyasamājādau ḍākārṇavatantrānusāraṁ yogināṁ kṛte prabhāsvaramāyākāyādisiddhibhiḥ yuganaddhakāyasya prāptividhirabhihitaḥ |
analyzed: pitṛtantra guhya samāja ādau ḍākārṇava tantra anusāram yoginām kṛte prabhāsvara māyā kāya ādi siddhibhiḥ yuga naddha kāyasya prāpti vidhiḥ abhihitaḥ

original: arthāt prabhāsvarasyodayasthāne hṛdayakamale kramaśo vāyurvilīnatāmupagacchannanulomakrame pratilomakrame ca catuḥśūnyatāyāḥ bodhaṁ kṛtvā ālokālokābhāsopalabdhyanantaraṁ  #
analyzed: arthāt prabhāsvarasya udaya sthāne hṛdaya kamale kramaśas vāyuḥ vilīna tām upagacchan anuloma krame pratiloma krame ca catur śūnyatāyāḥ bodham kṛtvā āloka āloka ābhāsa upalabdhi anantaram

original: prabhāsvarasya sākṣātkāraṁ karoti tathā ca prabhāsvarasyādhārabhūtena pañcaraśmiyutena vāyunā saṁvṛtimāyākāye utthāpanaṁ jāyate |
analyzed: prabhāsvarasya sākṣātkāram karoti tathā ca prabhāsvarasya ādhāra bhūtena pañca raśmi yutena vāyunā sa vṛti māyā kāye utthāpanam jāyate

original: tadutpannakramasambaddhā vyākhyā pañcakrame nāgārjunena savistaraṁ kṛtā |
analyzed: tad utpanna krama sambaddhā vyākhyā pañcakrame nāgārjunena sa vistaram kṛtā

original: yadyapi tantratrayametad advayatattvameva pratipādayate tathā ca bhāvaniṣpattau sarvatra advayasya samānatayā kintu sādhanāvidhau sūkṣmaprāṇa-vāyu-tilakayogānāṁ  #
analyzed: yadi api tantra trayam etat advaya tattvam eva pratipādayate tathā ca bhāva niṣpattau sarvatra advayasya samāna tayā kintu sādhanā vidhau sūkṣma prāṇa vāyu tilaka yogānām

original: prādhānyamevaṁ prabhāsvara-mayākāya-mahāsukhasvarūpe tathā māyākāyasya sādhanābhedād etad granthatraye sūkṣmāntaramavalokyate |
analyzed: prādhānyam evam prabhāsvara mayā kāya mahāsukha svarūpe tathā māyā kāyasya sādhanā bhedāt etat grantha traye sūkṣma antaram avalokyate

original: anuttaratantrasya kramadvayam pāramitānaye paramārthasatyaṁ-saṁvṛtisatyaṁ cāvirodhi mithaḥ saṁvṛtisatyaṁ svasvarūpānusāraṁ paramārthasatyaṁ  #
analyzed: anuttara tantrasya krama dvayam pāramitā naye paramārtha satya savṛti satyam ca avirodhi mithas savṛti satyam sva svarūpa anusāram paramārtha satyam

original: yato hi saṁvṛttisatyam ucchedasya niṣedhaṁ karoti,

original: śūnyatāyā bhāvanāṁ kurvatā sādhakena sūryamaṇḍala-candramaṇḍalabījākṣarādīnāṁ kramaśo nyāsaṁ vidhāya tatpariṇatyā mahāmudrākāya-niṣpannakaraṇamupasādhanamasti

original: niṣpannakramasyoccāvasthāyāṁ sūkṣmaprāṇacittena utthāpito yaśca saṁbhogakāyarūpatvenotpadyate sa śuddhaniṣpannajñānakāya ityucyate |

original: guhyasamājapañjikākṛṣṇayamāritantrādiṣu samāgateṣu caturyogeṣu tṛtīyātiyogaṁ yāvatsādhanā- upasādhanāyāṁ saṁgṛhītā vidyate |

original: upa samīpe sādhyaṁ niṣpādyate iti kṛtvā,

original: siddhiḥ mahāmudrāsiddhistasyā agrāādibhūtāḥ praṇavādayo mantrāḥ yasmin tadupasādhanasiddhyagraṁ vinyastasamastamantrākṣaraṁ mahāmudrārūpaṁ  #

original: samādhisattvo jñānasatvaśca sādhanārthaśca samayaśca tṛtīyam ' mantrādhipatinā aoṁkārādinā kāya-vāk-cittā-nāmādhiṣṭhitārthaṁ trivajraṁ codayitvā  #

original: sevādicaturyogeṣu prathame trayaḥ svārthasiddhiyogā antimastu parārthasiddhiyogaḥ ityucyate |

original: tridhyānaṁ sforayatā ācārya koṅṭulamahodayenoktaṁ yat maṇḍalasya pradhānanirmāturyuganaddhakāyasya anyaddhyānadvayasya niṣpannatāyāḥ pūrvaṁ  #

original: bhāvanākaraṇādayam 'ādi' rityucyate tathā prajñopāyasyādvayayoge jāte yoga ityucyate |

original: yuganaddhakāye bodhicittena mantradevaṁ nyasya maṇḍalasya pariniṣpannatāṁ yāvat yo yogaḥ tad dvitīyamaṇḍalarājagradhyānamityucyate |
analyzed: yuga naddha kāye bodhi cittena mantradevam nyasya maṇḍalasya pariniṣpanna tām yāvat yaḥ yogaḥ tat dvitīya maṇḍala rājagradhyānam iti ucyate

original: tadanantaraṁ devakṣetrapariśuddhiprabhṛtikaṁ devatulya-kṛtyakaraṇaṁ ca antimaṁ karmarājāgradhyānamityucyate |

original: kṛṣṇayamāritantrānusāram utpattikramasya bhāvanā caturyogavidhinā kriyate - prathamaṁ bhāvayed yogamanuyogaṁ dvitīyakam |
analyzed: kṛṣṇayamāri tantra anusāram utpatti kramasya bhāvanā catur yoga vidhinā kriyate prathamam bhāvayet yogam anuyogam dvitīyakam

original: caturyogānāṁ sthitiṁ nirūpayatā tatraivoktam - vajrasattvasya niṣpattiryoga ityabhidhīyate |
analyzed: catur yogānām sthitim nirūpayatā tatra eva uktam vajra sattvasya niṣpattiḥ yogaḥ iti abhidhīyate

jñānacakra praveśaḥ ca amṛta svādum eva ca

original: kṛṣṇayamāritantrasya pañjikāyāṁ ratnamālāyāṁ yogānuyogātiyogamahāyogān spaṣṭayatā vanaratnenaiṣāṁ savistaraṁ vivecanaṁ kṛtam - yogaḥ saptavidhānuttarapūjāta  #
analyzed: kṛṣṇayamāri tantrasya pañjikāyām ratnamālāyām yoga anuyoga atiyoga mahā yogān spaṣṭayatā vana ratnena eṣām sa vistaram vivecanam kṛtam yogaḥ

original: ārabhya pañcābhidhānena vajratattvasya niṣpattiparyanto vidhireva yoga ityucyate |
analyzed: ārabhya pañca abhidhānena vajra tattvasya niṣpatti paryantaḥ vidhiḥ eva yogaḥ iti ucyate

mukha trayasya madhye śvetasya
dakṣiṇe kṛṣṇasya vāme lohita varṇasya

original: vajratantrasya bhāvanākaraṇānantaram anuyogo'yaṁ vārāhīlohitavarṇena saha samāhito'sti |

original: etādṛśyā bhāvanāyā anantaraṁ tat svahṛdayakamale 'haṁ' akṣareṇa sfuritakaraṇaṁ,

original: bodhicittena maṇḍalotpattikaraṇaṁ tathā maṇḍale bījākṣarāṇāṁ nyāsakaraṇaṁ yāvad yo vidhiḥ sa anuyogavidhirityucyate |

original: yathā- 'kṣe' akṣareṇa mohasya kṛṣṇayāreśca tasya 'ma' akṣareṇa kṛṣṇayamāryāderūtthāpanam atiyogo'sti |
analyzed: yathā mohasya kṛṣṇayāreḥ ca tasya akṣareṇa atiyogaḥ asti

original: mahāyogaḥ vajrasattva-niṣpattiḥ bījākṣara-nyāsaḥ tadbījairiṣṭadevasya prākaṭayam sampūrṇapradhānadevaḥ anucaradevādibhirmaṇḍalasya paripūrṇatā,
analyzed: mahā yogaḥ vajra sattva niṣpattiḥ bīja akṣara nyāsaḥ tad bījaiḥ iṣṭadevasya prākaṭayam sampūrṇa pradhāna devaḥ anucara deva ādibhiḥ maṇḍalasya paripūrṇa tā
sampanna devānām cakṣuḥ prāṇa jihvā ādīnām adhiṣṭhita karaṇam

tathāgatānām pūjām kṛtvā teṣām abhiṣeka artham āmantrita karaṇam
tebhyaḥ abhiṣeka prāpti karaṇam
jñāna cakrasya ākarṣaṇam rāga vajra svabhāvaḥ tvam rāga dharma ākaraḥ prabhuḥ
sarva ghoṣa vara agra agra vāc vajra namaḥ astu te
ādi vacanaiḥ tuti karaṇa

original: aom a u ma ebhirakṣarairniṣpanno'sti yaśca kāya-vāk-cittānāṁ bodhakaḥ |

śūnyaḥ hetuḥ pratyaya anutpannaḥ asti

original: anenedamapi spaṣṭībhavati yat vayamanādikālato bhavacakrapatitā bhūtvā vastūnāṁ samīcīnāṁ sthitimajñātvā ' ahaṁ mamādaḥ ' pratyabhiniveśato'bhyastā  #

original: bhavāmo'to'smākaṁ śūnyatāyā vajrajñānātmaka-prabhāsvarasya jñānaṁ na bhavet sādhako bhūtvā ātmagrahe āsakto bhavet ataḥ pūrvaṁ mādhyamikakārikāyāṁ  #

original: anena siddhyati yat etat sarvaṁ cittajñānāya vidyate |

original: tatra sarvatraikatvapradarśanaṁ tathā saṁvṛtau etat kathanamasti yat vṛkṣasya yāvanto bhāgāḥ pṛthvīto bahiḥ tāvanto bhāgā ābhyantarīyāḥ santi

original: pṛthvīgarbhasthite vṛkṣajaḍabhāve tasya bahiḥ nāsti kiñcidastitvaṁ tadvat bahiṣṭhā yāvanto raṁga-rūpa-ākārādayaḥ tatsarvaṁ jaḍatulyacittasyaiva  #

original: prāyaḥ samastānuttaratantragrantheṣu utpattikramasya vimānabhāvanā dharmodayena bhūtocchedanaparyāyābhyāṁ kriyate |

original: tenaiva vajreṇa vibhāvayet ca prakārakaṁ pañcarabandhanaṁ ca ||

original: tena bhūmivāḍaṁ ca tadabhyantarāvasthitaviśvavajrasyopari sthitāvakāśatmakākāśe kṛṣṇayaṅkārajavāyumaṇḍalaṁ dhanurākāraṁ kṛṣṇaṁ koṭidvaye calatpatākādvayānvitaṁ  #

original: tadupari raktaraṁ kāreṇāgnimaṇḍalaṁ trikoṇaṁ raktaṁ koṇeṣu ca refāṅktitam |
analyzed: tad upari kāreṇa agni maṇḍalam tri koṇam raktam koṇeṣu ca

original: tadupari sitavaṁkāreṇa jalamaṇḍalaṁ ghaṇṭāṅkaṁ sitamadhomukhaṁ tadupari pītālaṁkāreṇa caturasraṁ pṛthvīmaṇḍalaṁ pītaṁ koṇeṣu triśūkavajrāṅkitaṁ  #

original: vibhāvya zhaṭiti vāyumaṇḍalādisarvapariṇāmena kūṭāgāraṁ dvipuraṁ viśvadalakamalasyopari yathāsvaṁ sthitacandrasūryāsanaṁ caturasraṁ aṣṭastambhopaśobhitaṁ  #
