sādhakaḥ ādikarmikaḥ iti ucyate

original: 2. svalpajñānāveśaḥ- sthūladevamaṇḍalānāṁ bhāvanākaraṇe samartho'pi sādhako'yamāyatanikadevānāmekasmin kṣaṇe'samarthatvāt svalpajñānāveśastarīyaḥ  #
analyzed: su alpa jñāna āveśaḥ sthūla deva maṇḍalānām bhāvanā karaṇe samarthaḥ api sādhakaḥ ayam āyatanika devānām ekasmin kṣaṇe asamartha tvāt su alpa jñāna āveśa starīyaḥ
iti ucyate

original: 3. jñāne svalpādhikāralābhisādhakaḥ- ayam āyatanikadevānāmekasmin kṣaṇe bhāvanākaraṇe yogyatāmāpnoti |
analyzed: jñāne su alpa adhikāra lābhi sādhakaḥ ayam āyatanika devānām ekasmin kṣaṇe bhāvanā karaṇe yogyatām āpnoti
atra yāvat mātra utpatti kramasya eva bhāvanā bhavati

original: tadanantaraṁ sādhakena utpatti-utpannakramadvayaṁ saṁyojya dhyānaṁ karaṇīyaṁ bhavati |
analyzed: tad anantaram sādhakena utpatti utpanna krama dvayam sayojya dhyānam karaṇīyam bhavati

original: tadā sādhake sūkṣmatikamadhye maṇḍalānāṁ sfuraṇasaṁharaṇayoḥ sāmarthyamāyāti |
analyzed: tadā sādhake sūkṣmatika madhye maṇḍalānām sfuraṇa saharaṇayoḥ sāmarthyam āyāti

original: atra sādhakasya prayāsena yāmamadhyāntarayoraikyamāyāti tathāpi sādhako'nantakarmasaṁcaye asaṁkhyarūpeṣvanantakarmasu praveśe ca yogyatāprāptau  #
analyzed: atra sādhakasya prayāsena yāma madhya antarayoḥ aikyam āyāti tathā api sādhakaḥ ananta karma sacaye asakhya rūpeṣu ananta karmasu praveśe ca yogyatā prāptau
asamarthaḥ bhavati
atra eva sādhakaḥ jñāne labdha alpa adhikāraḥ manyate

original: 4. jñāne samyagadhikāralābhisādhakaḥ- etasyaikaikasmin kṣaṇe'nantadhyānasya spaṣṭābhāso bhavati |
analyzed: jñāne samyak adhikāra lābhi sādhakaḥ etasya ekaikasmin kṣaṇe ananta dhyānasya spaṣṭa ābhāsaḥ bhavati
smaraṇa mātreṇa ayam ananta sattvānām hitam kartum śaknoti
iyam utpatti kramasya carama utkṛṣṭā avasthā vidyate
avasthāyām asyām sādhakaḥ niṣpanna kramasya ūṣma mārge api gacchati

original: sādhakasya bhedacatuṣṭayaṁ bhaṭṭāraka-ānandamatinā'pyuktam yat sādhakaiḥ sva svasādhanopāye samāgatotpattikramasya vidhinā bhāvanā karaṇīyeti
analyzed: sādhakasya bheda catuṣṭayam bhaṭṭāraka ānandamatinā api uktam yat sādhakaiḥ sva sva sādhana upāye samāgata utpatti kramasya vidhinā bhāvanā karaṇīyā iti

original: eteṣāṁ mate ekasmin kṣaṇe samastamaṇḍalānāṁ bhāvanākaraṇe asamarthasādhaka ādikarmiko'sti |
analyzed: eteṣām mate ekasmin kṣaṇe samasta maṇḍalānām bhāvanā karaṇe asamartha sādhakaḥ ādikarmikaḥ asti

original: vimāne tathā tatra nyāsitasthūladevānāṁ bhāvanākaraṇe'samartho'pi sādhaka āyatanadevānāṁ hṛdayādikasya spaṣṭabhāvanākaraṇe samarthasādhako
analyzed: vimāne tathā tatra nyāsita sthūla devānām bhāvanā karaṇe asamarthaḥ api sādhakaḥ āyatana devānām hṛdaya ādikasya spaṣṭa bhāvanā karaṇe samartha sādhakaḥ
prathama dvitīya sādhakayoḥ bhāvanā vidhau bhedaḥ bhavati

original: prathamaḥ sampūrṇamaṇḍalasya kramaśo bhāvanāṁ karoti dvitīyaśca sthūladevasyaikasmin kṣaṇe dhyānaṁ karoti sūkṣmāyatanikadevānāṁ kramaśo bhāvanāṁ  #
analyzed: prathamaḥ sampūrṇa maṇḍalasya kramaśas bhāvanām karoti dvitīyaḥ ca sthūla devasya ekasmin kṣaṇe dhyānam karoti sūkṣmāyatanika devānām kramaśas bhāvanām
karoti ca

original: tṛtīyasādhako na kevalaṁ sthūladevānāmapi tu sūkṣmadevānāmapi ekasmin kṣaṇe dhyānaṁ karoti |
analyzed: tṛtīya sādhakaḥ na kevalam sthūla devānām api tu sūkṣma devānām api ekasmin kṣaṇe dhyānam karoti
tṛtīya sthāne gatasya sādhakasya utpatti niṣpanna kramayoḥ advaya bhāvaḥ samāyāti
tad anantaram sādhakasya yāma madhya antarayoḥ dhyānam api abhinnam bhavati

original: asyāmavasthāyāṁ sādhakena ekasmin dine vāramekaṁ sampūrṇotpattividheḥ ( abhisamayasya )
analyzed: asyām avasthāyām sādhakena ekasmin dine vāram ekam sampūrṇa utpatti vidheḥ abhisamayasya
pāṭhaḥ karaṇīyaḥ bhavati
na tu pratibhānam

original: imāmavasthāṁ labdhavato'pi sādhakasya kṛte utpattikramīyāntimapadasya prāptirna bhavati |
analyzed: imām avasthām labdhavataḥ api sādhakasya kṛte utpatti kramīya antima padasya prāptiḥ na bhavati

original: caturthasthāne labdhe sati sādhaka utpattikrame pūrṇatāṁ prāpya niṣpannakrame'pi niṣṇāto bhavati |
analyzed: caturtha sthāne labdhe sati sādhakaḥ utpatti krame pūrṇa tām prāpya niṣpanna krame api niṣṇātaḥ bhavati

original: saṁvarodayatantre'pyuktamasti- utpattiṁ mṛdumadhyo yogī dhyāyād maṇḍalabhāvanā |
analyzed: savarodayatantre api uktam asti utpattim mṛdu madhyaḥ yogī dhyāyāt maṇḍala bhāvanā
adhimātraḥ zhaṭita ākāram maṇḍalam cittamātrataḥ

original: arthāt mṛdu madhyendriyadevamaṇḍalayośca kramaśaḥ bhāvanāṁ karoti tathā niṣpannakramasya bhāvanāyāmapi devakāyasya bhāvanāṁ zhaṭiti eva vidadhāti
analyzed: arthāt mṛdu madhyendriya deva maṇḍalayoḥ ca kramaśas bhāvanām karoti tathā niṣpanna kramasya bhāvanāyām api deva kāyasya bhāvanām zhaṭiti eva vidadhāti

original: uktaślokasya vyākhyāṁ kurvatā ācāryaseratogapāmahodayenoktamasti yad ayamekasyaiva sādhakasyotpattikramikabhāvanāyā vikāsakramo vidyate |
analyzed: ukta ślokasya vyākhyām kurvatā ācārya seratogapā mahodayena uktam asti yat ayam ekasya eva sādhakasya utpatti kramika bhāvanāyāḥ vikāsa kramaḥ vidyate

original: prathamacaraṇe sādhakaḥ sthūladevamaṇḍalasya kramaśaḥ bhāvanāṁ karoti sa mṛduḥ vartate dvitīyacaraṇe'rthāt kiñcit abhyāse jāte sthūladevamaṇḍalasyaikasmin  #
analyzed: prathama caraṇe sādhakaḥ sthūla deva maṇḍalasya kramaśas bhāvanām karoti sa mṛduḥ vartate dvitīya caraṇe arthāt kiñcid abhyāse jāte sthūla deva maṇḍalasya ekasmin

original: kṣaṇe tathā sūkṣmadevamaṇḍalasya kramaśaḥ bhāvanāṁ karoti,
analyzed: kṣaṇe tathā sūkṣma deva maṇḍalasya kramaśas bhāvanām karoti
sa madhyaḥ vartate

original: tṛtīyāvasthāyāṁ sthūla-sūkṣmasamastadevamaṇḍalasyaikasmin kṣaṇe bhāvanāṁ karoti tathā niṣpannakramasya sādhako'pi deva-bhāvanāṁ zhaṭiti eva  #
analyzed: tṛtīya avasthāyām sthūla sūkṣma samasta deva maṇḍalasya ekasmin kṣaṇe bhāvanām karoti tathā niṣpanna kramasya sādhakaḥ api deva bhāvanām zhaṭiti eva
sampādayati
niṣpanna kramasya sāmānya paricayaḥ niṣpanna kramasya ādhāraḥ bodhi citta mtantra śāstre bodhi citta nija citta tantra sūkṣma prāṇa citta ādiṣu nāma paryāya tvena
bodhi citte bodheḥ ca citte mahat antaram bhavati
bodhi cittam tu sarva satva varti param ca bodheḥ cittam tantram
yatas hi ayam caitasikaḥ dharmaḥ yaḥ ca āgantukaḥ
ayam eva śrāvaka yāna pratyekabuddha yānābhyām bodhisatvam pṛthak karoti

original: bodheścitte samutpanne sati sādhako sādhako bodhisattvo bhavati,
analyzed: bodheḥ citte samutpanne sati sādhakaḥ sādhakaḥ bodhisattvaḥ bhavati
bodhisatva yānī ca kathyate

original: etadvodhicittalakṣaṇaṁ spaṣṭayatā haribhadreṇa kathitam - cittotpādaḥ parārthāya samyaksambodhikāmatā |
analyzed: etat vodhi citta lakṣaṇam spaṣṭayatā haribhadreṇa kathitam citta utpādaḥ para arthāya samyaksambodhi kāma tā
parārtha siddhaye bodhi abhilāṣaḥ eva bodheḥ cittam

original: parārthakāmanā tadarthaṁ ca samyaksambodhikāmaneti caitasiko dharmaḥ,
analyzed: para artha kāmanā tad artham ca samyaksambodhi kāmanā iti caitasikaḥ dharmaḥ
yatas cittantu sāmānya bhāvena sarva dharmeṣu sama bhāvena ālambate
yatra ca kāmanā kiñcid dharma viśeṣa ālambanā

original: ato bodhicittena caitasikena bhavituṁ śakyate na tu cittena |
analyzed: atas bodhi cittena caitasikena bhavitum śakyate na tu cittena

original: ataḥ ubhayakāmanā cittasaṁjñayākhyātuṁ śakyā yataśca etat kāmanādvaye yāvat tīvratvaṁ syāt tāvadeva sādhako bodhi-samīpyaṁ prāpsyati,
analyzed: atas ubhaya kāmanā citta sajñayā ākhyātum śakyā yatas ca etat kāmanā dvaye yāvat tīvra tvam syāt tāvat eva sādhakaḥ bodhisamīpyam prāpsyati
tatas bodhi cittam ca vikasiṣyati

original: śāstreṣu bodhicittasya dvau bhedau samākhyātau- 1. saṁvṛtibodhicittam,
analyzed: śāstreṣu bodhi cittasya dvau bhedau samākhyātau sa vṛti bodhi cittam

original: tathā hi bodhicaryāvatāre- tad bodhicittaṁ dvividhaṁ vijñātavyaṁ samāsataḥ |
analyzed: tathā hi bodhi caryā avatāre tat bodhi cittam dvividham vijñātavyam samāsatas
bodhi praṇidhi cittam ca
bodhiprasthānam eva ca
prāṇimātrāya bodhi citta kāmanā tu praṇidhāna citta

original: tadarthaṁ ca daśapāramitā-caryā ca prasthānacittaṁ vartate |
analyzed: tad artham ca daśa pāramitā caryā ca prasthāna cittam vartate

original: etadbhedadvayaṁ tatraivopamayā varṇitamittham- gantukāmasya gantuśca yathā bhedaḥ pratīyate |
analyzed: etat bheda dvayam tatra eva upamayā varṇitam ittham gantu kāmasya gantuḥ ca yathā bhedaḥ pratīyate
tathā bhedaḥ anayoḥ jñeyaḥ yāthāsakhyena paṇḍitaiḥ

original: vajrayāne yadbodhicittāvadhāraṇā tatra bodhiścittamapi tu bodhicittameva yat sādhanāmūlakaṁ tattvameva nāpi tu sādhyamūlakamapyasti |
analyzed: vajrayāne yat bodhi citta avadhāraṇā tatra bodhiḥ cittam api tu bodhi cittam eva yat sādhanā mūlakam tattvam eva nā api tu sādhya mūlakam api asti
guhya samāje tantra svarūpam āśraya mārga fala bhedāḥ tu nirūpitāḥ

original: ( fala ) asaṁhāryāśraya eva mārgaḥ mārga eva falam avasthāmātraṁ bhedaśca |

analyzed: tat eva bodhi cittam api

original: guhyasamāje bodhicittasvarūpaviṣaye pratipāditaṁ yat śūnyatākarūṇayorabhinnarūpameva bodhicittamāste |
analyzed: guhya samāje bodhi citta svarūpa viṣaye pratipāditam yat śūnyatā karūṇayoḥ abhinna rūpam eva bodhi cittam āste
śūnyatā pāramitā naye śūnyatāyāḥ bāhya śūnyatā ābhyantara śūnyatā bāhya abhyantara ubhaya śūnyatā paramārtha śūnyatā prabhṛtayaḥ viśatiḥ bhedāḥ vyadhīyanta
yuktibhiḥ dharmeṣu viśleṣiteṣu satsu niḥsvabhāva tā antatas teṣām avatiṣṭhate
dharmi bhedena śūnyatā bhedāḥ ca api bhavanti
pāramitā naya vidāḥ śūnyatā svarūpam kiñcid prasajya niṣedha ātmakam manyante
kecid ca paryudāsa prabhāsvara svarūpam manyante

original: parañca vajrayāne śūnyatā niṣprapañcatā paryudāsasvarūpaiva pratīyate |
analyzed: parañca vajrayāne śūnyatā niṣprapañca tā paryudāsa svarūpā eva pratīyate

original: yataśca pitṛtantrīyagrantheṣu ālokādinā tṛtīyena prabhāsvarākhyacaturthajñānena ca krameṇa śūnyatāyāḥ śūnyātiśūnyamahāśūnyasarvaśūnyākhyabhedacatuṣṭayasya  #
analyzed: yatas ca pitṛ tantrīya grantheṣu āloka ādinā tṛtīyena prabhāsvara ākhya caturtha jñānena ca krameṇa śūnyatāyāḥ śūnya atiśūnya mahāśūnya sarva śūnya ākhya bheda catuṣṭayasya
sākṣātkāraḥ samamanyata

original: prathamālokajñāne śūnyatāsākṣātkāranantaraṁ rāgasambaddhānāṁ catvāriṁśad vikalpānāṁ kṣayaḥ dvitīyālokābhāsajñānena cātiśūnyatābodhe sati triṁśat  #
analyzed: prathama āloka jñāne śūnyatā sākṣātkāra anantaram rāga sambaddhānām catvāriśat vikalpānām kṣayaḥ dvitīya āloka ābhāsa jñānena ca ati śūnyatā bodhe sati triśat

original: vikalpānāṁ kṣayaḥ ālokopalabdhijñānena cātiśūnyatābodhakāle mohasambaddhānāṁ saptavikalpānāṁ kṣayo bhavati |
analyzed: vikalpānām kṣayaḥ āloka upalabdhi jñānena ca ati śūnyatā bodha kāle moha sambaddhānām sapta vikalpānām kṣayaḥ bhavati
etat tritaya jñānena śūnyatā bodhe sūkṣmam dvaitam avaśiṣyate

original: caramaprabhāsvarajñānadvārā sarvaśūnyatābodhe jāta satyeva advayaparamārthaḥ sākṣātkriyate |
analyzed: carama prabhāsvara jñāna dvārā sarva śūnyatā bodhe sati eva advaya paramārthaḥ sākṣātkriyate

original: aparatastu mātṛtantre pratipāditaṁ yat caturviṣayyānandaiḥ krameṇa śūnyatācatuṣṭayī sākṣātkriyate |
analyzed: aparatas tu mātṛtantre pratipāditam yat catur viṣayi ānandaiḥ krameṇa śūnyatā catuṣṭayī sākṣātkriyate
iyam ca avasthā vipāka ādi kṣaṇa catuṣṭaye vibhajyate

original: etenedameva suspaṣṭaṁ yat prabhāsvaracitte vikalpātisūkṣmarūpeṣu vilīneṣu satsu prabhāsvarasyādvayāvasthaiva caramāvasthā yā ca paryudāsasvarūpaiva  #
analyzed: etena idam eva su spaṣṭam yat prabhāsvara citte vikalpa ati sūkṣma rūpeṣu vilīneṣu satsu prabhāsvarasya advaya avasthā eva carama avasthā yā ca paryudāsa svarūpā eva
bhavitum śakyā
etat eva vajrayānasya śūnyatā svarūpam

original: paraṁ cedamapi nūnaṁ jñeyaṁ yadasya viṣprapañcatāyāṁ pāramitānayavajrayānayoścāntaraṁ na bhavati |
analyzed: param ca idam api nūnam jñeyam yat asya viṣprapañca tāyām pāramitā naya vajra yānayoḥ ca antaram na bhavati
kālacakra seka upadeśa ādi advaya tantra grantheṣu śūnyatā sarva kārā avara upetā samabhihitā

original: śūnyatā ca rūpaṁ yato hi vāyormadhyamāvasthitau marīcidhūmakhadyotadīpādayaḥ āvirbhavanti |
analyzed: śūnyatā ca rūpam yatas hi vāyoḥ madhyama avasthitau marīci dhūma khadyota dīpa ādayaḥ āvirbhavanti
ete ca sarve kālacakra deva rūpeṇa samudbhavanti
viṣaya śūnyatā sva rūpa prabhāsvarasya balāt utpanna tvāt prabhāsvara bhinna tvena vartate

original: ataḥ prabhāsvaratvamatra paramārtham viṣayarūpeṇa devakāyasaṁvṛtirūpaṁ ca |
analyzed: atas prabhāsvara tvam atra paramārtham viṣaya rūpeṇa deva kāya savṛti rūpam ca
sa vṛti rūpe svabhāvataḥ prabhāsvarāt abhinna tvam
aparatas ca akṣara sukham api sa vṛtiḥ ati param kathayitum śakya
yatas ca idam karma mudrā jñāna mudrā ādīnām sevanāt utpannam abhimukham ca abhavat
kim api syāt
parañca māyā kāya prabhāsvarayoḥ yuga naddha rūpam eva falam vartate
karūṇa a prabhāsvara akṣara sukha ādīni paryāyāṇi

original: karūṇā pāramitānaye yathā śūnyatā śūnyamātrantathaiva karūṇā karūṇāmātrameva |
analyzed: karūṇā pāramitā naye yathā śūnyatā śūnya mātram tathā eva karūṇā karūṇā mātram eva

original: buddhakapālatantre pāramitānaya-śūnyatā itthaṁ pratipāditā-jñānābhāve śūnyatā santatirahita-gṛhasthena samānā |
analyzed: buddha kapāla tantre pāramitā naya śūnyatā ittham pratipāditā ajñāna abhāve śūnyatā santati rahita gṛhasthena samānā

original: vastutastu śūnyatākarūṇayoradvayabhāvo'pekṣyate yataḥ karūṇā akṣarasukhañca nāmnā paryāyabhūtam |
analyzed: vastutas tu śūnyatā karūṇayoḥ advaya bhāvaḥ apekṣyate yatas karūṇāḥ akṣara sukham ca nāmnā paryāya bhūtam

original: mahāsukhena karūṇayā vā śūnyatāyāṁ prakaṭitāyāṁ satyāmeva sā prāṇihitaṁ vidadhāti |
analyzed: mahā sukhena karūṇayā vā śūnyatāyām prakaṭitāyām satyām eva sā prāṇi hitam vidadhāti
karūṇā eva mahā rāgaḥ
mahā rāga śūnyatayoḥ abhinna tvam eva vajrayānasya karūṇā rūpam vartate
śūnyatā karūṇayoḥ advaya svabhāva bhūta bodhi cittasya avabodhāya pāramitā naya mantra nayayoḥ ca aneke upāyāḥ savarṇitāḥ
tatra ca anuttara tantreṣu upadiṣṭa nāḍī vāyu tilakānām marma avabodhanam eva sarva śreṣṭhaḥ upāyaḥ
atas atra etat tritayam tattvam nirūpyate

original: vajradeham pitṛtantra-mātṛtantrādvayatantrāṇāṁ niṣpannakramasya bhāvanāvidhiṣu naikāni matamatāntarāṇi paraṁ ca yatra saṁvṛti-svādhiṣṭhānakrama-paramārthaprabhāsvarāṇāmabhinnarūpayuganaddhasya  #
analyzed: vajra deham pitṛtantra mātṛtantra advaya tantrāṇām niṣpanna kramasya bhāvanā vidhiṣu na ekāni mata mata antarāṇi param ca yatra sa vṛti sva adhiṣṭhāna krama paramārtha prabhāsvarāṇām abhinna rūpa yuga naddhasya
prāpti upāya lakṣya ntu atra samānam
tatra eva niṣpanna krama sādhana ādhārībhūta vajra deha nāḍī vāyu tilaka ādiṣu adhikāra prāptiḥ api sama rūpeṇa mānyā
kaḥ tāvat vajra dehaḥ
ṣaṭtriśat skandha samūhaḥ eva vajra dehaḥ

original: idaṁ kāmadhātāveva sambhāvyate na tu rūpadhātvarūpadhātuṣu |
analyzed: idam kāmadhātau eva sambhāvyate na tu rūpadhātu arūpadhātuṣu
yatas hi rūpadhātau ākāśa vāyu agni kṣiti jala dhātavaḥ kiñcid mātram eva avatiṣṭhante

original: ataḥ anuttaratantrasya sādhakaḥ kāmadhātusattva eva bhavitumarhati na tu rūpārūpadhātvoḥ yataśca kāmadhātāveva ṣaḍtriṁśat skandhaiḥ ṣaḍdhātubhiśca  #
analyzed: atas anuttara tantrasya sādhakaḥ kāmadhātu sattvaḥ eva bhavitum arhati na tu rūpa arūpadhātvoḥ yatas ca kāmadhātau eva ṣaḍtriśat skandhaiḥ ṣaṣ dhātubhiḥ ca
pūrṇam tad pūrṇa tvam sambhāvyate

original: saṁvarodayatantre ṣaḍdhātuviṣaye- tvaṅmāṁsakaṁ ca raktaṁ ca mātṛjam iti kathyate |
analyzed: sa vara udaya tantre ṣaṣ dhātu viṣaye tvac māsakam ca raktam ca mātṛ jam iti kathyate
snāyu majjā ca śukram ca
pitṛ jam iti kathyate
evam ṣaṭ kuśikam piṇḍa vajra satva vacaḥ yathā
tvak māsa rakta snāyu majjā śukra iti ṣaṣ adhātu sampannaḥ ayam kāyaḥ niṣpanna kramasya pariśodhyam āste
etat sa mala nirmāṇa kāyaḥ api ucyate
nāḍī yathā paṭa tantu samūhaḥ tathā eva asmadīya śarīram api nāḍī jāla samūhaḥ

original: tatra coṣṇīṣe dvipañcāśad nāḍīnāṁ samūhaḥ kaṇṭhacakre ca ṣoḍaśa hṛdayakamale aṣṭau,
analyzed: tatra ca uṣṇīṣe dvipañcāśat nāḍīnām samūhaḥ kaṇṭha cakre ca ṣoḍaśa hṛdaya kamale aṣṭau
nābhikamale catuṣṣaṣṭiḥ nāḍyaḥ pramukhāḥ
savara udayatantre api atha atas sampravakṣyāmi nāḍī cakram yathākramam
dvāsaptati sahasrāṇi nāḍī deha anugā bhavet
nāḍikāḥ upanāḍīnām tāsām sthānam samāśritaḥ
viśottaraśatam nāma nāḍī prādhānyam ucyate
punar nakha danta śarīra sava ṛddhikāḥ uṣṇīṣa ādi caturviśatiḥ nāḍyaḥ api pramukha tām bhajante

original: tatraivoktaṁ- nāḍī sthānaṁ ca pīṭhaṁ ca ,
analyzed: nāḍī sthānam ca pīṭham ca
caturviśat pramāṇataḥ

original: teṣāṁ madhye trayo nāḍyaḥ āśrayanti ca sarvagāḥ ||
analyzed: teṣām madhye trayaḥ nāḍyaḥ āśrayanti ca sarvagāḥ
etat atra avadhūtī lalanā rasanā prabhṛtayaḥ tisraḥ mukhya nāḍyaḥ
avadhūtī avadhūtī madhyamā brahyadaṇḍa rāhuśakhinī iti paryāya bhūtāni

original: kecana ācāryā avadhūtīnāḍīṁ kālpanikīṁ atisūkṣmāṁ ca manyante |
analyzed: kecana ācāryāḥ avadhūtīnāḍīm kālpanikīm ati sūkṣmām ca manyante

original: kvacit sarvaśarīravyāpikāvadhūtī nāḍīti varṇyate kvacitu uṣṇīṣādārabhya pṛṣṭhāsthiparyantaṁ nābhikṣetrāt caturaṅgalamadhaḥ kutracit guhyendriyāgraṁ  #
analyzed: kvacid sarva śarīra vyāpikā avadhūtī nāḍī iti varṇyate kvacid tu uṣṇīṣāt ārabhya pṛṣṭha asthi paryantam nābhi kṣetrāt catur aṅgalam adhas kutracid guhyendriya agram
pāda tāla paryantam ca avadhūtī bhavati iti carcitam
nāḍī cakra sakhyā api kvacid catur tris vā ca upalabhyate

original: raṅjuṅdorjemahodayasya matantu yathā jñānasya mūlaṁ madhyamā tathaiva bhāvamūlamapimahāprāṇanāḍī |
analyzed: yathā jñānasya mūlam madhyamā tathā eva bhāva mūlam api mahāprāṇanāḍī

original: ucyate ca, caturviṁśatisahasramitāścandrāḥ śukravāhinī nāḍī lalanā ca caturviṁśatisahasramitāḥ sūryāḥ śoṇitavāhinī nāḍī rasanocyate |
analyzed: ucyate ca caturviśati sahasra mitāḥ candrāḥ śukra vāhinī nāḍī lalanā ca caturviśati sahasra mitāḥ sūryāḥ śoṇita vāhinī nāḍī rasanā ucyate
caturviśati vāyu vāhinī nāḍī madhyamā asti

original: hevajre avadhūtītthaṁ varṇitā - avadhūtī madhyadeśe grāhyagrāhakavarjitā |
analyzed: hevajre avadhūtī ittham varṇitā avadhūtī madhyadeśe grāhya grāhaka varjitā
sarva dharmāṇām antimā sattā catuṣkoṭi niṣprapañca prabhāsvara tā eva

original: vikalpān vigalayya madhyamāyāṁ praveśaḥ sthitilābhamātrameva ca madhyanāḍī kathayitumaśakyā?
analyzed: vikalpān vigalayya madhyamāyām praveśaḥ sthiti lābha mātram eva ca madhyanāḍī kathayitum aśakyā
tathā eva lalanā rasane dvaita bhāva tvena kathayitum aśakyate

original: kiṁ vastutaḥ asmaccharīre sūkṣmarūpeṇa nāḍī sthitā ?
analyzed: kim vastutas asmad śarīre sūkṣma rūpeṇa nāḍī sthitā

original: cenmadhyamā nāḍīcakraprabhṛtayaḥ nāḍyaḥ varṇanānurūpāstarhi etadbhāvanāmātram iṣṭadeve svaśarīraṁ pariṇatyanantarameva kriyate ?
analyzed: ced madhyamā nāḍī cakra prabhṛtayaḥ nāḍyaḥ varṇanā anurūpāḥ tarhi etat bhāvanā mātram iṣṭadeve sva śarīram pariṇati anantaram eva kriyate
yat ca vicāraṇīyam
parañca savara udaya tantra hevajra tantra sampuṭodbhava tantra kālacakra tantra vajra vārāhī rahasya tantra jñānodaya tantra prabhṛtiṣu lalanā rasanā avadhūtī nāḍīnām

original: svarūpamitthaṁ spaṣṭīkṛtam - rasanālalanānāḍyau avadhūtyā dakṣiṇato rasanā,
analyzed: svarūpam ittham spaṣṭīkṛtam rasanā lalanā nāḍyau avadhūtyā dakṣiṇatas rasanā

original: vāmataśca lalaneti dve nāḍyau nābhitaḥ caturaṅgulamadhaḥ viśliṣya nābhipradeśe hṛdayāśaya ( gurdā )
analyzed: vāmatas ca lalanā iti dve nāḍyau nābhitaḥ catur aṅgulam adhas viśliṣya nābhi pradeśe hṛdayāśaya gurdā
mahānāḍyā sambaddhe bhavataḥ

original: ito'gre punaḥ hṛdayasya dakṣiṇato rasanā vāmataśca lalanā sambaddhe bhavataḥ |
analyzed: itas agre punar hṛdayasya dakṣiṇatas rasanā vāmatas ca lalanā sambaddhe bhavataḥ

original: tataśca karṇapurasyādhobhāge hṛdayasya mahānāḍītaḥ saṁyukte kaṇṭhacakre sannipatataḥ |
analyzed: tatas ca karṇa purasya adhobhāge hṛdayasya mahā nāḍītaḥ sa yukte kaṇṭha cakre sannipatataḥ

original: kūkāṭikānāḍīto bhūtvā karṇasyādhobhāgīyachidrato bhūtvā vṛkṣanāḍyā saha mastiṣke satyau mūrdhnaḥ brahyarandhreṇa saṁyukte |
analyzed: kūkāṭikānāḍītaḥ bhūtvā karṇasya adhobhāgīya chidrataḥ bhūtvā vṛkṣanāḍyā saha mastiṣke satyau mūrdhnaḥ brahyarandhreṇa sayukte
evam nāḍī dvayam sarva indriya dvāreṣu vyāptam

original: viśeṣataśca nāsikāyāḥ chidradvaye ime nāḍyau ūrdhvaśikhare bhavataḥ |
analyzed: viśeṣataḥ ca nāsikāyāḥ chidra dvaye ime nāḍyau ūrdhva śikhare bhavataḥ

original: adhobhāge nāḍītraya-saṁyogena nirmitacatuṣpathena viśliṣya dakṣiṇanāḍī rasanāyāḥ nimnaśikhareṇa strīgarbhaśayastharaktasya srāvaṁ purūṣastriyoḥ  #
analyzed: adhobhāge nāḍī traya sayogena nirmita catuṣpathena viśliṣya dakṣiṇa nāḍī rasanāyāḥ nimna śikhareṇa strī garbhaśaya stha raktasya srāvam purūṣa striyoḥ
mala sa dhāraṇam tyāga kṛtyam ca sampādayati

original: lalanārasanayoḥ svarūpaviṣaye hevajratantra-pañjikāratnāvali sampuṭodayatantra-saṁvarodayatantra prabhṛtiṣu kathitaṁ-lalanā śukravāhinī,
analyzed: lalanā rasanayoḥ svarūpa viṣaye hevajra tantra pañjikā ratnāvali sampuṭodayatantra savarodayatantra prabhṛtiṣu kathita lalanā śukra vāhinī
rasanā ca rakta vāhinī

original: lalanārasane uṣṇīṣacakrādārabhya guhyendriyacakraparyantam avadhūtyā āliṅgite bhavataḥ |
analyzed: lalanā rasane uṣṇīṣa cakrāt ārabhya guhya indriya cakra paryantam avadhūtyā āliṅgite bhavataḥ

original: vāyuḥ guhyasamājasya vyākhyātantravajramālāyāḥ dvādaśapaṭale aṣṭottaraikaśataṁ vāyavo varṇitāḥ |
analyzed: vāyuḥ guhya samājasya vyākhyā tantra vajramālāyāḥ dvādaśa paṭale aṣṭottaraikaśatam vāyavaḥ varṇitāḥ

original: teṣu prāṇāpānodānasamānavyānākhyā vāyupramukhāḥ evaṁ ca nāgakūrmakṛkaradevadattadhanañjayāśca aṅgabhūtā vāyavaḥ ucyante |
analyzed: teṣu prāṇa apāna udāna samāna vyāna ākhyāḥ vāyu pramukhāḥ evam ca nāga kūrma kṛkara devadatta dhanañjayāḥ ca aṅga bhūtāḥ vāyavaḥ ucyante

original: kālacakre etādṛśavāyūnāṁ kṛtyānītthaṁ varṇitāni - prāṇo'pānaḥ samānaḥ kamalavasudale mārūtaścāpyudāno |
analyzed: kālacakre etādṛśa vāyūnām kṛtyāni ittham varṇitāni prāṇaḥ apānaḥ samānaḥ kamala vasu dale mārūtaḥ ca api udānaḥ

original: vyāno nāgaśca kūrmaḥ sakṛkarapavano devadatto dhanañjayaḥ ||
analyzed: vyānaḥ nāgaḥ ca kūrmaḥ sa kṛkara pavanaḥ devadattaḥ dhanañjayaḥ
iti ete nāḍi cakre daśavidha pavanāḥ sa sthitāḥ karma bhedāḥ
śakhinī antam tiṣ ādyam sva hṛdaya kamalam nābhi cakram samastam
prāṇaḥ prāṇam karoti arka śaśi patha gataḥ tu anna pānam samastam

original: āpāno netyadhastāt sakalarasamsamaṁ neti kāye samānaḥ ||
analyzed: āpānaḥ na iti adhastāt sakala rasam samam na iti kāye samānaḥ
kāye spandati udānaḥ mukha kara caraṇaiḥ gītā nāṭyam karoti
vyānaḥ vyādhim karoti prakṛti guṇa vaśāt gātra bhañgaḥ tathā eva
asmad śarīre mahāprāṇa vāyuḥ eva sarva anya vāyūnām mūlādhāraḥ
etad abhāve jīvanam asambhavam
hṛdaya kamala stham idam

original: pratidivasamekaḥ svasthapurūṣaḥ dvisahasrottaraikaśataṣaṭśataṁ śvāsān ucchavāsāṁśca gṛhṇāti |
analyzed: pratidivasam ekaḥ svastha purūṣaḥ dvi sahasra uttara ekaśata ṣaṭśatam śvāsān ucchavāsāḥ ca gṛhṇāti

original: etanmahāprāṇādevotpannānyavāyūnāṁ sthānabhedaṁ kṛtyabhedaṁ ca suspaṣṭayatā āryadevanāpyabhihitaṁ - apānaśca nābheradhobhāge nāḍītrayasamūhena  #
analyzed: etat mahāprāṇāt eva utpanna anya vāyūnām sthāna bhedam kṛtya bhedam ca su spaṣṭayatā āryadevanā api abhihitam apānaḥ ca nābheḥ adhobhāge nāḍī traya samūhena
piṇḍīkṛta sthāne tiṣṭhati

original: idaṁ ca malamūtraśukraśoṇitakaṣāyarasādidhātūn visarjayati niḥsaraṇaṁ saṁkalanaṁ ca vidadhāti |
analyzed: idam ca mala mūtra śukra śoṇita kaṣāya rasa ādi dhātūn visarjayati niḥsaraṇam sa kalanam ca vidadhāti
samāna vāyuḥ tiṣṭhati
yathā mālyakāraḥ kūpa jalena vṛkṣa pādapān siñcati
tathā eva sarva anna pacanam kaṣāya rasa pārthakyam ca vidadhāti
sarva rasān nāḍī sthānam prāpayya śarīram poṣayati
udāna vāyuḥ kaṇṭha cakre avatiṣṭhate

original: ayaṁ ca mukta- pīta-pārthakyaṁ sampādayati saṅgītaceṣṭāpi anenaiva vāyunā bhavati |
analyzed: ayam ca sampādayati saṅgīta ceṣṭā api anena eva vāyunā bhavati
vyāna vāyuḥ ca sarva aṅge granthiṣu ca avatiṣṭhate
etat vāyoḥ tu mukhyam kṛtyam dehe śakti prasāraṇām
vimalaprabhāyām api asya sthāna kṛtyānām varṇanam avāpyate

original: nimnaśloke atisaṁkṣepeṇa etasthānānāṁ varṇanaṁ labhyate - hṛdi prāṇo gude'pānaḥ samāno nābhisaṁsthitaḥ |
analyzed: nimna śloke ati sa kṣepeṇa eta sthānānām varṇanam labhyate hṛdi prāṇaḥ gude apānaḥ samānaḥ nābhi sasthitaḥ
udānaḥ kaṇṭha deśa sthaḥ
vyānaḥ sarva śari ragaḥ
nāga kūrma ādi aga vāyavaḥ cara vicara samyakcara pracara nicara ādi nāmabhiḥ api ucyante
pañca indriya jñānāni utpādayati

original: pañcakrame'pi vāyunā sūkṣmarūpeṇa jñānaṁ saṁmiśratāṁ gatam |
analyzed: pañca krame api vāyunā sūkṣma rūpeṇa jñānam samiśra tām gatam
niḥsṛtya indriya mārgebhyaḥ viṣayān avalambate

original: etatpañcāṅgavāyūnāṁ sthānakṛtyādīni saṁkṣepeṇettham-nāgavāyuḥ dakṣiṇabāhumūlasya nāḍīdalaṁ prāpya saṁcarate |
analyzed: etat pañcāṅga vāyūnām sthāna kṛtya ādīni sa kṣepeṇa ittham nāga vāyuḥ dakṣiṇa bāhumūlasya nāḍī dalam prāpya sacarate
etat nāḍyāḥ śikharam ekam cakṣuṣi sayunakti
rūpa grahaṇam ca kṛtyam asya
kūrma vāyuḥ hṛdayasya pṛṣṭha bhāga stha jayā nāḍī dalena sacalati
etat eva śikharam karṇayoḥ nidadhāti
etat vāyoḥ tu mukhya kṛtyam śabda grahaṇam
kṛkara vāyuḥ vāma bāhu mūla skandha sthita nāḍī dala ambuṣā sacarati
nāsikāyām ekaḥ bhāgaḥ tiṣṭhati
gandha grahaṇam ca mukhya kṛtyam

original: devadattavāyuḥ hṛdayasya vāmadiśā lalanānāḍyā meṣalagnanāḍyā ca saṁcarati |
analyzed: devadatta vāyuḥ hṛdayasya vāma diśā lalanā nāḍyā meṣa lagna nāḍyā ca sacarati
etat śikharam ekam jihvā agre tiṣṭhati
rasa ādānam ca mukhya kṛtyam jṛmbhaṇam ca
dhanañjayavāyuḥ vāma stanasya kuhūnāḍyā sacarati

original: etannāḍyā śikharam upajihvāyāḥ madhye romṇaśca sarvachidreṣu tiṣṭhati |
analyzed: etat nāḍyā śikharam upajihvāyāḥ madhye romṇaḥ ca sarva chidreṣu tiṣṭhati

original: sparśādānaṁ ca mukhyakṛtyam mṛtaśarīre'pi kiñcitkālaṁ tiṣṭhati |
analyzed: sparśa ādānam ca mukhya kṛtyam mṛta śarīre api kiñcitkālam tiṣṭhati
upari varṇitā sarva vāyavaḥ mahāprāṇa vāyoḥ eva aṅga bhūtāḥ
deśa kṛtya bhedena pṛthak nāmāni dattāni

original: śvāsa-praśvāsakāle evaṁ vihāya caturvāyavaḥ nāsikāyāḥ dakṣiṇe vāme ca pṛthak pṛthak chidrebhyaḥ vahanti |
analyzed: śvāsa praśvāsa kāle evam vihāya catur vāyavaḥ nāsikāyāḥ dakṣiṇe vāme ca pṛthak pṛthak chidrebhyaḥ vahanti

original: vyākhyātantravajramālāyāṁ pañcatathāgata-pañcavarṇa-pañcadhātubhiḥ saha etadvarṇanamitthamakāri- nāsāgre sarvapaṁ nāma prāṇāyāmasya kalpanā
analyzed: vyākhyā tantra vajramālāyām pañca tathāgata pañca varṇa pañca dhātubhiḥ saha etat varṇanam ittham akāri nāsā agre sarvapam nāma prāṇāyāmasya kalpanā
prāṇāyāma sthitāḥ pañca raśmayaḥ buddha bhāvataḥ
ūrdhvam prāṇāt viniṣkrāntau

original: adhaśceti caturdhā syād balo ādhyātmikaḥ smṛtaḥ ||
analyzed: adhas ca iti caturdhā syāt ādhyātmikaḥ smṛtaḥ
kaṇṭha hṛd nābhi guhya abje gati agatī vinirdiśet
vairocana svabhāvaḥ asau mṛta kāyāḥ dvi niścaret

original: itthamatra pañcapradhānavāyu-pañcāṅgavāyu-varṇanena sākam idaṁ pratyapādi-etatsarvāṇi ekasyaiva pradhānaprāṇavāyoraṅgāni |
analyzed: ittham atra pañca pradhāna vāyu pañca aṅga vāyu varṇanena sākam idam pratyapādi etat sarvāṇi ekasya eva pradhāna prāṇa vāyoḥ aṅgāni
etad bhāvanā vidhiḥ agre vāyu yoge athavā caṇḍālī yoge kathayiṣyate
tilakam tilakasya arthaḥ mahā sukham tad hetuḥ ca
bheda trayam asya mūla niṣprapañca tilakam
mantra vāyu tilakam ca
cittasya prabhāsvara tā eva sa bhoga kāya cintanena etad ābhāsaḥ api jāyate

original: yathā ca sarvadharmāṇāṁ svabhāve-viśleṣite sati niḥsvabhāvaśūnyatāprāptiḥ dharmakāyasya lakṣaṇam |
analyzed: yathā ca sarva dharmāṇām svabhāve viśleṣite sati niḥsvabhāva śūnyatā prāptiḥ dharmakāyasya lakṣaṇam

original: prabhāsvare sthite sati bāhyābhyantaradhūmakhadyotacandrādīnāmābhāsaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṁ prabhāsvarasvarūpatvaṁ saṁbhogakāyaṁ lakṣayati |
analyzed: prabhāsvare sthite sati bāhya abhyantara dhūma khadyota candra ādīnām ābhāsaḥ sarva dharmāṇām prabhāsvara sva rūpa tvam sa bhoga kāyam lakṣayati
ṣaṣ indriyaiḥ sva viṣayāṇām anirūddha sva rūpa grahaṇam nirmāṇa kāyasya lakṣaṇam

original: 2. niṣprapañcatilakāvasthāyāṁ śukraśoṇitavāyusaṁsargeṇa śukraṁ grāhakatvena śoṇitaṁ ca grāhyatvena samutpadya viṣaya-viṣayibhāvaṁ gṛhṇāti,
analyzed: niṣprapañca tilaka avasthāyām śukra śoṇita vāyu sasargeṇa śukram grāhaka tvena śoṇitam ca grāhya tvena samutpadya viṣaya viṣayi bhāvam gṛhṇāti
yat ca bhrānti avidyā janitam asti

original: yato hi etad svabhāvenādvayaṁ sadapi dvaitaṁ gṛhṇāti |
analyzed: yatas hi etat svabhāvena advayam sat api dvaitam gṛhṇāti

original: bandhanakārakaṁ dravyaṁ mantraṁ vāyutilakaṁ ca pariśodhya- pariśodhakarūpeṇa vibhajya bhedaṣaṭkaṁ sampādyate |
analyzed: bandhana kārakam dravyam mantram vāyu tilakam ca pariśodhya pariśodhaka rūpeṇa vibhajya bheda ṣaṭkam sampādyate

original: avidyāsaṁskāravijñānaiḥ parikalpya vedanāsaṁskārasaṁjñāvijñānāni iti nāmasu parivartya nāmārthobhayagrāhakaṁ pariśodhyādhāramantratilakaṁ vidyate
analyzed: avidyā saskāra vijñānaiḥ parikalpya vedanā saskāra sajñā vijñānāni iti nāmasu parivartya nāma artha ubhaya grāhakam pariśodhya ādhāra mantra tilakam vidyate
etat pariśodhya ādhāra nāma arthayoḥ deva bhāvanā mantra japa ādibhiḥ pariśodhanam bhavati
atas eva pariśodhaka mantra tilakam idam nigadyate

original: ālambanapratyayādhipatipratyayasamanantarapratyayeti pratyayatrayeṇa paratantraṁ cittaṁ cañcalaṁ bhavati viṣayānapi gṛhṇāti |
analyzed: ālambana pratyaya adhipati pratyaya samanantara pratyaya iti pratyaya trayeṇa paratantram cittam cañcalam bhavati viṣayān api gṛhṇāti
idam vāyu kṛta pariśodhyam vāyutilakam

original: pañcendriyāṇāṁ viṣayarūpeṇa pratibhāsamānaiḥ śabdarūpaskandhādibhiḥ saṁgṛhītaśukraśoṇitaṁ pañcadhātupariśodhyaṁ dravyatilakam |
analyzed: pañca indriyāṇām viṣaya rūpeṇa pratibhāsamānaiḥ śabda rūpa skandha ādibhiḥ sa gṛhīta śukra śoṇitam pañca dhātu pariśodhyam dravya tilakam
dravya tilaka pariśodhakeṣu pratipakṣa tilakeṣu dvādaśa rasāḥ
caturviśatiḥ kaṣāyāḥ ca iti militvā ṣaḍtriśat pramukhāḥ ca
pañca pradhāna vāyu sa sargeṇa pañca tilakāni
pañca aṅga vāyu sa sargeṇa ūrdhva adhobhāga stha candra sūrya gata tilakam ca sametya dvādaśa rasa tilakāni
caturviśati pīṭha sthāneṣu kaṣāya tilakam ca avatiṣṭhante

original: yathā ca saṁvarodayatantre- pulliramalaye śirasi nakhadantavahāsthitā |
analyzed: yathā ca sa vara udaya tantre pulliḥ amalaye śirasi nakha dantavahā āsthitā
jālandhara śikhā sthāne keśa roma samāvahā
kulatā jānu dvayoḥ sthitvā

original: etadatiriktaṁ śarīre yāvatyo nāḍyastāsu kaṇe kaṇe'pi dravyatilakaṁ samāviśati |
analyzed: etat atiriktam śarīre yāvatyaḥ nāḍyaḥ tāsu kaṇe kaṇe api dravya tilakam samāviśati
tatra ca anuttara tantra yoginaḥ sādhanāka indram mātṛ labdha rakta tilakam

original: yacca nābhikṣetrāccaturaṅgulamadhaḥ lalanārasanayormelanasthāne madhyamānāḍyāḥ adhobhāge'plutā-kārastham ūrdhvoṣṇīṣakamalasthaṁ ca vidyate
analyzed: yat ca nābhi kṣetrāt catur aṅgulam adhas lalanā rasanayoḥ melana sthāne madhyamā nāḍyāḥ adhobhāge apluta ākāra stham ūrdhva uṣṇīṣa kamala stham ca vidyate
jñāna udaya tantre ca api nirmāṇa cakra madhya sthā prajñā varṇa agra rūpiṇī
vidyut śaṭā viṣa tantu vat
vibhāvya utthāpayet mantrī sat gurū upadiśet

original: sāratastu madhyamānāḍī- anāhatavāyu-niṣprapañcatilaketi etattrayaṁ kṛtya-vaibhinyāt pṛthak nirūpitam |
analyzed: sāratas tu madhyamā nāḍī anāhata vāyu niṣprapañca tilakā iti etat trayam kṛtya vaibhinyāt pṛthak nirūpitam

original: tattvatastu etatsarvaṁ nijacittaṁ sahajajñānaṁ prabhāsvarā vā santi |
analyzed: tattvataḥ tu etat sarvam nija cittam sahaja jñānam prabhāsvarāḥ vā santi
yat ca ādi anta rahitam
etat nāḍī etad artham ucyate yat prāṇinām mahāprāṇa āśrayam idam
etad abhāve madhyamā lalanā rasanāḥ ca iti nāḍīnām utattiḥ eva asambhavā
etasmāt eva śūnya sva rūpa madhyamā nāḍī āliṅgita rasanā lalanā prabhṛtayaḥ prādurbhavanti
etat eva anāhatavāyuḥ api
yatas ca vāyuḥ cittena saha abhinnaḥ bhavati
cittam
śāśvat kṣaya uccheda virahitāḥ imāḥ
atas tad abhinnaḥ vāyuḥ api citta sadṛśaḥ
etena eva ayam anāhatavāyuḥ api ucyate

original: mahāmurātilake'bhihitaṁ yat prabhāsvaracittena saha pañcaraśmivān vāyurabhinnarūpena tiṣṭhati |
analyzed: mahāmurātilake abhihitam yat prabhāsvara cittena saha pañca raśmivān vāyuḥ abhinna rūpena tiṣṭhati
etasmāt eva vāyu agni jala kṣiti prabhṛtayaḥ krameṇa utpadyante
pañca raśmayaḥ pañca bhūta dhātu vat pratīyante
prabhāsvarāt anāhatavāyoḥ ca eva sṛṣṭiḥ bhavati
niṣprapañca prabhāsvareṇa saha vāyoḥ abhinna tvena eva tatra gatiḥ āyāti
gateḥ eva jagat sṛjayte

original: adya vaijñānikānām aṇupadārthaviśleṣaṇāvadhau jñāyate yat te'pi proṭona nyūṭrona-ilekṭronataraṅgeṣu tadapi mahāśūnyatvena prāpnuvanti |
analyzed: adya vaijñānikānām aṇu padārtha viśleṣaṇa avadhau jñāyate yat te api proṭona nyūṭrona elekṭrona taraṅgeṣu tat api mahā śūnyatvena prāpnuvanti

original: mahāśūnyamidamabhāvātmakaṁ na śakyaṁ yataḥ abhāvāt kadāpi bhāvotpattirna jātā |
analyzed: mahāśūnyam idam abhāva ātmakam na śakyam yatas abhāvāt kadāpi bhāva utpattiḥ na jātā

original: ato mahāśūnyacetanā'pīyaṁ sūkṣmavāyorabhinnā'pi yataścaitasyai gatiṁ pradadāti jagaccotpādayati |
analyzed: atas mahāśūnya cetanā api iyam sūkṣma vāyoḥ abhinnā api yatas ca etasyai gatim pradadāti jagat ca utpādayati
ittham jagat prabhāsvaraḥ ca abhinnaḥ eva
etad abhāve tantra śāstra avasthitiḥ eva asambhāvyā
nāma saṅgītau api vāyuḥ ayam śvāsa praśvāsa samaya ghaṇṭā daṇḍa lagna svara vyañjana ādi sarva akṣarāṇām srotaḥ samabhihitaḥ

original: naitāvadevāpi tu samyaksambodhirapi asmādeva vāyorūtpanna iti varṇitam |
analyzed: na etāvat evā api tu samyaksambodhiḥ api asmāt eva vāyoḥ utpannaḥ iti varṇitam
ayam etad sarvasya utsaḥ abhilāpa āśrayaḥ ca san na api svayam anabhilāpyaḥ anutpādaḥ ca varīvarti
tat yathā bhagavān sambuddhaḥ akāra sambhavaḥ
akāraḥ sarva varṇa gyraḥ mahā arthaḥ parama akṣaraḥ
mahā prāṇaḥ hi anutpādaḥ vāc udāhāra varjitaḥ

original: vasantatilakaṭīkārahasyadīpikāyāmapi ' a ' ityakṣarānuśaṁsāviṣaye samabhi-hitam-akāra ityādi mahārtha iti ādyanutpannatattvasūcakatvāt |
analyzed: vasantatilaka ṭīkā rahasyadīpikāyām api samabhihita makāraḥ ityādi mahārthaḥ iti ādi anutpanna tattva sūcaka tvāt
varṇanāyakaḥ iti
anena eva teṣām prāṇi tvāt

original: ye ca dehināṁ sādhakānāṁ vā ye mantrā vākyāni pramāṇavādīni vā tata eva jātā utpannā |
analyzed: ye ca dehinām sādhakānām vā ye mantrāḥ vākyāni pramāṇa vādīni vā tatas eva jātā utpannā

original: evaṁ sarva eva sattvā mantraparāyaṇāḥ svabhāveneti sthitam |
analyzed: evam sarve eva sattvāḥ mantra parāyaṇāḥ svabhāvena iti sthitam

original: yāvad abhinnasvarūpoktatrayasya vastusthitiḥ samyag na jñāsyate tāvad niṣpannakramasādhanā na sambhāvyate |
analyzed: yāvat abhinna sva rūpa ukta trayasya vastu sthitiḥ samyak na jñāsyate tāvat niṣpanna krama sādhanā na sambhāvyate
atas eva sa kṣepeṇa etad paricayaḥ prādāyi

original: pitṛtantrasya niṣpannakramaḥ niṣpannakramabhāvanāyāṁ pitṛtantra-mātṛtantra-advayatantrāṇāṁ bhedena bhāvanāvidhāvapi kācid bhinnatā'valokyate
analyzed: pitṛ tantrasya niṣpanna kramaḥ niṣpanna krama bhāvanāyām pitṛ tantra mātṛ tantra advaya tantrāṇām bhedena bhāvanā vidhau api kācid bhinna tā avalokyate

original: pitṛtantre vineyajanānāṁ kulabhedenāpi punaḥ sādhanāyāṁ alpādhikā bhedā dṛśyante |
analyzed: pitṛ tantre vineya janānām kula bhedena api punar sādhanāyām alpa adhikāḥ bhedāḥ dṛśyante

original: yadyapi pitṛtantrapradhānagranthasya guhyasamājasya naike sādhanā-vidhayaḥ paramparāśca,
analyzed: yadi api pitṛtantra pradhāna granthasya guhya samājasya nā eke sādhanā vidhayaḥ paramparāḥ ca
teṣu nāgārjunasya ārya āmnāyaḥ jñānapāda āmnāyaḥ ca pramukhatamaḥ asti
ārya āmnāyaḥ etad āmnāya anusāram guhya samāja mūla tantrasya ṣaṣṭha paricchede mantra nidhi apti kāyena
vācā manasi coditaḥ
sādhayet pravarām siddhi
manaḥ santoṣaṇa priyām

original: etat ślokamādhārīkṛtya ' mantranidhyapti' ityataḥ vāgvivekasya kāyataḥ vajrajāpasādhanāyāḥ ādhārībhūtanirmāṇakāyaḥ gṛhyate |
analyzed: etat ślokam ādhārīkṛtya ityatas vāc vivekasya kāyataḥ vajra jāpa sādhanāyāḥ ādhārībhūta nirmāṇa kāyaḥ gṛhyate

original: ataḥ etena kāyavivekaḥ kāyadvārā ca vajrajāpaṁ vidhāya vāgvivekaprāptyā hṛdayasthavajrasatvasya codanena yogi-cittasantatau pravara-ityādicatuḥsiddhayo  #
analyzed: atas etena kāya vivekaḥ kāya dvārā ca vajra jāpam vidhāya vāc viveka prāptyā hṛdaya stha vajra satvasya codanena yogi citta santatau
labhyante
pravara vajra jāpena parivartanam citta vivekaḥ asti

manaḥ santoṣaḥ ca māyā kāyasya pariśuddhiḥ paramārtha prabhāsvarā
priyam iti yuga naddha vajradhara kāyaḥ
caryā melāpe āryadevaḥ niṣpanna kramam krama ṣaṭke sannihitam manyate

original: ācāryanāgārjunaḥ guhyasamājīyavyākhyātantravajramālāyāḥ vacanamudhṛtya nikhilānuttaratantrasya niṣpannakramasādhanāṁ pañcakrameṣu saṁgṛhṇāti
analyzed: ācārya nāgārjunaḥ guhyasamājīya vyākhyā tantra vajramālāyāḥ vacanam udhṛtya nikhila anuttara tantrasya niṣpanna krama sādhanām pañcakrameṣu sa gṛhṇāti
utpatti krame ca pṛthak piṇḍa artham racayāmāsa

original: sa tu kāyaviveka-vajrajāpavāgvivekayoḥ kāṁścidaṁśānapi utpattikramāṅgatvena manyate |
analyzed: sa tu kāya viveka vajra jāpa vāc vivekayoḥ kāścid aśān api utpatti krama aṅga tvena manyate
atas niṣpanna krame vāc viveka kramaḥ citta viveka kramaḥ
svādhiṣṭhānam
māyā kāya kramaḥ
advaya jñānam ca arthāt yuga naddha satya dvaya kramaḥ ca ete pañca kramāḥ gaṇyante

vajra jāpaḥ su śikṣyate

yuga naddha samādhi sthaḥ
na kiñcid śikṣate punar

original: candrakīrtiprabhṛtividvāṁsaḥ anuttaratantrasya utpattikrama-niṣpannakrameti dvayaṁ pañcakramasaṁgṛhītammatvā kāyavivekena sahaiva vāgvivekaṁ  #
analyzed: candrakīrti prabhṛti vidvāsaḥ anuttara tantrasya utpatti krama niṣpanna krama iti dvayam kāya vivekena saha eva vāc vivekam

original: vajrajāpakramaṁ cāpi cittā-lambanasya cittavivekasyaiva ca pūrvāvasthāmmanyante |
analyzed: vajra jāpa kramam ca api citta ālambanasya citta vivekasya eva ca pūrva avasthām manyante
etad matena niṣpanna krama mūla sādhanāyām citta vivekasya eva prathama sthānam vartate
atra ca vajra jāpaḥ cittaviveke
ittham atra utpatti krama citta viveka krama savṛti māyā kāya krama paramārtha prabhāsvara krama yuga naddha satya dvaya krama iti pañca kramāḥ

original: munidatta- abhayākaraguptādimatena cittālambanasādhanāyā ādhāraḥ vajrajāpaḥ ataḥ cittavivekāpekṣayā vajrajāpavāgvivekasyātra prāmukhyam |
analyzed: munidatta abhayākaragupta ādi matena citta ālambana sādhanāyāḥ ādhāraḥ vajra jāpaḥ atas citta viveka apekṣayā vajra jāpa vāc vivekasya atra prāmukhyam
atas citta vivekasya sthāne vāc vivekāya sthānam pradattam
etat asamāna tā mūle vistāra sagrahayoḥ pravṛtti mātra tā eva
vastutas atra abhimata siddhāntasya avirodhi tvam
aparatas ca niṣpanna krama sādhanā ṣaḍaṅga yoge api sa gṛhyate

original: mūlatantrasya dvādaśaparicchede ' atha vajracatuṣkoṇe sevākāryā dṛdavrataiḥ ' iti viṣaye uttaratantre varṇitaṁ - sevā ṣaḍaṅgayogena kṛtvā sādhanamuttamam
analyzed: mūlatantrasya dvādaśa paricchede ' atha vajra catuṣkoṇe sevā kāryā dṛda vrataiḥ iti viṣaye uttara tantre varṇitam sevā ṣaḍaṅga yogena kṛtvā sādhanam uttamam
sādhayet anyathā nā eva jāyate siddhiḥ uttamā
pratyāhāraḥ tathā dhyānam prāṇāyāmaḥ atha dhāraṇā
anusmṛtiḥ samādhiḥ ca ṣaṣ aṅgaḥ yogaḥ ucyate

original: svarūpataḥ ime ṣaḍyogā api pañcakrame saṁgṛhyante |
analyzed: svarūpataḥ ime ṣaṣ yogāḥ api pañca krame sa gṛhyante
yathā kāya viveke pratyāhāra dhyāne

original: vāgviveke prāṇāyāmaḥ prabhāsvare ca dhāraṇāyuganaddhe anusmṛtiḥ samādhiśca |
analyzed: vāc viveke prāṇāyāmaḥ prabhāsvare ca dhāraṇā yuga naddhe anusmṛtiḥ samādhiḥ ca
kramaḥ api niyataḥ eteṣām
yatas hi pūrva sādhana abhāve ānupūrveṇa na utpadyante

original: yathā ca aśaikṣikayuganaddhasya prāptyai śaikṣikayuganaddhasya pūrvasthitirapekṣyate |
analyzed: yathā ca aśaikṣika yuga naddhasya prāptyai śaikṣika yuga naddhasya pūrva sthitiḥ apekṣyate
tathā eva śaikṣika yuga naddha prāptyai māyā kāyaḥ paramārtha prabhāsvaraḥ ca apekṣyete
śūnyatāyāḥ sākṣātkāraḥ tu sāmānya māyā kāya pariyāna ntaram eva jāyate
atas māyā kāya vāptiḥ tu apekṣyate

original: etat prāptuṁ mṛtyukālasadṛśaṁ vāyuṁ hṛdayakamalasthe anāhatabindau vilīya upamāprabhāsvaraprāptiṁ kuryāt |
analyzed: etat prāptum mṛtyu kāla sadṛśam vāyum hṛdaya kamala sthe anāhata bindau vilīya upamā prabhāsvara prāptim kuryāt

original: etadarthaṁ prāṇāyāmena vajrajāpena ca hṛdayakamalasya nāḍīgranthirbhedyā |
analyzed: etad artham prāṇāyāmena vajra jāpena ca hṛdaya kamalasya nāḍī granthiḥ bhedyā
etad artham sūkṣma kāya viveka yoga dvārā avadhūteḥ adhobhāga sthe nāḍī cakre vāyu sagraha ādi vidheḥ
pūrva abhyāsaḥ apekṣyate
niṣpanna kramasya kāya viveka prāptyai sampūrṇa utpatti krama abhyāsaḥ apekṣyate
ittham pūrva sādhana abhāve uttara uttaram sādhana asiddhiḥ na sambhāvyate

original: pañcakramasya kāyavivekādi-bhāvanāvidhinā lakṣaṇabheda-vyutpatti-sādhanāvidhi-bhiḥ avagaterūdagatau parivartanavidhiprabhṛtibhedaiḥ pañcabhāgeṣu  #
analyzed: pañca kramasya kāya viveka ādi bhāvanā vidhinā lakṣaṇa bheda vyutpatti sādhanā vidhibhiḥ avagateḥ ūdagatau parivartana vidhi prabhṛti bhedaiḥ pañca bhāgeṣu
vibhajyate

original: kāyavivekaḥ vikalpenānutpanno mahāsukhaśūnyasvabhāve manasi samudito devakāya eva kāyavivekaḥ |
analyzed: kāya vivekaḥ vikalpena anutpannaḥ mahā sukha śūnya svabhāve manasi samuditaḥ devakāyaḥ eva kāya vivekaḥ
śata kula mudrita kāya viveka pañca kula mudrita kāya viveka tri kula mudrita mahā guhyaḥ eka kula mudrita iti caturvidhaḥ
kāya vivekaḥ sva rūpa gata samāhita pṛṣṭha labdhayoḥ bhedena dvividhaḥ
pañca skandha dhātu catuṣṭaya ṣaṣ indriya pañca viṣayāṇām ābhyantara bheda prabhṛtibhiḥ śatam bhedāḥ bhavanti

original: yathā ca pañcaskandhamāśritya kāyavivekaviṣaye guhyasamāje mūlatantre pratyapādi - pañcaskandhāḥ samāsena pañcabuddhāḥ prakīrtitāḥ ||
analyzed: yathā ca pañca skandham āśritya kāya viveka viṣaye guhya samāje mūla tantre pratyapādi pañca skandhāḥ samāsena pañca buddhāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: punaḥ skandhasya bāhyābhyantaralaghudīrghākāraśvetaraktaprabhṛtivarṇabhedena ekaskandhasyāpi pañca bhedā bhavanti |
analyzed: punar skandhasya bāhya abhyantara laghu dīrgha ākāra śveta rakta prabhṛti varṇa bhedena eka skandhasya api pañca bhedāḥ bhavanti
vedanā skadhā ādeḥ api sukha duḥkha upekṣā vāta pitta ādi bhedaiḥ pañca bhedāḥ kriyante

original: caturdhātusvarūpakāyavivekapratipādanaprasaṅge tatraivoktam - pṛthvī locanā khyātā abdhāturmāmakī smṛtā |
analyzed: catur dhātu svarūpa kāya viveka pratipādana prasaṅge tatra eva uktam pṛthvī locanā khyātā ap dhātuḥ māmakī smṛtā
pāṇḍara ākhyā bhavet tejaḥ
vāyuḥ tārā prakīrtitā

original: pṛthivīdhātorapi keśāsthiromanakhādibhedān vidhāya devīrūpaṁ bhāvayituṁ saṁkīrtitam |
analyzed: pṛthivī dhātoḥ api keśa asthi roma nakha ādi bhedān vidhāya devī rūpam bhāvayitum sa kīrtitam
tathā eva sajñā saskāra ādi skandhāḥ agni ap dhātu prabhṛtayaḥ api avagantavyāḥ
ṣaṣ indriya kāya viveka bhāvanā vidhi pratipādana avasare guhya samāje vajra āyatanāni eva bodhisatva āgyra maṇḍalam iti
kāya viveka ādhāra bhūteṣu ṣaṣ indriyeṣu
cakṣuṣaḥ kṣiti garbha tva

original: karṇasya vajrapāṇitvaṁ nāsāyā ākāśagarbhatvaṁ jihvāyā lokeśvaratvaṁ kāyadhātu-sarvāvaraṇaviṣkambhaka-trijñānasamūhasya manaso vā mañjuśrīrityākhyam
analyzed: karṇasya vajra pāṇi tvam nāsāyāḥ ākāśa garbha tvam jihvāyāḥ loka īśvara tvam kāya dhātu sarva āvaraṇa viṣkambhaka tri jñāna samūhasya manasaḥ vā mañjuśrīḥ ityākhyam
ittham ṣaḍ indriyāṇi bodhisattva rūpāṇi santi

bāhya sthūladhātūnām laya vidhiḥ ayam
tatas ca ābhyantara sūkṣmayoḥ layaḥ
ayam eva tri jñānasya laya kālaḥ

original: etatkramaḥ svarūpañcettham - ālokajñānam sarvavāyavo hṛdayakamalasthacitte līyante |
analyzed: etat kramaḥ svarūpam ca ittham āloka jñānam sarva vāyavaḥ hṛdaya kamala stha citte līyante

original: tadanu uṣṇīṣasthaṁ pitṛlabdhaṁ śvetaśukraṁ madhyamānāḍīmārgato hṛdayakamalaṁ praviśati |
analyzed: tadanu uṣṇīṣa stham pitṛ labdham śveta śukram madhyamā nāḍī mārgataḥ hṛdaya kamalam praviśati

original: tadānīṁ citte śaradṛtucandraprakāśena prakīrṇākāśavad ābhāsate dveṣasambaddhāstrastriṁśad vikalpāḥ nirūdhyante |
analyzed: tadānīm citte śarad ṛtu candra prakāśena prakīrṇa ākāśa vat ābhāsate dveṣa sambaddha astraḥ triśat vikalpāḥ nirūdhyante
tad kāle āloka ābhāsa atiriktam na anyaḥ kaścana ābhāsaḥ bhavati
āloka ābhāsaḥ ayam eva yat ca āloka jñāna śūnyatayoḥ a dvasthitiḥ

original: ālokābhāsajñānam māturlabdhaṁ raktaṁ madhyamānāḍyā mādhyamenādhobhāgataḥ ūrdhvaṁ prati saṁvardhya hṛdayakamalaṁ prāpnoti |
analyzed: āloka ābhāsa jñānam mātuḥ labdham raktam madhyamā nāḍyā mādhyamena adhobhāgataḥ ūrdhvam prati savardhya hṛdaya kamalam prāpnoti

original: tadā citte sūryaprakāśena vyāptākāśasamaṁ raktaṁ ālokābhāsajñānaṁ samudeti |
analyzed: tadā citte sūrya prakāśena vyāpta ākāśa samam raktam āloka ābhāsa jñānam samudeti
yat ca ati śūnyatayā saha advaya bhāvam sthāpayati

original: tadānīṁ citte raktālokābhāsātiriktaṁ kimapi na bhavati |
analyzed: tadānīm citte rakta āloka ābhāsa atiriktam kim api na bhavati
idam eva āloka ābhāsa jñānam

original: idānīṁ rāgasambaddhāḥ sarve'pi catvāriṁśad vikalpāḥ naśyanti |
analyzed: idānīm rāga sambaddhāḥ sarve api catvāriśat vikalpāḥ naśyanti
āloka upalabdha jñānam śukra śoṇitayoḥ anāhata bindau prabhāsvare

original: vilaye sati prabhāsvarasya prabhāsamakṣaṁ kṣaṇamekaṁ sādhakasya citte viṣayasyāspaṣṭaḥ ābhāso jāyate |
analyzed: vilaye sati prabhāsvarasya prabhā samakṣam kṣaṇam ekam sādhakasya citte viṣayasya aspaṣṭaḥ ābhāsaḥ jāyate
asyām avasthāyām cittamātrasya eva aspaṣṭaḥ ābhāsaḥ bhavati
mahāśūnyatayā ca sākam tad advaya bhāvam prāpnoti
iyam eva sthitiḥ āloka upalabdha jñānasya
moha sambaddhāḥ vikalpāḥ asyām avasthāyām nirūdhyante

original: prabhāsvaraḥ upari varṇite trijñānasvarūpe tatkrame ca jñānatrayasya sidhau satyāṁ prabhāsvarapadopalabdhimārgaḥ udghaṭate |
analyzed: prabhāsvaraḥ upari varṇite tri jñāna svarūpe tad krame ca jñāna trayasya sidhau satyām prabhāsvara pada upalabdhi mārgaḥ udghaṭate
āloka upalabdha padasya upalabdha arthaḥ eva prabhāsvara naikaṭya āptiḥ
upalabdha kṣaṇa anantaram dvitīya kṣaṇe prabhāsvara jñānam viṣaya viṣayi sarva dharma śūnyatayā advayam jāyate

original: ayaṁ mātṛ-prabhāsvaraḥ tena ca kṛtaḥ prabhāsvarapada-sākṣātkāraḥ mātṛvad vartate |
analyzed: ayam mātṛ prabhāsvaraḥ tena ca kṛtaḥ prabhāsvara pada sākṣātkāraḥ mātṛ vat vartate

original: sādhakaḥ svajīvanakāle madhyamānāḍī-sahāyatayā vāyoḥ praveśasthityutthāpanādikaṁ kṛtvā trijñānaṁ prakāśya taddvārā śūnyatāṁ sākṣātkurūte |
analyzed: sādhakaḥ sva jīvana kāle madhyamā nāḍī sahāya tayā vāyoḥ praveśa sthiti utthāpana ādikam kṛtvā trijñānam prakāśya tad dvārā śūnyatām sākṣātkurūte

original: sa eva mṛtyukāle udeṣyamāṇalakṣaṇāni krameṇa paricinvan dharmakāyasthaḥ bhavati |
analyzed: saḥ eva mṛtyu kāle udeṣyamāṇa lakṣaṇāni krameṇa paricinvan dharmakāyasthaḥ bhavati
atra śūnyatā svarūpa citta ādhāraḥ vāyuḥ eva
ālokasya svādhāraḥ vāyu sahita śūnyatvam vartate
iyam eva śūnyatā
idam eva advaya āloka jñānam
tathā eva āloka ābhāsa advayam
vidyate

original: prabhāsvaro'yaṁ viṣaya-viṣayibhedena dvividhaḥ sarvaśūnyatā hi viṣayaprabhāsvaraḥ sarvaśūnyatāyāḥ svaviṣayavidhāyakaṁ jñānaṁ viṣayi-prabhāsvaro  #
analyzed: prabhāsvaraḥ ayam viṣaya viṣayi bhedena dvividhaḥ sarva śūnyatā hi viṣaya prabhāsvaraḥ sarva śūnyatāyāḥ sva viṣaya vidhāyakam jñānam viṣayi prabhāsvaraḥ
vidyate

original: mudrāśabdābhiprāyastu hevajratantre- vajreṇa mudrayate'nena mudrā tenābhidhīyate ||
analyzed: mudrā śabda abhiprāyaḥ tu hevajratantre vajreṇa mudrayate anena mudrā tena abhidhīyate
mudrā ca dvividhā karmamudrā
yat karmaṇā utpanna keśa stana ādi yukta tā sā karma mudrā

original: jñānamudrā ca yad jñānamātreṇa nirmitā syāt |
analyzed: jñāna mudrā ca yat jñāna mātreṇa nirmitā syāt
ābhyantara sādhana aṅgam prāṇāyāmaḥ eva

original: tadupari piṇḍakramasya anubhedana- kramasya ca bhāvanā kriyate |
analyzed: tad upari piṇḍa kramasya anubhedana kramasya ca bhāvanā kriyate

original: pañcakrame etat spaṣṭīkriyate- prāptopadeśakaḥ śiṣyo dvidhā yogam athābhyaset |
analyzed: pañca krame etat spaṣṭīkriyate prāpta upadeśakaḥ śiṣyaḥ dvidhā yogam atha abhyaset
piṇḍa grāha krameṇa eva tathā ca eva anubhedataḥ
śirasaḥ pādataḥ vā api yāvat hṛdayam āgataḥ

original: bhūtakoṭiṁ viśed yogī piṇḍagrāha iti smṛtaḥ ||
analyzed: bhūtakoṭim viśet yogī piṇḍagrāhaḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: sthāvaraṁ jaṅgamaṁ caiva pūrvaṁ kṛtvā prabhāsvaram |
analyzed: sthāvaram jaṅgamam ca eva pūrvam kṛtvā prabhāsvaram
paścāt kuryāt tathā ātmānam anubheda kramaḥ hi ayam
śvāsa vātaḥ yathā ādarśe layam gacchati sarvatas
bhūtakoṭim tathā yogī praviśet ca muhur muhur
piṇḍa krama bhāvanāyām sādhakaḥ svayam iṣṭadevam bhāvayati
tatra iṣṭadevam hṛdaya prabhāsvara paryantam vilīyamāna svarūpe dhyāyati

original: anubhedakrame devabhāvanecchāyāṁ satyāṁ pūrvaṁ bāhyamaṇdalamātmaśarīre vyastadeveṣu tatrāpyekaikaṁ hṛdayasthitacittaprabhāsvare sthāvaraṁ jaṁgame  #
analyzed: anubheda krame deva bhāvanā icchāyām satyām pūrvam bāhya maṇdalam ātma śarīre vyasta deveṣu tatra api ekaikam hṛdaya sthita citta prabhāsvare sthāvaram jagame  /
jagamam ca kramaśas sva ātmani

original: ātmānaṁ ca svaprabhāsvare tathaiva līnayate yathā ca uṣṇe ṛjīṣe jalapātanena jalaṁ vilīnaṁ sat ekabindau militvā śuṣyati |
analyzed: ātmānam ca sva prabhāsvare tathā eva līnayate yathā ca uṣṇe ṛjīṣe jala pātanena jalam vilīnam sat eka bindau militvā śuṣyati
prabhāsvare vilaya prakriyā iyam anubheda kramaḥ vartate
yadi api ayam caturtha kramasya sādhanā vidhiḥ tathā api paddhatiḥ iyam atrā api prayujyate

original: cittavivekasya sādhanayā'nayā śūnyatāyāḥ sāmānyārthabodha eva jāyate |
analyzed: citta vivekasya sādhanayā anayā śūnyatāyāḥ sāmānya artha bodhaḥ eva jāyate
prayoga mārgasya dharma agra mārgasya ca ayam eva abhisamayaḥ
atas citta vivekasya prabhāsvara tā upamā prabhāsvara tvena api ucyate

original: apagaterūdgatiparivartanam cittavivekaparyantam niṣpannopamāprabhāsvarasya karmavāyunā spandanena sādhakaḥ pratilomālokopalabdhau tadutthāpayati
analyzed: apagateḥ ūdgati parivartanam citta viveka paryantam niṣpanna upamā prabhāsvarasya karma vāyunā spandanena sādhakaḥ pratiloma āloka upalabdhau tat utthāpayati
kālaḥ ayam citta vivekāt māyā kāye parivartana sakramaṇayoḥ ūcyate

original: hṛdayakamalasthamadhyanāḍīsahitasya sampūrṇanāḍīcakrasya granthiṣūdghaṭitāsu satīṣu māyākāye utthāpanāvasthāṁ yāvat sampūrṇaprakriyā cittaviveke  #
analyzed: hṛdaya kamala stha madhyanāḍī sahitasya sampūrṇa nāḍī cakrasya granthiṣu udghaṭitāsu satīṣu māyā kāye utthāpana avasthām yāvat sampūrṇa prakriyā citta viveke

original: māyākāye ca utthāpitā jāyate tadabhyāsakramo hi māyākāya ucyate |
analyzed: māyā kāye ca utthāpitā jāyate tad abhyāsa kramaḥ hi māyā kāyaḥ ucyate
etad sahakāri pratyayaḥ sūkṣma prāṇa vāyuḥ asti
upādāna kārakam cittam asti
yat ca lakṣaṇa anuvyañjana vibhūṣite deva kāye utthāpitam bhavati
ayam eva māyā kāyaḥ ucyate
ayam eva āsrava jñāna kāyaḥ
samāhita māyākāya pṛṣṭhalabdha māyākāya svapna māyākāya antarābhava māyā kāya ākhyāḥ catvāraḥ bhedāḥ etasya

original: cittavivekānantarameva upalabdhamāyākāyaḥ abhyāsakramasya māyākāyaḥ paryantamāyākāyaśceti nāmnā bhedatrayamapi vidhātuṁ śakyate |
analyzed: citta viveka anantaram eva upalabdha māyā kāyaḥ abhyāsa kramasya māyā kāyaḥ paryanta māyā kāyaḥ ca iti nāmnā bheda trayam api vidhātum śakyate

original: vyutpattiḥ māyākāyādidvādaśopamālakṣitaḥ āsravajñānakāya eva māyākāya ucyate |
analyzed: vyutpattiḥ māyā kāya ādi dvādaśa upamā lakṣitaḥ āsrava jñāna kāyaḥ eva māyā kāyaḥ ucyate
dvādaśa upamāḥ imāḥ prāṇa cittamātra utpanna tvāt ayam māyā upamaḥ
ayam sarva vyāptaḥ śaśi pratibimba sadṛśaḥ
ayam māsa asthi rūdhira ādi rahita pratibhāsa sadṛśaḥ
pratikṣaṇam sa spanditaḥ marīci sadṛśaḥ
prāṇa vāyu sampannaḥ sthūla kāya atiriktaḥ sūkṣma svapna kāya sadṛśaḥ
vipāka kāya sambaddhaḥ san api anyasmin pratibhāsamānaḥ pratiśruta kāya sadṛśaḥ
kāyaḥ ayam gandharvanagara sadṛśaḥ
ekasmin sati aneka iṣu ābhāsita indrajāla sadṛśaḥ
kāyasya asya pañca varṇāḥ amiśritāḥ indradhanuṣa sadṛśāḥ ca

original: 10. vipākakāyo meghasadṛśaḥ māyākāyaśca meghamadhyād āvirbhūtā vidyudiva vartate,
analyzed: vipāka kāyaḥ megha sadṛśaḥ māyā kāyaḥ ca megha madhyāt āvirbhūtā vidyut iva vartate
śūnyatā svabhāvaḥ ayam jalāt utthita vilīyamāna budbuda samānaḥ
aṅga pratyaṅgayoḥ paripūrṇa tā rūpa ādarśe pratibimbita vajradhara rūpa upamaḥ
etāsu upamāsu svapna upamā anya apekṣayā uttamā abhimanyate

original: yato hi svajīvanasya pañcaviṁśatipratiśataṁ samayaṁ janaḥ rātrau svapnāvalokane eva yāpayati |
analyzed: yatas hi sva jīvanasya pañcaviśati pratiśatam samayam janaḥ rātrau svapna avalokane eva yāpayati
yathā ca svapnāya nidrā anivāryā
tathā eva atra māyā kāyasya utthāpanāya vijñāna pūrva gamanam āvaśyakam
nidrāyām svapna āgamanam māyā kāya samam

original: māyākāyasya sādhakaḥ sthūlakāyena sūkṣmakāyaṁ nirmāya vicarati |
analyzed: māyā kāyasya sādhakaḥ sthūla kāyena sūkṣma kāyam nirmāya vicarati

original: iyaṁ tādṛśyeva kriyā yathā ca svapnāvasthāyāṁ sthūlakāyāt sūkṣmakāyasya pṛthak sthitiḥ |
analyzed: iyam tādṛśī eva kriyā yathā ca svapna avasthāyām sthūla kāyāt sūkṣma kāyasya pṛthak sthitiḥ
svapna anusāram kāyasya rūpa trayam vilokyate

original: 1. kuśalākuśalavipākāt samutpannasukhaduḥkhavāhako vipākakāyaḥ 2. vibhinnasaṁskāravāsanābhyaḥ prabhāvitaḥ pratibhāsitaḥ svapnakāyaḥ 3. aśuddhāvasthāyāṁ  #
analyzed: kuśala akuśala vipākāt samutpanna sukha duḥkha vāhakaḥ vipāka kāyaḥ vibhinna saskāra vāsanābhyaḥ prabhāvitaḥ pratibhāsitaḥ svapna kāyaḥ aśuddha avasthāyām
manaḥ maya kāyaḥ śuddha avasthāyām ca jñāna kāyaḥ
yaḥ ca prabhāsvara abhinnaḥ tiṣṭhati ayam eva nija kāyaḥ
etad traye māyā kāya sādhana āśrayaḥ sva santati svabhāva sthaḥ sūkṣma nija kāyaḥ eva asti

original: svapnakāyo'pi māyākāyasādhanādhāro na bhavitumarhati yato hyayaṁ kālikaḥ |
analyzed: svapna kāyaḥ api māyā kāya sādhana ādhāraḥ na bhavitum arhati yatas hi ayam kālikaḥ
atas nija kāyaḥ arthāt sūkṣma prāṇa cittam eva māyā kāya sādhana āśrayam
asya eva gṛha sadṛśaḥ sthūla kāyaḥ
mūla pañca vāyuṣu prāṇa vāyuḥ asti
prāṇa vāyuḥ api sthūla sūkṣma bhedābhyām dvividhaḥ

original: ekastu yasya prāṇeṣu samāpteṣu mṛtyurbhavati sa bhavati dvitīyaśca yaḥ indriyānāśritaḥ manovijñānāśrito'sti, sa prāṇāḥ |
analyzed: ekaḥ tu yasya prāṇeṣu samāpteṣu mṛtyuḥ bhavati sa bhavati dvitīyaḥ ca yaḥ indriya anāśritaḥ manaḥ vijñāna āśritaḥ asti sa prāṇāḥ
mṛtyoḥ anantaram anena eva antara abhāve ca utpādaḥ

original: mārge sādhanābalenaiva ayameva māyākāya utthāpito bhavati |
analyzed: mārge sādhanā balena eva ayam eva māyā kāyaḥ utthāpitaḥ bhavati

original: yadā ca karmakleśavaśo'yaṁ jayate tadā bhavacakre vibhinnarūpeṣu āvirbhūya prāṇī saṁsāracakre bhramati |
analyzed: yadā ca karma kleśa vaśaḥ ayam jayate tadā bhava cakre vibhinna rūpeṣu āvirbhūya prāṇī sa sāra cakre bhramati
etad mūlam api etat eva prāṇi cittam

original: pañcakrame'pyabhihitam- asvatantraṁ jagatsarvaṁ svatantraṁ naiva jāyate |
analyzed: pañcakrame api abhihitam asvatantram jagat sarvam svatantram nā eva jāyate
hetuḥ prabhāsvaram tasya sarva śūnyam prabhāsvaram
yena cittena bālāḥ ca
sa sāre bandhanam gatāḥ
yoginaḥ tena cittena sugatānām gatim gatāḥ
nikhila jagat sūkṣma prāṇa cittāt eva utpadyate
na tu sva svadharma astitva paramparayā

original: sarvahetuḥ prabhāsvaraḥ yaśca mahāśūnyasvarūpaḥ cittasya pañcaraśmivāyoścādvayarūpam |
analyzed: sarva hetuḥ prabhāsvaraḥ yaḥ ca mahā śūnya svarūpaḥ cittasya pañca raśmi vāyoḥ ca advaya rūpam
yathā ajalam tasya ca ārdra tā agniḥ tasya ca uṣṇa tā

original: tāntrikadarśanasya marmatvaṁ cittasya sūkṣmavāyoścābhinnatāyāḥ prakāśito māyākāya etadeva tantrasya rahasyam |
analyzed: tāntrika darśanasya marma tvam cittasya sūkṣma vāyoḥ ca abhinna tāyāḥ prakāśitaḥ māyā kāyaḥ etat eva tantrasya rahasyam
etat anubhāvaḥ gurum antareṇa na kartum pāryyate

original: atredaṁ jñeyaṁ kāyasya rūpadvayaṁ sthūlaṁ sūkṣmaṁ ca |
analyzed: atra idam jñeyam kāyasya rūpa dvayam sthūlam sūkṣmam ca

original: etatpuṣṭistu sādhanāṁ binā sāmānyataḥ sūkṣmakāyo mṛtyukāle bhavati iti vārtayā bhavati |
analyzed: etat puṣṭiḥ tu sādhanām binā sāmānyatas sūkṣma kāyaḥ mṛtyu kāle bhavati iti vārtayā bhavati

original: jīvanakāle māyākāyaṁ sādhayitvā sākṣātkaroti tarhi antarābhave trijñānavilayānantaraṁ saṁbhogakāye utthāpitaḥ san mucyate |
analyzed: jīvana kāle māyā kāyam sādhayitvā sākṣātkaroti tarhi antarābhave tri jñāna vilaya anantaram sa bhoga kāye utthāpitaḥ san mucyate

original: yataḥ antarābhavasya prāṇikāyaḥ sūkṣmaprāṇacittakāya eva bhavati |
analyzed: yatas antarābhavasya prāṇi kāyaḥ sūkṣmaprāṇa citta kāyaḥ eva bhavati

original: aparataśca sādhanābalena sarvavāyuṣu anāhate satsu māyākāyasya sādhanāsiddhyai kāyadvayajñānamāvaśyakam |
analyzed: aparatas ca sādhanā balena sarva vāyuṣu anāhate satsu māyā kāyasya sādhanā siddhyai kāya dvaya jñānam āvaśyakam

original: atredaṁ vicāraṇīyaṁ yadā sūkṣmakāye sādhakaḥ utthāpito bhavati tadā sthūlakāyāt tasya sambandha-vicchedo bhavati na vā ?
analyzed: atra idam vicāraṇīyam yadā sūkṣmakāye sādhakaḥ utthāpitaḥ bhavati tadā sthūlakāyāt tasya sambandha vicchedaḥ bhavati na vā
kecana vivāsaḥ vicchedam amanyanta
kecid ca vicchedam vinā api sūkṣmakāye utthāpanam aṅgīkṛtavantaḥ
mata dvayam api ucitam bhavet

original: kim na sambhāvyate yāvat samādhibalena sādhakaḥ māyākāye utthāpito bhaviṣyati tāvat sthūlakāyāt pṛthak sa sthāsyati |
analyzed: kim na sambhāvyate yāvat samādhi balena sādhakaḥ māyā kāye utthāpitaḥ bhaviṣyati tāvat sthūla kāyāt pṛthak sa sthāsyati

original: samādhibale samāpte sati sa punaḥ sthūlakāye parāvartiṣyate |
analyzed: samādhi bale samāpte sati sa punar sthūlakāye parāvartiṣyate

original: vastutaḥ sādhakaḥ yāvat paramārthaprabhāsvaraṁ prathamabhūmiṁ ca na prāpsyati tāvat sūkṣmakāyasyecchānusāraṁ sthūlakāyāt sampūrṇaḥ sambandha-vicchedo  #
analyzed: vastutas sādhakaḥ yāvat paramārtha prabhāsvaram prathama bhūmim ca na prāpsyati tāvat sūkṣmakāyasya icchā anusāram sthūlakāyāt sampūrṇaḥ sambandha vicchedaḥ
