original: tilopādo'pi vakti- yathā- ākāśagaṅgāvalokane dṛṣṭireva nirūdhyeta,
analyzed: tilopādaḥ api vakti yathā ākāśagaṅgā avalokane dṛṣṭiḥ eva nirūdhyeta

original: tathaiva svacittasya prakṛtya-vasthāvalokanena sarvavikalpā avarūddhāḥ syuḥ |
analyzed: tathā eva sva cittasya prakṛti avasthā avalokanena sarva vikalpāḥ avarūddhāḥ syuḥ

original: nīhārameghādayaḥ ākāśe evotpadyante tatraiva ca viśrāmyanti tathaiva vikalpāḥ caitasikāścāpi prabhāsvaracitte samutpadyante tatraiva śāmyantyapi
analyzed: nīhāra megha ādayaḥ ākāśe eva utpadyante tatra eva ca viśrāmyanti tathā eva vikalpāḥ caitasikāḥ ca api prabhāsvara citte samutpadyante tatra eva śāmyanti api

original: jñānasiddhāvapi pratyapādi- yathā sāhasikaḥ kukkuraḥ pāṣāṇaṁ parityajya tatprakṣepakamanudhāvati,
analyzed: jñāna siddhau api pratyapādi yathā sāhasikaḥ kukkuraḥ pāṣāṇam parityajya tad prakṣepakam anudhāvati
tathā eva vikalpam an avalokya tad utsa cittam anveṣaṇīyam

original: yena ca kadāpi pāṣāṇarūpivikalpasya prakṣepaṇaṁ na bhavet |
analyzed: yena ca kadāpi pāṣāṇa rūpi vikalpasya prakṣepaṇam na bhavet

original: yathā - loṣṭaśca dhāvati kṣipte nāsau prakṣepakastathā |
analyzed: yathā loṣṭaḥ ca dhāvati kṣipte na asau prakṣepakaḥ tathā
evam cittena yat bhāvya
tat bhavati na cittakam
siddhabiravāpādaḥ api abhidhatte vīci rahita parama śānta sāgara vat

original: vāyurahitadīpaśikhāvad uccākāśe samutpatitagarūḍavad bhūtakalpanaṁ bhaviṣyasya ca vicāraṁ binā kevalaṁ vartamānajñānaprakāśe stheyam |
analyzed: vāyu rahita dīpa śikhā vat ucca ākāśe samutpatita garūḍa vat bhūta kalpanam bhaviṣyasya ca vicāram binā kevalam vartamāna jñāna prakāśe stheyam
evam sthityā prabhāsvaram svayam eva āvirbhavati

original: sarahapādo'pi vakticittacaitasikayorvyāpārāvarodhena vāyurnirūdhyate vāyu-nirodhena ca prabhāsvaraṁ sākṣātkṛtaṁ bhaviṣyati |
analyzed: sa rahapādaḥ api vakti citta caitasikayoḥ vyāpāra avarodhena vāyuḥ nirūdhyate vāyu nirodhena ca prabhāsvaram sākṣātkṛtam bhaviṣyati

original: evamavalokyate yat prabhāsvarasādhanāyā ekaḥ saralo'pi panthāḥ |
analyzed: evam avalokyate yat prabhāsvara sādhanāyāḥ ekaḥ saralaḥ api panthāḥ

original: cet sarvādhyātmikacintakairayameva mārgaḥ anvasariṣyata tarhi adyatano'yaṁ samājaḥ atyunnatiṁ prāpsyat |
analyzed: ced sarva ādhyātmika cintakaiḥ ayam eva mārgaḥ anvasariṣyata tarhi adyatanaḥ ayam samājaḥ ati unnatim prāpsyat
param ca doṣaḥ ayam janasya

original: yad vastu sāralyena labhyate tadavāptuṁ sa necchati |
analyzed: yat vastu sāralyena labhyate tat avāptum sa na icchati
yat kāṭhinyena labhyeta tat eva sva upalabdhim manyate
yat samīpa varti
tad lābhāya na vicārayati

original: etasmādeva yatsaralaṁ janmajanmāntarāt svasahaivotpannaṁ tatsamīpatvād-navalokanena bhavacakramidaṁ duḥkhaśāntiśṛṁkhalābaddhamāste |
analyzed: etasmāt eva yat saralam janma janmāntarāt sva saha evā utpannam tad samīpa tvāt navalokanena bhava cakram idam duḥkha śānti śṛkhalā baddham āste

original: śaṅpākargyude mahāmudrāmañjūṣākhyagranthe samuktaṁ yad abodhasya caturhetavaḥ 1. asmaccittaṁ dharmakāyādabhinnaṁ,
analyzed: mahāmudrāmañjūṣā ākhya granthe samuktam yat abodhasya catur hetavaḥ asmad cittam dharmakāyāt abhinna
paran ca atyanta sāmīpyāt tat paricetum aśakyam
yadi api idam sarvadā udaya avasthāyām avatiṣṭhate paran ca asya ati gambhīra tayā jñātum aśakya tā
etad sākṣātkārāya smaraṇam samprajanya mātram ca apekṣitam
param ca atyanta sāralyena vayam tat na viśvasimaḥ

original: 4. trikāye svayaṁ prakaṭite satyapi bhadratvād buddhirenaṁ na gṛhṇāti |
analyzed: tri kāye svayam prakaṭite sati api bhadra tvāt buddhiḥ enam na gṛhṇāti
āditas eva asmad cittam ābhāsa śūnyam asti
dharmakāyaḥ ayam eva
ābhāsa tvam hi nirmāṇa kāyasya
yuga naddhaḥ sambhoga kāyaḥ
etat tri kāyaḥ
upari ukta catur doṣān parihṛtya prabhāsvaraḥ sākṣātkartum śakyate asmābhiḥ

original: ġyeyakośe cāpi proktaṁ cittaprabhāsvarādhigamāya manaścakṣvādīndriyāṇāṁ vāyośca prakṛtisthatvena lalanārasanayoḥ pravahan vāyuḥ madhyamāyāṁ  #
analyzed: yeyakośe ca api proktam citta prabhāsvara adhigamāya manaḥ cakṣu ādi indriyāṇām vāyoḥ ca prakṛti stha tvena lalanā rasanayoḥ pravahan vāyuḥ madhyamāyām
vileṣyati
atas cittasya śithilīkaraṇam anuttara upadeśeṣu anyatamam
ṣaḍaṅga yoge dhāraṇā aṅgam api idam

original: rūpādiviṣayāścakṣvādīndriyāṇi atra vilīya samyagantanirodhaprabhāsvareṣu ekarasāni bhūtvā'dvayāni jāyante |
analyzed: rūpa ādi viṣayāḥ cakṣu ādi indriyāṇi atra vilīya samyak anta nirodha prabhāsvareṣu ekarasāni bhūtvā advayāni jāyante
guhya samāje ca api uktam nirodha vajra gate citte nimittam upajāyate
pañca dhātu nimittam tat bodhivajreṇa bhāṣitam

original: avagaterūdgatiparivartanam paramārthaprabhāsvaraṁ pratilomni ālokopalabdhau prakaṭitāyāṁ caturthaparamārtha-prabhāsvarakramādidaṁ yuganaddhakrame  #
analyzed: avagateḥ ūdgati parivartanam paramārtha prabhāsvaram pratilomni āloka upalabdhau prakaṭitāyām caturtha paramārtha prabhāsvara kramāt idam yuga naddha krame
parivartate
yuga naddha kramaḥ anāhata vajra kāya paramārtha prabhāsvara ākhya satya dvayasya abhinnam eka rasa jñānam yuga naddha kramasya lakṣaṇam
bhedaḥ prahāṇa abhidheyābhyām etat bheda dvayam vidhīyate
vyutpattiḥ parama artha sa vṛteḥ yuga naddha rūpam idam
atas yuga naddha kramaḥ ucyate

original: pañcakrame cāpyabhihitam- saṁvṛtiṁ paramārthaṁ ca pṛthag jñātvā vibhāgataḥ |
analyzed: pañcakrame ca api abhihitam sa vṛtim parama artham ca pṛthak jñātvā vibhāgataḥ
sammīlanam bhavet yatra yuga naddham tat ucyate

original: sādhanā sādhanāyāḥ praśne tu kimidaṁ nocitaṁ yad āgameṣu ( buddhavacaneṣu )
analyzed: sādhanā sādhanāyāḥ praśne tu kim idam na ucitam yat āgameṣu buddha vacaneṣu
tu sādhakānām tattva darśana antaram uttarottaram avasthā guṇa ādīni varṇitāni syuḥ

original: parañca śāstreṣu prathamabhūmi-prāptiṁ yāvadevaitat pratipāditaṁ syāt |
analyzed: paran ca śāstreṣu prathama bhūmi prāptim yāvat eva etat pratipāditam syāt

original: yato hi tattvadarśanasya prathamabhūmeśca prāptyanantaraṁ sādhakaḥ tathāgataiḥ sambandhaṁ sthāpayati dharmañca śṛṇoti |
analyzed: yatas hi tattva darśanasya prathama bhūmeḥ ca prāpti anantaram sādhakaḥ tathāgataiḥ sambandham sthāpayati dharmam ca śṛṇoti
tebhyaḥ śāstrāṇām viśiṣṭa prayojana pratītiḥ na bhavati
yatas ca sa sva nirākaraṇam vajradhara ādiṣṭa devebhyaḥ kartum arhati

original: anyataśca ye nirvikalpajñānaṁ na sākṣātkṛtavantasteṣāṁ svavikalpena nirākaraṇavidhānamasañgatameva |
analyzed: anyatas ca ye nirvikalpa jñānam na sākṣātkṛtavantaḥ teṣām sva vikalpena nirākaraṇa vidhānam asañgatam eva
vikalpena nirṇaya sīmā prayoga mārgam yāvat eva

original: parañca parampareyaṁ nirmitā yat prathamabhūmimavāpya nirvikalpasthabodhisatvaiḥ kariṣyamāṇeṣvāvaraṇeṣu bhūmiṣu ca pakṣavipakṣakhaṇḍanenāpi  #
analyzed: parañca paramparā iyam nirmitā yat prathama bhūmim avāpya nirvikalpa stha bodhisatvaiḥ kariṣyamāṇeṣu āvaraṇeṣu bhūmiṣu ca pakṣa vipakṣa khaṇḍanena api
pratipādyate
etat kiyat ucitam idam vicāraṇīyam āste

original: yuganaddhotthāpanasambandhe āryadevaḥ caryāmelāpake pañcapraśnān utthāpya tannirākaraṇaṁ spaṣṭayati- 1. prathamaṁ tāvat tṛtīyakramasyārthāt  #
analyzed: yuga naddha utthāpana sambandhe ārya devaḥ caryā melāpake pañca praśnān utthāpya tad nirākaraṇam spaṣṭayati prathamam tāvat tṛtīya kramasya arthāt

original: cittavivekānantaraṁ māyākāyena caturtha-prabhāsvare sākṣātkṛte sati sāsravamāyākāyasyānto bhaviṣyati na vā ?
analyzed: citta viveka anantaram māyā kāyena caturtha prabhāsvare sākṣātkṛte sati sa āsrava māyā kāyasya antaḥ bhaviṣyati na vā

original: etaduttare sāsravamāyākāyāntaḥ svīkṛtaḥ caturthakramānantaraṁ anāsravaprāṇavāyoḥ yuganaddhakāyaḥ prakaṭiṣyati |
analyzed: etad uttare sa āsrava māyā kāya antaḥ svīkṛtaḥ caturtha krama anantaram anāsrava prāṇa vāyoḥ yuga naddha kāyaḥ prakaṭiṣyati

original: 2. mārgagamanakramasambandhe pṛṣṭe sati tatraiva pañcamārgāṇāṁ daśa bhūmīnāṁ ca sambandhe vistareṇa nirdiṣṭam |
analyzed: mārga gamana krama sambandhe pṛṣṭe sati tatra eva pañca mārgāṇām daśa bhūmīnām ca sambandhe vistareṇa nirdiṣṭam
bhavya āvṛttiḥ kadā sampatsyate
tad paridhiḥ ca kiyān

original: etaduttarantu-kleśasya savasanānāśe sati darśanamārgaprāptyanantaraṁ bhavo vyāvartate |

analyzed: mokṣa abhiprāyaḥ kaḥ
kleśa āvaraṇasya sa mūla nāśaḥ śaikṣika yuga naddha prāptiḥ ca mokṣaḥ
mokṣa prāpteḥ kim kāraṇam
etad kāraṇam hi samāna rūpeṇa pāramitā naya mantra nayayoḥ ca darśana mārga prāptiḥ
param ca darśana mārga svarūpa guṇavat tāyām antaram

original: yathā śrāvakayāne śūnyatāsākṣātkārānantaramapi arhat padaprāptiṁ yāvat karmakleśābhyāṁ bhavotpattirna rūdhyate |
analyzed: yathā śrāvaka yāne śūnyatā sākṣātkāra anantaram api arhat pada prāptim yāvat karma kleśābhyām bhava utpattiḥ na rūdhyate

original: pāramitānaye darśanamārgaprāptau satyāṁ śūnyatāsākṣātkāreṇa prajñaptātmadṛṣṭināśāt karmakleśavaśād bhave janmāvarodhastu bhavati parañca sahajātmagrāhyanāśo  #
analyzed: pāramitā naye darśana mārga prāptau satyām śūnyatā sākṣātkāreṇa prajñapta ātma dṛṣṭi nāśāt karma kleśa vaśāt bhave janma avarodhaḥ tu bhavati param ca sahaja ātma grāhya nāśaḥ
na jāyate

original: mantranaye tu prajñaptasahajobhayātmadṛṣṭyornāśaḥ darśanamārga eva sampadyate |
analyzed: mantra naye tu prajñapta sahaja ubhaya ātma dṛṣṭyoḥ nāśaḥ darśana mārgaḥ eva sampadyate

original: ete ca bhedāḥ viṣayaśūnyatāyāḥ sākṣātkartrā viṣayijñānabhedād manyante |
analyzed: ete ca bhedāḥ viṣaya śūnyatāyāḥ sākṣāt kartrā viṣayi jñāna bhedāt manyante

original: parañcedaṁ vicāraṇīyaṁ yat kiṁ viṣayijñānasya tīvratāviśeṣatayoranurūpameva viṣayabodho nāpekṣyate ?
analyzed: parañca idam vicāraṇīyam yat kim viṣayi jñānasya tīvra tā viśeṣa tayoḥ anurūpam eva viṣaya bodhaḥ na apekṣyate
viṣayi bhede sati viṣaya svarūpa ādau na bhedaḥ
kim idam sambhāvyate

original: kiṁ viṣayijñānasya niṣprapañcasvarūpameva śūnyatā na vidyate ?
analyzed: kim viṣayi jñānasya niṣprapañca svarūpam eva śūnyatā na vidyate

original: citte ye guṇā utpadyante te śūnyatājñānād notpannāḥ ?
analyzed: citte ye guṇāḥ utpadyante te śūnyatā jñānāt na utpannāḥ

original: darśanamārgārūdasādhakānāṁ guṇeṣu yo hyalpādhiko bhāvaḥ sa śūnyatājñānād na sañjātaḥ ?
analyzed: darśana mārga ārūda sādhakānām guṇeṣu yaḥ hi alpa adhikaḥ bhāvaḥ sa śūnyatā jñānāt na sañjātaḥ
evam kim viṣaya viṣayiṇoḥ gāmbhīra vyāpaka tā spaṣṭa tānām bheda karaṇam nā ucitam

original: yatkimapi syāt prathamabhūmeranantaram āsravo naśyati anāsravajñānaṁ cotpadyate |
analyzed: yat kim api syāt prathama bhūmeḥ anantaram āsravaḥ naśyati anāsrava jñānam ca utpadyate
itas eva kāya citta abhinna tvam jāyate
ayam śaikṣikaḥ yuga naddha kāyaḥ mārgaḥ abhidhīyate
pariṣkṛtaḥ san ayam krameṇa a śaikṣika yuga naddha kāyam prāpnoti

original: jñānapādāmnāyaḥ guhyasamājasya jñānapādāmnāyānusāraṁ catasro niṣpannakramabhāvanā caturānandabodhaiḥ kramacatuṣṭaye vidhīyate |
analyzed: jñāna pāda āmnāyaḥ guhya samājasya jñāna pāda āmnāya anusāram catasraḥ niṣpanna krama bhāvanā catur ānanda bodhaiḥ krama catuṣṭaye vidhīyate
etat ca jñānapādena mañjuśriyaḥ mukha āgama dvārā prāptam

original: jñānapādena mañjuśriyaḥ ādeśād muktitilakaṁ vyaraci yaśca jñānapādāmnāyasya niṣpannakramavidherādhārabhūto granthaḥ |
analyzed: jñānapādena mañjuśriyaḥ ādeśāt mukti tilakam vyaraci yaḥ ca jñāna pāda āmnāyasya niṣpanna krama vidheḥ ādhāra bhūtaḥ granthaḥ

original: etadanusāramutpattikrame akṣobhyapradhānapañcakulamaṇḍalānāṁ bhāvanānantaraṁ niṣpannakrame hṛdaye anāhatatilakaṁ maṇicakre guhyatilakaṁ,
analyzed: etad anusāram utpatti krame akṣobhya pradhāna pañcakula maṇḍalānām bhāvanā anantaram niṣpanna krame hṛdaye anāhata tilakam maṇi cakre guhya tilaka

original: nāsikāgre nirmāṇatilakaṁ ca bhāvayitvā krameṇa ānandaparamānandādicaturānandānubhavena saha niṣpannakramaḥ sādhyate |
analyzed: nāsikā agre nirmāṇa tilakam ca bhāvayitvā krameṇa ānanda paramānanda ādi caturānanda anubhavena saha niṣpanna kramaḥ sādhyate

original: sādhanāvidhiḥ hṛdayakamale utpattikramasadṛśapaddhatyā'nāhatabindau nikhilamaṇḍalaṁ dhyātvā saṁgrahasaṁhāravidhiṁ cānukṛtya tilakaikāgyraprāptiḥ  #
analyzed: sādhanā vidhiḥ hṛdaya kamale utpatti krama sadṛśa paddhatyā anāhata bindau nikhila maṇḍalam dhyātvā sa graha sahāra vidhim ca anukṛtya tilaka aikāgyra prāptiḥ

original: 2. hṛdayasthatilakaṁ vāyuyogena maṇicakre saṁmanthya tatraiva pūrvavat sampūrṇadevamaṇḍalaṁ bhāvayitvā pradhānadevahṛdayasthaṁ tilakaṁ ca dhyātvā  #
analyzed: hṛdaya stha tilakam vāyu yogena maṇi cakre samanthya tatra eva pūrvavat sampūrṇa deva maṇḍalam bhāvayitvā pradhāna deva hṛdaya stham tilakam ca dhyātvā
sa graha sahāra dhyāna anuśīlanāt eva paramānandaḥ labhyate

original: 3. ūrdhvanāsikāgre nimittatilakaṁ dhyātvā vajrajāpādivāyubalena sūkṣmavāyutilakamadhikṛtya sarvadharmāṇāṁ māyopamabhāvanā viramānandaḥ |
analyzed: ūrdhva nāsikā agre nimitta tilakam dhyātvā vajra jāpa ādi vāyu balena sūkṣma vāyu tilakam adhikṛtya sarva dharmāṇām māyā upama bhāvanā virama ānandaḥ
prabhāsvarasya bhāvanā vidhīyate

original: piṇḍānubhedadhyānayogena punaḥ punarabhyāsena ca trijñānalakṣaṇamarīcidhūmādīni utpadyante |
analyzed: piṇḍa anubheda dhyāna yogena punar punar abhyāsena ca tri jñāna lakṣaṇa marīci dhūma ādīni utpadyante
mātṛtantra niṣpanna kramaḥ he vajra cakra savara catuṣpīṭha mahāmāyā buddha kapāla prabhṛtayaḥ mātṛtantrasya granthāḥ

original: nāgārjunaḥ pitṛtantragranthaguhyasamājamādhārīkṛtyotpattikrame piṇḍīkṛtaṁ niṣpannakrame ca pañcakramaṁ vilikhya sādhanāyāḥ suspaṣṭaṁ vidhiṁ  #
analyzed: nāgārjunaḥ pitṛ tantra grantha guhya samājam ādhārīkṛtya utpatti krame piṇḍīkṛtam niṣpanna krame ca pañcakramam vilikhya sādhanāyāḥ su spaṣṭam vidhim
prāstāvīt ittham mātṛtantra grantheṣu na vilikhitam
mātṛtantra granthā eva vistīrṇā prasṛtāḥ ca

original: teṣu ko'pi grantho viśiṣṭamārgeṣu saṁgrahītuṁ duḥśakyaḥ |
analyzed: teṣu kaḥ api granthaḥ viśiṣṭa mārgeṣu sa grahītum duḥśakyaḥ
siddhaiḥ hevajrasya eva na eka paddhatiṣu vyākhyā vyadhāyi

original: yathā ḍombīpādaḥ amṛtasādhanāyāṁ vasantatilakena saha caṇḍālīsādhanāmanuṣṭhātuṁ bhṛśaṁ prairit |
analyzed: yathā ḍombīpādaḥ amṛta sādhanāyām vasantatilakena saha caṇḍālī sādhanām anuṣṭhātum bhṛśam prairit

original: sarorūha-pādenāpi utpattikrame ṣaḍvarṇayogena punaśca varṇānāmanubhedanavidhinā prabhāsvarasya sākṣātkārāyābhihitam |
analyzed: sarorūha pādena api utpatti krame ṣaṣ varṇa yogena punar ca varṇānām anubhedana vidhinā prabhāsvarasya sākṣātkārāya abhihitam
samaya vajraḥ sūkṣma tilakam samaketayat

original: ayaṁ piṇḍānubhedana-dhyānayogayoḥ balaṁ dattvā yuganaddhāvirbhūtavidhiṁ khyāpayati |
analyzed: ayam piṇḍa anubhedana dhyāna yogayoḥ balam dattvā yuga naddha āvirbhūta vidhim khyāpayati

original: yasya pracāraṁ tibbadeśīyaḥ anuvādakaḥ kargyudasampradāya-saṁsthāpakaśca marapā dharmamatiḥ kṛtavān |
analyzed: yasya pracāram tibba deśīyaḥ anuvādakaḥ kargyuda sampradāya sasthāpakaḥ ca marapāḥ dharma matiḥ kṛtavān
eva nāḍa pādasya ṣaṣ yogāḥ
prāyas bhoṭa deśīyam sampradāya catuṣṭayam etat paramparām anusarati

original: saṁkṣepeṇa paricayaḥ tat prastūyate yato hyayameva prādhānyena mātṛtantrasādhanāvidhiḥ |
analyzed: sakṣepeṇa paricayaḥ tat prastūyate yatas hi ayam eva prādhānyena mātṛtantra sādhanā vidhiḥ
caṇḍālī caṇdālī eva anuttara tantrasya sāra garbhitā sādhanā
kathyate ca api caṇḍālī hi etat mārga ādhāra śilā
caṇḍālī bhāvanāyai kāya cittayoḥ vastu sthitiḥ vijñeyā
kāya sambandhe upari uktam vistareṇa

original: cittasthitibodhaṁ binā na sākṣātkartuṁ śakyate tataḥ |
analyzed: citta sthiti bodham binā na sākṣātkartum śakyate tatas

original: yathā ca dhenoḥ śarīre dugdhantu bhavati parañca śṛṅgābhyāṁ dugdhaṁ dogdhuṁ na śakyate |
analyzed: yathā ca dhenoḥ śarīre dugdhantu bhavati param ca śṛṅgābhyām dugdham dogdhum na śakyate
stanebhyaḥ eva dugdham duhyate
hevajre api deha stham ca mahājñānam sarva saṅkalpa varjitam
vyāpakaḥ sarva vastūnām deha sthaḥ api na deha jaḥ

original: praśnaḥ samudeti mahājñānaṁ śarīrasthantu vartate parañca tatpratyakṣaṁ kathaṁ ?
analyzed: praśnaḥ samudeti mahā jñānam śarīra sthantu vartate param ca tat pratyakṣam katham

original: “samyagvāg“ granthe kathitaṁ evaṁ kāyasya nābhikṣetre sthitam |
analyzed: samyak vāc granthe kathitam evam kāyasya nābhi kṣetre sthitam
nāḍi cakra bhedena nābheḥ catvāraḥ bhedāḥ
yathā uṣṇīṣa kaṇṭha hṛdaya nābhi kṣetrāṇi

original: etad vyākhyāyamānaḥ ācāryaṅotonaḥ vakti - jāgradavasthāyāṁ cittarājo nābhau tiṣṭhati svapne ca kaṇṭhacakre nidrāvasthāyāṁ hṛdaye samāpattyavasthāyāṁ  #
analyzed: etat vyākhyāyamānaḥ vakti jāgrat avasthāyām cittarājaḥ nābhau tiṣṭhati svapne ca kaṇṭha cakre nidrā avasthāyām hṛdaye samāpatti avasthāyām
ca uṣṇīṣe bhavati

original: jāgradavasthāyāṁ cittaṁ nābhikṣetre anekavikalpākārasaṁjñābhiḥ saṁkulaṁ bhavati |
analyzed: jāgrat avasthāyām cittam nābhi kṣetre aneka vikalpa ākāra sajñābhiḥ sa kulam bhavati

original: svapne cittaṁ kaṇṭhacakre vāyunā spandite asti-nāsti svarūpe tiṣṭhati |
analyzed: svapne cittam kaṇṭha cakre vāyunā spandite astināsti svarūpe tiṣṭhati
samāpatti avasthāyām cittam uṣṇīṣe bhavati
tatas etad vyāvṛta tvam ati duṣkaram

original: yataḥ rāgato malinamidaṁ cittaṁ malinarūpeṇa avatiṣṭhate svanirmalasvarūpaṁ ca vismarati |
analyzed: yatas rāgataḥ malinam idam cittam malina rūpeṇa avatiṣṭhate sva nirmala svarūpam ca vismarati
etat catur avasthā sa kramaṇa avasthā ca ucyate

original: jāgradavasthāyāṁ lalanārasanā'vadhūtīnāṁ saṅgame aplutākārajñānāgniṁ prajvālya caṇḍālī-sādhanayā svapne kaṇṭhacakramāśritya svapna-sādhanayā  #
analyzed: jāgrat avasthāyām lalanā rasanā avadhūtīnām saṅgame apluta ākāra jñāna agnim prajvālya caṇḍālī sādhanayā svapne kaṇṭha cakram āśritya svapna sādhanayā

original: nidrāyāṁ prabhāsvara-sādhanayā samāpattāvapi caṇḍālīsādhanayā ca cittaṁ pariśodhyate |
analyzed: nidrāyām prabhāsvara sādhanayā samāpattau api caṇḍālī sādhanayā ca cittam pariśodhyate

original: yato hi atrendriyāṇāṁ viṣayapravartanāvasare ekatastu samāpattiḥ saṁkramate,
analyzed: yatas hi atra indriyāṇām viṣaya pravartana avasare ekatas tu samāpattiḥ
aparatas ca caṇḍālī uṣṇīṣa sthānāt bodhi cittam srāvayati
ittham caṇḍālī jāgrat samā pati ubhaya avasthayoḥ pariśodhikā

original: caṇḍālīsādhanayā yadyapi sarvafalavāptisthāpi pramukhatayā dharmakāyaṁ ca pradadātīyam |
analyzed: caṇḍālī sādhanayā yadi api pramukha tayā dharmakāyam ca pradadāti iyam

original: svapnasādhanayā saṁbhogakāyasya māyākāyena nirmāṇakāyasya prabhāsvareṇa ca mahāsukhakāyasya siddhirbhavati |
analyzed: svapna sādhanayā sa bhoga kāyasya māyā kāyena nirmāṇa kāyasya prabhāsvareṇa ca mahā sukha kāyasya siddhiḥ bhavati

original: caṇḍālī ityasyārthaḥ skandhāyatanadhātūnāṁ sarvadharmāṇāṁ ca nirākartrī bhakṣikā nirvikalpasvarūpā sarvajinānāṁ mātā vajrabhaṭṭārikaiva caṇḍālī  #
analyzed: caṇḍālī iti asya arthaḥ skandha āyatana dhātūnām sarva dharmāṇām ca nirākartrī bhakṣikā nirvikalpa svarūpā sarva jinānām mātā vajra bhaṭṭārikā eva caṇḍālī
vartate

original: hevajratantraṭīkāyāṁ canḍālī “caṇḍā prajñā kleśopakleśanikṛntane caṇḍasvabhāvatvādālivajrasatvaḥ caṇḍālīśabdenocyate “ ityādi kathitam |
analyzed: hevajratantraṭīkāyām canḍālī caṇḍā prajñā kleśa upakleśa nikṛntane caṇḍa svabhāva tvāt āli vajra satvaḥ caṇḍālī śabdena ucyate ityādi kathitam
bhedaḥ etad caṇḍālyāḥ catvāraḥ bhedāḥ a pluta ākāra jñāna agninā prajvalita uṣṇa caṇḍālī
vāyoḥ madhyamānāḍyām praveśāt param ūrdhva gatiḥ nivikalpā caṇḍālī
prajvalanena catur ānanda prabodhikā yuga naddha bhāva prāpikā fala caṇḍālī

original: sādhanā caṇḍālī sādhanāyā vidhidvayaṁ pūrvakarmavidhiḥ maulavidhiśca |
analyzed: sādhanā caṇḍālī sādhanāyāḥ vidhi dvayam pūrva karma vidhiḥ maula vidhiḥ ca
pūrva karma rūpeṇa nāḍī vāyu tilakāni pariśudhyanti
nāḍī vāyu tilakānām pariśodhanāya vibhinna yoga āsanānām pravidhānam

original: tadagre śarīraṁ kiñcidiṣṭadevatvena bhāvayitvā nāḍīcakrāṇi spaṣṭarūpeṇa dhyāyyante |
analyzed: tad agre śarīram kiñcid iṣṭadeva tvena bhāvayitvā nāḍī cakrāṇi spaṣṭa rūpeṇa dhyāyyante

original: abhyāsāya madhyamānāḍyā atisūkṣmakeśasadṛśīṁ sthūlasumerūparvatasadṛśīṁ bhāvanāṁ vidhāya nāḍīcakrajñānamavāpyate |
analyzed: abhyāsāya madhyamā nāḍyāḥ ati sūkṣma keśa sadṛśīm sthūla sumerū parvata sadṛśīm bhāvanām vidhāya nāḍī cakra jñānam avāpyate

original: nāḍīmārgapariśodhanāya lalanārasanābhyam ālikālyoḥ kramaśo nāsikāgrataḥ praveśasya guhyendriyāt nirgamanasya ca dhyānaṁ kriyate |
analyzed: nāḍī mārga pariśodhanāya lalanā rasa nābhyam āli kālyoḥ kramaśas nāsikā agrataḥ praveśasya guhyendriyāt nirgamanasya ca dhyānam kriyate
vāyu pariśodhane vāyu varṇa upari dhyānam recaka pūraka kumbhaka ākhya prāṇāyāmāḥ ca abhyasyante

original: śukraśoṇitayo sthitiṁ tadvāyusambandhādikaṁ ya samyak parijñāya maulacaṇḍālī sādhyate |
analyzed: śukra śoṇitayoḥ sthitim tad vāyu sambandha ādikam samyak parijñāya maulacaṇḍālī sādhyate
maula caṇḍālī vipāka kāye asmin caṇḍālī bhāvanā na vidhīyate

original: parañcaitadartham utpatti-kramavidhinā bhāvite kaśmiṁścidiṣṭadeve svaparivartanaṁ vidheyam |
analyzed: param ca etad artham utpatti krama vidhinā bhāvite kaśmiṣcid iṣṭadeve sva parivartanam vidheyam

original: atra ca hevajre ātmānaṁ parivartya pitṛdevoṣṇīṣakamalādārabhya nābheścaturaṅgulamadhaḥsthaṁ nāḍīcakraṁ bhāvyate |
analyzed: atra ca he vajre ātmānam parivartya pitṛ deva uṣṇīṣa kamalāt ārabhya nābheḥ catur aṅgulam adhas stham nāḍī cakram bhāvyate
hevajra tantrasya vyākhyā tantre sampuṭa udbhave bhāvanā vidhiḥ ittham varṇitaḥ asti
nābhi madhye sthitam padyam catuḥṣaṣṭi dala anvitam
dvātriśat alam paṅkajam mūrddha madhye vyavasthitam
kaṇṭha madhya gatam ca api tu ṣoḍaśa chadam

original: hṛdaye tu tathā caiva padyamaṣṭadalaṁ smṛtam ||
analyzed: hṛdaye tu tathā ca eva padyam aṣṭa dalam smṛtam

original: caṇḍālībhāvanā prāyaḥ hevajravarṇitānusāraṁ hṛsvaplutākārasya 'a' ityasya bhāvanāmanuṣṭhāyaiva kriyate |
analyzed: caṇḍālī bhāvanā prāyas hevajra varṇita anusāram hṛ sva pluta ākārasya 'a iti asya bhāvanām anuṣṭhāya eva kriyate
atra iti asya anusāram ucyate

original: svayaṁ hevajrayuganaddhabhāvanā nābhistha-catuṣṣaṣṭidalīyakamalamadhye kṛṣṇapītaraśmivata ūrdhvamukhasya bījasya 'a' ityasya hṛdayasthāṣṭadalakamalamadhye  #
analyzed: svayam he vajra yuga naddha bhāvanā nābhi stha catuṣṣaṣṭidalīya kamala madhye kṛṣṇa pīta raśmivataḥ ūrdhva mukhasya bījasya 'a iti asya hṛdaya stha aṣṭadala kamala madhye
nīla varṇa vajra rāhu svabhāvasya   iti asya
catur nāḍī kamaleṣu a bhraṃ āṃ jrīṃ khaṃ

original: sīmnaścaturnāḍīdaleṣu adhomukhena' evaṁ mayā ' ityetasya ca bhāvanā'nuṣṭhīyate |
analyzed: sīmnaḥ catur nāḍī daleṣu adhomukhena evam mayā iti etasya ca bhāvanā anuṣṭhīyate

original: kaṇṭhasthaṣoḍaśadalacakramadhye raktavarṇasūryasvabhāvasya om ityetasya caturdikṣu raktavarṇādhomukhatilakanādena vibhūṣitasya 'haṁ ' ityetasya  #
analyzed: kaṇṭha stha ṣoḍaśadala cakra madhye rakta varṇa sūrya svabhāvasya om iti etasya catur dikṣu rakta varṇa adhomukha tilaka nādena vibhūṣitasya   iti etasya
bhāvanā kriyate
praśvāsa kāle recaka prāṇāyāma avasare
prativarṇāt pañca raśmayaḥ niḥsṛtya akhilam jagat vyāpnuvanti
śvāsa kāle ca recaka prāṇāyāme
sarva prabhā mayaḥ vāyuḥ tatra vilīyate
kumbhaka prāṇāyāma avasare savarṇa nāḍī cakrāṇi ādarśa pratibimbana vat su spaṣṭam dhyeyāni

original: tadanu mātṛdevaprabhāyāṁ vilīne candramasi ' aṁ ' ityasmin tataśca nābhicakrabīje ' aṁ ' ityasmin vilīya jñānāgniṁ prajvālayati |
analyzed: tadanu mātṛdeva prabhāyām vilīne candramasi ' aṃ ' iti asmin tatas ca nābhi cakra bīje ' aṃ ' iti asmin vilīya jñāna agnim prajvālayati

original: ayamagniḥ ūrdhvaṁ saṁvardhya hṛdayacakraṁ prāpya pañcatathāgatān ,
analyzed: ayam agniḥ ūrdhvam savardhya hṛdaya cakram prāpya pañca tathāgatān
pañca māmakī ādikam jvālayati mahā sukham srāvayati

original: yathā ca hevajratantre - caṇḍālī jvalitā nābhau,
analyzed: yathā ca hevajratantre caṇḍālī jvalitā nābhau
dahati pañca tathāgatān
dahati ca locana ādiḥ dagdhe aham sravate śaśī

original: abhidhyānottaratantre caṇḍālī jñānāgnitvena vajramālāyāmagnitvena mahāmudrā-tilake ca karmavāyutvena cakrasaṁvare ca tilakatvenābhihitā |
analyzed: abhidhyānottara tantre caṇḍālī jñāna agni tvena vajramālāyām agni tvena mahāmudrā tilake ca karma vāyu tvena cakra savare ca tilaka tvena abhihitā

original: saṁvṛtau tilakameva kathayituṁ śakyam yasya ca agnivat svarūpam |
analyzed: sa vṛtau tilakam eva kathayitum śakyam yasya ca agni vat svarūpam

original: caṇḍālyāḥ pūrvakarmaṇi nābhi-cakrāccaturaṅgulamadho lalanā-rasanā-madhyamānāḍīnāṁ melanasthāne ' a ' plutākāre citraikāgyraṁ vidhāya kumbhakaprāṇāyāmo'nuṣṭhīyate
analyzed: caṇḍālyāḥ pūrva karmaṇi nābhi cakrāt catur aṅgulam adhas lalanā rasanā madhyamā nāḍīnām melana sthāne citra aikāgyram vidhāya kumbhaka prāṇāyāmaḥ anuṣṭhīyate

original: atra prajvalitāgnivad etad dhyātvā nābhau pañcāśataśaḥ kumbhakaṁ kriyate |
analyzed: atra prajvalita agni vat etat dhyātvā nābhau pañcāśataśas kumbhakam kriyate

original: krameṇordhvagatikaḥ hṛdayaṁ kaṇṭhaṁ cāntataḥ uṣṇīṣaṁ prāpnoti cāgniḥ |
analyzed: krameṇa ūrdhva gatikaḥ hṛdayam kaṇṭham ca antatas uṣṇīṣam prāpnoti ca agniḥ

original: uṣṇīṣaṁ prāpya sampūrṇāṅgapratyaṅgāni jñānāgninā pūritāni bodhicittaṁ ca śukrābhinnaṁ bhavati,
analyzed: uṣṇīṣam prāpya sampūrṇa aṅga pratyaṅgāni jñāna agninā pūritāni bodhi cittam ca śukra abhinnam bhavati
anāsrava mahā sukha ābhāsaḥ iti evam etat dhyāyyate

original: kālacakraprabhṛtyadvayatantragranthānusāreṇa sampūrṇaśarīre anāsravasukhena vyāpte sati śarīrasthāsravatilakaṁ nāśayati |
analyzed: kālacakra prabhṛti advaya tantra grantha anusāreṇa sampūrṇa śarīre anāsrava sukhena vyāpte sati śarīra stha āsrava tilakam nāśayati

original: yathā lauhasthaḥ pāradaḥ lauhaṁ prajvālya nāśayati,
analyzed: yathā lauha sthaḥ pāradaḥ lauham prajvālya nāśayati
tathā eva anāsrava mahā sukham āsrava dravya tilakam jvālayitvā nāśayati

original: sādhakasya ṣaḍdhātuvinirmitamidaṁ śarīraṁ indradhanuṣasadṛśaṁ māyākāyaṁ prāpnoti,
analyzed: sādhakasya ṣaṣ dhātu vinirmitam idam śarīram indradhanuṣa sadṛśam māyā kāyam prāpnoti
śarīreṇa anena eva sambhoga kāyam ca prāpnoti

original: nābhicakrāt kramaśaḥ ūrdhvagatitaḥ uṣṇīṣaṁ yāvat punaścoṣṇīṣacakrānnābhicakraṁ yāvad adhogaterabhyāsa evānanda-paramānanda-viramānanda-sahajānandānāṁ  #
analyzed: nābhi cakrāt kramaśas ūrdhva gatitaḥ uṣṇīṣam yāvat punar ca uṣṇīṣa cakrāt nābhi cakram yāvat adhogateḥ abhyāsaḥ eva ānanda paramānanda viramānanda sahajānandānām
prāpti vidhiḥ vidyate

original: evaṁ dhyānena ānandacatuṣṭayānubhūtistadaiva sambhāvyate yadā ca sarvaprāṇavāyavaḥ caṇḍālīsādhanābalena madhyamāṁ praviśya avatiṣṭharen yataśca  #
analyzed: evam dhyānena ānanda catuṣṭaya anubhūtiḥ tadā eva sambhāvyate yadā ca sarva prāṇa vāyavaḥ caṇḍālī sādhanā balena madhyamām praviśya avatiṣṭharet yatas ca

original: jñānāgnirmadhyamāntaḥ praviśan cakreṣu praviśya tad bhinatti |
analyzed: jñāna agniḥ madhyama antar praviśan cakreṣu praviśya tat bhinatti
sarva nāḍyaḥ madhyamā nāḍyām sarva vāyavaḥ sūkṣma praṇavāyī
sarva tilakāni anāsrava anāhata tilakayoḥ

original: nābhito hṛdayaparyantaṁ prāptau viṣayātiśūnyaviṣayiviramānandaḥ kaṇthāduṣṇīṣaṁ yāvat prāptikāle viṣayisahajānandaśca labhyate |
analyzed: nābhitaḥ hṛdaya paryantam prāptau viṣaya ati śūnya viṣayi virama ānandaḥ kaṇthāt uṣṇīṣam yāvat prāpti kāle viṣayi sahaja ānandaḥ ca labhyate
etāni catvāri kṣaṇāni ucyante vicitra kṣaṇam
vipāka kṣaṇam vimarda kṣaṇam vilakṣaṇa kṣaṇam ca iti

original: ānandastu vicitrakṣaṇamucyate yataśca bāhyapratyayamudrām ābhyantarapratyayavāyuyogaṁ caṇḍālīyogaṁ vāśritya etat sākṣātkriyate |
analyzed: ānandaḥ tu vicitra kṣaṇam ucyate yatas ca bāhya pratyaya mudrām ābhyantara pratyaya vāyu yogam caṇḍālī yogam vā āśritya etat sākṣātkriyate
idam vicitra samūha melāpakāt utpannam atas eva vicitra kṣaṇam khyāpyate
dvitīyam tu vipāka kṣaṇam
yatas ca atra vicitra kṣaṇāt nava prayāsaḥ na apekṣyate
tṛtīyaḥ tu vimardaḥ
pariṇāma siddhi anantaram tad paripūrṇa ānanda prāpti anantaram api itas api adhikaḥ kaścana ānandaḥ bhaviṣyati
evam na pratīyate
ayam eva sarva uttamaḥ ānandaḥ
evam vicāra sthitam yogī prāpnoti
atas eva idam vimarda kṣaṇam ucyate
caturtha kṣaṇa
vilakṣaṇam
niṣprapañca nirlakṣaṇa bodha avastheyam
ayam eva sahaja ānandaḥ
hevajre catur kṣaṇam bāhya mudrayā sayojayitum kathitam asti
pañca krame api caturtha paramārtha prabhāsvara prāpti avastheyam eva mantra nayasya ca darśana mārgaḥ asti

original: caṇḍalīsādhanāyāṁ samutpannaguṇadoṣāṇāṁ vistareṇa pratipādanaṁ tilopā-samyag vāg kape ḍachī jamapala pāao dvārā viracite caṇḍālībhāvnāavidhau  #
analyzed: caṇḍalī sādhanāyām samutpanna guṇa doṣāṇām vistareṇa pratipādanam vāc kape ḍachī dvārā viracite
iti atra ca kṛtam āste

original: māyākāyaḥ hevajre pratipāditam- ātmā jīvaṁ ca sattvaṁ ca kālaḥ pudgala eva ca |
analyzed: māyā kāyaḥ hevajre pratipāditam ātmā jīvam ca sattvam ca kālaḥ pudgalaḥ eva ca
sarva bhāsvabhāvaḥ asau māyā rūpī ca sasthitaḥ
sarva dharmāṇām māyā vat bhāvanā karaṇīyā
svara gata māyākāyasya aneke bhedāḥ pañca krama bhāvanā vidhi anusāreṇa māyā kāya utthāpanā vidheḥ bhedaḥ

original: yathā pañcakrame trijñānā-nantaram upamāprabhāsvareṇotthāpitaṁ māyākāyam aśuddhamāyākāyena caturthaprabhāsvara-vāyuyogena ca madhyamānāḍyāṁ  #
analyzed: yathā pañcakrame tri jñāna anantaram upamā prabhāsvareṇa utthāpitam māyā kāyam aśuddha māyā kāyena caturtha prabhāsvara vāyu yogena ca madhyamā nāḍyām

original: praveśya sarvaśūnyatvasākṣātkārānantaraṁ pratilomni sūkṣmavāyau spandite sati sa viśuddhamāyākāyo nigadyate |

original: mātṛtantre caṇḍālīṁ dhyātvā vāyuṁ madhyamāyāṁ praveśya bodhicittaṁ srāvayitvā ca caturānandaiḥ śūnyatāmavabuddhya sahajānandānantaraṁ māyākāyotthāpanaṁ  #
analyzed: mātṛtantre caṇḍālīm dhyātvā vāyum madhyamāyām praveśya bodhi cittam srāvayitvā ca catur ānandaiḥ śūnyatām avabuddhya sahaja ānanda anantaram māyā kāya utthāpanam

ayam eva śuddha māyā kāyaḥ ucyate

original: prabhāsvarānantaraṁ prakaṭitayuganaddhamāyākāyasya viśuddhamāyākāyasya sarvadharmāṇāṁ ca māyasvapnavadavabodhaḥ aśuddhamahākāyaḥ |
analyzed: prabhāsvara anantaram prakaṭita yuga naddha māyā kāyasya viśuddha māyā kāyasya sarva dharmāṇām ca māya svapna vat avabodhaḥ aśuddha mahākāyaḥ

original: pañcakrame paramārthamanu śuddhamāyākāyāt pūrvamapi upamāprabhāsvarādāvirbhūtaḥ aśuddhamāyākāyaḥ niṣpannakramo manyate |

original: pitṛtantre vāyuṁ madhyamāyāṁ praveśya trijñānena prabhāsvaraḥ sākṣāt kriyate kintu mātṛtantre vāyormadhyamāyāṁ praveśastu mānyo'sti parañcālambanarūpeṇa  #
analyzed: pitṛtantre vāyum madhyamāyām praveśya tri jñānena prabhāsvaraḥ sākṣāt kriyate kintu mātṛtantre vāyoḥ madhyamāyām praveśaḥ tu mānyaḥ asti paran ca ālambana rūpeṇa

original: caṇḍālyāḥ 'evaṁ' bindorvā grahaṇena pṛthak prabhāsvaramāyākāyādibhyaḥ svatantrakramasya pratipādanamaparihāryaṁ nāsti |

original: tadapi cittasya nidrākālāvasthāṁ sāmānyamāyārūpaṁ ca tvaritaṁ vijñātuṁ pṛthak sādhanāvidhirapyupalabhyate |

original: ataścittaṁ svapne vijñātuṁ jāgradavasthāyāṁ caṇḍālībhāvanāvat svapna-sādhanā kriyate |

original: caṇḍālīmāyākāyayoḥ dākṣyamavāptuṁ jāgrati svapne ca samabhāvaścaiva bhavati |

original: sādhanā sādhakaḥ śayanakāle sampūrṇanāḍīcakrasaṁvalite svadehe iṣṭadevaṁ bhāvayet |

analyzed: kaṇṭha cakre aḥ iti akṣare yaḥ ca sarva tathāgatānām vāc sva rūpaḥ pañca prabhā mayaḥ ca āste

original: iti vicintya nidrāṁ prāpnuyāt yena ca svapne'pi svapno bhavati iti parijñātaṁ bhavet |

original: tathaiva kaṇṭhacakre eva vajrajāpaṁ bhāvayitvā tacca prabhāsvare samāhitya niṣprapañce samasthitireva svapnasādhanā'sti |
analyzed: tathā eva kaṇṭha cakre eva vajra jāpam bhāvayitvā tat ca prabhāsvare samāhitya niṣprapañce sama sthitiḥ eva svapna sādhanā asti

original: svapne svapno vartate iti parijñāya yathā jāgrada-vasthāyāṁ dhyānayogādayaḥ kriyante tathaiva svapne'pi bhāvanīyam |

original: prabhāsvaraḥ mātṛtantre prabhāsvarasādhanāvidhiḥ pitṛtantrasadṛśa eva yaśca pūrvamabhihito'sti |

original: sāmānyato nāḍapādasya ṣaḍdharmayogaḥ sarvānuttaratantrāṇāṁ niṣpannakramasādhanāyāḥ saṁgraharūpo manyate |

original: vajraḍākārṇava-saṁvarodayābhyāṁ svapnāntarābhavau gṛhītau sampuṭodbhavacatuṣpīṭhābhyāṁ ca saṁkramaṇamuddhṛtam |

original: yadyapyayaṁ nikhilānuttaratantrāṇāṁ sādhanāvidhistathāpi ṣaḍyogakendraṁ marma vā caṇḍālīyoga ucyate yaśca mātṛtantrasyāsāmānyaḥ sādhanāvidhiḥ

original: madhye śyāmavarṇe hūṁ padyadaleṣu ca nīlavarṇe 'anuttaram' iti caturakṣaraṁ dhyeyam yacca pañcajñānaṁ pañcabuddhasvarūpaṁ cāste |

original: etasya prakṛtyutpatti-antarābhāvaḥ 2. mṛtyuduḥ khāntarābhavaḥ 3. dharmadhātu-antarābhāvaśca iti bhedatrayaṁ vidhātuṁ śakyam |
analyzed: etasya prakṛti utpatti antara abhāvaḥ mṛtyu duḥ kha antara abhavaḥ dharmadhātu antara abhāvaḥ ca iti bheda trayam vidhātum śakyam

original: avasthānusāreṇa etasya naike bhedā vidhātuṁ śakyante,

original: antarābhava eva yuganaddhakāyasya arthāt paramārthaprabhāsvarasya māyākāyasya cābhinnarūpeṇa bodhi jāyate |

original: trikāyavyavasthayā pratīyate yadyekajīvana eva samyaksambodhiḥ prāptavyaḥ cettarhi sa ca antarābhava eva sambhāvyate na tu jīvitāvasthāyām,
analyzed: tri kāya vyavasthayā pratīyate yadi eka jīvane eva samyaksambodhiḥ prāptavyaḥ ced tarhi sa ca antarābhave eva sambhāvyate na tu jīvita avasthāyām

original: yataśca etadvipākakāyasya parityāgaṁ binā prabhāsvarasya sūkṣmamāyākāyasya ca yuganaddharūpeṇa utthānaṁ kadāpi na sambhāvyate |

bhūta utpannam idam śarīram prabhāsvara kāyam na bhavitum arhati

original: kāraṇantvatredameva yat pāramitāyāninaḥ mantrayāninaśca buddhamakaniṣṭhabhuvane ādāveva bodhiprāptammanyante |

atra antarābhavena samyaksambodhi prāptiḥ na manyate

original: kālacakre samabhihitam- tasmān niḥspandasaukhyaṁ kṣaṇamiha sahajaṁ dharmadhāturdadāti prāṇenākṛṣya sarvān rasagatiṣu gatān kleśamārān nihatya
analyzed: kālacakre samabhihitam tasmāt niḥspanda saukhyam kṣaṇam iha sahajam dharmadhātuḥ dadāti prāṇena ākṛṣya sarvān rasa gatiṣu gatān kleśa mārān nihatya

original: ṛddhiṁ sarvajñabhūmiṁ tribhuvanagurūtāṁ yogināṁ janmanīha mṛtyuṁ mārgapraviṣṭo vrajati yadi tadā tadgrahādanyajātyā ||
analyzed: ṛddhim sarvajña bhūmim tribhuvana guru utām yoginām janmani iha mṛtyum mārga praviṣṭaḥ vrajati yadi tadā tad grahāt anya jātyā

original: arthāt jīvanakāle paramapadaṁ prāptuṁ nāśaknot tarhi aparajanmani kiṁ prāpsyati |
analyzed: arthāt jīvana kāle parama padam prāptum na aśaknot tarhi apara janmani kim prāpsyati

original: mātṛtantre antarābhavasādhanāyāḥ svīyammahattvamāste yato hi avastheyameva atyantaṁ sūkṣmā balaśālinī ca bhavati |

original: sāmānyāntarābhavasādhanāyāṁ sādhako mṛtyukāle pañcaskandhadhātucatuṣṭayasya ṣaḍāyatana-pañcaviṣayāṇāṁ pañcāśrayajñānānāṁ pañcaviṁśatitattvānāṁ  #

original: yathā hi rūpaskandhāśrayikādarśajñāna- kṣitidhātu-cakṣurindriya-rūpādiviṣayāṇāṁ kṣayānantaramantaścitte marīcipratibhāsaḥ bāhyakāyadīptiśca  #

original: pitṛlabdhaṁ śvetaśukraṁ nābhicakrasyādho mātṛlabdhaṁ raktaṁ cordhvagatiṁ vidadhat hṛdayakamale caikarasaṁ sambhūya sarvaśūnyena sārdhaṁ prabhāsvareṇādvayaṁ  #

jāyate

original: tatkṣaṇaṁ jīvanakāle kṛtāṁ tatsadṛśīṁ bhāvanāmāśritya tadbalena ca parijñāya tadavasthitireva dharmakāyasya ekā sthitiḥ |

original: prabhāsvarasyādvayarūpeṇa sthiteyāmavasthā prabhāsvaramātrā saha sādhakaputrasya melanamapyucyate |
analyzed: prabhāsvarasya advaya rūpeṇa sthitā iyām avasthā prabhāsvara mātrā saha sādhaka putrasya melanam api ucyate

original: āśraya eva mārgaḥ mārga eva ca falaṁ yaccāsaṁhāryamāste |

original: atredaṁ nūnaṁ jñeyaṁ yathā āśrayamārgafalānyavasthābhedena pṛthak vartante parañca tathatā tvekaiva tathaivāsyāmavasthāyāṁ dharmakāya eva sambhogakāyaḥ  #
analyzed: atrā idam nūnam jñeyam yathā āśraya mārga falāni avasthā bhedena pṛthak vartante parañca tathatā tu ekā eva tathā eva asyām avasthāyām dharmakāyaḥ eva sambhoga kāyaḥ

analyzed: tasmāt eva pūrvam niṣpanna kramasya sāmānya arthe api pratipāditam vajrayāne bodhi cittam sādhanā mātram asat sādhya tvam āpadyate idam eva autkṛṣṭyam vajrayānasya

original: sambhogakāyaḥ cetsādhakaḥ dharmakāyasthito na bhavitumaśaknot tarhi saḥ prabhāsvare samutthāpitaḥ san ālokābhāsanantaram antarābhavasatve prakaṭiṣyati  #

yaḥ ca sūkṣma kāyaḥ ucyate

original: nirmāṇakāyaḥ sambhogakāye utthāpanaṁ na syāttarhi prāṇyantarābhavasattvo bhaviṣyati |

original: vāyau madhyamānāḍyāṁ praviṣṭe sati prakaṭitāni lakṣaṇānyādhārīkṛtya dharmakāyasya prāptividheḥ punarbhāvanameva dharmakāyasya mārgīkaraṇamucyate

original: itthaṁ trikāyasya mārgīkaraṇāya pūrvaṁ vāstavike mṛtyukāle trikāyasya prakaṭīkaraṇavidhiḥ parijñeyaḥ |

original: sādhanāprayojanaṁ hi jīvanakāle mṛtyuṁ parijñāya jīvanmuktireva kathyate |
analyzed: sādhanā prayojanam hi jīvana kāle mṛtyum parijñāya jīvanmuktiḥ eva kathyate

original: atra praśno'pi sambhāvyate- mṛtyukāle evaṁ parijñānaṁ na sambhaviṣyati yato hi mṛtyustu,
analyzed: atra praśnaḥ api sambhāvyate mṛtyu kāle evam parijñānam na sambhaviṣyati yatas hi mṛtyuḥ tu

original: saṁkramaṇam saṁkramaṇamutkrāntiṁ vā sāmānyaśabdeṣu satataṁ pravāhayuktatvena gatiśīlatvena cābhidhātuṁ śaknumo vayam |

original: ataḥ prabhāsvaracittasya pravāhātmakaṁ kṣaṇikatvaṁ dīpaśikhāvat pratikṣaṇaṁ parivartanaśīlaṁ ca sadapi nirantaraṁ gatiśīlamapi vidyate |

na tu vijātīyena

original: ataḥ svataḥ śūnyarūpeṇābhāsiteṣṭadevasya mātṛpitṛyuganaddha-rūpeṇa prakaṭitamātṛdevasyānurāgapūrṇe svacitte sthitirevākṣārasukhaprāptirdhyānayogo  #
analyzed: atas svatas śūnya rūpeṇa ābhāsita iṣṭadevasya mātṛ pitṛ yuga naddha rūpeṇa prakaṭita mātṛdevasya anurāga pūrṇe sva citte sthitiḥ eva akṣāra sukha prāptiḥ dhyāna yogaḥ
vā asti

original: anusmṛtisādhanākāle caṇḍālyā bodhicittaṁ nigīrya uṣṇīṣanmaṇi-cakraparyantaṁ prāptyā caturānandaprāptirbhavati |
analyzed: anusmṛti sādhana akāle caṇḍālyāḥ bodhi cittam nigīrya uṣṇīṣat maṇi cakra paryantam prāptyā caturānanda prāptiḥ bhavati
etat atra caturtha akṣara sukha sahaja ānandaḥ eva dhyānam asti

original: tatkāle eva nābhau caṇḍālyā prajvalane yogī devabimbaṁ sākṣātkurūte tatra cānurāgasukhamutpadyate |
analyzed: tad kāle eva nābhau caṇḍālyā prajvalane yogī deva bimbam sākṣātkurūte tatra ca anurāga sukham utpadyate
anusmṛtiḥ iyam eva

original: anusmṛtyutpatyai dhāraṇayā madhyamānāḍyāṁ vāyumacalatvena saṁsthāpya caṇḍālī prajvālanīyā |
analyzed: anusmṛti utpatyai dhāraṇayā madhyamā nāḍyām vāyum acala tvena sasthāpya caṇḍālī prajvālanīyā
evam vayoḥ madhyamānāḍyām avasthitiḥ eva dhāraṇā abhidhīyate

original: dhāraṇāvasthāprāptyai prāṇāyāmena lalanārasanayoḥ pravahan vāyuḥ madhyamāyāṁ praveṣṭavyo bhavati,
analyzed: dhāraṇā avasthā prāptyai prāṇāyāmena lalanā rasanayoḥ pravahan vāyuḥ madhyamāyām praveṣṭavyaḥ bhavati
yaḥ ca prāṇāyāma yogaḥ iti ucyate

original: madhyamānāḍyāḥ paricayaḥ pratyāhārayogavidhinā aharniśi udeṣyamāṇaikādaśalakṣaṇānāṁ siddhyanantarameva sambhāvyate |
analyzed: madhyamānāḍyāḥ paricayaḥ pratyāhāra yoga vidhinā ahar niśi udeṣyamāṇa ekādaśa lakṣaṇānām siddhi anantaram eva sambhāvyate

original: pratyāhāreṇaikādaśalakṣaṇeṣu sākṣātkṛteṣu satsu samādhiyogena tāni dārdyamavāpnuvanti |
analyzed: pratyāhāreṇa ekādaśa lakṣaṇeṣu sākṣātkṛteṣu satsu samādhi yogena tāni dārdyam avāpnuvanti
ittham ṣaḍaṅga yoga kramaḥ niyataḥ asti

original: kālacakre ṣaḍaṅgayogakramaḥ - pratyāhāro daśānāṁ viṣayaviṣḥayiṇāmapravṛttiḥ śarīre |
analyzed: kālacakre ṣaḍaṅga yoga kramaḥ pratyāhāraḥ daśānām viṣaya viṣḥayiṇām apravṛttiḥ śarīre
prajñā tarkaḥ vicāraḥ ratiḥ acala sukham dhyānam api ekacittam
prāṇāyāmaḥ dvi mārgaḥ skhalanam api bhavet madhyame
bindau prāṇa praveśaḥ hi ubhaya gati hataḥ dhāraṇā ca ekacittam

original: caṇḍālyālokanaṁ yad bhavati khalu tanau cāmbare'nusmṛtiḥ syāt prajñopāyātmakenākṣaraṇasukhavaśājjñānabimbe samādhiḥ |
analyzed: caṇḍālī ālokanam yat bhavati khalu tanau ca ambare anusmṛtiḥ syāt prajñā upāya ātmakena akṣaraṇa sukha vaśāt jñāna bimbe samādhiḥ

original: etanmṛdvādibhedaistrividhamapi bhavet sādhanaṁ viśvabharttustisro mudrāstrimātrāstrividhagativaśāt karmasaṁkalpadivyāḥ ||
analyzed: etat mṛdu ādi bhedaiḥ trividham api bhavet sādhanam viśvabharttuḥ tisraḥ mudrāḥ tri mātrāḥ trividha gati vaśāt karma sakalpa divyāḥ

original: ṣaḍañgayogasya viśiṣṭaḥ paricayaḥ pūrvamatra ṣaḍaṅgayogavidhiḥ saṁkṣepeṇa vivecito'dhunā ca tadviśiṣṭaḥ paricayo'tra yathākramaṁ prastūyate
analyzed: ṣaḍañga yogasya viśiṣṭaḥ paricayaḥ pūrvam atra ṣaḍaṅga yoga vidhiḥ sakṣepeṇa vivecitaḥ adhunā ca tad viśiṣṭaḥ paricayaḥ atra yathākramam prastūyate

original: pṛthagjānāṁ cakṣurādivijñānāni svasvendriyadvāraiḥ rūpagandharasādiviṣayeṣu pravartante yathā ca madhumakṣikāḥ puṣparasamanubhavanti |
analyzed: pṛthagjānām cakṣuḥ ādi vijñānāni sva sva indriya dvāraiḥ rūpa gandha rasa ādi viṣayeṣu pravartante yathā ca madhumakṣikāḥ puṣpa rasam anubhavanti
pratyāhārasya 'prati iti eva śabdaḥ ekādaśasu artheṣu prayujyate
paran ca atra niṣedha arthakaḥ eva
āhāra śabdaḥ tu tyāga arthakaḥ

original: pañcendriyāṇāṁ pañcaviṣayebhyaḥ sambandhaṁ vicchidya vijñāne tatsaṁhṛtya jñānasvabhāvātmakapañcendriyāṇāṁ pañcaprabhāsvarasvabhāvaviṣaye praveśīkaraṇameva  #
analyzed: pañca indriyāṇām pañca viṣayebhyaḥ sambandham vicchidya vijñāne tat sahṛtya jñāna svabhāva ātmaka pañca indriyāṇām pañca prabhāsvara svabhāva viṣaye praveśīkaraṇam eva
pratyāhāraḥ
etad abhiprāyaḥ ayam sāmānya ābhāsam parihāya jñāna ābhāsa avasthitiḥ eva pratyāhāraḥ asti
guhya samāja uttara tantre ca uktam daśānām indriyāṇām tu sva vṛtti sthānām tu sarvatas
pratyāhāram iti proktam āhāra pratipattaye
vajrapāṇiḥ cakrasavaraṭīkāyām ākāśa lakṣaṇa bhāvanām eva pratyāhāra sādhanām pratyapādīt
nirābhāsasya cittasya sthitiḥ ākāśa lakṣaṇā
ākāśa bhāvanā eva eṣā
śūnyatā bhāvanā matā
etad abhyāsāt nirvikalpa vāyoḥ madhyamāyām sa grahasya sāmarthyam āyāti

original: sādhanāvidhiḥ kālacakratantre pratyāhāro jinendro bhavati daśavidhaḥ evaṁ ca - pratyāhāro daśānāṁ viṣayaviṣayiṇāmapravṛttiḥ śarīre |
analyzed: sādhanā vidhiḥ kālacakra tantre pratyāhāraḥ jinendraḥ bhavati daśavidhaḥ evam ca pratyāhāraḥ daśānām viṣaya viṣayiṇām apravṛttiḥ śarīre

original: pratyāhāreṇa yogī viṣayavirahito'dhiṣṭhyate sarvamantraiḥ ityādivacobhiḥ pratyāhārasādhanāvidhiḥ pratyapādyata |
analyzed: pratyāhāreṇa yogī viṣaya virahitaḥ adhiṣṭhyate sarva mantraiḥ ityādi vacobhiḥ pratyāhāra sādhanā vidhiḥ pratyapādyata

original: saṁkṣepeṇa viṣayaviṣayiṇoḥ rūpagrahaṇādisambandhaṁ vicchidya cittasya śūnyatāyāṁ pravartanameva pratyāhārasādhanā |
analyzed: sa kṣepeṇa viṣaya viṣayiṇoḥ rūpa grahaṇa ādi sambandham vicchidya cittasya śūnyatāyām pravartanam eva pratyāhāra sādhanā

original: yathā - nāpaneyamataḥ kiñcit prakṣeptavyaṁ na kiñcana |
analyzed: yathā na apaneyam atas kiñcid prakṣeptavyam na kiñcana
draṣṭavyam bhūtataḥ bhūtam bhūta darśī vimucyate

original: etadvacanānusāram apaneyaprakṣeptavyābhyāṁ rāhityaṁ sad citte yathābhūtasthitireva pratyāhārasādhanā |
yathā'thavā janaḥ svarūpamevādarśe paśyati tathaiva svacittarūpyādarśe iṣṭadevarūpaṁ dhyātvā cittasya bāhyaviṣayapravartanādavarodhāvasthitireva  #
analyzed: yathā athavā janaḥ sva rūpam eva ādarśe paśyati tathā eva sva citta rūpya ādarśe iṣṭadeva rūpam dhyātvā cittasya bāhya viṣaya pravartanāt avarodha avasthitiḥ eva

original: uktasthitayoḥ kramaśaḥ rātreḥ dhūmādicatvāraḥ divasasya ca jvālādiṣaḍlakṣaṇāni prakaṭībhavanti |
analyzed: ukta sthitayoḥ kramaśas rātreḥ dhūma ādi catvāraḥ divasasya ca jvālā ādi ṣaṣ lakṣaṇāni prakaṭībhavanti

original: yathā kālacakre pratipāditam- ākāśāsaktacittairanimiṣanayanair vajramārgaṁ praviṣṭaiḥ śūnyāddhūmo marīciḥ prakaṭavimalakhadyota eva pradīpaḥ
analyzed: yathā kālacakre pratipāditam ākāśa āsakta cittaiḥ animiṣa nayanaiḥ vajra mārgam praviṣṭaiḥ śūnyāt dhūmaḥ marīciḥ prakaṭa vimala khadyotaḥ eva pradīpaḥ

original: jvālācandrārkavajrāṇyapi paramakalā dṛśyate bindukaśca tanmadhye buddhabimbaṁ viṣayavirahitānekasambhogakāyam ||
analyzed: jvālā candra arka vajrāṇi api parama kalā dṛśyate bindukaḥ ca tad madhye buddha bimbam viṣaya virahita aneka sambhoga kāyam

original: atredamapi pratipāditaṁ lakṣaṇamadhye pratibimbitaḥ sambhogakāyaḥ kimapi bahirvastu nāsti kintu svīyameva cittam |
analyzed: atrā idam api pratipāditam lakṣaṇa madhye pratibimbitaḥ sambhoga kāyaḥ kim api bahis vastu na asti kintu svīyam eva cittam

original: tasyāṁ sarvajñabimbaṁ payasi ravirivānāvilaṁ viśvavarṇam sarvākāraṁ svacittaṁ viṣayavirahitaṁ nāparaṁ cittameva ||
analyzed: tasyām sarvajña bimbam payasi raviḥ iva anāvilam viśva varṇam sarva ākāram sva cittam viṣaya virahitam na aparam cittam eva

original: śūnyatāyā viṣayādilakṣaṇeṣu prakaṭiteṣu gurūpadeśānusāraṁ devapratibimbaṁ bhāvyate |
analyzed: śūnyatāyāḥ viṣaya ādi lakṣaṇeṣu prakaṭiteṣu guru upadeśa anusāram deva pratibimbam bhāvyate

original: etena ca nāḍīcakraprāṇāyāmādīni dārdyaṁ prāpnuvanti ante ca kramaśo bodhicittamapi susthiraṁ jāyate tacca mahāsukhāptikāraṇaṁ bhavati |
analyzed: etena ca nāḍī cakra prāṇāyāma ādīni dārdyam prāpnuvanti ante ca kramaśas bodhi cittam api susthiram jāyate tat ca mahā sukha āpti kāraṇam bhavati

original: kālacakre'pyuktam- śūnye dhūmādimārgaṁ gurūniyamavaśād bhāvayed viśvasīmno nāḍīcakreṣu tasmāt sthiramapi kurūte prāṇamāpānavāyum |
analyzed: kālacakre api uktam śūnye dhūma ādi mārgam gurūn iyama vaśāt bhāvayet viśva sīmnaḥ nāḍī cakreṣu tasmāt sthiram api kurūte prāṇam āpāna vāyum

original: paścādindornirodhaṁ graha iva kurūte bodhicittasya yogī tasmādyatkiñcidiṣṭaṁ katipayadivasaiḥ prāpyate janmanīha ||
analyzed: paścāt indoḥ nirodham grahaḥ iva kurūte bodhi cittasya yogī tasmāt yat kiñcid iṣṭam katipaya divasaiḥ prāpyate janmani iha
dhyānam ālambane citta sthairyyam eva dhyānam
dhyānam ca yogasya ādhāra bhūtam
etat su dṛda tayā anya āśritāḥ yogāḥ dṛdībhavanti
prabhāsvara ābhāsita lakṣaṇeṣu prajñā kalpanā vivarta rati sukha ātmaka ekāgra tā ādīni eva dhyānasya svarūpāṇi

original: guhyasamājottaratantre cāpi- kalpanaṁ dhyānamucyeta taddhayānaṁ pañcadhā bhavet |
analyzed: guhya samāja uttara tantre ca api kalpanam dhyānam ucyeta tat hayānam pañcadhā bhavet
vitarkam ca vicāram ca
prītiḥ ca eva sukham tathā
cittasya ekāgra tā ca eva
pañca ete dhyāna sagrahāḥ

original: kālacakre'pyuktam- prajñā tarko vicāro ratiracalasukhaṁ dhyānamapyekacittam ||
analyzed: kālacakre api uktam prajñā tarkaḥ vicāraḥ ratiḥ acala sukham dhyānam api ekacittam
arthāt prabhāsvarasya ekādaśa lakṣaṇa cintanam prajñā
kalpanā bhāvān gṛhṇāti
atra ca bhāva sa jña śūnya rūpa lakṣaṇa jñānam kalpanā asti

original: śūnyasvarūpalakṣaṇajñānasya kevalaṁ cittena vicāraṇameva nāpitu tasyānubhavo'rthāt viṣayaviṣayirahitaniścayātma-kānubhavavidhānameva vitarkaḥ  #
analyzed: śūnya sva rūpa lakṣaṇa jñānasya kevalam cittena vicāraṇam eva na api tu tasya anubhavaḥ arthāt viṣaya viṣayi rahita niścaya ātmaka anubhava vidhānam eva vitarkaḥ
mīmāsā

original: dhyānānuprāṇite sati bāhyaśarīre ābhyantaracitte ca yaḥ sukhānubhavaḥ sā ca prathamā ratiḥ ( prītiḥ) |
analyzed: dhyāna anuprāṇite sati bāhya śarīre ābhyantara citte ca yaḥ sukha anubhavaḥ sā ca prathamā ratiḥ prītiḥ
sukham ucyate
etena ca prasrabdhiḥ labhyate

original: atra kālacakrānusāreṇa 'tanmadhye buddhabimbaṁ viṣayavirahitānekasambhogakāyam ' etena ca samādherasāmānyalakṣaṇabhūtaḥ sambhogakāyaḥ prādurbhavati,
analyzed: atra kālacakra anusāreṇa 'tad madhye buddha bimbam viṣaya virahita aneka sambhoga kāyam etena ca samādheḥ asāmānya lakṣaṇa bhūtaḥ sambhoga kāyaḥ prādurbhavati
pañca abhijñā ādi jñānāni ca prāpyante

original: kālacakre- pañcābhijñānalābhī bhavati narapate dhyānayogena śudhāḥ |
analyzed: kālacakre pañca abhijñāna lābhī bhavati narapate dhyāna yogena śudhāḥ
prāṇāyāmaḥ prāṇa vāyoḥ āyāma nirodha ādi karaṇam vistāraḥ vā eva prāṇāyāma śabda arthaḥ
prāṇa vāyoḥ gati avarodhanena amṛta āyuḥ dīrgha āryuḥ
samavāpyate saha eva ca prāṇāyāmāt mahat sukham upalabhyate

original: kālacakre nāgādyān sādhayitvā pravarasuranarā yoginā sādhanīyāḥ |
analyzed: kālacakre nāga ādyān sādhayitvā pravara sura narāḥ yoginā sādhanīyāḥ
dhūma ādyān sādhayitvā maraṇa bhaya karāḥ madhyamā sādhanīyāḥ
prāṇa ādyān sādhayitvā dravita śaśadharāḥ bindavaḥ sādhanīyāḥ
sat saukhyam sādhayitvā sahaja jina tanuḥ sarva gāḥ sādhanīyāḥ

original: pratyāhāreṇa samādhinā ca śūnyatārūpimahāmudrāyāḥ pratibhāsanantaraṁ prāṇāyāmena mṛtyurjīyate,
analyzed: pratyāhāreṇa samādhinā ca śūnyatā rūpi mahāmudrāyāḥ pratibhāsa anantaram prāṇāyāmena mṛtyuḥ jīyate
vajra deha prāptiḥ ca bhavati

original: vajradehe kramaśaḥ tilakamadhikṛtya sahajasukhāptireva prāṇāyāmasya mukhyaṁ prayojanam |
analyzed: vajra dehe kramaśas tilakam adhikṛtya sahaja sukha āptiḥ eva prāṇāyāmasya mukhyam prayojanam

original: vajradehasya dīrghāyuṣyasya ca prāptiṁ binā jīvane'smin paramapadamavāptuṁ na śakyate |
analyzed: vajra dehasya dīrgha āyuṣyasya ca prāptim binā jīvane asmin parama padam avāptum na śakyate
atas pūrvam aparimita āyuṣaḥ prāptiḥ vidheyā

original: ādau saṁrakṣaṇīyā sakalajinatanurmantriṇāṁ siddhihetoḥ kāyābhāve na siddhirna ca paramasukhaṁ prāpyate janmanīha |
analyzed: ādau sa rakṣaṇīyā sakala jina tanuḥ mantriṇām siddhi hetoḥ kāya abhāve na siddhiḥ na ca parama sukham prāpyate janmani iha

original: tasmāt kāyārthahetoḥ pratidinasamaye bhāvayennāḍiyogaṁ kāye siddhe'nyasiddhistribhuvananilaye kiṅkaratvaṁ prayāti ||
analyzed: tasmāt kāya artha hetoḥ prati dina samaye bhāvayet nāḍi yogam kāye siddhe anya siddhiḥ tribhuvana nilaye kiṅkara tvam prayāti
kāya sarakṣaṇa artham prāṇāyāma anuṣṭhānam āvaśyakam

original: kālacakre'pi- prāṇāyāmo dvimārgaḥ skhalanamapi bhavenmadhyame prāṇaveśaḥ |
analyzed: kālacakre api prāṇāyāmaḥ dvi mārgaḥ skhalanam api bhavet madhyame prāṇa veśaḥ
vāma dakṣiṇayoḥ lalanā rasanayoḥ mārgaḥ madhyamā mārge vilīyate

original: rasanāyāṁ pravahamānānāṁ pṛthvyādhdhātunāṁ pañcaviṣayāṇāṁ ca vilīnatvāt te daśākārā bhavanti |
analyzed: rasanāyām pravahamānānām pṛthvyāt dhātunām pañca viṣayāṇām ca vilīna tvāt te daśa ākārāḥ bhavanti
seka uddeśa ṭīkāyām lalanā pañca maṇḍala dharmiṇaḥ madhyamā abhinna aṅgena japtavyaḥ

original: kālacakre prāṇāyāmavidhiḥ - ghrāṇe randhradvayena tvapi pihitamukhe bāhyavātaḥ samastaḥ prāṇenākṛṣya vegāt taḍidanalanibho ghaṭṭito'pānavāyuḥ
analyzed: kālacakre prāṇāyāma vidhiḥ ghrāṇe randhra dvayena tu api pihita mukhe bāhyavātaḥ samastaḥ prāṇena ākṛṣya vegāt taḍit anala nibhaḥ ghaṭṭitaḥ apāna vāyuḥ

original: kālenābhyāsayogād vrajati samarasaṁ candrasūryāgnimadhye annādyaṁ kṣutpipāsāmapaharati tanau cāmaratvaṁ dadāti ||
analyzed: kālena abhyāsa yogāt vrajati sama rasam candra sūrya agni madhye annādyam kṣudh pipāsām apaharati tanau ca amara tvam dadāti

original: prāṇāyāmasādhanāṁ pañcakrame cāpi nāgārjunaḥ samājottaratantre 'caturdevī paripṛcchā vyākhyātantre' vajramālādi tantrāṇi samuddhṛtya spaṣṭīkṛtavān
analyzed: prāṇāyāma sādhanām pañcakrame ca api nāgārjunaḥ samājottara tantre vajramālā ādi tantrāṇi samuddhṛtya spaṣṭīkṛtavān
hevajre ca api prāṇāyāma sādhanā vivecitā

original: etadgranthābhiprāyo'yameva yat pañcaprabhāmayavāyūn dvādaśāṅgulād ṣoḍaśāṅgulaparyantamākṛṣya nāsikāgre sthāpayet |
analyzed: etad grantha abhiprāyaḥ ayam eva yat pañca prabhāmaya vāyūn dvādaśa aṅgulāt ṣoḍaśa aṅgula paryantam ākṛṣya nāsikā agre sthāpayet

original: nābhikṣetre śvāsasthitau satyām apanavāyuṁ balādupari samākṛṣya prāṇāyāme caikīkṛtya kumbhakaṁ vidheyam |
analyzed: nābhi kṣetre śvāsa sthitau satyām apanava āyum balāt upari samākṛṣya prāṇāyāme ca ekīkṛtya kumbhakam vidheyam
kumbhakasya dīrgha sthitiḥ apekṣyate
praśvāsaḥ yugapad na grāhyaḥ
kiñcid parityajya tat bandhanam kāryyam

original: pūrṇataḥ praśvāsaparityāgāt kumbhakaṁ cirakālaṁ na sthātumarhati |
analyzed: pūrṇataḥ praśvāsa parityāgāt kumbhakam cira kālam na sthātum arhati

original: śvāse om kumbhake ca hū praśvāse ca āḥ ityeteṣu cittamavadheyam |
analyzed: śvāse om kumbhake ca hū praśvāse ca āḥ iti eteṣu cittam avadheyam

original: ataḥ aoṁ hūṁ āḥ iti prāṇāyāmasyāṅgam |
analyzed: atas aom hūm āḥ iti prāṇāyāmasya aṅgam

original: kvacit kumbhake āḥ praśvāse hūṁ śvāse ca om athavā mahāmāyātantre praśvāse om kumbhake hū śvāse ca āḥ ityeteṣu cittamavadheyaṁ bhavati |
analyzed: kvacid kumbhake āḥ praśvāse hūm śvāse ca om athavā mahāmāyā tantre praśvāse om kumbhake hū śvāse ca āḥ iti eteṣu cittam avadheyam bhavati
prāṇāyāma anuṣṭhāne śvāsa gatiḥ krameṇa sūkṣmā ati sūkṣmā jāyate

original: śvāsapraśvāsāvadhau nāsikāyāṁ laghuvastrasthāpanena hastasthāpanena vā svālambane smṛtistiṣṭhati |
analyzed: śvāsa praśvāsa avadhau nāsikāyām laghu vastra sthāpanena hasta sthāpanena vā sva ālambane smṛtiḥ tiṣṭhati
mālāmantra uccāram antareṇa ayam vidhiḥ api ucyate
sāmānya avasthāyām api śvāsaḥ tīvra tayā grāhyaḥ praśvāsaḥ tu manda tayā eva

original: prāṇāyāma-sādhanāvidhiḥ kālacakre itthaṁ suspaṣṭīkṛto'sti - dṛṣṭe bimbe prakuryāt pratidinasamaye prāṇavāyornirodhaṁ yāvadvai bhrāmyamāṇaṁ  #

analyzed: sva tanu parivṛtam dṛśyate raśmi cakram

original: ṣaṇmāsaiḥ sparśahīnaṁ vrajati samasukhaṁ mārgacittaṁ yatīnāṁ rāgārāgāntamādyaṁ kṣaṇamapi ca vibhorvadhate śvāsasaṁkhyam ||
analyzed: ṣaṣ māsaiḥ sparśa hīnam vrajati sama sukham mārga cittam yatīnām rāga arāga antam ādyam kṣaṇam api ca vibhoḥ vadhate śvāsa sakhyam

original: pratyāhāreṇa samādhinā ca devarūpapratibimbanānantaraṁ prāṇāyāmābhyāsastāvad vidheyo yāvacca svaśarīrāntaḥ prabhāmayaṁ vāyucakraṁ paribhramat  #
analyzed: pratyāhāreṇa samādhinā ca deva rūpa pratibimbana anantaram prāṇāyāma abhyāsaḥ tāvat vidheyaḥ yāvat ca sva śarīra antar prabhā mayam vāyu cakram paribhramat  /
sat dṛṣṭam na syāt

original: etadabhyāsena prāṇāyāmamelanena cāgnerūtpattiḥ sampūrṇe śarīre sūkṣmanāḍīnāṁ tatra ca saṁcaritasya vāyoḥ śukraśoṇitādīnāṁ ca suspaṣṭaṁ darśanaṁ  #
analyzed: etad abhyāsena prāṇāyāma melanena sampūrṇe śarīre sūkṣma nāḍīnām tatra ca sa caritasya vāyoḥ śukra śoṇita ādīnām ca su spaṣṭam darśanam
jāyate

original: evamābhāsodbhavānantaraṁ ṣaṇmāsaparyantaṁ prāṇāyāmānuṣṭhānena śukraśoṇitādīni suspaṣṭāni dṛśyante ,
analyzed: evam ābhāsa udbhava anantaram ṣaṣ māsa paryantam prāṇāyāma anuṣṭhānena śukra śoṇita ādīni su spaṣṭāni dṛśyante
etena ca śukra skhalanam avarūdhyate

original: tadanu ca indriyadvayāliṅganaṁ vinaiva yogī akṣaramahāsukhamārgeṇa śūnyatārūpeṇa praveṣṭumarhati |
analyzed: tadanu ca indriya dvaya āliṅganam vinā eva yogī akṣara mahāsukha mārgeṇa śūnyatā rūpeṇa praveṣṭum arhati

original: kālacakratantre-nigaditam- yā śaktirnābhimadhyād vrajati parapadaṁ dvādaśāntaṁ kalāntaṁ sā nābhau saṁnirūddhā taḍidanalanibhā daṇḍarūpotthitā  #
analyzed: yā śaktiḥ nābhi madhyāt vrajati para padam dvādaśāntam kalā antam sā nābhau sa nirūddhā taḍit anala nibhā daṇḍa rūpa utthitā  /
ca

original: cakāccakrāntaraṁ vai mṛdulālitagatiścālitā madhyānāḍyāṁ yāvaccoṣṇīṣarandhre spṛśati haṭhatayā sūcivad bāhyacarma ||
analyzed: cakāt cakra antaram vai mṛdu lālita gatiḥ cālitā madhyā nāḍyām yāvat ca uṣṇīṣa randhre spṛśati haṭha tayā sūci vat bāhya carma
āpānam tatra kāle parama haṭha tayā prerayet ūrdhva mārge

original: uṣṇīṣaṁ bhedayitvā vrajati varapuraṁ vāyuyugme nirūddhe ||
analyzed: uṣṇīṣam bhedayitvā vrajati vara puram vāyu yugme nirūddhe
evam vajra prabhedāt manasi sa viṣayāt khecara tvam prayāti
pañca abhijñā svabhāvā bhavati punar iyam yoginām viśva mātā

original: śaktirarthāt prāṇavāyuḥ pṛthvidhātutaḥ dvādaśāṅgulātmake vistāre jalaṁ ( dhātutaḥ )
analyzed: śaktiḥ arthāt prāṇa vāyuḥ pṛthvi dhātutaḥ dvādaśa aṅgula ātmake vistāre jalam dhātutaḥ

original: trayodaśāṅgulavistāre agnidhātuḥ caturdaśāṅgulātmake vistāre vāyudhātutaḥ pañcadaśāṅgulātmakavistāre ākāśadhātuśca ṣoḍaśoṅgulamātraṁ vistāre  #
analyzed: trayodaśa aṅgula vistāre agni dhātuḥ caturdaśa aṅgula ātmake vistāre vāyu dhātutaḥ pañcadaśa aṅgula ātmaka vistāre ākāśa dhātuḥ ca ṣoḍaśa ūṅgula mātram vistāre

original: huṅkārasvarūpaṁ svanāsikāmādhyamena lalanārasanayoḥ sakāśāt vahatoḥ prāṇāpānayormadhyamāyāṁ praviṣṭayoḥ vidyudiva nirmalā bhavanti,
analyzed: huṅkāra sva rūpam sva nāsikā mādhyamena lalanā rasanayoḥ sakāśāt vahatoḥ prāṇa apānayoḥ madhyamāyām praviṣṭayoḥ vidyut iva nirmalāḥ bhavanti

original: nābhicakrāt kramaśo haṭhayogena ūrdhvagatiṁ kurvāṇāḥ sarvanāḍīgranthīn saṁbhedya uṣṇīṣaparyantaṁ prāpnuvanti |
analyzed: nābhi cakrāt kramaśas haṭha yogena ūrdhva gatim kurvāṇāḥ sarva nāḍī granthīn sa bhedya uṣṇīṣa paryantam prāpnuvanti
tatas bahis nirgatya sādhakaḥ parakāya praveśa khecara ādi śuddha bhūmi gamana prabhṛti siddhīn prāptum arhati

original: brahyarandhraṁ yāvat prāptyantaraṁ sādhakaḥ punaḥ mahāsukhaṁ saṁsrāvya adhogatiṁ vidadhānaḥ maṇicakrakendraṁ praviśati |
analyzed: brahyarandhram yāvat prāpti antaram sādhakaḥ punar mahāsukham sasrāvya adhogatim vidadhānaḥ maṇicakraka indram praviśati

original: kālacakratantre suvyaktam - vātaiḥ saṁghaṭṭamānaistaḍidanalaśikhā drāvayenmūrdhni candraṁ yo yo bindurdruto'smād galahṛdayagato nābhiguhye
analyzed: kālacakra tantre su vyaktam vātaiḥ sa ghaṭṭamānaiḥ taḍit anala śikhāḥ drāvayet mūrdhni candram yaḥ yaḥ binduḥ drutaḥ asmāt galahṛdaya gataḥ nābhi guhye

original: bindoḥ spandadravaṁ yat kuliśamaṇigataṁ saṁnirūddhaṁ dhvajāgre prajñājñānakṣaṇaṁ tad yadi dadati sukhaṁ bindumālācyutena ||
analyzed: bindoḥ spanda dravam yat kuliśa maṇi gatam sa nirūddham dhvaja agre prajñā jñāna kṣaṇam tat yadi dadati sukham bindu mālā acyutena

original: ūrdhvādhogatayorayaṁ vidhiranyagrantheṣu ānandacatuṣṭayasya kṣaṇacatuṣṭayasya ca saṁjñayopakṛto'sti |
analyzed: ūrdhva adhas gatayoḥ ayam vidhiḥ anya grantheṣu ānanda catuṣṭayasya kṣaṇa catuṣṭayasya ca sajñayā upakṛtaḥ asti

original: brahyarandhrāt prāṇavāyuṁ bahirniṣkāsya sādhako mṛtyumapi prāptumarhati |
analyzed: brahya randhrāt prāṇa vāyum bahis niṣkāsya sādhakaḥ mṛtyum api prāptum arhati
atas tena adhas gati ūrdhva gatyoḥ nirantaram abhyāsaḥ vidheyaḥ
mātṛtantre caṇḍālīsādhanā vidhiḥ ayam eva

original: kālacakre- praṇāyāmaḥ samantāt samasukhafalado mastake yāvadiṣṭastasmādūrdhvaṁ hyaniṣṭo maraṇabhayakaraḥ skandhanirnāśahetuḥ |
analyzed: kālacakre praṇāyāmaḥ samantāt sama sukha fala daḥ mastake yāvat iṣṭaḥ tasmāt ūrdhvam hi aniṣṭaḥ maraṇa bhaya karaḥ skandha nirnāśa hetuḥ

original: uṣṇīṣaṁ bhedayitvā paramasukhapade yo vrajan vai niyojyaḥ skandhābhāve'pi yogī viśati samasukhaṁ kintu loke prasiddhaḥ ||
analyzed: uṣṇīṣam bhedayitvā parama sukha pade yaḥ vrajan vai niyojyaḥ skandha abhāve api yogī viśati sama sukham kintu loke prasiddhaḥ
mudrā sevanayā api sādhanā iyam anuṣṭhīyate

original: viṣaye'sminnapi tatraiva- madhye prāṇapraveśaḥ saraviśaśigaterbandhanaṁ savyavāme cittaṁ mudrāprasaṅge paramasukhagataṁ vajrasambodhanaṁ ca
analyzed: viṣaye asmin api tatra eva madhye prāṇa praveśaḥ saravi śaśi gateḥ bandhanam savya vāme cittam mudrā prasaṅge parama sukha gatam vajra sambodhanam ca

original: padye vajradhvanirvā svakarasalilajollālanaṁ saukhyahetor bījātyāgaḥ sasaukhyau maraṇabhayaharaḥ śrīgurorvaktrametat ||
analyzed: padye vajra dhvaniḥ vā sva kara salilaja ullālanam saukhya hetoḥ bīja a tyāgaḥ sa saukhyau maraṇa bhaya haraḥ śrī guroḥ vaktram etat

original: prāṇāyāme siddhe sati bodhisattvaiḥ sādhakaḥ pūjayiṣyate |
analyzed: prāṇāyāme siddhe sati bodhisattvaiḥ sādhakaḥ pūjayiṣyate
buddhaiḥ vyākṛtaḥ san mahā siddhim lapasyate
atra bodhisattva padasya nītārthaḥ indriyāṇi
arthāt devacakṣuḥ divyakarṇa prabhṛtīnām siddhiḥ sampatsyate

original: kālacakre viṣaye'sminnapi- tasmānniḥ spandasaukhyaṁ kṣaṇamiha sahajaṁ dharmadhāturdadāti |
analyzed: kālacakre viṣaye asmin api tasmāt niḥ spanda saukhyam kṣaṇam iha sahajam dharmadhātuḥ dadāti

original: prāṇenākṛṣya sarvān rasagatiṣu gatān kleśamārān nihatya |
analyzed: prāṇena ākṛṣya sarvān rasa gatiṣu gatān kleśa mārān nihatya
ṛddhim sarvajña bhūmim tribhuvana guru utām yoginām janmani iha

original: mṛtyuṁ mārgapraviṣṭo vrajati yadi tadā tadgrahādanyajātyā ||
analyzed: mṛtyum mārga praviṣṭaḥ vrajati yadi tadā tad grahāt anya jātyā
dhāraṇā yadi api dhāraṇā śabdaḥ grāhya grāhaka ubhaya arthayoḥ prayujyate
paran ca atra dhāraṇā abhiprāyaḥ prāṇa vāyu tilakayoḥ bodhi citte sthirīkaraṇam

original: samānyataḥ pañcasu cāthavā ṣaḍnāḍī-cakreṣu vāmadakṣiṇayoḥ uparyadhaśca pravahadvāyoḥ madhyānāḍyāṁ sthite tilake'vasthitirhi dhāraṇākhyaṁ yogāṅgamasti
analyzed: samānyatas pañcasu ca athavā ṣaṣ nāḍī cakreṣu vāma dakṣiṇayoḥ upari adhas ca pravahat vāyoḥ madhyā nāḍyām sthite tilake avasthitiḥ hi dhāraṇa ākhyam yoga aṅgam asti
vastutas viśeṣa abhyāsena lalāṭa cakra stha tilake prāṇa sthiti karaṇam eva dhāraṇā

original: sekoddeśaṭīkāyamapi - svamantraṁ hṛdaye dhyātvā prāṇabindugate nyaset |
analyzed: seka uddeśa ṭīkā ayam api sva mantram hṛdaye dhyātvā prāṇabindu gate nyaset
nirūddham atīndriyam ratnam dhārayet dhāraṇam smṛtam

original: prāṇāpānayornābhicakre saṁmiśraṇaṁ yāvat hṛdayadyanyacakreṣu kumbhakabhāvanā na sambhāvayte |
analyzed: prāṇa apānayoḥ nābhi cakre samiśraṇam yāvat hṛdaya di anya cakreṣu kumbhaka bhāvanā na sambhāvayte

original: ataḥ prāṇāyāmadvārā nābhikṣetre prāṇāpānamelanena guhyalakṣaṇānāmāvirbhāvānantarameva dhāraṇā sādhanīyā |
analyzed: atas prāṇāyāma dvārā nābhi kṣetre prāṇa apāna melanena guhya lakṣaṇānām āvirbhāva anantaram eva dhāraṇā sādhanīyā

original: prāṇāyāmena kramaśaḥ nābhicakrahṛdayacakrakaṇṭhacakreṣu vāyuṁ gamanāgamanavirahitaṁ kṛtvā lalāṭasthatilake tad vilayakaraṇameva dhāraṇā |
analyzed: prāṇāyāmena kramaśas nābhi cakra hṛdaya cakra kaṇṭha cakreṣu vāyum gamana āgamana virahitam kṛtvā lalāṭa stha tilake tat vilaya karaṇam eva dhāraṇā

original: kālacakratantre'pyuktam- kṛtvā paryaṅkabandhaṁ vikasitavadano'nyonyadantaṁ spṛśenna ākṛṣṭo bāhyavātastadamṛtaśaito nābhimadhye praviṣṭaḥ |
analyzed: kālacakra tantre api uktam kṛtvā paryaṅka bandham vikasita vadanaḥ anyonya dantam spṛśet na ākṛṣṭaḥ bāhyavātaḥ tad amṛta śaitaḥ nābhi madhye praviṣṭaḥ

original: saṁtāpaṁ kṣutpipāsāṁ harati varatanau saṁnirūddho viṣaṁ ca śveto bindurlalāṭe svaparikarito muñcamāno'mṛtaṁ ca ||
analyzed: sa tāpam kṣudh pipāsām harati vara tanau sa nirūddhaḥ viṣam ca śvetaḥ binduḥ lalāṭe sva parikaritaḥ muñcamānaḥ amṛtam ca

original: guhyasamājottaratantre cāpyuktam- svamantraṁ hṛdaye dhyātvā prāṇabindugataṁ nyaset |
analyzed: guhya samāja uttara tantre ca api uktam sva mantram hṛdaye dhyātvā prāṇabindu gatam nyaset
nirūddhya ca indriya ratnam dhārayan dhāraṇam smṛtam

original: anusmṛtiḥ pratyāhārāṅgadvārā bhāvitaṁ śūnyarūpaṁ dhyānāṅgena paripoṣyate |
analyzed: anusmṛtiḥ pratyāhāra aṅga dvārā bhāvitam śūnya rūpam dhyāna aṅgena paripoṣyate

original: prāṇāyāmena nāḍī-vāyutilakāni niyantrya dhāraṇayā tilakaṁ madhyamāyāṁ sthirīkriyate |
analyzed: prāṇāyāmena nāḍī vāyu tilakāni niyantrya dhāraṇayā tilakam madhyamāyām sthirīkriyate

original: pratyāhāradhyānābhyāṁ dṛdīkṛtaṁ śūnyarūpamākāśavad tadanusmṛtikaraṇameva anusmṛtyākhyaṁ yogāṅgamāste |
analyzed: pratyāhāra dhyānābhyām dṛdīkṛtam śūnya rūpam ākāśa vat tad anusmṛti karaṇam eva anusmṛti ākhyam yoga aṅgam āste

original: guhyasamājottaratantre- vibhāvya yadanusmṛtyā tadākāraṁ tu saṁsmaret |
analyzed: guhya samāja uttara tantre vibhāvya yad anusmṛtyā tad ākāram tu sasmaret
anusmṛtiḥ iyam jñeyā pratibhāsaḥ atra jāyate

original: sekoddeśaṭīkāyāmapi matamidaṁ suspaṣṭīkṛtam- pratyāhāradhyānābhyāṁ sthirī-kṛta-tridhātupratibhāsātmakasaṁvṛtisatyasya saṁsfaraṇamarthāt tasya  #
analyzed: seka uddeśa ṭīkāyām api matam idam su spaṣṭīkṛtam pratyāhāra dhyānābhyām sthirīkṛta tri dhātu pratibhāsa ātmaka sa vṛti satyasya sa sfaraṇam arthāt tasya
nikhila ākāśe vyāpti vidhānam eva anusmṛtiḥ

original: bustonaḥ anusmṛtilakṣaṇaṁ suspaṣṭayan akathayat- dhāraṇāṅgasya sādhanābalena nābhikṣetre caṇḍālīṁ prajvālya caṇḍālīsvabhāve pratibimbasadṛśa-nirvikalpatridhātukātmakasveṣṭadevasya  #
analyzed: bustonaḥ anusmṛti lakṣaṇam suspaṣṭayan akathayat dhāraṇā aṅgasya sādhanā balena nābhi kṣetre caṇḍālīm prajvālya caṇḍālī svabhāve pratibimba sadṛśa nirvikalpa tri dhātuka ātmaka sva iṣṭadevasya
ābhāsa sthitiḥ eva anusmṛtiḥ

original: kālcakratantre cāpi- caṇḍālyālokanaṁ yad bhavati khalu tanau cāmbare'nusmṛtiḥ syāt |
analyzed: kālcakra tantre ca api caṇḍālī ālokanam yat bhavati khalu tanau ca ambare anusmṛtiḥ syāt
sādhakasya indriyāṇām mṛdu madhyama uttama bhedena bheda trayam

original: sumeroḥ kaṇasadṛśānanta-mahāmudrābhiḥ sākaṁ samāhitatvavidhāyakaḥ uttamaḥ jñānātmakamahāmudrayā saha madhyamaḥ karmamahāmudrayā saha samāhitaḥ  #
analyzed: sumeroḥ kaṇa sadṛśa ananta mahāmudrābhiḥ sākam samāhita tva vidhāyakaḥ uttamaḥ jñāna ātmaka mahāmudrayā saha madhyamaḥ karma mahāmudrayā saha samāhitaḥ
sādhakaḥ ca mṛduḥ asti
kālacakre api etat mṛdu ādi bhedaiḥ trividham api bhavet sādhanam viśvabhartuḥ
tisraḥ mudrāḥ tri mātrāḥ trividha gati vaśāt karma sakalpa divyāḥ

original: sādhanāsthalaṁ kālacakre itthaṁ suspaṣṭīkṛtam - etā mudrāścatasro'kṣarasukhafaladā yoginā bhāvanīyāḥ |
analyzed: sādhanā sthalam kālacakre ittham su spaṣṭīkṛtam etāḥ mudrāḥ catasraḥ akṣara sukha fala dāḥ yoginā bhāvanīyāḥ
sarvasmin sarvakālam surata rati gataiḥ loka mārgaḥ prayuktaḥ
grāma araṇya śmaśāne aśuci śuci nilaye veśma devālaye ca
varṇa a varṇa abhicāraiḥ tanu bala sukha daiḥ anna pāna ādi bhogaiḥ
sāmānyatas yathā pratyāhāra aṅgena kāya vajra sādhanā vidhīyate
dhyāna aṅgena tatra dṛdatā prāpyate

original: prāṇāyāmena ca vāyuṁ niyantrya vāgvajrasādhanā kriyate dhāraṇayā ca tatra dārdyaṁ sampādyate tathaivānusmṛtyā cittavajraḥ sādhyate samādhinā  #
analyzed: prāṇāyāmena ca vāyum niyantrya vāc vajra sādhanā kriyate dhāraṇayā ca tatra dārdyam sampādyate tathā eva anusmṛtyā citta vajraḥ sādhyate samādhinā
ca tat dārdyam prāpya parama padam avāpyate

original: kālacakre pitṛtantramātṛtantrābhyāṁ bhinnaṁ uṣṇīṣakaṇṭhahṛdayeṣu nāḍīcakre ca pṛthak pṛthak caturbindūnāmastitvamurarīkṛtam |
analyzed: kālacakre pitṛ tantra mātṛ tantrābhyām bhinnam uṣṇīṣa kaṇṭha hṛdayeṣu nāḍī cakre ca pṛthak pṛthak catur bindūnām astitvam urarīkṛtam

original: ete bindavaḥ jāgradādicaturavasthāsu vāyunā spanditāḥ santaḥ nānābhramān janayanti |
analyzed: ete bindavaḥ jāgrat ādi catur avasthāsu vāyunā spanditāḥ santaḥ nānā bhramān janayanti
yathā jāgrat avasthāyām ūrdhvabhāgīyāḥ sarva vāyavaḥ uṣṇīṣa cakre
adhobhāgīyāḥ sarva vāyavaḥ ca nābhi cakre sagṛhyante

analyzed: svapna avasthāyām api ūrdhva vāyavaḥ kaṇṭha cakre adhobhāgīyāḥ ca guhya indriye sa gṛhītāḥ śabda mātram vāc bhrāntim ca utpādayanti

analyzed: suṣuptau ūrdhva bhāgīyāḥ sarva vāyavaḥ hṛdaya cakre adhobhāgīyāḥ ca maṇi cakre ekatrībhūya nirvikalpāḥ asfuṭāḥ santaḥ bhrāntim utpādayanti

original: purūṣastriyoḥ samāpatyavasthāyām ūrdhvabhāgīyāḥ sarvavāyavo nābhicakre adhovāyavaśca guhyendriyāgrabhāge saṁgṛhītāḥ sukhānubhūtiṁ srāvaṁ cotpādayanti

original: duṣcaryāmapahāya samādhinā cittaṁ karmayogyaṁ vidhāya caturāryasatyasya ṣoḍaśākāreṇa prajñābhāvanayā tatsākṣātkurūte yastasya falarūpeṇa srotāpatteḥ  #

original: 2. pratyekabuddhayānam atra kṣaṇamātraṁ vijñānaṁ paramārthe dṛṣṭvā ṣoḍaśākāreṣu caturāryasatyabhāvanā śrāvayānena samaṁ vidhīyate |

original: parañcātra tadbhāvanayā sārdhaṁ gambhīrapratītyasamutpādasya samanvayātmikā bhāvanā svapṛthageva vaiśiṣṭyamādhatte |

analyzed: ittham pratyekabuddha yāne fala rūpeṇa pratyekabuddhaḥ arhat padam samavāpya kāya saketaiḥ dharmam diśati

original: 3. bodhisattvayānam etadyānasya sādhako nikhiladharmeṣu nairātmyaṁ nirūpya paropakārabhāvanāyāṁ daśapāramitāścatuḥsaṁgrahavastūni ca samācaryya  #

original: 4. kriyātantrayānam etatsādhakaḥ kalaśamukuṭābhiṣekātparam ātmathatāṁ paramārthataḥ catuṣkoṭirahitāṁ viśuddhāṁ jñātvā devatathātādiṣaṭtattvaiḥ  #

original: 6. yogatantrayānam atra sādhakaḥ vajraśiṣyābhiṣekeṇa sahācāryābhiṣekamapi gṛhṇāti paramārthataśca animittadharmatādhiṣṭhānaṁ saṁvṛtivajradhātudevatvena  #

original: dṛṣṭvā pañcābhisambodhibhiḥ pratihāryya-catuṣṭayena ca svayaṁ devabhāvanāṁ vidhāya jñānasattvadevāvāhanena sākaṁ tacca svayamātmani vilīya caturmudrāyāṁ  #
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā pañca abhisambodhibhiḥ pratihāryya catuṣṭayena ca svayam deva bhāvanām vidhāya jñāna sattva deva āvāhanena sākam tat ca svayam ātmani vilīya caturmudrāyām

original: baddhvā pūjārcanāntaraṁ visarjanaṁ sampādya āntarikasamādhi-caryāyāḥ śucyādibāhyacaryāyāḥ sevanena falarūpākaniṣṭhabhūmau paramapadaṁ samavāpnoti
analyzed: baddhvā pūjā arcana antaram visarjanam sampādya āntarika samādhi caryāyāḥ śuci ādi bāhya caryāyāḥ sevanena falarūpā kaniṣṭha bhūmau parama padam samavāpnoti

original: 7. mahāyogatantrayānam etadayānasya sādhakaścaturvidhābhiṣekebhyaḥ saṁgṛhītānuśaṁsā-sāmarthyaṁ gambhīrābhiṣekeṇopacitya mauladarśane ( vāstavikasādhanāyāṁ
analyzed: mahā yoga tantra yānam etat ayānasya sādhakaḥ caturvidha abhiṣekebhyaḥ sa gṛhīta anuśasā sāmarthyam gambhīra abhiṣekeṇa upacitya maula darśane vāstavika sādhanāyāḥ
nikhila dharmān citta prabhāsvara śūnyatā bhinna mahā dharmakāye buddhvā mārge utpatti krama niṣpanna kramayoḥ guhya abhiṣekam samavāpya vāyu tilakasya

original: yuganaddhakramasya cābhyāsaṁ kurvāṇaḥ ekasminneva janmani anuttarabodhiṁ labhate |
analyzed: yuga naddha kramasya ca abhyāsam kurvāṇaḥ ekasmin eva janmani anuttara bodhim labhate
atiyoga tantra yānam sādhakaḥ atra prādhānyena caturtha abhiṣekeṇa abhiṣicyate

original: darśane samastabhavān nirvāṇadharmāṁśca ādikālatī buddhasvabhāve nirūpya cittavargopadeśanihitacaryāśca vidadhāti |
analyzed: darśane samasta bhavān nirvāṇa dharmāḥ ca buddha svabhāve nirūpya citta varga upadeśa nihita caryāḥ ca vidadhāti

original: sarvasādhyaniṣedhebhyaḥ prahāṇagrahaṇebhyaśca uccatamaḥ san sa mārgācaraṇaṁ kurvan samantabhadrabuddhapadamadhigacchati |
analyzed: sarva sādhya niṣedhebhyaḥ prahāṇa grahaṇebhyaḥ ca uccatamaḥ san sa mārga ācaraṇam kurvan samantabhadra buddha padam adhigacchati

original: etāni nava yānāni yadi mārgāvasthāntargatāni nirdhāryyante tadā tu yānatraya eva samāviśanti |
analyzed: etāni nava yānāni yadi mārga avasthā antargatāni nirdhāryyante tadā tu yāna trayaḥ eva samāviśanti
hīnayānam śrāvakayānam
mantra yānam ca
etat yāna trayam abhisamayasya uttarottara vṛddhyai a parihāryam
etat vivaraṇam anyatra nirūpitam

original: upasaṁhāraḥ vastuvādivicārakānatiricyānyasarvadharmadarśanānāṁ vicārakāśced dārśanikānāṁ zhaṁzhāvāteṣu na nipatanti tarhi tattvaviṣaye sarve  #
analyzed: upasahāraḥ vastuvādi vicārakān atiricya anya sarva dharma darśanānām vicārakāḥ ced dārśanikānām zhazhā vāteṣu na nipatanti tarhi tattva viṣaye sarve
sthitim ekām prāpnuvanti

original: yathā bauddha-vijñānavādinaḥ viśvaṁ svacittasya vistāraṁ mattvā cittasvarūpammanyante kimidameva cittaṁ sṛṣṭikartu nābhavat ?
analyzed: yathā bauddha vijñāna vādinaḥ viśvam sva cittasya vistāram mattvā citta svarūpam manyante kim idam eva cittam sṛṣṭi kartu na abhavat

original: mādhyamikāḥ vastutaḥ sarvatattvānāmekātāmaṅgīkurvanti kinta-deva cittaṁ sṛṣṭerādhārabhūtaṁ na sambhāvyate ?
analyzed: mādhyamikāḥ vastutas sarva tattvānām ekātām aṅgīkurvanti kintat eva cittam sṛṣṭeḥ ādhāra bhūtam na sambhāvyate
vajrayāne tu sva kāyaḥ eva sampūrṇa brahya aṇḍam

original: caturviṁśātipīṭhasthānānāṁ daśabhūmīnāṁ ca vyavasthā'pi etasminneva kāye bhavati yacca svayameva sṛṣṭikāraṇaṁ jāyate |
analyzed: catur viśā ati pīṭhasthānānām daśa bhūmīnām ca vyavasthā api etasmin eva kāye bhavati yat ca svayam eva sṛṣṭi kāraṇam jāyate
īśvara vādī hinduḥ vā kriścanaḥ muslimaḥ vā

original: sarve'pi etat prabhāsvaracittaṁ yacca catuṣkoṭivinirmuktaṁ niṣprapañcatattvaṁ vartate,
analyzed: sarve api etat prabhāsvara cittam yat ca catuṣkoṭi vinirmuktam niṣprapañca tattvam vartate

original: tasya bhinnanāmabhiḥ etasyaiva tattvasya vyākhyāṁ svapaddhatyā kurvanti |
analyzed: tasya bhinna nāmabhiḥ etasya eva tattvasya vyākhyām sva paddhatyā kurvanti

original: cittaśamanāvasthāyām atra ko'pi bhedo na vidhātuṁ śakyate |
analyzed: citta śamana avasthāyām atra kaḥ api bhedaḥ na vidhātum śakyate

original: tenaiva sarvadharmeṣu siddhamahāpurūṣāḥ samupalabhyante iti dṛśyate'smābhiḥ |
analyzed: tena eva sarva dharmeṣu siddha mahā purūṣāḥ samupalabhyante iti dṛśyate asmābhiḥ

original: abhisamayālaṅkāre maitreyanāthaḥ prāvocat - nāpaneyamataḥ kiñcit prakṣeptavyaṁ na kiñcana |
analyzed: abhisamaya alaṅkāre maitreya nāthaḥ prāvocat na apaneyam atas kiñcid prakṣeptavyam na kiñcana
draṣṭavyam bhūtataḥ bhūtam bhūta darśī vimucyate

original: pratyekaṁ janaḥ svasvayogyatayā pariśrameṇa copalabdhavibhinnatattvāni nirvahan vyavahāre dhyānakṣetre ca ślokasyāsyārthānusaraṇaṁ vidadhyāttarhi  #
analyzed: pratyekam janaḥ sva sva yogyatayā pariśrameṇa ca upalabdha vibhinna tattvāni nirvahan vyavahāre dhyāna kṣetre ca ślokasya asya artha anusaraṇam vidadhyāt tarhi
sukhī bhavitum arhati

original: janaḥ sukhī bhavettarhi rāṣṭraṁ viśvaṁ cāpi sukhi bhavitumarhati |
analyzed: janaḥ sukhī bhavet tarhi rāṣṭram viśvam ca api sukhi bhavitum arhati
bhaviṣyam vartamānasya falam bhavati

original: vartamāne śobhane sati bhaviṣyamapi samīcīnaṁ bhavati |
analyzed: vartamāne śobhane sati bhaviṣyam api samīcīnam bhavati

original: nātra saṁśitileśaḥ cejjīvanamidaṁ sukhamayaṁ etatkramaśca sukhamayo varteta tahryagre kā'vaśyakatā nirvāṇasya |
analyzed: na atra sa śiti leśaḥ ced jīvanam idam sukha mayam etad kramaḥ ca sukha mayaḥ varteta kā āvaśyaka tā nirvāṇasya

original: āvaśyakaṁ cedameva yadasīmitam akhaṇḍam agocaraṁ ca tattvaṁ,
analyzed: āvaśyakam ca idam eva yat asīmitam akhaṇḍam agocaram ca

original: tat svabuddhiviṣayaṁ na kuryāt nāpi ca tatra bāhyavyavasthāmādhārīkṛtya bhedaṁ kuryāt |
analyzed: tat sva buddhi viṣayam na kuryāt na api ca tatra bāhya vyavasthām ādhārīkṛtya bhedam kuryāt

original: akhaṇḍatayā samabhāvena tāṭasthyena nirvikalpabhāvena ca pravartanādeva vajrayānasya vāstavikaṁ darśanaṁ tattvaṁ ca jñātuṁ śakyate, nānyathā
analyzed: akhaṇḍa tayā sama bhāvena tāṭasthyena nirvikalpa bhāvena ca pravartanāt eva vajrayānasya vāstavikam darśanam tattvam ca jñātum śakyate nā anyathā

original: vajrayānīyaparamparā viṣaye'smin cirakālaṁ prāyatanta pratyakṣānubhūtiṁ cākārṣuḥ |
analyzed: vajrayānīya paramparāḥ viṣaye asmin cira kālam prāyatanta pratyakṣa anubhūtim ca akārṣuḥ

original: naitāvadevāpi tu jīvane'sminneva sthitimimāmanubhūya nijacaramotkarṣasādhanāvidhiṁ vyakasiṣuḥ |
analyzed: nā etāvat evā api tu jīvane asmin eva sthitim imām anubhūya nija carama utkarṣa sādhanā vidhim

original: sampradāyagatabheda-buddhimapahāya nirapekṣabhāvena cenmūlyāṅkanaṁ vidhīyeta tarhi nūnameva mānavahitaṁ setsyatyasmāt |
analyzed: sampradāya gata bheda buddhim apahāya nirapekṣa bhāvena ced mūlya aṅkanam vidhīyeta tarhi nūnam eva mānava hitam setsyati asmāt
viśvasya bhaya āvaha sthitau adya tāntrika darśana sādhana āpaddhateḥ nitānta āvaśyaka tvam pratīyate
āśāsyate mayā
yat etam viṣayam mānavaḥ nija jīvane caritā arthayiṣyati

original: grantharacanājanyapuṇyānubhāvenāpi prāṇinaḥ samyaksambodhiṁ prāpnuyuriti pariṇāmanāṁ vidadhāmi |
analyzed: grantha racanā janya puṇya anubhāvena api prāṇinaḥ samyaksambodhim prāpnuyuḥ iti pariṇāmanām vidadhāmi
teṣām śarīrāṇi namaskaromi yatra uditam tat vara citta ratnam
yatra apakāraḥ api sukha anubandhī sukha ākarāḥ tān śaraṇam prayāmi

original: vaṅchukadorjenegī bhikṣuṇā praṇītā bhāratīyasaṁskṛtapaṇḍitadharmadattacaturvedena ca sampāditā vajrayānadarśanamīmāṁsākhyā kṛtiriyaṁ paripūrṇatāmagāt
analyzed: bhikṣuṇā praṇītā bhāratīya saskṛta paṇḍita dharmadatta catur vedena ca sampāditā vajrayāna darśana mīmāsā ākhyā kṛtiḥ iyam paripūrṇa tām agāt
śubham astu sarva jagatām
